DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg032

32 On a first stone to the east of the same temple.


śrî-Hariharâya namaḥ ǁ

I.
smita-sita-kusuma-śrîś châru-dôr-daṇḍa-śâkhaḥ
kara-kisalaya-râgô bhôgi-vallî-pinaddhaḥ |
chatura-chita-phalâḍhyaś Śaṃbhunârâyaṇô vô
vîtaratu phalam ishṭaṃ santataṃ kalpa-vṛikshaḥ ǁ
Dhruvêśvara-gurôr̤ putraṃ Mahâdêva-budhaṃ numaḥ |
pîtaṃ yasya yaśô-haṃsyâ para-vidvad-yaśaḥ-payaḥ ǁ

[page 65]svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ | Kâñchî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ | Yadu-
vaṃśâṃbara-dyumaṇi | su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi | śrî-Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa-dêva-charaṇa-smaraṇa-pariṇatân-
taḥkaraṇaṃ | Yâdavâbharaṇaṃ | Pâṇḍya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ | parichchhêdi-gaṇḍaṃ | Râjiga-
Chôḷa-manô-bhaṅgaṃ | sâhasôttuṅgan ity-âdi-nâmâvaḷî-virâjamâna-mânônnatânûna-têjô-nidhâna śrî-
mad-Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-Dêva-vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-
târaṃ-baraṃ saluttav ire ǁ

vṛi ǁ
II.
mîr̤uvev eṃba maṇḍaḷikar ill adaṭinde bayalge vandu mey- |
dôr̤uvev eṃba vikramigaḷ illa kunuṅgi kaḷald aḷaldu kâyp- |
âr̤i poḍarppu-geṭṭu besakeyvavar allade mikka tanna kâyp-|
êr̤ida têjadiṃ Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-mahîpan id êṃ pratâpiyô ǁ
kaṃ ǁ
III.
mîr̤i madavêr̤i gele tale- |
dôr̤i raṇôtsavadin ântu nija-bhuja-baḷamaṃ |
tôr̤idaḍe Javana muḷisaṃ |
tôr̤ade mâṇdapane Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-mahîpaṃ ǁ

tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ svasti samasta-sa-mada-sâmanta-sâmaja-samâja-kaṇṭhîravaṃ | raṇa-raṅga-
Bhairavaṃ | Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-pada-kamaḷa-parâga-tiḷakita-lalâṭa-paṭṭaṃ | svâmi-drôha-saṅghaṭṭa-gha-
raṭṭaṃ | pratibhaṭa-niśâṭa-kôṭî-samuchchâṭana-paṭutara-mantra-prayôga-chatura-Châṇakyaṃ | man-
tri-maṇḍaḷa śikhaṇḍa-mâṇikyaṃ | ripu-nṛipa-sainya-sâgara-samuttaraṇa-samagra-pratyagra-Pavana-
nandanaṃ | dig-aṅganâ-tuṅga-kucha-sthaḷa-sthâsaka-yaśaś-chandanaṃ | nirupama-bhakti-bhâra-samâ-
râdhita-nija-pati-vitîrṇṇa-Kumâra-nâmâbharaṇaṃ | śrî-karaṇaṃ | nija-prajâ-samadhika samanushṭhita-
sakaḷa-prajâ-rakshaṃ | sarvvâdhyakshan ity-âdi-nâmâvaḷi-virâjita-râjat-têjô’dhirâja-śrîmad-Vijaya-
Pâṇḍya-Dêva-prâjya-râjya-sthirîkaraṇa-daksha-dakshiṇa-dôr-ddaṇḍa-maṇḍita-mahâ-pradhâna śrîmad-
Vijaya-Permmâḍi-daṇḍanâthan eseyuttav ire ǁ

vṛi ǁ
IV.
besan ên ennada vîrar illa bhayadiṃ mûviṭṭiyiṃ bandu jî- |
visad irpp uddhatar illa pêḷda-besanaṃ mârkkoṇḍu kayvârddu bâ-|
ḷva sa-mudrârigaḷ ill enal Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-śrî-mahîpaṅge sâ-|
dhisidaṃ râjyaman ê-pratâpa-nidhiyô Permmâḍi-daṇḍâdhipaṃ ǁ
kaṃ ǁ
V.
er̤agada-virôdhi-varggama-|
n er̤agisi nija-patige Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-mahîpaṅg |
er̤agisidaṃ sâmrâjyama-|
n ar̤iye jagaṃ Vijaya-Permma-daṇḍâdhîśaṃ ǁ

vachana ǁ â-vijaya-lakshmî-viḷâsa-viḷasita-nija-bhuja-Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-Dêva-pâda-padmôpajîvi | svasti
samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ | Banavâsi-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ | vânara-dhvaja-
mṛigêndra-lâñchhanaṃ | Permmaṭṭi-tûryya-nirgghôshaṇaṃ | chatur-aśîti-nagarâdhishṭhita-Lalâṭa-
lôchana-Chaturbbhujaṃ | jagad-viditâshṭâdaśâśvamêdha-dîkshâ-dîkshitaṃ | Himavad-girîndra-
rundra-śikhara-śakti-saṃsthâpita-nijânvaya-prakaṭitôrjjita-pratâpa-śîḷâ-staṃbhaṃ | baddha-mada-gaja-
mahâ-mahimâbhirâmaṃ | Kâdaṃba-chakri-Mayûravarmma-vaṃśôdbhavan | Uchchaṅgi-giri-nâthaṃ |
śrî-Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa-dêva-labdha-vara-prasâdan enisida Kêtarasaṅgaṃ tan-manô-nayana-chakô-
rôtpaḷa-chandrikey enisida Kanakabey-arasigaṃ |

kaṃ ǁ
VI.
mada-lêkhâ-viḷasita-sura- |
radanige sorkk udiyip-ante ripu-vanaja-vana-|
pradaḷana-paṭu kîrtti-byâ- |
pta-diśaṃ Nâgati-nṛipâḷan ind udiyisidaṃ ǁ

tad-guṇônnatiy ent endaḍe |

vṛi ǁ
VII.
kara-rârâjita-maṇḍalâgra-nihata-dviḍ-bhûtaḷâdhîśa-bhî- |
kara-bhû-chhâyan aśêsha-viśruta-kavi-brâta-pra-chêtar̤-priyaṅ- |
[page 66]karan udyat-kamaḷâdhinâthan udayâdityaṃ-bol end-enduv î- |
dhare baṇṇippudu Nâgati-kshiti-taḷâdhîśâgra-saṅ-gaṇyanaṃ ǁ

alladeyuṃ ǁ

kaṃ ǁ
VIII.
eregoḷvud akhiḷa-vidvad- |
daridratâ-piśitamaṃ dvishad-râja-manô- |
hara-maṇḍaḷamuman avanî- |
vara-Nâgatiyarasan-atuḷa-baḷa-bhuja-bhujagaṃ ǁ
kaṃ ǁ
IX.
âtan-anujâtan upamâ- |
tîta-parâkrama-guṇânvitaṃ ripu-nṛipati- |
brâta-śalabhôtkara-pra- |
dyôtita-têjô’gniy enisuvaṃ Hariy-arasaṃ ǁ
kaṃ ǁ
X.
â-Nâgati-nṛipatige muṃ |
bhânuge tat-Karṇṇan udiyip-ant udiyisidaṃ |
dâna-gunônnata-satya-ni- |
dhânaṃ Kêtarasan akhiḷa-budha-jana-sarasaṃ ǁ

vachana ǁ mattav â-Nâgati-kshitîśaṅge ǁ

XI.
Mâcharasan eṃban akhiḷa-ka- |
ḷâ-chaturaṃ tanayan âgi pesarvaḍedaṃ dhâ- |
trî-chakra-nâtha-tiḷakaṃ |
yâchaka-jana-nikara-kamaḷa-ramaṇa-tanûjaṃ ǁ

vachana ǁ antu pogaḷtegaṃ negaḷtegaṃ neley âda Sâyira-nâḍa manneyaṃ Nâgatiyarasanuv âtana kir̤iy-
ayya Hamparasanuṃ Sattiyarasanuv â-Nâgatiyarasana tamma Hariyarasanuṃ kumâraṃ Kêtarasa-
nuṃ Mâcharasanuṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadin irdd ondu-divasav âdi-râja-charita-dharmma-kathâ-
śravaṇa-datta-śravaṇar âgi para-baḷa-vijaya-vanitâ-haraṇa-samudyatar-ante dharmmâbhimukhar
enisi śrîmat-svayaṃbhu-Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa-dêvar-anâdiy-agrahâraṃ Kûḍalûra tamma nibandhiya
kâṇike-sahita manneyamuman â-vûra kâluvaḷḷiy enisida Beḷvaḍiya tamma nibandhiya kâṇike-sahita
manneyamumaṃ Śaka-varsha 1093 r̤eneya Vikṛita-saṃvatsarada Pushya-bahuḷa-pâḍiva-Śukra-
vârad uttarâyaṇa-saṅkramaṇad andu śrîmat-svayambhu-Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa-dêvara divya-śrî-pâda-
padmaṅgaḷge â-chandrârkka-sthâyiy âgi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭaru î-dharmmamaṃ rakshisida-
vargge Vâraṇâsi-Kurukhsêtrârgghyatîrttha-Gayâ-Prayâga-śrî-Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa-sthânâdi-mahâ-puṇya-
kshêtraṅgaḷalli amâvâsye-sûryya-grahaṇa-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkramaṇa-vyatîpâtâdi-puṇya-tithigaḷalu
śaṅkha-mahâśaṅkha-saṅkhyâ-samanvitam enipa chatur-vvêda-vêdâṅga-vêdântâdi-vidyâ-viśêshakar
a-gaṇya-puṇyar enipa bhûmi-dêvôttamargge pratyêkaṃ kôṭi-kôṭi-suvarṇṇa-varṇṇada kavilegaḷa kôḍu-
gaḷaṃ ponnoḷu koḷagugaḷaṃ beḷḷiyoḷ kaṭṭi kâṃsya-dôhana-pâtraṃ berasu kâmadhênu-samânav enipa
dhênugaḷaṃ yathôktadiṃ dânaṃ geyda phalav akku ǁ (usual imprecatory phrases and verses)

EC 11 Dg 33
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg033

33 On the same stone.


svasti śrîmat-Śaka-varsha 1095 neya Nandana-saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapada-śuddha-tadige-Bṛihaspati-
vârad andu ǁ

padya ǁ
I.
vinatêndraṃ Vishṇu daivaṃ guṇa-gaṇa-nidhi-Permmâḍi-daṇḍâdhinâthaṃ |
janakaṃ saubhâgya-bhâgyânvite negaḷda Mahâdêvi tây viśva-vidvaj- |
jana-sêvyaṃ Sôma-Dêvaṃ tanag anujan enal dhâtriyoḷ bâppu sâmâ- |
nyane Viśvâmitra-gôtrârṇṇava-tuhinakaraṃ Dugga-daṇḍâdhinâthaṃ ǁ

[page 67]śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ Banavase-pannirchchhâsirad adhikâri śrîmad-Duggarasa-daṇḍanâyakaru
śrîmad-anâdiy-agrahâraṃ Kûḍalûra mahâjanaṃ nûr̤a-nâlvargge hoṅge tiṅgaḷiṅge hâga-vriddhiyalu
koṭṭa gadyâṇa 10 ttuṃ akshayav âgi vṛiddhiyalu nandâdîvige â-chandrârkka-sthâyiy âgi śrî-Śaṅkara-
Nârâyaṇa-dêvargge mahâjanaṅgaḷu naḍasuvant âgi dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭaru ǁ

EC 11 Dg 34
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg034

34 At the same place, on a 2nd stone.


śrî-Hariharâya namaḥ namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

I.
namas tasmai Gaṇêśâya nityaṃ yad-gaṇḍa-maṇḍalê |
bhṛiṅga-mâlâ-dvi-guṇitâ dânâṃbhaḥ-kaṇa-mañjarî ǁ
jayaty âdi-Varâhô’yaṃ yêna dhatrî samuddhṛitâ |
aṅga-saṅgâd ivâdyâpi sasyaiḥ puḷaka-danturâ ǁ
pâthôrâśi-mahîdharêndra-sutayôḥ sâpatnya-saṃpâdana-
prauḍhaṃ vârshika-śâradâṃbudharayôs sârûpya-saṃbhâvitaṃ |
viśvôtpatti-vipatti-saṅghaṭanayôr êkaṃ nidânam mahaḥ
saṃpatyai bhavatât sadâ Hariharâkâraṃ jagat-kâraṇaṃ ǁ
prakhyâta-rûpaṃ parikarmma-bhûmêr
âvâsa-bhûmir mmahatâṃ manôjñâ |
aty-uchchhritaṃ janma-gṛihaṃ guṇânâṃ
jâgartti vaṃśô Yadu-puṅgavânâṃ ǁ
vibhûshayâmâsa tam anvavâyaṃ
śrî-Saṅgamâkhyô nṛipatir gguṇêna |
srîmân ṛitûnâm iva saṅgham êkaḥ
kâlô vasantaḥ kusumôdayêna ǁ
yasya vâraṇa-ghaṭâ-kaṭa-sthaḷî-
nissaran-mada-jharî-taraṅgitâḥ |
anvakârshur abhitaḥ Kaḷindajâm
âpagâs tad-itarâ nirantaraṃ ǁ
Harihara-nṛipa-Bukka-bhûmipâlâv
iti bhuvi tasya sutâv ubhâv abhûtâṃ |
punar api bhuvanâbhirakshaṇârtthaṃ
samupagatâv iva Rauhiṇêya-Kṛishṇau ǁ
Harihara-narapâlaḥ pâlayâmâsa pṛithvîṃ
mada-jita-ripu-râjô Bukka-Râjâgrajanmâ |
śirasi satatam âjñâ-patrikâṃ dhârayantaḥ
srajam iva narapâlâ yasya sêvâm akârshuḥ ǁ
yasya prastuta-mâtra êva yaśasi Prâḷêya-pṛithvîdhara-
kshôṇî-mâṃsaḷa-mânanîya-mahikâ-sandôha-sandêha-dê |
kaiśchin niśchaya-kôṭibhis sumanasâṃ gôshṭhî-garishṭhair jjanaiś
chêtas tat-kshaṇam âdi-râja-gaṇanâ-vaimukhyam âlaṃbatê ǁ
athânujas tasya jagat-pratîtaḥ
śrî-Bukka-Râjô Vijayâbhidhânâṃ |
Purandara-śrîḥ puram adhyavâtsîd
ramyâm iva Dvâravatîm Mukundaḥ ǁ
lakshmîvân Yadu-vaṃśa-mauktika-maṇir mmâdyad-bali-dhvaṃsanaḥ
sad-vṛindâvana-varttanaika-rasikas satyânuraktâśayaḥ |
[page 68]unmîlad-bala-bhadra-mûrtti-mahitaḥ pṛithvîbhṛid-unmûlana-
prauḍhaḥ kshmâm aśishan Murântaka iva śrî-Bukka-pṛithvîpatiḥ ǁ
santaptâ garaḷôshmaḷê phaṇi-phaṇâ-chakrê svayaṃ mêdinî
nityaṃ saukhya-karaṃ paraṃ punar asâv âkâṅkshamâṇâ padaṃ |
nîrandhrâm abhajishṭa nirvṛitim ati-prauḍhôdayaṃ saṃśritâ
chhâyâ-maṇḍala-śâyinaṃ nirupamaṃ yad-bâhu-kalpa-drumaṃ ǁ
tasmâd Bukka-mahîpâlâch chhrîmân Hariharô nṛipaḥ |
âvirâsît kaḷâ-ślâghyaḥ kshîrâbdhêr iva chandramâḥ ǁ
atha tâm êva nagarîm adhyavâtsîn mahîpatiḥ |
pitrâbhirakshitâṃ pûrvvam Ayôdhyâm iva Râghavaḥ ǁ
prâkârô Hêmakûṭaḥ parisara-parikhâ Tuṅgabhadrâtibhadrâ
sâkshâd ârakshakô’yaṃ kshiti-bhuvana-patiḥ śrî-Virûpâksha-dêvaḥ |
râjâ râjâdhirâjô Harihara-nṛipatiḥ kshôṇi-kâñchî cha Kâñchî
lôkê śâkhâ-puraṃ śrîḥ katham iva vachasâṃ gôcharê syâd ihâsyâḥ ǁ
Bukka-kshôṇibhujaḥ paraṃ Harihara-kshmâpêna râjya-śriyâ
saṃprâptas sachivâgraṇîr vvijayatê śrî-Mudda-daṇḍâdhipaḥ |
nityaṃ nîti-niyantritâri-nṛipati-vrâtaḥ pratâpôdayô
Râmêṇâmita-têjasâ Daśarathân mantrî Sumantrô yathâ ǁ
Harihara-nṛipatir vvidhâya yasminn
akhiḷa-dhuraṃ hṛidi nirvṛitiṃ prayâti |
Harir iva mahitaṃ bharaṃ dharitryâḥ
phaṇa-nivahê phaṇinâm adhîśvarasya ǁ
bhâḷa-dêśa-nihitêna yat-pada-
prânta-rêṇu-bhasitêna santataṃ |
vairiṇaḥ pariharanti bhûbhujô
bhâvinaṃ tam apamṛityum âtmanaḥ ǁ
bhujâlâna-nibaddhasya pratâpa-mada-hastinaḥ |
mada-rêkhâ-śriyaṃ dhattê yasya jyâ-kiṇa-vallarî ǁ
yat-khaḍga-latikâ-pâta-śaṅkâ-vyâkuḷa-chêtasâṃ |
hanta chitraṃ prakaṃpantê śatrûṇâṃ prâṇa-vâyavaḥ ǁ
yasyâgrahâra-dânâṃbu-kulyâ-ślâghyôpaśalyakâ |
a-daivamâtṛikaivâstê samastâpi vasundharâ ǁ
havyâdânâgatêndra-pramukha-paṭa-kuṭî-staṃbha-daṇḍair ivôchchair
ddharmmasyâlaṃba-daṇḍair iva vidhi-vihitair yyajvanâṃ yûpa-daṇḍaiḥ |
tîra-sthair ûrdhva-bâhâ iva bhuvi saritô yan-nisṛishṭâgrahâra-
stômaṃ sarvva-praśastaṃ nija-ninada-mishân nityam udghôshayanti ǁ
praṇayi-jana-pârijâtaḥ sô’yaṃ śrî-Mudda-daṇḍêśaḥ |
śrî-Muddadaṇḍanâyakapuram iti vikhyâtam agrahâra-varaṃ ǁ
Kûḍlûra-janapadântaḥ .... chôchchaṅgi-durggasya |
Chikkahadakâparâkhyaṃ mahita-taṭâkaṃ mahâ-kshêtraṃ ǁ
śaśi-kha-śikhi-chandra-samitê Śâkê Śiddhârtthi-saṃjñitê châbdê |
Kârttika-mâsasya sita-dvâdasyâṃ Bhâskarê vârê ǁ
Hari-bôdha-puṇya-kâlê viprêbhyaḥ prâdita prîtyâ |
shaṭ-triṃśad atra vṛittîḥ ...... śrî-Hariharâya dêvâya ǁ
tatra dvâdaśa dattâ chatasṛibhir adhikâ tu viṃśatis tv anyâ |
tâvat-saṅkhyâvadbhyô viprêbhyô vṛittayas samaṃ dattâḥ ǁ

[page 69]asya grâmasya sîmâ-nirddêśas tu sphuṭa-parijñânârtthaṃ Karṇṇâṭa-bhâshayâ vilikhyatê | (here follow
details of gift and names &c. of vrittidârs) miḷitvâ shaṭ-triṃśad-vṛittayaḥ | asminn agrahârê kshêtra
.... vidyâ.... châgrahârârtthaṃ âgâmi-tat-sarvvaṃ vyaya-jâtaṃ cha shaṭ-triṃsad ....... brâhma-
ṇaiś cha samaṃ vibhajyânubhavanîyaṃ ǁ

II.
pratyartthi-pṛithivîpâla-makuṭa ...... |
........ ra-kshmâpa-śâsanaṃ lôka-śâsanaṃ ǁ

(usual final verses)

III.
êsha śrî-Mudda-daṇḍêśa-dharmma-kalpa-mahîruhaḥ |
nityânubandhî nirvyâjaṃ jîyâd â-chandra-târakaṃ ǁ
śrî-Mudda-daṇḍanâyaka-
sahitaḥ śrî-Harihara-kshmâpaḥ |
avanim akhaṇḍâm avatâd |
anudinam ânanditâśêshaḥ ǁ

śubham astu maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî-Harihara-Râyana voppa śrî-Virûpâksha ǁ

IV.
Harihara-Dêvêna tadâ
viprair êtais samastaiś cha |
svayam anyâpi cha dattâ
Śrîdhara-bhaṭṭâya vṛittir êkâtra ǁ
Ṛik-śâkhâdhyêtâyaṃ
Vâsishṭhaś chêti vikhyâtaḥ |
sapta-triṃśach cha tatô
grâmê’śmin vṛittayas siddhâḥ ǁ

â-agrahâradavara voppa srî-Harihara ǁ

V.
Harihara-dêvarigaṃ bhû- |
sura-tatigaṃ Mudda-mantri dhâreyan er̤ad â- |
vara-Daṇḍanâthapurakaṃ |
Dharaṇôjaṃ baradan ur̤e śilâ-śâsanamaṃ |

śrî śrî śrî

35 At the same place, on a 3rd stone.


I.
namâmi tad vapur nnityam êkaṃ Hariharâtmakaṃ |
samâhita-janânanda-kandaḷî-kanda-varddhanaṃ ǁ
Śrî-Girijâ-priyar śiti-sita-chchhavigaḷ nuta-kaustabha-sphurad- |
bhôgi-vibhûshaṇar vvihaga-râja-vṛishâsanar êka-mûrtti-saṃ- |
yôga-virâjitar Hari-Hara-prabhugaḷ daye-geyg anârataṃ |
râgade Sôma-bhûpatige niś-chaḷa-lakshmiyumaṃ sthirâyumaṃ ǁ
amṛitâṃbhônidhiy emba sejje-vaneyoḷ kallôla-mañchâgra-saṃ- |
stha-mahad-bhôgi-pa-bhôga-taḷpa-taḷadoḷ sad-yôga-nidrâ-paraṃ |
Kamaḷâ-vallabhan irddu viśva-jananakk udyôgisal tat-su-sa- |
tvame rûpaṃ taḷed-ante chinmayan Ajaṃ nâbhy-abjadoḷ puṭṭidaṃ ǁ

antu puṭṭi |

II.
kramadiṃ tat-Padmajaṃ mâḍidan akhiḷa-jagach-chakradoḷ nôḍ elai ma- |
dhyama-lôkaṃ chelvan â-lôkadoḷav ati-manô-hâri tân âdud int â- |
[page 70]dame Jambûdvîpav â-dvîpadoḷav atiśayaṃ Bhâratôrvvî-taḷaṃ ma- |
ttam enittânuṃ tad-urvvî-taḷadoḷav aniśaṃ Kuntaḷa-kshôṇi rayyaṃ ǁ

va ǁ tat-Kuntaḷa-dharâ-taḷâdhipatyadoḷ anêka-Châḷukya-chakrêśvara-pravarttanâ-vyatikramaṇadoḷu |

vṛi ǁ
III.
Danu-sutan orvvan urvvareyan â-raseg uydoḍ avaṅge bhaṅgamaṃ |
janiyisi tanda munnina Mukundana śauryyaman âtma-vikramaṃ |
neneyise Râshṭrakûṭa-nṛipar âḷva dharitriyan iḷḍukoṇḍ agur- |
vvina kali Tailan uddharisidaṃ nija-châru-Chaḷukya-vaṃśamaṃ ǁ

anantara ǁ

vṛi ǁ
IV.
eḷeyaṃ tan-nandanaṃ tâḷdidan avanata-varddhishṇu Satyâśrayôrvvî- |
taḷa-pâḷaṃ mattav alliṃ baḷike tad-anujâtâtmajaṃ tâḷdidaṃ dôr- |
vvaḷa-dṛiptaṃ Vikramâṅkaṃ baḷike tad-anujaṃ tâḷdidaṃ châru-chandrô- |
jvaḷa-kîrtti-vyâpta-saptârṇṇava-parivṛita-bhû-chakran app Ayyaṇayyaṃ ǁ
kaṃ ǁ
V.
kshitiyaṃ kuḷa-kudhara-stana- |
vatiyaṃ kômaḷa-tamâḷa-kuḷa-kuntaḷa-san- |
tatiyaṃ samudra-rasanâ- |
vṛitiyaṃ tad-avarajan âḷdan â-Jayasiṃhaṃ ǁ
vṛi ǁ
VI.
ântaran ikki sâdhisida dhâtrige suttid agaḷ payôdhi ṭhâ- |
ṇântaradoḷ niyôjisida nâyakar â-dig-adhîśar âge niś- |
chinteyin êka-bhôgyav akhiḷaṃ jagav embinav âḷdan â-dharâ- |
kântana sûnu pârtthiva-śirômaṇiy Âhavamalla-bhûbhujaṃ ǁ
ka ǁ
VII.
tat-sutan utpâdita-ripu- |
hṛit-santâpanav enduṃ kunda-Himôrvvî- |
bhṛit-sadṛiśa-kîrtti budha-jana- |
vatsaḷan ene Sôyidêva-bhûpan negaḷdaṃ ǁ

tad-anujaṃ ǁ

vṛi ǁ
VIII.
Magadhâdhîśana nettiyoḷ mur̤ida-kûr-vvâḷ Chôḷan-îr-aḷḷe bi- |
ṭṭege gôd-ant iral urbbi ninda sabaḷaṃ Nêpâḷanâ bâyoḷ â- |
yagav aḍḍaṃ nile naṭṭi kaṭṭid-alag âdaṃ tanna dôr-ggarvvamaṃ |
tri-guṇaṃ mâḍe samastamaṃ taḷedan urvvî-chakramaṃ Vikramaṃ ǁ
kaṃ ǁ
IX.
tad-apatyaṃ sakaḷa-kaḷâ- |
vidan âhava-vijayi kâminî-jana-hṛit-saṃ- |
mada-Madanaṃ negaḷdaṃ bhû- |
viditaṃ Bhûlôkamalla-chakrâdhîśaṃ ǁ

tat-sutaṃ ǁ

vṛi ǁ
X.
Mâlava-mâ-lavâdi-haranaṃ dhṛita-pallava-Pallavâvanî- |
pâḷaka-maṇḍaḷaṃ mukura-basta-yugâtta-laḷâṭa-Lâṭa-bhû- |
mî-lalanâdhipaṃ vipad-anûna-Kaḷiṅga-(kaḷiṅ)-gan embud â- |
bhîḷa-parâkrama-kramanan eyde jagaṃ Jagadêkamallanaṃ ǁ
kaṃ ǁ
XI.
tach-chakrêśânujan asu- |
hṛich-chakra-vidâraṇaika-dakshâsi virâ- |
jach-chandra-viśada-yaśan ene |
nichchaṃ gali negaḷdan alte Nûrmmaḍi-Tailaṃ |

tat-kâladoḷu ǁ

vṛi ǁ
XII.
dharaṇî-chakrakk adhisṭhânam id enisidud âtmîya-dôr-daṇḍav unma- |
tta-ripu-brâtâsu-vâtâśanade taṇidud â-śâta-khaḷgâhi vidvad- |
[page 71]vara-chêtar̤-prîti-santarpaṇade saphalav âyt artthav âśâ-karîndrô- |
tkara-karṇṇôtkîrṇṇav âyt ujvaḷa-yaśav enipaṃ Bijjala-kshôṇipâḷaṃ ǁ
vṛi ǁ
XIII.
toḍardoḍ arȧti-bhûbhujara ben-dovalaṃ heḍa-maṇḍeg etti kû- |
g-iḍasade ketti munn aḍig uruḷchi karuḷgaḷan eyde (sârchchi) gêḷ- |
iḍisade gaṇṭalaṃ ner̤eye kaṇ por̤a-pâyvinav otti mutti bây- |
biḍisade mâṇbane samaradoḷ kali-Bijjala-Dêva-bhûbhujaṃ ǁ
ka ǁ
XIV.
pusiy altu vîra-bhôjyâ |
vasundarâ yeṃba vâkyav ene dhareyaṃ sâ- |
dhisidaṃ teṅk-abdhiya baḍa- |
ga-sîme Châḷukya-kaṭakav ene Bijja-nṛipaṃ ǁ
â-dharaṇîśvara-pada-sê- |
vâdhînaṃ sakaḷa-vimaḷa-guṇa-ratnâṃ- |
bhôdhi nirâkṛita-vidviḍ- |
bâdhaṃ Kasapayya-Nâyakaṃ pesar-vveḍedaṃ ǁ

va ǁ ant anûna-guṇa-nidhânan enisida Kasapayya-Nâyakar dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭânugraha-pûrvvakaṃ
Banavâsi-pannirchchhâsiramumaṃ pratipâḷisuttam iral â-kâladoḷu ǁ

vṛi ǁ
XV.
idu sukhad âgaraṃ Siriya puṭṭida-sâgarav ârayal samabh- |
yudayada gottu satyada tavar-mmane Chittajan-ikke-ṭâṇam un- |
mada-yuvatî-janaṅgaḷ-er̤evaṭṭu budhâḷiya janma-bhûmiy eṃ- |
budan ene śôbheyaṃ taḷedud int aniśaṃ Banavâsi-maṇḍaḷaṃ ǁ
deseyaṃ poṃ-baṇṇadiṃ tiṃbuva-kaḷama-vanaṃ divya-saurabhyadind â- |
gasamaṃ nir-vyâkuḷaṃ pûripa-kusuma-vanaṃ dhâtriyaṃ niryyad-aṃbhar̤- |
prasara-srôtaṅgaḷindaṃ jaḷamayam enip-â-nâḷikêrî-vanaṃ sad- |
bisadiṃ haṃsâḷiyaṃ rakshipa-jaḷaja-vanaṃ rayyav â-nâḍoḷ ellaṃ ǁ
nir̤i-daḷir-doṅgalaṃ taḷed aśôke taguḷd eḷenîra tandalaṃ |
kar̤ev eḷe-deṅgu biṇ-gonegaḷin toṇad-âḍuva kauṅgu bêrggaḷiṃ |
tur̤ug-ire kâyta-bakke sale kaḷtale tân nelegoḷvin-anda .. |
ḍ ir̤id ele-vaḷḷi kaṇg esevuv elliyuv alliya nandanaṅgaḷoḷ ǁ

va ǁ ant anûna-śôbheyaṃ taḷeda Banavâsi-janapadâṅganânana-viḷâsamaṃ tâḷdi |

vṛi ǁ
XVI.
mada-madhupâḷi suttad alar-dôṇṭav agurvvina gandha-śâḷi sut- |
tada bayal añche-viṇḍu ner̤e-suttada pû-goḷan ikshu-vâṭi su- |
ttada purav aṃbuja-pratati suttada per-gger̤e Kâvan-âjñe su |
ttada banav ill enal sogayis-irppudu Nâgarakhaṇḍa-kaṃpaṇam ǁ
ka ǁ
XVII.
âgaḷuv esed-irppudu pun- |
nâga-vanadin eseva-nâga-chaṃpaka-vanadiṃ |
nâgalatâ-vanadiṃ sale |
Nâgarakhaṇḍaṃ viḷâsa-ratuna-karaṇḍaṃ ǁ
parikipoḍ anûna-saurabha- |
bharita-śrîkhaṇḍamuṃ diṭaṃ pratipad-vi- |
sphurita-śaśi-khaṇḍamuṃ Nâ- |
garakhaṇḍamuv âra manamumaṃ sôlisavê ǁ

va ǁ antu sogayisuva Nâgarakhaṇḍav-eppattar̤a-manneyakk-adhipatiyuṃ sudatî-jana-hṛidaya-kumu-
dinî-târâdhipatiyuv enisi ǁ

[page 72]vṛi ǁ
XVIII.
pesar-vvaḍedaṃ nijâcharaṇamaṃ mar̤evettu yugaṃ Kṛitâhvayan |
nisadam ad eyde varttise nijôjvaḷa-kîrttiyan ottu-vettu-var- |
ttise hagaluṃ śaśâṅka-ruchi Râma-śara-prakaraṃ nijôdgha-vâk- |
prasaraman iṃbu-vettu parivarttise Sôma-nṛipâḷan urvviyoḷ ǁ

va ǁ â-maṇḍaḷêśa-maṇi-maṇḍanana viśuddhêddha-vaṃśâvataraṇav ent endaḍe ǁ

ka ǁ
XIX.
Rudraṅgav iḷegav ogedaṃ |
bhadra-kadaṃbâvanija-taṭadoḷ vidviḍ- |
vidrâvaṇan avanata-bhû- |
bhṛid-râji Mayûravarmman emba nṛipâḷaṃ ǁ
nosaloḷ uri-gaṇṇ avaṅg udi- |
yise mar̤ey end alli paṭṭamaṃ kaṭṭade jâ- |
nu-samuddêśadoḷ ant adan |
esad ire kaṭṭidar enalk ad inn ê-vogaḷveṃ ǁ

va ǁ ant a-dabhra-kadaṃba-vṛiksha-sândra-chchhâyayoḷ baḷedan-appudar̤iṃ Kâdaṃba-kulave kulav
âge negaḷda Mukkaṇṇa-Kadaṃba-Mayûravarmmaniṃ baḷiyan tad-vaṃśadoḷ anêka-bhûpâḷaka-pra-
vartanânantaraṃ ǁ

vṛi ǁ
XX.
jagamaṃ tann ârppu nichchan taṇipe daśa-diśâ-chakramaṃ tanna kîrtty-aṃ- |
śugaḷ âdaṃ parvve tann âkṛiti jana-nayanânandamam mâḍe dushṭâ- |
rigaḷaṃ tann ugra-śauryyaṃ ner̤e masuḷisi kîḷ mâḍe tann ujval̤a-ksha- |
tra-guṇaṃ mattâḍhyaraṃ dhikkarisi negaḷdan urvvîśvaraṃ Barmma-Dêvaṃ ǁ
ka ǁ
XXI.
Kâdaṃba-vaṃśa-saṃbhavar |
î-doreyar bbhûpar âruv ill enipa-maha- |
tvôdayaman ântan akhiḷâ- |
śâ-danty-anuvartti-kîrtti Barmma-nṛipâḷaṃ ǁ
â-nṛipa-vanite śarach-chan- |
drânane nava-kâma-kaḷpa-latikâ-tanu bhû- |
mi-nute Kâḷala-Dêvi ka- |
ḷâ-nidhi parivâra-surabhiy ene peser-vvaḍedaḷ ǁ
tat-taneyaṃ ghana-śauryya-Ma- |
rut-taneyaṃ vitaraṇâṃśumat-taneyaṃ lô- |
kôttara-śaucha-guṇêndra-sa- |
rit-taneyaṃ Boppa-Dêva-bhûpaṃ negaḷdaṃ ǁ
vṛi ǁ
XXII.
hoṅg eḍegeṭṭu baṇṭan ol̤akeydu virôdhiyan âmpa vandiyaṃ |
nîgal ad entuv âr̤ad aḷut îva nijêpsita-kâryyav ondan ud- |
yôgisi satyamaṃ nuḍiva bhûbhujaraṃ diṭav appa-vîradiṃ |
châgadin oppuv or-nnuḍiyin âṃ saridappene Boppa-Dêvanoḷ ǁ
sara-nidhi guṇpinoḷ dore Śurêndra-dharâdharav unnatikkeyoḷ |
dore hari śauryyadoḷ dore surâvanijaṃ ghana-dâna-vṛittiyoḷ |
dore śaśi kîrttiyoḷ dore Manôbhavan aṅga-viḷâsad êḷgeyoḷ |
dore yinit akkuv allade nṛipar ddorey appare Boppa-Dêvanoḷ ǁ

tat-sati ǁ

ka ǁ
XXIII.
parivâra-kaḷpa-late pati- |
nirîkshaṇa-bhramara-mallikâ-late vidvat-|
parapushṭa-chûta-latey ene |
Siri-Dêvigav alte sârttha-paryyâyaṅgaḷ ǁ
[page 73]avar-irbbarggaṃ Haraṅgaṃ Giripati-sutegaṃ Shaṇmukhaṃ puṭṭuv-ond-an- |
davan â-Nârâyaṇaṅgaṃ Sirigav anupamaṃ Chittajaṃ puṭṭuv-ond-an- |
davan Indraṅgaṃ tad-Indrâṇigav eseva Jayantaṃ magaṃ puṭṭuv-ond-an- |
davan ânt urvvî-nutaṃ puṭṭidan amaḷa-yaśô-vallabhaṃ Sôyi-Dêvaṃ ǁ
strî-chaya-śêshav âytu ripu-râja-kuḷaṃ nija-vîradinde nir- |
yyâchakav âytu dhâtri nija-dâna-guṇônnatiyinde pûrvva-ka- |
ḷpôchitav âytu Kalki nija-châru-charitradin endoḍ aṇṇa vâg- |
gôcharavê guṇâvaḷi nṛipâḷa-śikhâmaṇi-Sôvi-Dêvana ǁ
avaniyan ânt Anantana manaṃ goḷal ârppudu biṇpu nîradâ- |
dhvavan ........ putrana manaṃ goḷal ârppudu pempu vârddhiyan |
tave tare pîrd-Agastyana manaṃ goḷal ârppudu guṇp enalke pe |
......................... Sôyi-Dêvanol̤ ǁ
ari-bhûmî-kânteyaṃ tôḷ da .................... |

para-jaitra-śrîya ...................... |
...... matte .... rbbaṃ sobagina madadiṃ Sôyi-Dêva ...... ǁ
.......... nṛipan ârppina .... na kûrppin êḷgeya .. |
.. ḍeyuv âva pêḷadeḍe bêḍi kṛitârtthate-vetta-vandigaḷ |
nôḍi jagakke sanda chaturâṅganeyar samarakke vandu .... ṭṭ |
ôḍida .... nnapar ad elliyuv âraye tâve pêḷarê ǁ
ka ǁ
XXIV.
tata-vitatôddhata-vâdya- |
śruti-svara-grâma-mûrchchhanâ-tâna-sama .. |
.... gâna-bhêdadoḷ tân |
ati-chaturaṃ Bharatan-ante Sôma-nṛipâḷaṃ ǁ

XXV.
para-samba .... doḷ kundada nava-nidhi râjâlayô .... doḷ si- |
ddhara saṅkrîḍâ-sarô-madhyadoḷ agala .... maṇi-śrêṇi-bhûshô- |
tkaradoḷ kalpâvanîjaṃ pramada-vanadoḷ uḷḷantevol vêga vi .. |
.. ra ...... divaṃ nṛipati-jana-śirô-maṇdanaṃ Sôyi-Dêvaṃ ǁ

yô rûpaman ar̤idu mushṭi-pa .... |
.. ya laṅghana-gati- |

XXVII.
pu .... dirdd anya-bhûpâḷara .... |
...... maṃ kaṇḍu .. raysada kaṇṇaṃ sîmeyaṃ dâṇṭi |
.......... te ...... gita ........ |
...yuṃ mat-tati nôḍade tôḷaṃ pettana ........ ǁ

...... vṛita ........ doḷ Surarâja-kânte bhûmi-nute ......................... ra kântey endoḍ
inn ân eṇe ...................... de Sôma-bhûmîpana ..................................
sampadâkaranuṃ ........................ savutta ................................
................ pâyô ............................ hômaṃ ..........................
...................... doḷ vettisal vêḷke ...............................................
.... tâmra .................... laviṃ Kadaṃba-ku ............... viṭṭan uṇbesa ..........
...... vidhânakkav â-dêvâ .................................................... dhârâ-
pûrvvakav â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ .................. ndhi-vigrahi .... rimayya nâl̤-prabhu
Saṅka-Gâvuṇḍa.............. Gâvuṇḍagaḷu śrî-Harihara-dêvara nitya-pûje........ ḍav eppatta..
.. vûral aydu-paṇa .... kâlamuṃ naḍav antâgi dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭa ...... int î-dharm-
[page 74]mamaṃ sa-dharmmadiṃ rakshisidavaru Vâraṇâsi-pramukha-tîrttha-kôṭiyoḷu vêda-vêdânta-vêdigaḷ
appa vipra-kôṭige gô-dâna-bhû-dâna-kanyâ-dâna-pramukha-dâna-kôṭiyan aḷaṅkâra-sahita sûryya-
grahaṇa-saṅkramaṇa-pramukha-tîrtta-kôṭiyoḷu koṭi-sûḷu koṭṭa phalav akku (usual imprecation)

EC 11 Dg 36
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg036

36 On the wall to the south of the mahâdvâra of the same temple.


śrî-Hariharâya namaḥ ǁ namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

I.
Śrî-kântas sa jayati kêḷi-kôḷa-mûrttir
llôkârtti-prathita-payôdhi-Kumbhajanmâ |
yad-daṃshṭrâ-vikasita-kêtaka-chchhadâgrê
bhriṅgîva sphurati śubhâ vasundharêyaṃ ǁ
samavatu Gajavadanô vaḥ
śaśvad-viśva-praśasta-vistâraḥ |
anukurutê yaḥ pitaraṃ
mada-jaḷa-miḷitâḷi-nîlita-grîvaḥ ǁ
sâ kalyâṇâvatâraṃ kaḷayatu Kamaḷâvâsa-kântâ sitâmbhaś-
chyôta-jyôtir-vitânâ sakaḷa-kaḷa-sudhâkâya-dâyâda-vaktrâ |
yâ pâdâṃbhôja-bhâjâṃ niravadhi kurutê śrî-viḷâsaṃ viśâlaṃ
kiñcha prôdañchad-indu-dyuti-lahari-parîhâsinô vâg-viḷâsân ǁ
dêvaḥ pâyâd apâyâd vaḥ Śrîśô yasya .. tur nnanu |
trilôkî-bhâminî-bhâḷê kastûrî-tiḷakâyatê ǁ
mauḷi-prôllâsi-pâṇi-sthita-vaḷaya-kaḷâ-sarrppa-talpâbdhi-śâyi-
Śrî-kântâ-nâtha-chakshus-tuhinakiraṇataḥ ↓1śrîra-ruk-paunaruktyaṃ |
kurbban saṃrambha-dûrôchchalita-sura-nadî-śîkarâkâra-sârâs |
târâḥ kshîrâmburâśi-pratima-vana-ruchas tâṇḍavaṃ vaḥ punâtu ǁ
Śrîkântâhvayam asti vastu bhavana-dhvaṃsânabhijñaṃ mahaḥ
sarbbajñaṃ bhuvanôdbhava-sthiti-laya-byâpâra-pâraṅgataṃ |
tan-nâbhî-sarasîruha-bhramaratâm adyâpi vidyôtayan
Dhâtâ nûtana-viśva-sambhạva-kaḷâ-prâgalbhyam abhyasyati ǁ
vaṃśas tat-pâda-janmâ jagati vijayatê yâminî-kâmuka-śrî-
miśrîbhâvaika-bhûmi[s] sva-charita-vibhavâkrânta-dik-chakravâḷaḥ |
tasmin vismêra-têjô-braja-bhuvi jananê vikrama-prakramâsi-
vyâpârâptâri-nârî-jana-nayana-jharî-vâr-samudraḥ sa Rudraḥ ǁ
yô’sau vairi-narêndra-chandravadanâlaṅkâra-sat-kânana-
prôddîpyad-dava-Yâdavânvaya-mahâ-vârâśi-târâpatêḥ |
Kalyâṇâdhipatêr amâtya-tiḷakô Hêmâdri-bhûmîbhujaḥ
śatru-kshatriya-taksha-dakshiṇa-bhuja-stambhas samujjṛiṃbhitaḥ ǁ
kaṇṭhê na dhattê sma vishaṃ dvijihvair
nna saṅgam aṅgîkurutê sma nâpi |
jaḍâśrayô nôgratayâ prasiddhas
tathâpy asau nôjjhita-Rudra-mudraḥ ǁ
tasmâd asmâd ajani rajanî-nâyaka-sphîta-kâya-
jyotir-ddhaṭî-prakaṭita-yaśâ nâyakô Mailayâkhyaḥ |
vairi-kshôṇî-ramaṇa-taruṇî-sajja-dṛik-kajjaḷânâṃ
pratyâdêśa-byasana-rasikô’py arjjakas taj-jalânâṃ ǁ
[page 75]âvis sâvitra-têjô-vijayi-nija-bhûjâ-daṇḍa-chaṇḍa-pratâpas
tasmâd [sî]tâ sva-dâsîkṛita-ripu-nikarô Heggaḍaḥ khaḍga-vîraḥ |
Mailaḥ Kalyâṇa-nâtha-kshitipati-vibhavâmbhôdhi-chandrâvatârô
bhû-jâtaḥ pârijâtas tirayati cha sudhâ-mâdhurîm sâdhu-vâdaiḥ ǁ
tasyâsîd asitôtpala-dyuti-kaḷâ-saurabhya-garbbhêśvara-
↓2sthâyal-lôchana-bibhramâ guṇa-gaṇa-śrî-jyâyasî prêyasî |
nâmnâ yâpi cha Rêvalêti viditâ dhâmnâ cha hêma-prabhâ
dâmnâpi smayatê smitêna cha sudhâ-bhânuṃ mudâ nindati ǁ
tasyâm âvirabûd abhûta-vikṛitâv akshâma-lakshmî-samâ-
vâsô Heggaḍa-nâyakâd guṇa-miḷan-muktâvaḷî-nâyakât |
kîrtti-jyôtir amanda-chandana-payaḥ-prâyaṃ vitanvann ayaṃ
Sômô nâmata êva nâri-taruṇî-vaktrâbja-saṅkôchakaḥ ǁ
khyâtaḥ śrî-Hoysaḷâḷî-kula-jaladhi-sudhâdîdhitir dhî-dhurîṇaḥ
śrî-khêḷach-Chôḷa-Pâṇḍya-prabhṛiti-narapati-sthâpanâchâryya îśaḥ |
vîraḥ śrî-Sôma-bhûmî-parivṛiḍha-tanayô Nârasiṃha-kshitîśô
yat-svâmî Sôma-nâmâ jagati vijayaṭê vâhinî-vallabhô’yaṃ ǁ
nûnaṃ Sôma-chamûnâtha[ḥ] śrî-vâri-kariṇâṃ gaṇaḥ |
anyathâ katham udbhûtir ddânâmbu-saritâm ataḥ ǁ
nirmmitô dharmma-śîlêna kavibhir yyêna varṇyatê |
agrahâras sukhâdhâra-Kâvêrî-saritas taṭê ǁ
kvâpi kvâpi nayâvaḷî-parimiḷan-mîmâṃsayâ mâṃsaḷâḥ
kvâpi kvâpi cha tarkka-karkkaśa-vachô-vîchî-nichôḷikṛitâḥ |
kvâpi kvâpi cha śabda-yajña-kavitâ-saṃvâvadûkâḥ śukâḥ
śrî-vidyâ-nidhi-Sômanâtha-nagarî sâ bhâti bhushâ bhuvaḥ ǁ
Kâvêrî-saritas taṭê Puraharaḥ śrî-Nârasiṃhêśvaraḥ
śrî-Lakshmî-Nṛiharis tathâ Muraharaḥ śrî-Yôga-Nârâyaṇaḥ |
aiśânyaṃ diśi pañcha Pañchavadanâḥ śrî-Bijjaḷêśâdayô
Gopâḷêna Janârddanêna cha saha śri-Kêśavô madhyataḥ ǁ
Mastyâdyâ daśa mûrttayô Muraharâ Nârâyaṇâ dvâdaśa
prâkârêshu cha Kêśavâdaya itaḥ Saṅkarshaṇâdyâs tathâ |
Vishvaksêna-mukhâs tathâ cha bahavaḥ Padmâsanêndrâdinâ
dêvâs Sômapurê sahâpi cha Girâ yêna pratishṭhâpitâḥ ǁ
yasyâgrajô Mêḷaya-nâmadhêyas
sênâpatir vvarddhita-bhâgadhêyaḥ |
yad-bhâginêyô ripu-gâtra-bhallaḥ
śrî-Malli-Dêvô’ri-vanaika-dâvaḥ ǁ
yad-dâna-tôshitâkârâ nirddôshair ggumbhanair ggirâṃ |
âśî-râśi(rm)mayair êvaṃ varṇṇayanti guṇârṇṇavaṃ ǁ
śrî-Sômâhvaya-daṇḍanâyaka-bhujâ-daṇḍa-pratâpârkka-bhûḥ
prâchînâchaḷa-maṇḍaḷîka-parishaj-jṛimbhâkhiḷa-svasti-bhûḥ |
vairi-śrî-hara gâyi-gôvaḷa bhuvi śrî-gaṇḍa-peṇḍâra tê
Chaṇḍîśaḥ śubha-vaibhavaṃ vitanutâd â-chandra-chaṇḍadyuti ǁ
itthaṃ tad-vamśa-jâta-stuti-vitati-miḷad-gîrbhir abhyunnata-śrîs
sphâyach-Chârvvâka-Bauddhâgama-timira-ravis tarkka-tantra-svatantraḥ |
sphûrjaj-Jainâmburâśi-grasana-chaturatâ-Kumbhajanmâvatârô
dhîrô Gaṅgâdharâryyas tilakayati sabhâṃ yaś cha bhâsâṃ nivâsaḥ ǁ
[page 76]Vaikuṇṭhê Nîlakaṇṭhê nigama-nikathitaṃ khyâpayan advayaṃ yaḥ
kshôṇî-vaktrâvatîrṇṇô jagad-udaya-hṛiti-sthairyya-dhuryyêṇa yêna |
drushṭênânêna puṃsâṃ kara-taḷa-kaḷitâ sâpi kaivalya-lakshmîr
akshâmâ(ṃ)sô’ sti dêvo jagati Hariharaḥ yasya dâsaḥ sa Sômaḥ ǁ
Śrî-Gaurî-jîvitaṃ sarpa-chandrôttaṃsitam advayaṃ |
itthaṃ vikattha ṛê yaś cha mahas tatvaṃ sitâsitam ǁ
Harihara parihara duritaṃ
mama tava charaṇâbja-chañcharîkasya |
Harihara niravadhi vitara
tvam anantânanta-bhôga-bhâg-bhâgân ǁ
Śâkê kâlê navati-śataka-prôttarê’smin sahasrê
jâtê’bdânâm upari Vibhavê vatsarê varttamânê |
dêvôttaṃsâkṛiti-Hariharâgâratô dvâra-dêśê
sat-prâsâdaṃ kanaka-[ka]ḷaśais Sôma-nâthôbyadhatta(ṃ) ǁ
gaṇḍa-peṇḍâra-Sômasya daṇḍanâtha-śikhâmaṇêḥ |
dharmmaḥ śarmma-karâkârô jîyâd â-chandra-târakaṃ |
śrî-Kâvêrî-nadî-śôbhita-parisaradoḷ su-sthiraunnatya-châru- |
prâkâraṃ guṇpuvett-â-parikhe mer̤eyal ant alli sômârkka-vîthyâ- ǁ
nekâgâraṅgaḷindaṃ sakaḷa-pura-janâkîrṇṇadiṃ sêbyam â-grâ- |
mâkâraṃ kaṇge nichchaṃ sogayipudu puraṃ Sômanâthâkhyeyindaṃ ǁ
vodavida vêda-śâstra-nikhiḷâgama-tat-pada-mantra-tantra-tar- |
kkada nija-nitya-karmma-kṛita-puṇyada yajña-viśuddha-tatpara- |
tvada sujanatvad ûrjjitada vipra-varêṇyarin intu chelvu-vet- |
tud enalu Sômanâthapurad unnati baṇṇipoḍ innuv aggaḷaṃ ǁ
phaḷa-bhara-namra-nandanada śâḷi-vanaṅgaḷa karbbu-dôṇtad ut- |
paḷa-kamaḷâkaraṅgaḷa ghanôrmmi-vighûrṇṇita-tat-taṭâka-saṃ- |
kuḷada pogaḷte-vetta-pari-kâlgaḷa perchchugey intu santataṃ |
baḷas ire Sômanâthapurav urvvige sarvva-samagra-bhûshaṇaṃ ǁ
pṛavidita-Sômanâthapura-madhyade vistaram âge dêvatâ- ḷ
bhavanaman oppe mâḍisi sa-lakshaṇa-lakshita-mûrtti-vetta Vi- |
shṇuvin-avatâran ille sakaḷâgama-mârggade su-pratishṭhey â- |
duv enalu pempu-vett eseda Sôma-chamûpati gâyi-gôvaḷaṃ ǁ
śrî-gambhîra-Prasanna-Chenna-pesarim śrî-Kêśavaṃ dakshiṇâ- |
bhâga sthânade lôka-môhana-karaṃ Gopâḷa-mûrttaṃ manô- |
râgaṃ mâḷp adhipaṃ Janârddanan ivar mmûrtti-trayaṃ tammoḷ î- |
yôgaṃ tat-pura-madhya-Vishṇu-gṛihadoḷ mukhyaṃ prasiddhôtkaraṃ ǁ
vividha-jayôtsava-karav â- |
davu tat-parisûtradalli parivêshṭitav â- |
dav udagra-sakaḷa-mûrttiga |
ḷ av ellav ant alli tôrkku tara-taradindaṃ ǁ
śrî-Mastyâdi-daśâvatârav anituṃ śrî-(Kêśavâkhyâlliyuṃ) |
śrîman-maṅgala-mûrtti Saṅkarushaṇâdyaṃ bârahaṃ nâmadiṃ |
kshêmaiśvaryya-vara-pradaṅgaḷ enip â-Nârâyaṇâkhyâdigaḷ |
tâmuṃ vârddhi-guṇâṅka-saṅkhyey ivaroḷ Kṛishṇâdiy-ashṭâdaśaṃ ǁ
vara-Gaṇapaṃ Bhairava-Bhâ- |
skara-Vishvaksêna-Durggiy int î-dêvar |
[page 77]pparigaṇita-chatus-saptati- |
pura-madhyade Vishṇu-bhavanadoḷ rañjisuguṃ ǁ
taradind opp ire Bijjalêśvaram ad ant â-mârggadiṃ Perggaḍê- |
śvaram att ûrjjita-Rêvalêśvaramum attaṃ śôbhip â-Ba(y)iṛalê- |
śvarav â-mdhyade Sômanâtha-Siva-liṅgaṃ tat-puraiśânyadoḷ |
chiram app antire mâḍi pempu-vaḍedaṃ śrî-Sôma-daṇḍâdhipaṃ ǁ
vara-mûrtti śrî-Nṛisiṃhêśvaran enipa Bhavaṃ Yôga-Nârâyaṇaṃ su- |
sthiradiṃ Lakshmî-Nṛisiṃhaṃ nelas ire nalaviṃ Sômanâthâkhye-vett â- |
purav â-Kâvêriyâ madhyadoḷ eseye jagad-vandyam âg irppud ant â- |
puram embant artthiyiṃ mâḍidan atuḷa-baḷaṃ Sôma-daṇḍâdhinâthaṃ ǁ
srî-vidyâ-nidhiy emba pempu jasamaṃ bîrutt iral mâḍi sad- |
bhâvôdbhâvita-vêda-śâstra-nikhiḷâchâra-prasiddhâdhvara- |
↓3prâvarttittad udagra-vipra-nivahakk utsâhadind ittan int |
î-vikhyâtiya Sômanâthapuramaṃ śrî-Sôma-daṇḍâdhipaṃ ǁ

âtana vaṃśôtpattiy ent endaḍe ǁ

II.
śrî-Lakshmî-nâtha-nâbhî-naḷina-ja-nija-pâdâbjad iṃpâda vaṃśaṃ |
bhû-lôka-khyativantar ppara-hita-charitar ssvâmi-saṃraksha-dakshar |
śśîlâchârâgragaṇyar gghana-baḷar enip ârûḍharoḷ vîra-lakshmî- |
lôla-śrî-Duddeyaṃ-Nâyakan atuḷa-baḷaṃ gaṇḍa-peṇḍâra-vîraṃ ǁ
unnata-Duddeya-Nâyaka |
Nannave-Nâyakiy ivargge huṭṭidan ati-saṃ- |
pannaṃ Maileya-Nâyaka- |
n-annar ad âr nni ...... vîra-vitaraṇad eḍeyoḷ ǁ
śrî-Kalyâṇa-viśuddha-kîrtti-nagarî-nâthaṃ Chaḷukyânvayâ- |
lôkaṃ śrî-Jagadêkamalla-nṛipa-nâthaṃ mechchuv âḷ embud î- |
lôkaṃ Maileya-Nâyakaṃ birudaroḷ tâṃ gaṇḍa-peṇḍâra-sâ- |
tvîkaṃ sâhasi gâyi-gôvaḷan ati-prakhyâtiyaṃ tâḷdidaṃ ǁ
Maileya-Nâyakan-aṅgane |
Śailasutâ-sadṛise Rebbalâ-Nâyakiyaṃ |
trailôkyaṃ hogaḷuvud ene |
Mailaya-Nâyakana puṇyav ârgg a ...... ǁ
śrîman-Maileya-Nâyakaṅge mahimâvashṭambhe-Rebbavvegaṃ |
Hêmâdri-pratimônnataṃ śaradhi-gambhîra-pracha ...... |
...... rkka-têjô-........ n udbhavisidaṃ trailôkya-vikhyâti-nis- |
sîmaṃ Perggaḍe-Nâyakaṃ balupiniṃ gây-gôvaḷam gâm ...... |
guṇa .......... ḷ |
Triṇayana-sati-sadṛise pati-hitada sampadad a- |
graṇi Rêkave-Nâyaki dhâ- |
riṇi hoga .................... reyaṃ ǁ
śrîmat-Perggaḍe-Nâyakaṅg eseva Rêkâ-Dêvigaṃ huṭṭi tat- |
svâmi-śrî-pada-sêvanâ-pariṇataṃ śrî-gaṇḍa-peṇḍâ .... |
.... Hoysaṅa-Râya-Vîra-Narasimhôrvvîśa-bhṛityaṃ sthiraṃ |
svâmi-drôhara gaṇḍa maṇdaḷika-jûbaṃ Sôma-daṇḍâdhipaṃ ǁ
Hariharanâtha-dêva-bhavanâgrade vistarav âge śôbhe-vett |
ire neley aidan eyde cheluv âgire bâgi .. vâḍa-kâñchanôt- |
[page 78]kara-kaḷasaṅgaḷiṃ rachi.... ṇyada perchchuge dharmmad eḷtaraṃ |
sthirav ene kîrtti-vett eseda Sôma-chamûpati gâyi-gôvaḷaṃ ǁ
Naḷa-Nahusha-Hariśchandrari- |
n aḷavaḍḍada ...... dhura-pratâpade gây-gô- |
vaḷa daṇḍanâtha-Sômani- |
n aḷavaṭṭudu ramya-harmya-nirmmita-dharmmaṃ ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ ........ janâśrayaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ bhaya-lôbha-durllabhaṃ
mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ Yâ...... ra-dyumaṇi sarvvajña-
chûḍâmaṇi malerâja-raja nija-râja-têja malaparoḷu gaṇḍa gaṇḍa-bhêruṇḍa kadana-prachaṇḍa ri......
mârttaṇḍa a-sahâya-śûra para-nârî-dûra êkâṅga-vîra raṇa-raṅga-dhîra Sanivâra-siddhi Sura-mantri-
buddhi giri-durgga-malla ripu-ḥṛidaya-bhalla chalad-aṅka-Râma saṅgrâma-Bhîma vairîbha-kaṇṭhirava
Yadu-kuḷa-kaumudî-kairava Magara-râjya-nirmmûḷanaṃ Chôḷa-râjya-pratishṭhâchâryyaṃ Pâṇḍya-
râjya-samuddharaṇa niśśaṅka-pratâpa-chakravartti śrî-Vîra-Nârasiṃha-Dêv-arasaru abhinava-dakshiṇa-
Dvârâvati nija-râjadhâni-Dôrasamudrada nelevîḍenoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam
iralu tat-pâda-padmôpajîviy appa śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ mantri-mâṇikyaṃ nîti-Châṇâkyaṃ niyôga-
Yôgandharaṃ pati-kâryya-dhurandharaṃ ati-vishama-hayârûḍha-prauḍha rêkhâ-Rêvantanuṃ para-baḷa-
Kṛitântanuṃ svîkâra-sârôdayanuṃ anna-dâna-sva(va)rṇṇa-dâna-kanyâ-dâna-bhû-dâna-gô-dânâdi-
sakaḷa-dâna-vinôdanuṃ gôtra-pavitranuṃ maṇḍaḷika-jûbaṃ gâyi-gôvaḷaṃ gaṇḍa-peṇḍâraṃ svâmi-vañ-
chakara gaṇḍaṃ śrî-Sôma-daṇḍanâthaṃ Śaka-varshada 1190 neya Vibhava-saṃvatsarada Vaiśâkha-
śuddha-pañchamî-Sômavârad andu śrî-vidyâ-nidhi-prasanna-Sômanâthapurav emba agrahâravaṃ
mâḍi alli śrî-Śaiva-Vaishṇava-dêvatâ-bhavanaṅgaḷaṃ mâḍisi â-â-dêvategaḷaṃ su-pratishṭheyaṃ mâḍi
tad-anantaraṃ śrî-Hariharadali Harihara-nâthana dibya-bhavanada pûrvva-dvâradalli aydu suvarṇṇa-
kaḷaśa-sahitav aydu neleyav âgi .... mâḍisi lôka-hitârtthaṃ svârtthav ensi kṛitârtthan âdâṃ ǁ

III.
dhâriṇi Mêru-girîndraṃ |
vâridhi dig-danti gagana-chandrâdityar |

maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî |

37 At the basement of the dîpamâle pillar, east of the same temple.


(Nâgarî characters)

śrî-Râmô jayati ǁ Nîlakaṇṭha-prabhu-varmmaṇaḥ pautrasya Bâdâmî-prabhu-varmmaṇaḥ putrasya
Râmachandra-Bâdâmî-prabhu-varmmaṇaḥ tasya râjñô râjya-lakshmî-visishṭa-prathama-purushârthaṃ
dharma-mârgê ...................... hlâda-kârinî amarîva saubhâgyavatî Tuḷajâbâî Harihara-
kshêtrê nṛipa-Sâlivâhana-śakê 14.. Pramâthi-nâma-saṃvatsarê Mârgaśira-bahuḷa 4 Śukravârê dîpa-

38 At the same temple, on a broken vîrakal to the north.

EC 11 Dg 39
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg039

[page 79]39 At the same temple, on a stone near the aśvatta tree to the north.


I.
jayanti Sthâṇu-↓1Dharayôr advaita-dyôtanôdyatâḥ |
aksha-mâlâ-triśûlâri-pâñchajanya-dharâḥ karâḥ ǁ
jayaty ânamitâśêsha-surâsura-narôragaṃ |
svarggâpavargga-mârggânuśâsanaṃ dharmma-śâsanaṃ ǁ
II.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti śrîr jayaś châbhyudayaś cha ǁ

III.
jayanti pṛithu-pâṭhîna-vapushô vikrama-kramâḥ |
Harêr a-tuchchha-puchchhâgra-kshôbhitâṃbhôdhi-pâthasaḥ ǁ
jayanti sthâyi-sañchâri-bhâvâbhinaya-bhâvakâḥ |
Nîlalôhita-śailûshya-bhrû-latâ-lâsya-vibhramâḥ ǁ
Śrî-kântasya chakâsti nâbhi-sarasî-saṃbhûtam ambhôruhaṃ
vakshaḥ-kaustubha-ratna-pîṭha-vasatêr lîlâtapatraṃ śriyaḥ |
tatrôdbhûya nisargga-sargga-rachana-vyâpâra-nishṭhâtmanâ
Dhâtrâ sṛishṭi-dhuran-dharô muni-varaḥ prâg Atrir âsûtritaḥ ǁ
Atrêr nnêtrâd ajani rajanî-vallabhô râja-śabdaḥ
yaṃ nirmmâlya-srajam iva parê bhartṛi-bhûtâ bhajanti |
kiñchâśêsha-tridaśa-parishan-mauḷi-mâḷârchchitâṅghrêr
dêvasyâpi Tripura-jayinaḥ śêkharaṃ yasya lêkhâ ǁ
tasmân nirmmaḷitâkhila-tri-bhuvanaṃ nirddhûta-chêtaḥ-parî-
tâpaṃ nirbbharam unmishat-kuvaḷayâmôda-prapannôdayaṃ |
sarvvâśâ-paripûrtti-daksham akhiḷa-kshôṇîbhṛid-uttaṃsitaṃ
gôtraṃ Yâdava-bhûbhujâm udabhavat têjas tadîyam yathâ ǁ
dṛipyad-dânava-lupyamâna-vibhava-svârâjya-nistârakâḥ
saṃrâjaḥ kati nâma Haihaya-mukhâs tasmin abhûvan na vâ |
Kaṃsa-dhvaṃsana-kêḷi-kautuka-vaśât dêvô’pi Lakshmî-patir
vviśvâmnâya-vimṛigyamâṇa-varaṇô yatrâvatîrṇṇas svayaṃ ǁ
tasmin kulê chiram arâjata Chêdi-Râjô
râjâpi viśva-vasudhâ-vaḷayasya yô’sau |
Pâṇḍyâvanî-virachita-sthira-pakshapâtaḥ
Pâṇḍyâkhyayaiva su-dṛiḍhâṃ bhuvi rûḍhim âpa ǁ
yach-chûḍâgrima-śaṅka-kaṅkaṇa-hati-krêṅkâri Paurandaraṃ
śailêndra-pṛithu-sânu-pîṭha-viluṭhat-pâṭhîna-chinhaś cha yat- |
śakti-vyakta-niyantraṇaś cha viphaḷâraṃbhô yad aṃbhônidhiḥ
Pâṇḍyânâṃ para-vaibhavâsahaṃ ahô têjas tad ôjâyatê ǁ
bhrû-bhaṅga-mâtra-vidhurîkṛita-vairi-vargga-
chittaḥ Paḷanta iti tat-tanayô babhûva |
Châḷukya-Chôḷa-narapâḷakayôs sva-râjya-
svârâjya-daṃ vijayatê yudhi yasya śauryyaṃ ǁ
vandîkṛitâkhiḷa-virôdhi-nṛipâvarôdha-
śvâsa-praśânta-samara-śrama-gharmma-tôyaḥ |
jâtas tatas chiram arâjad Irukkavêḷô
vêḷâchaḷa skhaḷita-nirmmaḷa-kîrtti-bandhuḥ ǁ
[page 80]tasyâsît tanayaḥ parâkrama-parâbhûta-prabhûta-dvishad
vîra-śrî-ramaṇî-svayaṃ-vara-pati[ḥ] śrî-Râya-Pâṇḍyô nṛipaḥ |
bhrâmyad-bhîma-gadâbhighâta-daḷitair vvaiṛîbha-kuṃbha-sthaḷaiḥ
yasy smârita-Bhârati punar abhûd aty-uddhatâ yuddha-bhûḥ ǁ
namad-akhiḷa-sapatnî-mauḷi-ratnâyitôdyach-
charaṇa-nakhara-.. krâ Râya-Pâṇḍyasya râjñî |
su-charita-paripûta-sphîta-sûrîndra-sûktâ
subhagima-guṇa-sîmâ Sôma-Dêvî babhûva ǁ
jâtyâ paraspara-virôdhavatôḥ satîtva-
saundaryyayôḥ praṇaya-bhûmir asâv asûta |
vâchas śriyaś cha parimôchita-bhûri-vairam
êkâśrayaṃ sapadi Paṇḍita-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaṃ ǁ
yat-kîrttiḥ paripanthi-pârthiva-yaśaḥ-śvêtâbja-chandra-dyutir
yyach-chaṇḍâsir amarttya-vâra-vanitâ-saundarya-sâphalya-daḥ |
Kaṃsa-dhvaṃsana-vaṃśa-maṇḍana-mahâ-muktâ maṇêḥ kîrtta..
tasyâmushya kavîśvarâḥ kati na vâ vâṇîm aḷaṃkurvvatê ǁ
darppâdhmâta-parâvanî-parivṛiḍha-prâṇâniḷâsvâdana-
sphâya .... -bhujâ-bhujaṅgama-śirô-viśrânta-viśvaṃbharaṃ |
jyôtsnâ-nirmmaḷa-kîrtti-charchchita-jagaj-jâḷaṃ kaḷânâm nidhiṃ
sâ sûtê sma sutântaraṃ tad-anujaṃ śrî-Vîra-Pâṇḍyaṃ nṛipaṃ ǁ
yâchñâ(ṃ) yat-karavâḷa-kâḷa-bhujaga-grâsa(ṃ)-trasat-sva-priya-
prâṇa-trâṇa-parâyaṇârî-vanitâ-jihvânta-mâtrâśrayaṃ |
âdhattê yudhi Vîra-Pâṇḍya-nṛipatês traividyam adhyêyushaḥ
śauryya .. sya nutau prayâti katamaḥ sâkalyataḥ kalyatâṃ ǁ
vêḷâṃ jâta-sura-drumâṃ jaḷanidhêr udbhûta-siṃhâṃ taṭîṃ
Mêrôr udgata-bhâskarâṃ Surapatêr âśâm adhaḥ-kurvvatî |
sêyaṃ Râya-mahîśvarasya mahishî prâsûta Kâmâkhyayâ
vikhyâtaṃ Nigaḷaṅka-malla-Vijaya-śrî-Pâṇḍya-bhûpâḷakaṃ ǁ
Brahmâṇaḥ Paramêshṭhinaḥ kati jagan-nirmmâṇa-nishṭhâḥ kri..
naishâm Atri-munîyituṃ prabhavati prâyaḥ paraḥ kaśchana |
vaṃśê yasya purâ Sudhâṃśu-vapushâ Kṛishṇâkhyayânantaraṃ
bhûyaḥ Kâma-nṛipâtmanâ cha yad ayaṃ Lakshṃî-patir vvarttatê ǁ
kiṃ dvîpântara-darśanôtsuka-dhiyaḥ kiṃ nâka-yôshid-ratâḥ
kiṃ tê durvvaḷa-durvvaha-kshiti-bhara-mlâyad-bhujâ bhûbhujaḥ |
vîra-śrî-Nigaḷaṅkamalla-nṛipatês sêvâ-sudhâsvâdanaṃ
nyakkṛityâpi vahanti yat katipayê gâḍha-grahaṃ vigrahê ǁ
kîrttir jagat-tritaya-chandana-paṅka-charchchâṃ
na prêkshatê Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-nṛipasya nûnaṃ |
pratyartthi-pârtthiva-kaḷatra-kapôḷa-mâtram
âpâṇḍurayya paritṛipyati yat-pratâpaḥ ǁ
aśrântam asru-salila-snapitâni dagdhuṃ
pratyartthi-pârtthiva-vadhû-hṛidayâni kalyaṃ |
kiṃ chitram atra samadhishṭhita-viśva-kâshṭham
ujjṛimbhatê Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-nṛipasya têjaḥ ǁ
êkaḥ kô’pi sa Vêdhasâ nirupamaḥ sṛishṭô yadîyân guṇân
dhairyyâdîn anukarttum atra na paraṃ kalyaṃ kvachid dṛiśyatê |
[page 81]yat tasya prabaḷa-pratâpa-vidhuraiḥ pratyartthi-pṛithvîśvarair
âkrântâḥ kula-bhûbhṛitô jaḷadhaya(ḥ)s tîrṇṇâ viḍîrṇṇô raviḥ ǁ
na jyôtsnâ-laharîṃ niśâ-nigaḍitâṃ naivâmara-śrôtasaṃ
stôtuṃ vâñchhati vishṭapa-traya-parichhinna-pravâha-trayâṃ |
vâṇî śâśvata-viśva-lôka-viḷasad-yat-kîrtti-vaśyâ chirâd
asmâkaṃ na payômayaṃ nidhim apâm âpânitaṃ vêḷayâ ǁ
astu svasti namat-samasta-nṛipati-śrêṇî-kirîṭa-sphuran-
mâṇikya-prakarârchchir-archchita-pada-dvandvâravinda-śriyê |
śrîmat-Kâma-mahîbhujê pratibhaṭa-kshmâpâḷa-bhâḷâkshara-
brâta-kshâḷana-daksha-dakshina-bhujâ-nistriṃśa-dhârâṃbhasê ǁ

tasya pradhânâmâtyaḥ |

IV.
kaiśchit tîrnṇa-mahârṇṇavaiḥ katipayaiḥ kaupîna-mâtrâṃśukair
anyair vvanya-phaḷâśibhis tad-itarair mmârttaṇḍa-bimbônmukhaiḥ |
chêshṭâḥ śatru-bhaṭair iti prakaṭayan jîyâch chiraṃ Mârutêś
śrîmat-Pâṇḍya-janâbhirâma-Hanumân Hermmâḍi-daṇḍâdhipaḥ ǁ

svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabdê mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvarê Kânchî-pura-varâdhîśvarê Yadu-vaṃ-
śâmbara-dyumaṇau | su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇau | Mahêndra-maṇi-makuṭa-kôṭi-vighaṭita-nija-vijaya-kara-
kaṅkaṇê | lîlâ-mâtrâsâdhita-sapta-Koṅkaṇê | Kanaka-naga-śiḷâ-taḷa-sthâpita-pâṭhîna-lâñchhana-jaya-
staṃbhê | dûrîkṛitârâti-vîrâvashṭaṃbhê | Tâmraparṇṇî-nirṇṇikta-mauktika-yuktânêka-ratnâkarâmu-
dra-samudra-bhâṇḍâgârê | Maḷaya-giri-nandana-chandana-madhya-dêśa-nivêśita-śṛiṅgârâgârê | kiṅ-
karîkṛita-bhûta-bhêtâḷa-maṇḍaḷê | svîkṛitânêka-ripu-nṛipati-maṇḍaḷê hêḷâ-gṛihîtâhitânêka-jaḷa-śaiḷa-
durggê | vandîkṛitârâti-vîra-maṇḍaḷika-varggê śrî-Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa-charaṇa-smaraṇa-pariṇatântaḥ-
karaṇê | Yâdavâbharaṇê | Pâṇḍya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍê | parichchhêdi-gaṇḍê | Râjiga-Chôḷa-manô-
bhaṅgê | sahasôttuṅgê | śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraḥ | Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaḥ Noḷaṃbavâḍi-pramukham
akhiḷa-mahî-maṇḍaḷaṃ dik-kuṃbhi-kuṃbha-kûṭa-samunnatêna pannaga-râja-bhôga-nirbbharâbhô-
gêna kamaṭha-pati-ka .. ṭi-karkkaśêna bhuvana-bhavana-rakshâ-dîkshaṇa-dakshiṇa-bhujêna | vaḷa-
yam iva sa-hêḷam udvahann anavarata-vinamad-akhiḷa-narapati-mukuṭa-taṭa-ghaṭita-masṛiṇa-maṇi-
marîchi-vîchi-saṃbhâra-saṃbhêda-mêdura-charaṇa-nakha-kiraṇa-chakravâḷa-vâḷavyajana-santarppita-
sakaḷa-jagaj-jana[ś] śrîmad-Uchchaṅgy-abhidhânâṃ râjadhânîm adhishṭhâya | dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭâ-
nugraha-nishṭhaḥ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdêna râjyaṃ kurvvann êkadâ ǁ Śaka-nripa-kâlê êkôna-navaty-
adhika-sahasratamê | aṅkataḥ 1089 neya Sarvvajit-saṃvatsarê varttamânê tat-Pushya-śuddha-dvâda-
śyâṃ Sômavârê Rôhiṇyâṃ Brahma-yôgê Makara-saṅkrântau mahâ-pradhâna(ḥ)-śrîkaraṇa-sarvvâdhya-
ksha-mahâpasâyita-Kumâra-Vijaya-Permmâḍi-daṇḍanâtha-vijñaptyâ bhagavataḥ śrî-Harihara-dêva-
syâṅga-bhôga-traikâlika-nivêdyâgrâśana-brâhmaṇa-bhôjanâkshara-śikshâ-vyâkaraṇa-mîmâṃsâ-vêdânta-
vyâkhyâna-Ṛig-Yajur-vvêda-dvayâdhyâpanârtham êva nishka-śata-traya-mâtram êva karaṃ parikalpya
parihṛita-sarvva-bâdham âyuktakaṃ râja-vallabhâdi-daushṭyasya kadâchid apy a-gôcharaṃ cha
Kûḍalûr-grâmaṃ vêda-vêdâṅga-pâragêbhyaḥ sadâchâra-parêbhyaḥ sakaḷa-śâstribhyaḥ chatur-uttara-
śatêbhyô brâhmaṇêbhyaḥ piṇḍâdâna-rûpêṇa prâdât (here follow details of gift &c.) êvaṃ-vidhô yaḥ kaś-
chid râjâ râja-vallabhaḥ ........................ sarvva-pâpinâm adhamaḥ | tathâ hi | (usual final verse) maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî.

Notes
↑1. * So in the original.
EC 11 Dg 40
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg040

40 On the same stone.
(Lines 1 to 22 the same as in the previous No.)


I.
darppâdhmâta-parâvanî-parivṛiḍha-prâṇâniḷâsvâdana-
sphâyad-bhû .. bhujâ-bhujaṅgama-śirô-viśrânta-viśvaṃbharaṃ |
[page 82]jyôtsnâ-nirmmaḷa-kîrtti-charchchita-jagaj-jâḷaṃ kaḷânâṃ nidhiṃ
sâ sûtê sma sutântaraṃ tad-anujaṃ śrî-Vîra-Pâṇḍyaṃ nṛipaṃ ǁ
vêḷâṃ jâta-sura-drumâṃ jaḷanidhêr udbhûta-siṃhâṃ taṭîṃ
Mêrôr udgata-bhâskarâṃ Sura-patêr âśâm adhaḥ-kurvvatî |
sêyaṃ Râya-mahîśvarasya mahishî prâsûta Kâmâkhyayâ
vikhyâtaṃ Nigaḷaṅka-malla-Vijaya-śrî-Pâṇḍya-bhûpâḷakaṃ ǁ
................................
râsôllâsa-prayâsa-prakaṭa-prasṛimara-p.................. |
........................ nâṃ
svêshâṃ rôshânubhâjâṃ yad-ari-mahibhujâ ............ ǁ
kîrttiṃ jagat-tritaya-chandana-paṅka-charchchâṃ
na prêkshatê Vijaya-Pâṇdya-nṛipasya nûnaṃ |
pratyartthi-pârtthiva-kaḷatra-kapôḷa-mâtram
âpâṇḍurayya paritṛipyati yat pratâpaḥ ǁ

svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabdê mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvarê | Kâñchî-pura-varâdhîśvarê | Yadu-vaṃ-
śâṃbara-dyumaṇau | su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇau | Mahêndra-maṇi-makuṭa-kôṭi-vighaṭita-nija-vijaya-kara-
kaṅkaṇê | lîlâ-mâtra-sâdhita-sapta-Koṅkaṇê | Kanaka-naga-śilâ-taḷa-sthâpita-pâṭhîna-lâñchhana-jaya-
staṃbhê | dûrîkṛitârâti-vîrâvashṭaṃbhê | Tâmraparṇṇî-nirṇṇikta-mauktika-yuktânêka-ratnâkarâmudra-
samudra-bhâṇḍâgârê | Maḷaya-giri-chandana-nandana-madhya-dêśa-nivêśita-śṛiṅgârâgârê | kiṅkarî-
kṛita-bhûta-bhêtâḷa-maṇḍaḷê | svîkṛitânêka-ripu-aṛipati-maṇḍaḷê | ...... hitânêka-jaḷa-śaiḷa-durggê |
................ śrî-Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa-charaṇa-smaraṇa-pariṇatântaḥkaraṇê | Yâdavâbharaṇê |

........ śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaḥ (rest effaced)

EC 11 Dg 41
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg041

41 At the same place, on a 2nd stone.


I.
jayanti Sthâṇu-Harayôr advaita-dyôtanôdyatâḥ |
aksha-mâlâ-triśûlâri-pâñchajanya-dharâḥ karâḥ ǁ
jayanti sthâyi-sañchâri-bhâvâbhinaya-bhâvakâḥ |
Nîlalôhita-śailûsha-bhrû-latâ-lâsya-vibhramâḥ ǁ
jayaty ânamitâśêsha-surâsura-narôragaṃ |
svarggâpavargga-mârggânuśâsanaṃ dharmma-śâsanaṃ ǁ↓1

śrî-Hari-Harâbhyâṃ namaḥ

II.
svasti samasta-vastu-guṇa-saṃstutan ânata-dêva-mauḷi-vi- |
nyasta-padâṃbujaṃ tri-bhuvana-prabhavaṃ Bhavan abjajâṇḍadoḷ |
vistṛitav âge mâḍiḍa charâchara-dhâtriyan eyde sutti rô- |
das-taḷamaṃ para ...... gura-tuṅga-taraṅga-saṅgataṃ ǁ
makara-vrâtâbhighâtôchchaḷita-kamaṭha-saṅghaṭṭa-saṃsparddhi-mîna- |
prakara-prakshôbhitôdyat-taraḷatara-taraṅgôtkaraṃ kshipta-muktâ- |
nikaraṃ kaṇg eyde chalvaṃ paḍedud aviraḷôttâḷa-kallôḷa-mâḷâ- |
dhika-saṅgharsha-prajâta-prabaḷa-ghana-ghana-dhvâna-raudraṃ samudraṃ ǁ
adu nânâ-nakra-chakra-krama-kari-makarôḍḍîna-paṭhîna-puchchha- |
chchhada-vâtâghâta-bhîtâchaḷa-chaḷana-chaḷat-tuṅga-raṅgat-taraṅgau- |
gha-duranta-prântam ujjṛibhita-bahaḷa-taḍij-jâḷa-lîḷâ-viniḷâṃ- |
[page 83]buda-biṃbâḍaṃbaraṃ kaṇg esevudu laharî-lôḷa-bâḷa-pravâḷa ǁ
tad-vaḷaya-vaḷayitaṃ viḷa- | sad-vastu-vichitrav enisi sogayisuvudu Jaṃ- |
bû-dvîpav alli naḍuve ku- | bhṛid-vallabhan enisi Mêru-giri rañjisuguṃ ǁ
adu chañchach-châru-châmîkara-kara-visaraj-Jâhnavî-vâri-pûrâm- |
buda-mâḷâ-nîḷa-lîḷâ-vana-ruchigaḷin aprâkṛitâlôka-śôbhâ- |
spadav âdaṃ prâkṛitâkâradin atiśaya-chitrâmśu-chitrîkṛitâśê- |
sha-dig-antaṃ Chitrakûṭôtkaṭam enisuvud abhraṅkashôtkôṭi-kûṭa ǁ
ant enisid Amara-giriyin- | daṃ teṅkaṇa deseyoḷ eseva Bhârata-varshâ- |
bhyantaradoḷ iḷâ-kânteya | kuntaḷav ene mukhyav âytu Kuntaḷa-dêśa ǁ
Kuntaḷa-dêśaman âḷdar a- | nantâvanipâḷa-nikaramaṃ geldu mahî- |
kântâ-vallabhar atiśaya- | kânta-guṇâvâsar ati-balar chChâḷukyar ǁ

tad-anvayâvatârav ent endaḍe ǁ

III.
Srî-ramaṇî-ramaṇana gaṃ- | bhîratarôdâra-nâbhi-kâsâra-sarad- |
vâriyoḷ âdudu sita-sara- | sîruhav ati-bahaḷa-surabhi-parimaḷa-miḷita ǁ
Jaḷaruhajaṭharana jaṭharada | jaḷajâtadoḷ ogeda Jaḷajajâtana bṛidaya- |
sthaḷa-jaḷaruha-jâtaṃ nija- | kuḷâdibhûtaṃ Harîtan ati-vikhyâtaṃ ǁ
âtana tanûbhavaṃ Hari- | taṃ tach-chuḷuka-jaḷadoḷ achchariy enal ut- |
khâtâsi-verasu puṭṭida- | n âtata-têjaṃ pratâpi Sattima-Dêva ǁ
â-Satyâśraya-Dêvaninde negaḷd î-Châḷukya-râjânvaya- |
śrî sat-kîrttiyan âḷdud alli palaruṃ vikrântadiṃ vairi-san- |
trâsôdbhâsita-têjar a-pratiratha-prakhyâtar old âḷdar â- |
jñâ-sampattiyan âḷdu Kuntaḷa-dharitrî-kânteyaṃ bhûbhujar ǁ
Châḷukya-tiḷakan âḷdaṃ | śrî-lalanâliṅgitôchcha-vakshas-sthaḷan â- |
bhîḷa-pratâpan asuhṛit- | kîlâlapan enipa Tailapaṃ vasumatiyaṃ ǁ
gaṇanâtîta-vicharad-a- | praṇata-praṇatâvanîpaka-vanîpaka-mâr- |
ggaṇa-mârggaṇa-pradâyaka- | raṇa-vitaraṇa-guṇa-vinirjjitailaṃ Tailaṃ ǁ
ene śauryônnatan âda Tailapan-apatyaṃ Sattimaṃ tan-nṛipâ- |
ḷana putraṃ vibhu Vikramaṃ tad-anujaṃ sand-Ayyaṇaṃ tan-mahî- |
śana tammaṃ Jayasimhan âtana magaṃ Trailôkyamalla-kshitî- |
san enipp Âhavamallan âtana sutaṃ Sômêśvarôrvvîśvaraṃ ǁ
tad-anujan a-vinata-ripu-nṛipa- | mada-gaja-bidu-vidaḷana-pravîṇa-kṛipâṇaṃ |
mudadim râjanvatiy eni- | sidan avaniyan ubhaya-râya-beṅkoḷva nṛipaṃ ǁ
chatur-ambhôrâśi-vêḷâ-vaḷayita-vasudhâ-bhâra-dhaurêya-dôr-mmaṇ- |
ḍita-chaṇḍôgrâsi-kâḷôraga-vadana-nipîtâhita-prâṇan aty-ûr- |
jjita-têjô-râjitâji-prabaḷa-ripu-mahîpâḷa-kôḷâhaḷa-krî- |
ḍita-lôlaṃ lîleyiṃ pâlisidan akhiḷa-bhû-chakramaṃ Vikramâṅka ǁ
tat-sutan akhiḷa-kaḷâ-sam- | pat-sannidhi tannoḷ eseye Sarvvajña-mahî- |
bhṛit-samjñe-vaḍedan amaḷa-śa- | rat-samaya-sudhâṃśu-kîrtti-dhâmaṃ Sômaṃ ǁ
Bhûlôkamalla-vallabha | n î-lôkaman âḷdan eseye Sarvvajña-mahî- |
pâla-vesar itara-bhûpar | mmûlôkaman âḷdar âdaḍam pesar vaḍeyar ǁ
tat-putran uddhatâri-ku- | bhṛit-pavi-daṇḍâyamâna-bhuja-daṇḍa-samu- |
dyat-paṭutara-pratâpaṃ | sat-pâlakan âḷdan urvviyaṃ Permma-nṛipa ǁ
jagadoḷ udâttatâdi-guṇa-gauravadiṃ Jagadêkamallanoḷ |
Sagara-Bhagîrathâdigaḷa pôlvige varppanoḷ anya-chakravar- |
ttigaḷan ad entu pôlipudo pêl enal a-pratima-pratâpan a- |
ty-agaṇita-śauryyan a-pratirathaṃ pratipâḷisuvaṃ dharitriya ǁ
[page 84]enisida Châḷukya-nṛipâ- | ḷana nachchina kaṭṭid-alaginant esedaṃ kûr- |
ppina balpina têjada mân- | taṇad oḷpiṃ Vîra-Pâṇḍya-Dêva-narêndraṃ ǁ
â-Vîra-Pâṇḍya-Dêva-ma- | hîvallabhan-anvavâya-saṃstavakâsmat- |
prâvîṇya-saṃstava-pra- | stâvane tân eyd ad âdaḍaṃ stutiyisuveṃ ǁ
śrîmat-samasta-vibudha-śi- | khâmaṇi-Mṛiḍan-uttamâṅga-saṅgatiyind ud- |
dâmateyan âḷdu sogayipa | Sômânvayav akhiḷa-vandyav enduv a-nindya ǁ
Sarasiruhôdaran-udarada | sarasiruhadoḷ ogeda Sarasirubabhavana manas- |
sarasiruhadoḷ udiyisidaṃ | surarshi-pati vigata-tandran Atri-munîndraṃ ǁ
â-munipana nayana-sudhâ- | dhâmadin udiyisidan amṛitamayan amaḷa-kaḷâ- |
kômaḷa-vapu nṛipati-kuḷa- | śrî-mahiḷâ-niṭiḷa-taṭa-lalâmaṃ Sômaṃ ǁ
nijav enal ambuja-jananâ- | bdhijanana-muni-nayana-jananav emb î-janan A- |
tri-janaṇaman eydi Sôma | tri-jâtan ent Atri-jâtan idu chitratara ǁ
Râjânvavâyadoḷ Yadu- | Râjaṃ janiyisidan âtaniṃ Yadu-vaṃśa- |
śrî jagadoḷ esedu Yâdava- | râjanyaka-nâmav âytu viśruta-dhâma ǁ
śrî-Vaishṇavâṃśa-Bala-Kṛi- | shṇâvataraṇadinde maṅgaḷâyatanav enipp |
â-vaṃśadoḷ âv aṃśaḍoḷ | âva mahîpâḷa-vaṃśa maṅ.... n emba ǁ
Âditya-Dêvan embaṃ | Yâdava-kuḷa-tiḷakan âtanind âdudu Pâṇ- |
ḍyôdayav â-Pâṇḍya-nṛipaṅ- | g âdaṃ śrî-Chêdi-Râjan emba tanûja ǁ
Chêdi-mahîśaran adaṭale- | d âdaṃ śrî-Chêdi-Râjan â-nṛipana sutaṃ |
Yâdava-bhûshaṇan enisida- | n âdaṃ Paḷamâṇḍa-Dêva-Pâṇḍyâvanipa ǁ
Yâdava-vaṃśôttaṃsaṅg | âdaṃ Paḷamâṇḍa-Pâṇḍya-nṛipatige tanayaṃ |
śrî-dayitan uddhṛitatara- | mêdiny-adhipâḷan Irukavêḷa-nṛipâḷa ǁ
â-vibhuviṅge puṭṭi tanag â-vibhavaṃ chatur-aṅguḷônnata- |
śrî veras âdud embinegav eyde pogaḷteyan âḷdu viśva-dhâ- |
trî-varan âgi nirjjita-virôdhi-mahîpati-râja Râja-Pâṇ- |
ḍyâvanîvallabhaṃ negar̤dan âtana vikramam ûrjjita-krama ǁ
nene-nenedu Râja-râjên-drana pṛithuḷa-gadâśani-pratâpaman ahitâ- |
vanibhṛin-nikâyav ambhô- | dhi-nilînaṃ miḍukal aṇmad achaḷav enikkuṃ ǁ
adhika-bhuja-balaran adaṭale- | d adhikatara-bhuja-prâtâparaṃ geldu sama- |
bhyadhikatama-sauryyan âḷdaṃ | vadheyaṃ rumhariyoḷ ahitaraṃ Râya-nṛipa ǁ
ene negaḷda Râya-Pâṇḍyâ- | vanipaṅg arddhâṅga-lakshmiy enisidaḷ akhiḷâ- |
vani-vanitâ-ratnav id ond | ene Bôvala-Dêvi sakaḷa-guṇa-gauravadiṃ ǁ
Râya-nṛipâṅgane Billava- | Râya-tanûjâte Vikramâdity-nṛipaṃ |
jyâyaṃ tanag ene jagadaoḷa- | g â-yuvatiya sat-kulînatege tegaḷ uṇṭê ǁ
avar-irvvara piriya-magaṃ | bhuvana-prastutya-nitya-vidyâ-vibhavaṃ |
Divijanadî-jaḷa-Maḷayaja- | dhavaḷa-kamaḷa-tuḷita-kîrtti Paṇḍita-Pâṇḍya ǁ
Srîharshôtpa.. -Bhôja-Vatsa-nṛipati-śrî-Vikramâdityar int |
î-Hiṃmyâchaḷa-Sêtu-madhya-mahiyaṃ vikrânta-vidyâ-kṛitô- |
tsâhar ppâḷisidar ttadiya-guṇa-sandôhaṅgaḷ î-bhûpanoḷ |
vyûhîbhûtav enal negartte-vaḍedaṃ śrî-Pâṇdya-bhûpâḷaka ǁ
adhigata-samasta-vidyaṃ | Madhusûdana-Dêvarindam ene Paṇḍita-Pâṇ- |
ḍya-dharâdhipatiya pôlvige | badhira-dharâdhîśar entuv êṃ bandaparê ǁ
Manu-muni-charitaṃ vidvaj- | jana-vallabhan aty udâtta-chittaṃ sakaḷâ- |
vanitaḷadoḷ Paṇḍita-Pâṇ- | ḍya-narêndraṃ negal̤dan intu negaḷvudu bhûpa ǁ
â-vibhuvin-anujan akhiḷa-ka- | ḷâ-vidan ânamita-vîra-vairi-nṛipâḷaṃ |
dêva-dvija-guru-jana-pada- | sêvâjñaṃ Vîra-Pâṇḍya-Dêva-narêndraṃ ǁ
[page 85]tad-anujan udâra-charitaṃ | madavad-ripu-nṛipati-vijayi Paḷamâṇḍa-nṛipaṃ |
tad-anubhavan uddhatârâ- | ti-daḷana-paṭuv enipa Kâma-Dêvâvanipa ǁ
Paṇḍita-Pâṇḍya-tanûjaṃ | paṇḍita-maṇḍaḷa-sarôja-vana-mârttaṇḍaṃ |
maṇḍalika-gaṇḍa-giri-pavi- | daṇḍaṃ Tailapa-nṛipâlan anupa[ma]-śîla ǁ
śrîman-mahâ-pradhâna-śi- | khâmaṇiy ene chakravartti kuḍe paḍed akhiḷôr- |
vvî-mahita-dhâma viśruta- | nâmadin Âditya-daṇḍanâthaṃ negal̤da ǁ
â-vibhuvina sute Gaṅgâ- | Dêvi nijâbhijana-rûpa-guṇa-gauravadiṃ |
śrî-Vîra-Pâṇḍya-Dêvana | dêvi mahâ-dêviy enipa pempaṃ paḍedaḷ ǁ
piriduṃ kâruṇyadindaṃ piriy-arasige mâḷk ishṭa-saṃsiddhiyaṃ Śaṅ- |
karan Indrôpêndra-chandrâdy-amara-vara-kirîṭâgra-śôṇâśma-raśmi- |
sphurad-ârât-tri-kramôdbhrâmita-Sati-kṛita-nîrâjanaṃ Jâhnavî-śê- |
khara-śôbhâ-bhâsi Gaṅgâ-vadhuge budha-jana-stôtra-pâtraṃ Triṇêtraṃ ǁ
Vijayâ-Dêvi vinidrâm- | buja-daḷa-nibha-nayane Vikramâditya-nṛipâ- |
nuje Vîra-Pâṇḍya-pṛithvî- | bhuja-vallabhe vibudha-kalpa-latey ene negaḷdaḷ ǁ
piriduṃ kâruṇyadiṃ mâḍuge vibhu Vijayâ-Dêvig iśhṭârtthamaṃ Śaṅ- |
karan ambhô-bhû-nabhômbhôruha-sakha-śikhi-sômâniḷâtmâtmakaṃ va- |
hni-ravîndûdbhâsi-nêtra-trayan amara-sarid-vâri-pûrôchchaḷach-châ- |
mara-vîchî-châru-chandra-dyuti-chaya-chaṭu-charchchâñchitaṃ chandra-chûḍaṃ ǁ
śrî-Vîra-Pâṇḍya-Dêvan i- | ḷâ-vallabhan alli paḍedan uddhata-ripu-śaur- |
yyâvashṭambha-vibhañjana- | bhâvita-Jagadêkamalla-vallabha-vesaraṃ ǁ
Gaṅga-Kaḷiṅga-Vaṅga-Maru-Gûrjjara-Kêraḷa-Chêra-Chôḷa-Gau- |
ḍâṅga-Varâṭa-Lâṭa-Khasa-Barbara-Kôsaḷa-Puṇḍra-Pârasî- |
Koṅgaṇa-Koṅga-Koṅkaṇa-Kuru-Prathar-Ândhra-Turushka-Mâgadhô- |
ttuṅga-nṛipâḷa-jâḷaman adirppida mey-gali Pâṇḍya-bhûbhuja ǁ
karavâḷâghâta-śâtâhita-kara-viluṭhad-danta-śa . gaḷiṃ tat- ǁ
paribarhôddâma-hêmâbharaṇa-kiraṇadiṃ tat-patâkâstra-varmmâm- |
bara-chitrôdyôtadiṃ tad-rudhira-visara-kâsârikâ-pûradiṃ pâṇ- |
ḍuritaṃ paiśaṅgitaṃ karbburitav aruṇitaṃ Vîra-Pâṇḍyâji-raṅgaṃ ǁ
vijaya-śrî-pati-Pâṇḍya-bhûbhuja-bhujâvashṭambha-vitrasta-vai- |
ri-janâdhîśara dêśadoḷ tiḷaka-punnâgâñjana-syandana- |
dhvaja-bâṇâsana-sâla-kâñchana-sita-chchhatraṅgaḷ enduṃ kuja- |
brajadoḷ tôrppuvu nôḷpaḍ ill itara-vastu-stôma-nâmaṅgaḷiṃ ǁ
adirad idaridaran idir-iḍu- | v adaṭaran adaṭaledu bedar̤e beṅkoṇḍu sama- |
sta-dig-antaramaṃ pudid oda- | vida jasadind esevan asadaḷaṃ Pâṇḍya-nṛipa ǁ
piriduṃ kâruṇyadiṃ Pâṇḍyarasa ninage dîrgghâyumaṃ śrîyumaṃ Śaṅ- |
karan Indrôpêndra-vandyaṃ kuḍuge gagana-Gaṅgâ-taraṅgôchchaḷachchhî- |
kara-vâri-sphâra-târâ-parikara-taruṇêndu-prabhâ-bhâsi-jûṭân- |
tara-dêśaṃ vyômakêśaṃ Giri-vara-tanayâ-jîvitêśaṃ mahêśaṃ ǁ
svasti prastuta-vâstava-stava-jagat-saṃstutya-nityôdaya-
trastârâti-tamastama-prakaṭita-prauḍha-pratâpôshmaṇê |
bhâsvad-Yâdava-pûrvva-śaila-śikhara-sthâna-sthira-sthâyinê
bhûyâd bhâsita-dik-taṭa-pratiruchê śrî-Pâṇḍya-chaṇḍâṃśavê ǁ

svasti samasta-vastu-guṇa-rûpa-saṃstava-stutya-châru-châritra | vividha-vibudha-jana-vichitra-
stôtra-pâtra | sakaḷa-kaḷâ-kaḷâpa-kauśaḷa-kautukita-prabaḷa-paṇḍita-prakara | paritôshita-kavi-
gamaki-vâdi-vâgmi-nikara sukara-kavi-nikara-chitta-chamatkârakara | sahaja-saubhâgya sarasa-
sârasvata | vîrâri-maṇḍaḷika-Châṇûra-malla-gaḷa-gâḷa | ↓2taraḷaukita-ḍhaukara-janana-hikkâ-ninâda
[page 86].... sampâdana-pravîṇâpratimalla-purâṇa-Nârâyaṇa | mâninî-manô-môhana-karaṇa-kaḷâ-chatura-
Chârâyaṇa | chatur-aṅga-tantra-pañchâṅga-mantra-nânâṅga-yantra-samudayôbhaya-prâkârâkâra-
purassara-nija-vijaya-nâma-saṅkîrttana-mâtra-vitrâsitâmitra-nivaha ripu-nṛipa-prâjya-râjyâjyâhuti-
pûta-satatôddîpta-nija-pratâpa-hutavaha tri .... ra-tri-vidha-râjahaṃsa-maṇḍaḷa-ruchi-tiraskaraṇa-
kâraṇa-ghana-ghaṭâṭôpa | ripu-nṛipâḷa-jâḷa-tila-kaḷâkaḷana-bhañjana-paṭu-prabhañjana samasta-vasu-
matî-jana-chitta .... samara-samârambha-saṃrambhôjjṛimbhita-gambhîra-bham.... Bhaîrava nija-
vijaya-bhûri-bhêrî-rava-śravaṇa-samanantara-kshubhita-rabhasa-prati ........ apasaraṇa-pratijñâ-
gûḍha-prauḍha-ripu-maṇḍaḷika-saṅkuḷa-drâvaṇa | jagad-dâridrya-vidrâvaṇa | sakaḷa-lôka-lôchana-
purâkṛita-sukṛita-sañchayânurôdha-bôdha-nirmmâṇa-karmmaṭha-Brahma-nirmmita-sarvva-sampûrṇ-
ṇa-śubha-lakshaṇa-lakshitâkshaya-manôharâkṛiti-nirâkṛita-Manôjâta | ruchira-śuchitôchitâchâra-
chârutâ-smârita-Surasarijjâta | grahaṇa-nirggata-prêraṇa...... sthâpanôtkaḷita-sâdi-sûdana Sûkaḷa-
sapti-saṅkuḷa-grâhita-pañchadhârâ-prapañcha-sañcharaṇa-chaturatara-su-rêkhâ-Rêvanta | vipuḷa-nija-
kîrtti-vallî-vêllita-dig-anta | anavarata-vinamad-ananta-sâmanta-samudaya-maṇi-makuṭa-kûṭa-kôṭi-
ghaṭita-taruṇa-taraṇi-kiraṇâruṇa-śôṇa-maṇi-marîchi-mañju-mañjarî-puñja-rañjita-charaṇa-sarasîruha |
an-anya-sâmânya-vadânyatâ-nyakkṛita-kaḷpa-bhûmiruha | ati-bahaḷa-viḷasita-sitaruchi-ruchi-nichaya-
ruchira-vichakiḷa-mukuḷa-kuḷa-dara-daḷita-kumuda-vana-Tuhina-girivara-dhavaḷa-kamaḷa-Maḷayaja-
Rajata-kudhara-dhavaḷima-tuḷita-viśada-nija-yaśaḥ-prasara-dhavaḷita-nikhiḷa-daśa-diśa | nirantarôttarô-
ttara-pravarddhâmâna-su-daśa ǁ prâkṛita ǁ ayakka-vikkanta-kakkaḍa-sakukkaḍa rivu-maṇḍaḷiya-Daṇu-
taṇaya-Dêvayî-ṇandaṇa | rivu-maṇḍaḷiya-kuḷa-śaiḷa-daḷaṇa-Saṅkandaṇa paḍivakhkha-vikhkhêva-
pakhkhavâya.. ta-jaya Lachhchhi-vikhkhitta-tikhkha-kaḍakhkha-vîkhkhaṇa-sa-lakhkhaṇa-raṇa-mukh-
kha rivu-maṇḍaḷiya-sikhkhâ-viyakhkhaṇa | nisagga ....saya-sahugga-khagga-muhagga-giḷiya-rivu-baḍa
.... bî.... yachcharia Kali-kalusa-vilôvi-kamma-sach-charia ṇittiṃsa-kasaṇa-viphphâria-viphphu-
ḷiṅga-viphphulia-rivu-maṇḍaliya maḍaphpha-tuphpha.. jaṇum.... laṇa-pavîṇa-kivâṇa rûvâhari .. ya-
Kusumbâṇa | visaṇṭhuḷi.. kuṇṭhida-rivu-maṇḍaḷiya-turaya-thôra-thaṭṭa rivu-maṇḍaliya-kuḷa-diśâpaṭṭa ǁ
vyâkaraṇa-vidyânavadya-viśruta-Śrutadhara | dhairyyâvadhîrita-Mandara-dharâdhara | bhabya-śrâvya
kâbya-nâṭakâkhyâyikâkhyânâdi-byâkhyâna-vyâpârâ .... ta-nabya-Śrîharsha | sarasa-śruti-svara-
śravaṇa-puṭa-pêya-gêyâmṛita-rasâsvâda-sañjanita-santatôddharsha | nyâya-śikshâ-vichakshaṇâksha-
pâda-Vaiśêshika | viśêsha-vi.. Kaṇâda | pratipaksha-paksha-saṃbharaṇa-samrôdha-prasâdita-Syâd-
vâda-vidyâ-prathita-guṇa-jâḷa | Mîmâṃsâ-sarasî-sañchâra-chañchura-marâḷa | Sâṅkhya-siddhânta-
saṅkhyâ-prasiddha-Kapila-siddha | Bauddha-râddhânta-prabuddha-Buddha | Lôkâyata-mata-vichâra-
chatura-Dêvatâchâryya | nirupama-prakhyâtaudâryya | śrîmad-amṛitakara-samârûḍha-prauḍha-Yadu-
vaṃśa-vaṃśa-prabhava-shâḍguṇya-sampatti-yukta-su-byakta-mauktika-viḷâsa | sakaḷa-vidyâdhidêvatâ-
viḷâsa-nivâsa | nikhiḷa-Lôkapâḷôttarôttarâśâ-prasâda-prabaḷa-pratâpa-prakhyâta-śrî-Râjarâjâtmajâta ǁ
śrî-Sôvala-Dêvî-samâkhyâ-vikhyâtâbhaṅga-Gaṅgâ-prasûta | anya-râjanya-janya-janita-jaya-svîkâra-
prasiddha-nâmâbhirâma śrîmat-Sômânvaya-lalâma | śrîmad-amarâdhinâtha-paramêśvara-śrî-Śaṅkara-
Nârâyaṇa-dêva-vara-prasâdâsâdita-nirantaraiśvaryya | kuḷâchaḷa-nichaya-niśchaḷa-dhairyya | śrîmaj-
Jagadêkamalla-Dêva-vijaya-jagad-rakshâ-daksha-dakshiṇa-kara-kaḷita-kaukshêyaka-śôbhâ-vibhâsa | sa-
kaḷa-maṅgaḷa-nivâsa | śrî-Vîra-Pâṇḍya-Dêva sthiraṃ jîva |

IV.
jîva śrî-yuta Pâṇḍya-Dêva vinamad-bhûpâḷa-chûḍâmaṇi- |
śrêṇî-prasphurad-aṃśu-śôṇa-charaṇâ-chandrârkka-târâvadhi |
prîti-prîṇita-vandi-mâgadha-budha-prauḍha-prasasti-krama- |
prakhyâta-stuti-sâra-châru-charita svasty astu tubhyaṃ chiraṃ ǁ
ninag îg ishṭârttha-saṃsiddhiyan ati-mudadiṃ Pâṇḍya-bhûpâḷa śumbhad- |
Dyunadî-raṅgat-taraṅga-praguṇa-śaśi-kaḷâ-kânti-santâna-śôbhâ- |
ghana-raktâpâṅga-vâmâmbakan aruṇa-maṇi-bhrâjitâhîndra-rundrâ- |
bhinava-prêṅkhan-mayûkha-sphuṭa-vikaṭa-jaṭâ-pallavaṃ dêva-dêva ǁ
[page 87]Śrî-Gaurî-priyar abja-sûryya-nayanar kkauśêya-charmmâmba[ra]r |
nnâgârâti-vṛishêndra-vâhar asita-śvêtâṅgar ambhôdhi-śai- |
lâgârar yYadu-Râja-vaṃśa-tiḷakaṃ śrî-Vîra-Pâṇḍyaṅge kûrtt |
îg ânanda-śubhaṅgaḷaṃ Hari-Harar chandrârkka-târam-baraṃ ǁ
śrî-Vîra-Pâṇḍya- Dêva-ma- | hî-vallabha-mahita-pâda-paramârâdhyar |
śrî-vibhavar mMadhusûdhana- | Dêvar vvirachisidar eseye śâsana-kṛitiyaṃ ǁ
baredaṃ śâsanamaṃ Śaṅ- | kara-Dêvaṃ Vîra-Pâṇḍya-Dêva-narâdhî- |
śvara-bhavana-sandhi-vigraha- | dhurandharaṃ ṭaṅkakâbhirâmaṃ Sômaṃ ǁ

svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Kâñchî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ | Yadu-vaṃ-
śâmbara-dyumaṇi | su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi | Pâṇḍya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ | parichchhêdi-gaṇḍaṃ |
Mahêndra-maṇi-makuṭa-kôṭi-vighaṭita-nija-vijaya-kara-kaṅkaṇaṃ | lîlâ-mâtra-sâdhita-sapta-Koṅka-
ṇaṃ | Kanaka-naga-śilâ-taḷa.. pita-pâṭhîna-lâñchhana-jaya-stambhaṃ | dûrîkṛitârâti-vîrâvashṭambha |
Tâmbraparṇṇî-nirṇṇikta-mauktika-yuktânêka-ratnâkarâmudra-samudra-bhâṇḍâgâra Maḷaya-giri-kan-
dara-chandana-madhya-dêśa-nivêśita.... gâraṃ | kiṅkarîkṛita-bhûta-vêtâḷa-maṇḍalaṃ | svîkṛitânêka-
ripu-maṇḍaḷika-maṇḍalaṃ | hêḷâ-gṛihîtâhita-gada.... la-śaila-durggaṃ | vandîkṛita-vîra-vairi-maṇḍa-
ḷika-varggaṃ | Râjiga-Chôḷa-manô-bhaṅgaṃ | śrîmaj-Jagadêkamalla-Dêva-pâdâbja-bhṛiṅgaṃ | śrî-
Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa-dêva-charaṇa-smaraṇa-pariṇatântaḥkaraṇaṃ | Yâdavâbharaṇaṃ | nâmâdi-praśas-
ti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Jagadêkamalla-Vîra-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru Noḷambavâḍi-mûvat-
tir-chchhâsiraṃ modalâgi palavuṃ dêśaṅgaḷaṃ kumâra-vṛittiyind âḷdu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôda-
diṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttav ir̤ddu śrîmach-Châḷukya-pratâpa-chakravartti-Jagadêkamalla-varshada 10
neya Prabhava-saṃvatsarad Âśvayujad-amâvâsey-Âdivâra-sûryya-grahaṇad andu śrî-Tuṅgabhadrâ-
Haridrâbhidhâna...... sambhêda-mahâ-tîrtthadalli Gôbi-jîya .... samasta-mahâ-dânaṅgaḷaṃ mâḍi
śrî-Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa-dêvargge śrîgandha-kuṅkuma-karppûra-lêpanâdy-aṅga-bhôgakkaṃ naivêdya-
kkaṃ dêvara .... satrakkav endu chakravarttiyalli kâruṇyavaṃ paḍedu Pâramêśvara-datṭiy......
kâḍu 30 r̤-oḷagaṇa Guttivûraṃ pûrvva-prasiddha-chatur-âghâṭa-samanvitaṃ mêlâ ........ sahitaṃ
sarvva-bâdhâ-parihâradiṃ ...... chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ sthirav âgi goṭṭar î-dharmma.. haḍapad-
Âditya-bhaṭṭargge dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭa gaḷde ...... beddalu mattarunâlku int î-dharmma
........ Vâraṇâsi-Kurukshêtrârgghyatîrttha-Gayâ-Prayâga śrî-Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇa- ............
mahâ-puṇya-tîrtthaṅgaḷalli ............ śaṅkha-saṅkhyâ-samanvitav enipa chatur-vvêda-vêdâṅga-
vêdântâdi-vidyâ-viśêshaka...... puṇyar enipa bhûmidêvôttamargge pratyêkav âgi koṭṭa suvarṇṇa-
varṇṇada kapilegaḷaṃ kôḍugaḷaṃ ponnoḷu koḷagugaḷaṃ beḷḷi .. kâṃsya-dôhana-pâtraṃ (rest illegible)

Notes
↑1. * These verses are in Nâgari characters.
↑2. * So in the original.
EC 11 Dg 42
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg042

42 In the enclosure of the same temple, on a stone to the north of the Kâśî-Viśvêśvara temple.


I.
........ nityam êkaṃ Hariharâtmakaṃ |
samâhita-janânanda-kadaḷî-kanda-varddhanaṃ ǁ
srîmach-chit-sau ...... Bhava kṛitiyoḷ êkâtmar âm embudaṃ nis- |
sîmaṃ lôkakk abhibyañjipa-ter̤ad esada...... rttisvayambhû- |
.. matvaṃ chelvu-vett â-Harihara-paramârâdhyar îg apramêya- |
prêmar ddaṇḍâdhipaṃ Barmmarasan-abhimatâvâptiyaṃ tâme nichchaṃ ǁ
śrî-Girijâ-varaṃ Haran ad orvvaḷ iḷâmara-putri tannan int |
âgaḷum old upâsti-geye tad-dhṛidayêshṭa-phaḷârppaṇârtthadiṃ |
râgadal âkeyaṃ kanasinoḷ nereyal samasanda tat-samâ- |
(yôgadin) Îśvarâṃśam ene nindudu garbbhav adabhra-vibhramaṃ ǁ

antu garbbhaṃ nelesi (nava)-mâsaṃ tîval oḍane ǁ

[page 88]ka ǁ
II.
atiśayatara-rûpânvita- | n atarkkya-vikraman anûna-śubha-lakshaṇa-saṃ- |
yutan akhiḷa-sat-kaḷâ-vi- | śrutan udayasidaṃ ripu-vrajôshṇaṃ Kṛishṇaṃ ǁ
udayisi nâpita-karmadi- | n ad-orvva nara-mâṃsa-bhakshiyam nṛipanaṃ dur- |
mmadanaṃ saṃharisi jagan- | mudamaṃ muṃ paḍedan alte Kâḷañjaradoḷ ǁ

va ǁ ant âtanaṃ Kṛitânta-dantântarvartti-mâḍi tadîya-râjya-sâṃrâjya-lakshmiyaṃ bâhâvaḷêpadin
iḷdu-koṇḍu nava-laksha-Dahaḷâ-maṇḍaḷama nuḍige sâdhyaṃ mâḍi Kaḷachuri-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Kṛishṇa-
bhûpâḷaṃ sukhadin arasu-geydan âtan-anvaya-jâtaroḷ anêka-bhûpâḷaka-pravarttanâ-vyatikramaṇa-
doḷu ǁ

vṛi ǁ
III.
pesar-vaḍedaṃ nijâkṛiti vidagdha-vadhû-jana-vaśya-viddey emb |
esakaman appukeyye nija-vikramam uddhata-nâśa-hetuv emb |
esakaman appukeyye nija-kîrttiy apûrvva-sudhâṃśu-rôchiy emb |
esakaman appukeyye dharaṇî-pati Kannama-Dêvan urvviyoḷ ǁ
ka ǁ
IV.
tad-vikhyâtaṅg adhika-bhu- | ja-dvayam ene sanda Râja Bijjalan embar |
sad-vidyar jjaya-lakshmî- | hṛid-vallabhar âdar irvvaruṃ priya-putrar ǁ
vṛitta ǁ
V.
avaroḷag agrajaṃ negaḷda Bijjala-Dêvan anûna-sâhasô- |
dbhava-nidhi śatru-maṇḍaḷika-maṇḍaḷiyaṃ nija-maṇḍalâgradind |
avanata-vṛittig âḷ-vesake dandu jagad-vijigîshu-vṛitti bhû- |
bhuvanadoḷ ekka-lâvaṇam ivaṅg ene nindan iḷêjya-râjyadoḷ ǁ
Harige chatur-bhujaṃ divija-dantige danta-chatushkav oppuv-ant- |
ire tad-iḷêśvarânuja-mahîpatig Ammugi Śaṅkhavarmman â- |
narapati Kannaraṃ negal̤ḍa Jôgaman emba tanûjar intu nâl- |
varum esad irddar ant avaroḷ agrajan Ammugiy ântan urvviyaṃ ǁ

anantaraṃ tad-anujaṃ ǁ

vṛi ǁ
VI.
ântaran Antakânanadoḷ aḷgisi matt uḷid ôḍid anya-bhû- |
kântaran anta-kânanadoḷ aḷg ire śâsisi lîleyiṃ padâ- |
krântaran âdya-vṛittige samantu niyôjisi dhâtri baṇṇipan- |
nan Tal̤ikâḍa Jôgama-nṛipaṃ mer̤edaṃ nija-râja-nîtiyaṃ ǁ

tat-putra ǁ

vṛi ǁ
VII.
ari-bhûpâḷara mîse bhôṅkene kariṅk-êḷvannegaṃ têjav â- |
varisitt urvviyan âpad-abdhi-vinimagnônmagnaraṃ dânav ud- |
dharisitt arthi-janaṅgaḷaṃ Manu-pavitrâchâramaṃ tâṃ tiras- |
karisutt âtma-charitrav ên adhikanô Permmâḍi-bhûpâḷakaṃ ǁ

â-nṛipaṅge ǁ

vṛi ǁ
VIII.
udayisidaṃ pratâpa-nidhi Bijjala-Dêva-dharâdhinâthan itt |
udayise Yâvanôddhata-vadhû-tatig utkaḷikâ-prapañcham att |
udayise dur-mmadâri-dharaṇîśvara-mâḷeg anûna-bhîti matt |
udayise bândhava-kshititaḷêśvara-santatig utsavôtsavaṃ ǁ
dharanî-chakrakk adhishṭhânam id enisudud âtmîya-dôr-ddaṇḍav unma- |
tta-ripu-vrâtâsu-vâtâśanade taṇidud â-śâta-khaḷgâhi vidvad- |
vara-chêtaḥ-prîti-santarppaṇade sa-phaḷav âyt arthav âśâ-karîndrôt- |
kara-karṇṇôtkîrṇṇav âyt ujvaḷa-yaśav enipaṃ Bijjaṇa-kshôṇipâḷaṃ ǁ
sale nile vêḷey endu bhayadiṃ kaḍid aṅguḷi melda bâya tam- |
bulav eḷakoṇḍu maṇḍam aḍa-gûḷ urad aṅkusav âgi koyda nuṇ- |
galey ivu kâguv allade virôdhi-nṛipar chchalad-aṅka-Râmanoḷ |
maled idir âdaḍ âḷ kudurey âne rathaṃ ner̤e kâyal ârppuvê ǁ
[page 89]nosalôḷ sâmrâjya-paṭṭaṃ nelasal oḍane dôr-ggarvvadiṃ manneyargg ub- |
basavaṃ muṃ mâḍidaṃ matt irey ire chaladiṃ maṇḍaḷêsargge bêroḷ |
bisi-nîraṃ poydan ant antirey ire baḷiyaṃ râyaraṃ kûḍe nirmmû- |
ḷisidaṃ chakrâdhinâthôjvaḷa-mukha-tiḷakaṃ Bijjala-kshôṇipâḷaṃ ǁ
odavida garvvadiṃ beseva râyara ben-dovalaṃ bidirchchi râ- |
gadin eḷatanda danti-haya-santatiy allade honnan ittu ka- |
ṭṭida kari-vâji-sâhaṇadoḷ elliyum ill enip ondu sâhasâ- |
bhyudayaman onda-nâlageyoḷ ê-vogaḷveṃ Giri-durgga-mallanaṃ ǁ
munid idirânta bhûbhujara nettiyan aṭṭeyoḷ âḷe poyyad ir- |
ppane suli-pal ghalillen uge bâḷina kîḷ-parajinde môdad ir- |
ppane naḍu-bennoḷ aḷ-garuḷan ommeya neydala kâvan urchchuv-ant |
anituman urchchad irppane raṇâgraṇi Bijjala-Dêva-bhûbhujaṃ ǁ
kaṃ ǁ
IX.
koḍadin udiyisid Agastyaṃ | kaḍalaṃ pîrddante maṇḍaḷêśvara-râjyakk |
oḍeyan ene puṭṭi vîradi- | n eḍegoṇḍaṃ sakaḷa-dhâtriyaṃ Bijja-nṛipaṃ ǁ

svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ Kâḷañjara-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ suvarṇṇa-
vṛishabha-dhvajaṃ | ḍamaruka-tûryya-nirghôshaṇaṃ Kaḷachuri-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ | kadana-
prachaṇḍaṃ | mâna-Kanakâchaḷaṃ su-bhaṭar âdityaṃ | kaligaḷ-aṅkuśaṃ gaja-sâmanta saraṇâgata-
vajra-pañjaraṃ pratâpa-Laṅkêśvaraṃ para-nârî-sahôdaraṃ Śanivâra-siddhi giri-durgga-mallaṃ |
chalad-aṅka-Râmaṃ | vairîbha-kaṇṭhîravaṃ niśśaṅka-malla-namâdi-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmad-bhuja-
baḷa-chakravartti-Tribhuvanamalla-Bijjaṇa-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddha-
mânam â-chandra târaṃ saluttam ire tad-pâda-pad nôpajîvi ǁ

vṛi ǁ
X.
chatur-upadhâ-viśuddha-mati Chittabhava-pratirûpa-sundarâ- |
kṛiti sura-śaiḷa-sannibha-mahônnati vipra-janêshṭa-dâna-saṅ- |
gati ripu-vṛinda-durmmada-nivâraṇa-kâraṇa-châru-sâhasa- |
sthiti Kasapayya-Nâyakanoḷ eyde jagan-nuti-vettu tôr̤uguṃ ǁ
manava.... dhîśa-Bijjala-nṛipêndra-padâmbuja-yugma-bhaktiyoḷ |
dhanavan anûna-dâna-nichayaṅgaḷoḷ uktiyan udgha-satya.. ḷ |
tanuvan anêka-sad-brata-samâcharaṇaṅgaḷoḷ âtma-kîrttî-var |
ttanaman aṇaṃ diśântadoḷ adhishṭhisidaṃ Kasapayya-Nâyakaṃ ǁ
... ǁ
XI.
viditame purâṇa-Rukmâṅ- | gadan apara-Yudhishṭhiraṃ nava-Prahlâdaṃ |
sad-amaḷa-charitradind em- | budu sale Kasapayya-Nâyakanan akhiḷa-janaṃ ǁ
âtaṅge sakaḷa-jana-vi- | khyâta-guṇaṅg eseva maydunaṃ tân ene sañ- |
jâta-yaśaṃ śauryya-gu.. | ........ Barmmarasa-daṇḍanâthaṃ negaḷdaṃ ǁ
vṛi ǁ
XII.
pitṛi Sagarânvayaṃ negaḷda Muñjala-Dêvan atarkkya-rûpa-san- |
nuti ........ viśva-nute Bîyala-Dêviy apâra-vîran un- |
nata-guṇan aśva-dâna-nidhi Dôcha-chamûpati mâvan |
.... emma nimm-aḷave Barmmana nirmmaḷa-vaṃśa-varṇṇanaṃ ǁ
Kâmana rûpa-śôbhe Khacharêndrana sannuta-dâna-sampadaṃ |
Bhîma .... gadoḷ îkshipaḍ ill enavêḍa bandu sa- |
prêmade nôḷke tâṃ bayasi bêḷke virôdhaman eyde mâḷke nis- |
sîma ........ chamûpati tôr̤uguv â-guṇaṅgaḷaṃ ǁ
ôvade râyaraṃ mur̤iva Poysaḷan-oḍḍan ad onde-vâji .. |
...... ôḍi tor̤eyaṃ puge sôrvva tadîya-raktadiṃ |
bhâvise Tuṅgabhadreya jaḷam nava-kuṃkuma-varṇṇa...... |
.. vagav endoḍ âr ppogaḷal ârpparo Parmmana sâhasaṅgaḷaṃ |
[page 90]peḍeyaṃ tâṃ paḍe poyguv endu Phaṇipaṃ ...... |
miḍukaṃ dâḍegaḷaṃ kaḷal̤chugum enuttuṃ siṃhav î-lôkadoḷ |
poḍaralk aṇmavu kaṇḍoḍ eyde poseguṃ ...... doḷ |
siḍil aḷkirppud enalk ad âv adaṭan âmpaṃ Barmma-daṇḍêśanaṃ ǁ
kaṃ ǁ
XIII.
eraḍ illada nuḍiy ondaro- | ḷ irav ...... |
poreyad udâraṃ seraguṃ | berag illada vîrav emma Barmmaṅge nijaṃ ǁ
pusi moḷat-ante ...... gaṇḍare Barmman-antir oḍ- |
ḍisidara nettaraṃ nelake vâgi kanalchi . raḷ-garuḷgaḷaṃ |
dese-vali-geydu mîr̤ida-raṇa ...... kîr̤i gar- |
jjisuvara gaṇṭalaṃ nulidu tammaḍa .. ner̤e tôr̤ad-annegaṃ ǁ
sale giri-durgga-ma...... nôḍal eyduvaṃ |
jalamaya-durggamaṃ jaladhiyoḷ kalasal ner̤evaṃ prakôpa-saṃ- |
jvalana ........ rggamumaṃ suḍal ârppan endu Bi- |
jjala-nṛipan aḷkar̤im besasuvaṃ gaḍa Barmman id êṃ pratâpiyô ǁ
tova ...... man asthiyaṃ ner̤eye koṭṭar munnin-â-dânigaḷ |
nevadiṃ bêḷpavarg ant avaṃ tuḍal uḍal ........ |

straman udyat-kanakaṃ .... rmma-daṇḍâdhipaṃ ǁ
kaṃ ǁ
XIV.
vârakav adhikârada siri | nîr êr̤al ad êke garvvadind ant adar̤ol |

XV.
tad-amâtyaṃ satya-sambhâvita-vimaḷa-vachaṃ châru-dâkshiṇya ...... |
........ ḍguṇya-mantrôdbbava-nidhi parama-brâhmya-châritra-nityâ- |
bhyudaya-sthânaṃ mahô ........ payôrâśiy emb ondu pempiṃ |
viditaṃ tân âdan âdaṃ Ravicharasan udâtta ........ draṃ ǁ
sogayisuv-âbhijâtyav abhijâtateyoḷ dorey-âda mûrtti mûr- |
ttige paḍi ........ ritav â-cḥaritakk eṇey-âda lakshmi la- |
kshmige saman âdud ond ar̤ivu matt ar̤iviṅg anurûpavâ...... |
...... iv âvagaṃ karaṇad Âcharasaṅg aḷavaṭṭu tôr̤uguṃ ǁ
kaṃ ǁ
XVI.
vara-charita-Dyunadîjaṃ | paripûjita .... padâmbhôjaṃ bhâ- |
skara-têjaṃ karaṇada .. | ṭṭi-Râjan âtmîya-vaṃśa-kuvaḷaya-râjaṃ ǁ
î-dhare ........ | bôdhâbharaṇaṃ dvijêśa-śaraṇaṃ .... |
bâdhâkaraṇaṃ karaṇaṃ | Srîdhara-Nâyakan akharvva ...... raṇaṃ ǁ
bâlyadin audâryyaṃ sâ- | ... yaśô’rtthite su-śîḷav ar̤ivu jagan-mâṅ- |
galyav enisidavu .. | ...... ṇa-Nâyakanoḷ endaḍ êṃ pogaḷveṃ ǁ
mikk-ar̤ivu kalpa-kujavaṃ | dhikkarip-audâryya ...... mâṅkarisal |
takka-gabhîrate karaṇada | Tikkarasaṅg ekka-ḷâvaṇaṃ tâm enikuṃ ǁ

va ǁ ant enisida ........ kshaṅgaḷ appa samasta-karaṇaṅgaḷu verasu Barmmarasa-daṇḍanâyakar
bBanavâsi-pannir-chchhâsiramu ........ graha-sishṭânugraha-pûrvvakaṃ pratipâḷisuttam irdd ondu-
divasaṃ dharmma-kathâ-pra .... mâhâtmyaṃ prastutav âda samayadoḷu ǁ

vṛi ǁ
XVII.
Gayeyiṃ pâvanav eyde Vâraṇa .... vitraṃ Prayâ- |
geyin atyanta-viśuddhav â-vimaḷa-Gaṅgâ-tîradiṃ pûta-vâ- |
riye Pampâ-taṭa ............ śailadiṃ śrêshṭham em- |
ba yaśô-lakshmiyan ântud â-Harihara-sthânaṃ jagan-maṅgaḷaṃ ǁ
nuta-ti ...... tapô-yôgadiṃ vêda-vidyâ- |
ratiyiṃ hômaṅgaḷiṃ (dhyânadin) eseva mahâ-dânadiṃ ...... |
[page 91].. tu sandôhaṅgaḷiṃ matt uḷida su-charita-vrâtadiṃ pôgad aty-û- |
rjjita-puṇyaṃ pôga...... charaṇâbhyarchcha ................ ǁ

(rest illegible)

EC 11 Dg 43
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg043

43 At the same place, on a second stone.


svasti śrî jayâbhyudayaś cha

I.
namaḥ kamaḷa-nâbhâya Vishṇavê prabhavishṇavê |
jagad-indîvarânanda-bandhavê śauryya-sindhavê ǁ
pâtu vô mêdinî-ḍôḷâ bâḷêndu-dyuti-śôbhinî |
daṃshṭrâ mahâ-Varâhasya pâtâḷa-gṛiha-dîpikâ ǁ
paridhâvan-nakra-chakra-kramaṇa-ramaṇa-sañjâta-kallôḷa-mâḷâ- |
sphurad-udyat-sîkaraugha-sthagita-gagana-dig-maṇḍaḷaṃ châru-châmî- |
kara-ratna-brâta-nânâ-ruchi-nichaya-viḷâsâspadaṃ śôbhikuṃ bhâ- |
sura-Jaṃbûdvîpamaṃ suttidud ati-bahaḷa-dhvâna-raudraṃ samudraṃ ǁ

va ǁ â-ratnâkara-vêshṭitam appa Jambûdvîpada naṭṭa-naḍuve ǁ

II.
amara-gaṇa-sêvyav ati-tuṅg- | ima-sikhara-bhrâjinikhiḷa-târâ-chakra- |
bhramaṇâvaḷi divijô- | ttama-niḷayaṃ Mandarâchaḷaṃ rañjisuguṃ ǁ

va ǁ â-Mandara-ma . dharada dakshiṇa-dig-maṇḍaḷakke maṇḍanamum enisi ǁ

ka ǁ
III.
santata-viḷâsa .. ta-bhû- | śvântaṃ kamanîya-nagara-nandana-lakshmî- |
kântaṃ dhâtrî-kânteya | kuntaḷav ene tôrppud oppi Kuntaḷa-dêśaṃ ǁ

tat-Kuntaḷa-dharâtaḷâdhipatya .. ḷ anêka-Châḷukya-chakrêśvara-pravarttanâ-byatikramaṇadoḷu ǁ

IV.
Mâlava-mâ .... di-haraṇam dhṛita-pallava-Pallavâvanî- |
pâḷaka-maṇḍaḷaṃ mukuḷa-hasta .. gâtta-lalâṭa-Lâṭa-bhû- |
mî-lalanâdhipaṃ viśad-anûna-kaḷiṅga-Kaḷiṅgan embud â- |
bhîḷa-parâ .. ma-kramanan eyde jagaṃ Jagadêkamallana ǁ

tat-kâladoḷu ǁ

V.
dharaṇî-chakrakk adhîsṭhânam id eni .. dud âtmîya-dôr-ddaṇḍav unma- |
tta-ripu-brâtâsu-vâtâśanade taṇidud â-śâta-khaḷgâhi vidvad- |
vara-chêtar̤-prîti-santarppaṇade saphalav âyt artthav âśâ-karîndrôt- |
kara-karṇṇôtkîrṇṇav âyt ujvaḷa-yaśav enipaṃ Bijjaḷa-kshôṇipâḷa ǁ
â-dharaṇîśvara-pada-sê- | vâdhînaṃ sakaḷa-vimaḷa-guṇa-gaṇa-ratnâṃ- |
bhôdhi nirâkṛita-vidviḍ- | bâdhaṃ śrî-Vîra-Pâṇḍya-bhûpan udâra ǁ
â-vibhuvin-anujan akhiḷa-ka- | ḷâ-vidan ânamita-vîra-vairi-nṛipâḷaṃ |
sêvita-guru-Harihara-bhû- | dêvaṃ Nigaḷaṅka-malla Kâma-nṛipâḷaṃ ǁ

tad-agra-tanûjaṃ ǁ

VI.
Paṇḍita-Pâṇḍya-tanûjaṃ | paṇḍita-maṇḍaḷa-sarôja-vana-mârttaṇḍaṃ |
maṇḍaḷika-gaṇḍa-giri-pavi- | daṇḍaṃ śrî-Vijaya-Pâṇḍyan âhava-śauṇḍa ǁ

â-Pâṇḍya-maṇḍaḷâdhîśvaraṃ Noṇaṃbavâḍi-mûvatt-ir-chchhâsiramaṃ sva-dharmmadiṃ pratipâḷisuttam
ire tad-anuvarttiy enipa Sindânvayad avatârav ent endaḍe ǁ

VII.
Siva-Sindhu-saṅgadind ud- | bhavisidan orbbaṃ kumâran âtana pesaraṃ |
Bhavan iṭṭan oldu Sai.. va- | n ivan end uragâdhirâja-rakshâ-sahitaṃ ǁ
[page 92]puli-vâlaṃ kuḍid allade | kaliy âgaṃ putran endu Gaurî-pati tann- |
olaviṃ puliyaṃ nirmmise | puli-vâlaṃ kuḍidu beḷedan â-śiśu dhareyoḷ ǁ

va ǁ mattaṃ Paramêśvaraṃ tanna putraṅge Mâḷatî-dêviyaṃ saṅgrâmakke sahâyey âg endu besase
Niḍudôḷa-Sindan end eraḍaneya pesaraṃ kuḍe paḍedu |

vṛi ǁ
VIII.
Karahâṭaṃ yôga-pîṭhaṃ tanage neley enal sandu tad-bhûmipâḷôt- |
karamaṃ beṅkoṇḍu[....]bhuja-baḷadin iḷâ-chakramaṃ tan-nṛipâḷaṃ |
dharaṇîpâḷarkkaḷoḷ ballidan adaṭan udâraṃ kula-khyâtan end ur- |
bbare nichchaṃ baṇṇisal bhû-bhuvanadoḷ esedaṃ Sinda-vaṃśâvatâraṃ ǁ

svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Karahâṭa-pura-varâdhiśvaraṃ Mâḷatî-
dêvî-labudha-vara-prasâda sâdita-samasta-mahî-maṇḍaḷaṃ | vijaya-lakshmî-karṇṇa-kuṇḍaḷaṃ | nîḷa-
dhvaja-virâjamânaṃ | dâna-Kânînaṃ | mallaḷi-tûryya-ghôshaṇaṃ | guṇa-ratna-bhûshaṇaṃ | Sinda-
mârttaṇḍa vijaya-dôr-ddaṇḍa | Phaṇi-râja-vaṃśa | sujanâvataṃsa | vyâghra-mṛiga-lâñchchhanaṃ |
viniyôga-kâñchanaṃ | śauryya-pârâyaṇaṃ | vairi-Nârâyaṇaṃ | aras-aṅka-karagasaṃ birudar-aṅkuśa |
vairi-vana-dâvaṃ Sindara-Dêvaṃ Niḍudôḷa-Sinda Karahaḍa-nâl-sâsirav-oḷagâg anêka-dêśaṅgaḷan
âḷdan âtana vaṃśadoḷ anêkaruṃ râjyaṃ geydar avaroḷu |

vṛi ǁ
IX.
a-gaṇita-paurushâbharaṇan uddhata-vairi-nṛipâḷa-brinda-saṃ- |
yuga-vijaya-prachaṇḍa-bhuja-daṇḍa-samâhṛita-râjya-sampadaṃ |
mṛiga-ripu-vikramaṃ para-baḷârṇṇava-Kumbhajan endu santataṃ |
pogaḷe dharâtalaṃ piriya-Chaṭṭarasaṃ pesarvettan urbbiyoḷ ǁ
ka ǁ
X.
âtana sati sakaḷa-guṇô- | pête Mahîjâtegaṃ Mahîdhara-sutegaṃ |
khyâtey ene Dôrabarasi vi- | nûta-patibrata-guṇakke modal ene negaḷdaḷ ǁ
â-dampatigaḷa puṇyadi-n âdaṃ magan adhika-vikramaṃ Jôgarasaṃ |
mêdiniyan âḷdan âtaṅg | âdaṃ Chaṭṭarasan udita-bhâgyaṃ putra ǁ
siḍda poḍarppinoḷ dorege vappudu daḷḷipa-têjad êḷge pâl- |
gaḍala gabhîra-vṛittig eṇey âdudu tanna gabhîra-vṛitti nâl- |
vaḍi Kanakâchaḷakke migil unnati kaḷpa-mahîruhakke nûr- |
mmaḍi migil âytu châgad esakaṃ dorey âvano Chaṭṭa-bhûpanoḷ ǁ
taḷare taḷarchchuvaṅge Kanakâchaḷam ottuvavaṅg elê viyat- |
taḷam alarvaṅge tîvi-tegad-ambu taḍambarivaṅge kaṇṭaka- |
praḷeyam avuṅkuvaṅge Javan aṅkisuvaṅge siḍild siḍil diṭaṃ |
seḷedapen-embavaṅg aḷurva-daḷḷuri Chaṭṭaman emba jeṭṭigaṃ ǁ

va ǁ tad-anantaraṃ tad-vaṃśadoḷu |

XI.
âtata-kîrtti Mâcharasan ânata-rakshaṇa-daksha-vikramaṃ |
nîti-nirantarâbhyudaya mânita-mânyan udâra-śauryya-sañ- |
jâta-yaśô-vitâna-vaḷayîkṛita-dig-vaḷaya-prapañchan ud- |
dyôtita-bhânu-têjan uditôdita-bhâgyan udagra-paurushaṃ ǁ
kâdida-kâḷegaṅgaḷan ad ê-vesagoṇḍape Mâchi-Dêva-śa- |
strôdita-vairi-bhûpa-rudhira-hrada-magna-maṇi-vrajaṅgaḷaṃ |
bhêdisi kâṇbar innuv ari-râja-puraṅgaḷa sîmeyalli sam- |
pâdita-pôta-yâtrika-janaṃ pugal ollade vârddhi-madhyamaṃ ǁ

ad alladeyuṃ ǁ

XII.
kaliyaṃ mûdali .. te pandeyan elê pôg endu saṅgrâmadiṃ |
tolagirppantevol unnatâṃśu-yugadoḷ vaksha-sthaḷôddêśadoḷ |
sale pûrbbâṅgadoḷ âvagaṃ tur̤ugi tôr̤utt irppa śastra-braṇâ- |
vaḷi vîrâṅgane kûḍe kaṇ-dereda .. ant oppuguṃ santataṃ ǁ
[page 93]kshîra-samudrad-ante Kamaḷôdbhavan Îśvaran-ant Umâ-varaṃ |
Mêru-girîndrad-ante .. budhâśrayaṇ Ambujanâbhan-ante vi- |
stârita-vikrama dyumaṇiy-ant ire sat-pada-varttiy embud î- |
dhâriṇi Mâchi-Dêva-narapâḷanan ûrjjita-puṇya-śîḷanaṃ ǁ

va ǁ yint enisida Sindânvaya-gagana-sudhârôchiy appa Mâchi ...... ge ǁ

ka ǁ
XIII.
Ratigaṃ Pârbbatigav Arun- | dhatigaṃ migilâda rûpu-saubhâgya-pati- |
brata-guṇadin oppire hi .. | .. te Chaṭṭala-Dêviy agra-mahiśiy enippaḷ ǁ
kuladindaṃ baladindam unnatikeyiṃ saubhâgyadiṃ bhâgyadiṃ |
chalaḍiṃ rûpa-viḷâsadiṃ vibhavadiṃ châritradiṃ permmeyiṃ |
lalanâ-ratnav id endu dhâtri pogaḷguṃ .... radiṃ pûṇdu nir- |
mmaḷeyaṃ Chaṭṭala-Dêviyaṃ pati-hita-prârambha-Bhûjâteyaṃ ǁ
tad-anujan udâra-cha .... | kadana-krîḍâ-vinôdan uddhata-darppaṃ |
bidura-parâkraman âdaṃ | vidita-guṇaṃ Malli-Dêvan ûrjjita-têja ǁ
... bhuvina tammaṃ saka- | lâvanipa-khyâta-kîrtti sad-guṇa-vibhavakk |
âvâsam enisidaṃ saṃ- | bhâvitan-.... rasan agrajaṅg ati-bhakta ǁ
vṛi ǁ
XIV.
Baḷabhadraṅge Murâri Dharmma-taneyaṅg â-Bhîmasênaṃ mahî- |
taḷa-vikhyâtan enippa Dâśarathig â-Saumitriy ant êne niś- |
chaḷa-bhakti-brata-śuddhiyiṃ vinayadiṃ śûratvadiṃ kûḍi nir- |
mmaḷa .... sa keyvan Ayharasan aṇṇaṅg agraja-snêhadiṃ ǁ
dâna-guṇaṃ kaṇ-der̤adudu | Kânînaṃ maguḷe hu ...... ṅg enipaṃ |
sûnṛita-vachana-nidhânaṃ | mânitan Ayharasan akhiḷa-dâna-vinôdaṃ ǁ

ant enisid Aiharasa .... ya-tanûjaṃ Râyarasan âtana nûtana-nṛipêtara-prabhâvav ent endaḍe ǁ

XV.
dharaṇî-rakshaṇa-daksha-dakshiṇa-bhujâ .... ṅge saṅgrâma-bhî- |
kara-siṃha-pratimaṅge vâravanitâ-Kandarppakalpaṅge pêḷ |
doreyê mattina ṭuṃ .... tipar end end âgaḷuṃ kîrttikuṃ |
dhare vidvaj-jana-pôshaṇôchita-nijâbhiprâyanaṃ Râyanaṃ ǁ

â.... da kula-tilakana kula-vanite ǁ

ka ǁ
XVI.
guṇadoḷ chaduroḷu śubha-la- | kshaṇadoḷ dore Girije Vâṇi Lakshmî-vadhuv end- |

XVII.
aṃrita-payônidhiyiṃ chan- | draman udayâchaḷadin arkkan abjôdaradiṃ |

daradiṃ ........ tand oḍarchchisida nânâ-dîpad-ant oppuguṃ ǁ
parama-paramânurâgadi | Suranadi Rudrâṇi Śaṃbhu ...... Hêrambaṃ |
berasu k(h)arav oldu band Î- | śvara-Dêvaṅg ittar eseyal âyuṃ śrîyaṃ ǁ

taḷedirdd â-Hariy Îśvarôrbbipatig îgi........ ddhiya ǁ

kâduven em ....... puv âjige mâraṇa-mantra-sannibha ǁ
aṅguḷiyiṃ phaṇâ-maṇiya ratnada mudreya hasta ........ |

kaṇg ati-raudrav âge ripu-mastakamaṃ muḷi ........

pâdana-hêtu...... Kali-kâladoḷaṃ Manu-mârgga-vartti tân |
âda mahâtmanaṃ pogaḷvud-Îśvara-bhûbhujanaṃ nirantaraṃ ǁ

va ǁ antu vinayada kaṇiyuṃ vikrama...... ma mâvan alla.... santana râjya-baḷakke..........

XVIII.
taruṇî-tuṅga-stana ...... Maḷayajadiṃ hâri-hâridra-râgôt- |
kara ...... gaḷin aruṇâśmâvaḷî-châru-bhûśâ- |
karaṇa-stôma ... jaḷa-viharaṇa ................ |
... taṃ pa(y)iśaṅgitaṃ karbburitav aruṇitaṃ Tuṅgabhadrâ-jaḷaugha ǁ

XIX.
...... dharmmame .... ḷa-.. khyada |
...... saṃsârad-oḷage sâśvatam adar̤iṃ |
dharmmamane mâḷpudadar̤iṃ |
dharmmakkaṃ nâ ............ dud uṇṭê ǁ

endu dharmmamane mukhyaṃ mâḍi svasti śrîmat-Kaḷachuryya-kuḷa-tiḷaka chakravartti Bhujabaḷa-
malla-Dêva-varshad eṇṭeneya Śubhânu-saṃvatsarada Puśya-suddhad ↓2amavâse-Bṛihavârad andu śrî-
man-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Yîśvara-Dêv-arasaru śrî-dakshiṇa Gaṅge-Vâraṇâsi-śvayambhu-Śaṅkara-
Nârâyaṇa-dêvara prabhâta-śrî-kâryyakaṃ naivêdya-shôḍashôpachârakke Bhrânti mûvattar̤a tamma
manneyara nibandhiyoḷag ûral ondu honnan uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-sûryya-grahaṇa-byatîpâtad andu
alliya aśêsha-mahâjanaṃ nûr̤a-nâlvaru naḍasuvant âgi avara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ mâḍi
koṭṭaru ǁ

EC 11 Dg 44
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg044

44 On a fifth stone, at the same place.


I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ
II.
pâyâd âdi-Varâhasya lîlâ-viḷa .... |
yad-daṃshṭrâgrê sthitâ bhûmiḥ kastûrî-gôḷakâyatê ǁ
Śrî-râmâ-Girijâdhipau sura-vara-prônnamra-pâdâmbujau |
śaṅkhâmbhô ...... paṭṭiśa-dharau svarṇṇâhi-bhûshânvitau |
Târkshyôkshônnata-vâhanau Hari-Harau bhaktêshṭa-sampatkarau |
pâtâṃ Kâvaṇa-Daṇḍanâtham aniśaṃ bhû-lôka-kaḷpa-drumaṃ ǁ
paridhâvan-matsya-puchchhâhata-makara-karâsphâḷanâbhîḷa-nakra- |
sphuritôdyach-chhiṃśumâra-kramaṇa-samuditôchchaṇda-vâtâbhighâtô- |
ddhura-vîchî-śîkaraugha-sthagita-nikhiḷa-dig-maṇḍaḷaṃ rañjikuṃ bhâ- |
sura-Jambûdvîpa-.. ḷâ-vaḷeyita-bahaḷa-dhvâna-raudraṃ samudraṃ ǁ

va ǁ â-Jambûdvîpada madhya-pradêśakk aḷaṅkârav enal oppambaḍedu ǁ

III.
sura-vidyâdhara-dampati-prakaradiṃ chandrârkka-târâ-gaṇôt- |
kara-śôbhâñchita-mêkhaḷâ-vaḷeyadiṃ sat-kâñchanôddîpti-ban- |
dhura-gôtrâchalad unnata-pratibheyiṃ kaḷpâṅghripârâma-vi- |
staradiṃ rañjipud ujjvaḷôrjjita-yaśaṃ śrî-sundaraṃ Mandaraṃ ǁ
kaṃ ǁ
IV.
â-Mandarakke dakshiṇa- | bhû-maṇḍaḷam esevud alli Bharata-kshêtraṃ |
