va ǁ â-viśvambharâ-maṇḍaḷamaṃ vijaya-lakshmî-maṇḍita-nija-bhuja.... padiṃ tâl̤dar anekar chChâ-

V.

bhû-vadhuvaṃ bhujadoḷ eseye Maiḷugi-Dêvaṃ ǁ

va ǁ antuv alladeyuṃ |

vṛitta ǁ
VIII.
lôḷa-bhujâsi-ghâta-gaḷitâhita-gandha-gajêndra-kumbha-muk- |

X.

XI.

n udâtta-vibhavâmarêndran udvṛitta-bhujaṃ |

XII.
sumanô-bhûdhara-kîḷitâyata-mahad-bhû-bhâramaṃ tâl̤dida- |
śramamaṃ mâṇipen ende Kûrmma-Phaṇabhṛid-dig-dantigaḷg ande saṃ- |
bhran adind âdima-chakravartti-vijayâḷaṅkâran int oppe Saṅ- |
kama-Dêvaṃ taḷedaṃ dharâ-vaḷeyamaṃ prôchchaṇḍa-dôr-ddaṇḍadiṃ ǁ

ad alladeyuṃ |

vṛi ǁ
XIII.
vâridhiy-ant agâdha-mahimâspadanuṃ bahu-ratna-śôbhiyuṃ |
Mêru-girîndrad-ante kanakânvitanuṃ vibudhaika-sêbyanuṃ |
Vârijanâbhan-ant atul̤a-vikramanuṃ kamaḷâkshan embud î- |
dhâriṇi Saṅkamâṅka-narapâḷanan ûrjjita-puṇya-śîḷanaṃ ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ Kâḷâñjara-pura-
varâdhîśvaraṃ suvarṇṇa-vṛishabha-dhvaja ḍamaruga-tûryya-nirgghôshaṇa kadana-prachaṇḍa subha-
ṭar-âditya kaligaḷ-aṅkusa chalad-aṅka-Râma śrîmatu Kaḷachuryya-bhuja-baḷa-chakravartti nissaṅka-
malla Saṅkama-Dêvaru Kalyâṇada nele-vîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire |
tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi vairi-bhaya-dâyakan enippa Kâvaṇa-Daṇḍanâyakana...... v ent endoḍe ǁ

kaṃ ǁ
XIV.
Karaḍikalu-nâḍa lakshmige |
vara-bhûshaṇam enipa Nandavâḍigeyol̤u Man- |
dara-dhairyyan ol̤pu-vaḍed opp |
ire dêvala-Sôma negal̤dan urvvî-taḷadol̤ ǁ
ant esev Agastya-gôtrada |
santânadoḷ amal̤a-kal̤pa-bhûjada ter̤adiṃ |
santatav udâra-charitaṃ |
Kantu-nibhaṃ Permma-Dêvan eḷeyoḷu negal̤daṃ ǁ
[page 97]â-vibhuvina vadhu pempiṃ |
bhû-vadhuvaṃ nikhiḷa-vibhava-guṇad unnatiyiṃ |
Śrî-vadhuvaṃ pôlt akhiḷa-ka- |
ḷâvide sati Jakkaṇavve pati-hitey enipaḷ ǁ
avar-irvvarggaṃ puṭṭida- |
n avanî-taḷa-vinuta-dâna-guṇadiṃ Karṇṇaṅg |
ivan adhikan enisidaṃ bhû- |
bhuvanadoḷ î-Kâvaṇayya-daṇḍâdhîśaṃ |
vṛi |
XV.
satataṃ viśruta-sat-kaḷâ-chaturanê Brahmâtmajaṃ bhûtaḷa- |
XVI.
stuta-sâmarthyane Jakkaṇavveya sutaṃ têjar̤-prabhâvôdayôd- |
dhatanê Têja-chamûpan-agrajan udagrârâti-sênâbdhiy-un- |
natiyaṃ pîl̤dane sand Agast[y]a-kula-jaṃ daṇḍâdhipaṃ Kâvaṇaṃ ǁ
krûrârâti-madêbha-kumbha-viḷasan-muktâ-phal̤a-śrêṇiyiṃ |
vîra-śrîg avataṃsamaṃ rachiyipaṃ dôr-ddaṇḍa-chaṇḍâsiyiṃ |
dhîrôdâtta-virôdhi-râya-baḷavad-daṇḍêśaroḷ gaṇḍa-peṇ- |
ḍâraṃ Kâvaṇa-daṇḍanâthane valaṃ vidvishṭa-vidrâvaṇaṃ ǁ

va ǁ antum alladeyuṃ ǁ

vṛi ǁ
XVII.
gaṇḍara gôvan emba birudô ...... daṇḍanâthan-ud- |
daṇḍa-bhujâsi-Râhu chaladind idir-ânta-virôdhi-râja-san- |
maṇḍaḷamaṃ kaḍaṅgi gele nuṅgavud achchariy allad î-jagan- |
maṇḍanav âda tat-kuvaḷaya-grahaṇônnati chitram urbbiyoḷ |
mattaṃ ǁ
XVIII.
ripu-nagaraṃ karaṃ vijanav âgiyuv arjjuna-râji-râjitaṃ |
XIX.
vipuḷa-śaśânka-vaṃśa-kanakâñchitav ant ade vibhramânvitaṃ |
chapaḷa-bhujaṅga-bhîma-nakuḷâśrayam udgata-puṇḍarîkam int |
upamege chitrav âyt enipud î-vibhu-Kâvaṇa-daṇḍanâthana ǁ
kusidan iḷâtaḷakk irade Gûrjjaran uṭṭudan ikki Hoysaṇaṃ |
dese-deseg ôḍidaṃ bharadin aḷkidan â-Velunâḍa-Chôḷeyaṃ |
misukade Gôveyâ ...... idan endoḍ ad âmpan âvan int |
asi-lateyaṃ kiḷalk adaṭaroḷ kali-Kâvaṇa-daṇḍanâyakaṃ ǁ
karavâḷâhatiyiṃ padâti-balamaṃ tat-sainika-brâtadiṃ |
turaga-stômaman â-turaṅga-daḷadiṃ mattêbhamaṃ tan-madôd- |
dhura-danti-brajadiṃ ratha-pratatiyaṃ nurgg ottutuṃ Bhîmanoḷ |
dore-vettaṃ kadana-prachaṇḍan enisal daṇḍâdhipaṃ Kâvaṇaṃ ǁ

va ǁ ant â-vibhuvina satiyara mahimey entene ǁ

vṛi ǁ
XX.
Ratiy ent ante viḷâsadiṃ vibhavadiṃ Mâ-dêviy ent ant Arun- |
dhatiy ent ante patibrate prabhuteyiṃ châturyyadiṃ Bhâratî- |
satiy ent ante negaḷte-vettu mer̤evaḷ châritradiṃ bhâgyad un- |
natiyiṃ Kâḷala-Dêvi Kâvaṇa-chamûnâthaṅge sad-rîtiyiṃ ǁ
(mattaṃ ǁ vṛi ǁ)
XXI.
kuruḷiṃ tumbiya bambalaṃ sarasija-śrî-lîleyaṃ vaktradiṃ |
dara-hâsa-dyutiyindav indu-ruchiyaṃ kîḷ-mâḍutuṃ vibhramôt- |
karadiṃ Kâvaṇa-daṇḍanâtha-vipuḷa-śrî-vakshadoḷ lakshmi-vi- |
staramaṃ Mâḷala-Dêvi tâne paḍadaḷ saubhâgyadiṃ bhâgyadiṃ |

[page 98]ant âtan-anujana pratâpa-prabhâvav ent endoḍe ǁ

seḍedar aḍaṅgidar mmaḍidar ôḍidar aḷgidar aḷki baḷkidar |
mmiḍukade birdd uruḷdare .... gundidar uṭṭudan ikki kaiduvaṃ |

ittapan udâtta-charitaṃ |

tad-anujar ûrjjita-prachura-dâna-guṇar vvibhu-Kêśavâṅkanuṃ |

bhyudayada maiyme-vettu sale rañjipar î-dharaṇî-taḷâgradoḷ ǁ

svasti śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ sênâdhipati bâhattara niyôgâdhipati râya-daṇḍanâthaṃ gaṇḍa-peṇḍ-

DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg048

[page 100]48 At the same temple, on the first pillar of the first aṅkaṇa of the mukha-maṇṭapa.


svasti śrîmatu Saka-varshada 1185 neya Rudhirôdgâri-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-su 15 Âdivârad andu
śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Bommarsara maneya sarvva-pradhânaṃ Kuppageḍḍeya Mêdhâvi-
sênabôvanu śrî-Harihara-dêvariṅge â-mahâjanaṅgaḷa kayalu koṭa bîja-honu ga 10 kaṃ varisake baḍi
ga 3 kaṃ taka leka nichchalu vondu vupâravanu sarvvârâdhane sahita naḍasuvaru â-chandrârkka
maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî śrî

DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg049

svasti śrî jayâbhyudayaś cha ǁ Vikrama-saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapada-śu 10 Gu | śrî-Harihara-dêvarige
Gôveya-Paramânanda-Sômanâtha-bhaṭôpâdhyâyara makkaḷu râja-guru Śrîdhara-Dêvaru yavara tamma

neṭṭev inpantiri—2 Subêdâr Shêk baḍê Jemêdâr Veṅgiṭṭâchalam mar̤upaḍi ...... yivâḷ Agôshṭu—

r̤adu ivar 31 mêl viḷunda bâram mâtuṇai

EC 11 Dg 59
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg059

59 At Harihar, on a stone in front of the Lakshmî-dêvi’s temple.


śrî-Hariharâya namaḥ śrî-Râya-Mahadêva-Lakshmî-Nârâyaṇâya namaḥ ǁ

namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

I.
pântu vô jalada-śyâmâś śârṅga-jyâ-ghâta-karkkaśâḥ |
traiḷôkya-manḍapa-stambhâś chatvârô Hari-bâhavaḥ ǁ
Harir avatu kiri-vapur vvô ya(sa)sya radâgrâṅgaṇê sthitâ satataṃ |
sita-kamaḷa-mukuḷa-miḷad-aḷi-lalanâ-lîlâṃ bibhartti bhû-kântâ ǁ
pirid-olavind î-dharmmava |
paripâlisug â-Mahâvarâha-Harîśaṃ |
dharey âvana radanâgrado |
ḷ irut oppuvaḷ abja-madhupa-lalaneya ter̤adiṃ ǁ
[page 102]vara-rada-nâḷadiṃ dig-amaḷa-chchhadadind uḍu-kêsaraṅgaḷind |
uru-ghana-bhriṅgadiṃ kanaka-parbbata-karnnike kûrmma-vrintadiṃ |
parav ene neydalant eseva dhâtriyan Adi-varâha-rûpadiṃ |
dharisidan âvan â-Hariharaṃ paripâlisug î-su-dharmmamaṃ ǁ
vṛitta ǁ
II.
gaja-mukhan Îśa-putran amaḷâmburuhâyata-nêtran Ambikâ- |
tmajan a-jarâ-maraṃ jaṭhara-pannaga-mastaka-ratna-bhânuviṃ |
rajaniyoḷ âdoḍaṃ vikacha-pâda-payôjan amêya-vikramaṃ |
tri-jagad-adhîsvaraṃ koḍuge namma manôrathamaṃ Gaṇâdhipaṃ ǁ
vṛitta ǁ
III.
Nîrajajâta vistarisid aṇḍamumaṃ maṇi-mâleyâgi vi- |
stârisi hastadiṃ piḍidu tanna saraṇ buguvarge lêsumaṃ |
prêrisalôsugaṃ japisutippaḷ iruḷ pagal âvaḷ ôrvvaḷ â- |
Bhârati namma jihvadal an-âviḷadind irutikke santataṃ ǁ
śrî-Lakshmi prêmadind and udisid-udadhiyoḷ puṭṭi târâdhinâthaṃ |
trilôkyakk agragaṇyaṃ modal enisidan â-Sôma-vaṃśônnatakkaṃ |
mêlappa-kshatriya-śrî Yaduvin-udayadiṃ Yâdavâdhîśar end î- |
bhû-lôka-khyâti-vett î-pesarin esadar â-vaṃśaja-kshôṇipâlar ǁ
kanda ǁ
IV.
dharey-atiśaya-bhâramumaṃ |
pariharisalu Râma-Kṛishṇar udayisal oḍan â- |
vara-vaṃśav andu modal âg |
urutara-vikhyâta-kîrtiyind esadikkuṃ ǁ
vṛitta ǁ
V.
alli samasta-bhû-vaniteg orbban adhiśvaran âgiy âḷid-â- |
Bhillaman-âdiyâda-nṛipariṃ bare Jaitugi-Dêvan-âtmajaṃ |
ballidan unnatôdayan udâra-parâkraman aty-udarggadind |
ellarig agragaṇyan enal oppida-kîrttig adhîśa Siṅghaṇaṃ ǁ
naleviṃ vaihâḷig âtaṃ por̤amaḍutiral â-sêneyind edda-dhûḷî- |
kulamaṃ kaṇḍ añji satṛi-kshitipatigaḷu tand itta vittaṅgaḷ ellaṃ |
yiḷeyoḷ kâl-ikkal imb ill ene pasarisal ambhônidhîśaṅge ninn î- |
jaḷadoḷ dauvvârikar baichiḍis enal avar̤iṃ vârdhi ratnâdhinâthaṃ ǁ
vṛitta ǁ
VI.
ari-hṛidayaṅgaḷ emb uru-sarôvara-jîvanamaṃ |
karaṅgaḷ-aty-uravaṇiyind a-sârav ene tat-taruṇî-nayanôtpaḷaṅgaḷaṃ |
vi-rasav enalke mâḍuta mahîsurar-âsya-sarôruhaṅgaḷaṃ |
bharavasadinda vistarisut oppida Siṅghaṇan emba bhâskaraṃ ǁ
kanda ǁ
VII.
âtana mommagan obbaṃ |
bhû-taḷak adhinâthan âgi Kandhara-Dêvaṃ |
prîtiyal udayisal ari-nṛipar |
âtaṅkavan eyde biṭṭar adhipatitanamaṃ ǁ
vṛitta ǁ
VIII.
pirid-app î-khyâtiyindaṃ durada-balupinim kshâtra-têjôgratâ-vi- |
staradind a-krôdhadindaṃ pusige sogasan emb ondu tâtparyyadindaṃ |
ari-chakraiśvaryyamaṃ koṇḍ uduṭi kaḷava sâmarthyadiṃ dhairyyadindaṃ |
vara-bhâgyaṃ Pâṇḍavâdyaṅg eṇey enal esedaṃ vîṛa-Kandhâra-Dêvaṃ ǁ
vṛitta ǁ
IX.
Yadu-kula-kîrtti-kañjava vikâsisal end ina bhûpa-rûpadind |
udasidanô tad-âsraya-varêndireyaṃ ramisalk Adhôkshajaṃ |
mudadi nṛipâlan âdanô Haraṃ ripu-Darppakanaṃ gelalke puṭṭ- |
idan ene Kandharânuja mahâ-Mahadêva-mahîśan oppidaṃ ǁ
[page 103]vṛi ǁ
X.
biḍu nîṃ Kêraḷa ninna râjya-madamaṃ Hammîra nîṃ vîradiṃ |
keḍabêḍ îgaḷe bandu kâṇ oḍeyanaṃ kappaṅgaḷaṃ bêgadiṃ |
kuḍu nîṃ Koṅkaṇa Chôḷa ninna balup inn ên appud end âgaḷuṃ |
poḍavîsaṃ Mahadêvan orbban enutaṃ dvârâdhipar ssâr̤uvar ǁ
Gauḷar kkâḷagak añji putt aḍaridar ṇṇâṇ-geṭṭu-pôg Utkaḷar |
chchêḷa-prîtiya biṭṭar ôḍi jalavaṃ pokk añjidar mMâḷavar |
Lâḷar kkâṇike goṭṭu kaṇḍar uḷida-kshmâpâḷar ell âgaḷuṃ |
vêḷ-âḷ-âgihar endaḍ êṃ pogaḷven â-bhûpa-pratâpôgramaṃ ǁ
vṛi ǁ
XI.
dorekoḷg î-balup int adalladaḍe yâ-Têluṅga-râjyaṅgaḷaṃ |
pura-mûr̤akk eṇeyâgi mâḍi kaḷad â-têjôgram ent âdudô |
ari-mattêbhama geldu pempu vaḍedaṃ matt âvanô bhûmiyoḷ |
Girijêśaṃ Mahadêva-Râya-vesariṃ pṛithvîśan âdaṃ diṭaṃ ǁ
â-Kandhârana tanayaṃ |
svîkarasiye tanna pagevar-ellara siriyaṃ |
śrî-kânteg arasan âdaṃ |
bhû-kâminig olida Râmachandra-mahîndraṃ ǁ
sthiratara-vara-râjyô vairi-bhûpâḷa-pûjyaḥ |
parihṛita-jagad-ârttiḥ pûritâśôru-kîrttiḥ |
dvija-mukha-śatapatrâditya-Kandhâra-putraḥ |
sakaḷa-guṇa-nikâyaḥ śôbhatê Râma-Râyaḥ ǁ
nayana-kumuda-sômô yôshitâṃ sâṅga-Kâmô-’ |
py anupama-nija-dhâmâ Yâdava-śrî-lalâma[ḥ] |
sakaḷa-jaladhi-sîma-kshmâpatiḥ sârvvabhaumas |
tv anuguṇa-vara-nâmâ bhutaḷê bhâti Râmaḥ ǁ
makha-mudita-Mahêndraḥ pôshita-kshmâmarêndraḥ |
sa jayati bhuvanêndraḥ svîkṛitâri-dvipêndraḥ |
daḷita-ripu-karîndrôttuṅga-kumbhô mṛigêndrô |
dhavaḷita-dig-ibhêndra-khyâti-bhô Râmachandraḥ ǁ

svasti śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâraka Dvârâvatî-pura-varâ-
dhîsvara Yâdava-kuḷa-kamaḷa-kaḷikâ-vikâsa-bhâskara Mâḷava-Râya-Madana-Triṇêtra Gûrjjara-Râya-
vâraṇâṅkuśa Teluṅga-Râya-sthâpanâchâryya Hoysaṇa-Râya-sâmrâjya-lakshmî-haraṇa-prachaṇḍa-dôr-
ddaṇḍa ari-râya-jagajh-jhamparuṃ paṇâchâriya śrî-râya-Nârâyaṇa prauḍha-pratâpa-chakravartti śrî-
vîra-Râmachandra-Bâya-vijaya-râjyôdayadalli âtana maneya samasta-sainyâdhipati śrîmat-Sâḷuva-
Tikkama-Dêvana prâdurbbhâva-pratâpaṅgaḷ entendaḍe ǁ

kanda ǁ
XII.
sura-sênânivol udayisi |
nirupama-guṇa-Kâyi-Dêva-Hîrâyagaḷiṃ |
dharey-arasa Râmachandrana |
vara-sêneg adhîśan âgi Tikkaman esadaṃ ǁ
vṛi ǁ
XIII.
vîran udâra-vikraman a-bhêdakan anya-parâkramaṅgaḷaṃ |
mîr̤ida kharggadind esava pempugaḷ-obbuḷig orbban îśvaraṃ |
Śrîramaṇa-Triyambaka-padâmbuja-bhṛiṅgan udagra-paurushaṃ |
dhâriṇiyoḷ pesar-vvaḍedu Sâḷuva-Tikkama-Dêvan oppidaṃ ǁ
kanda ǁ
XIV.
śrî-Mahadêvana manada |
prêmada-sukumâran âgi Tikkama-Dêvaṃ |
bhûmîśa-Râmachandrana |
kaumudiy êrid emba teradi karam esadirddaṃ ǁ
[page 104]vṛitta ǁ
XV.
bharadiṃ Sâḷiva-Tikkamaṃ por̤amaḍal sênâ-rajaḥ-puñjadiṃ |
giriyaṃ chûrnnisi bhûmiyâgi nabhamaṃ mâḍuttam ambhôdhiyaṃ |
piriduṃ perggesar̤ âgi śatṛi-śiramaṃ seṇḍâḍi vairi-śriyaṃ |
paritand îvudu Ramachandra-charaṇakk ânandadiṃ vikramaṃ ǁ

svasti śrîman-mahâ-manḍaḷêsvaraṃ atyantôddhata-yuddha-sannaddha-baddha-vaira-vîrârâtî-brâta-
śirô-nikṛintana-prachaṇḍa-dôr-ddaṇḍanuṃ yuddha-prachaṇḍanuṃ grahaṇa-nirggata-prêraṇa-lagna-
sthâpanôllaḷita-sâdi-sû .... sûkaḷa-sapti-saṅkuḷa-grâhita-pañcha-dhârâ-prapañcha-sañcharaṇa-
chaturatara-su-rêkhâ-Rêvantanuṃ vipuḷa-nija-kîrtti-va .... lalita-dig-antanuṃ vîrâri-maṇḍaḷika-Châ-
ṇûra-malla-gaḷa-gâḷa-taraḷaukita .... pa-janita-ḍhakkâ-ninâdana-sâda-sampâdana-prabhô pratimalla
purâṇa-Nârâ ...... ṇanuṃ ǁ śrî-Triyambaka-śrî-Harihara-nâtha-pâdâravinda-prasâda-prâpta-râjya-
rakshaṇa-daksha-daksihṇa-bhujâ-daṇḍa .... sannâha .. ra-pârijâta kanaka-dhârâ-varusha-nissîma-
sauriyanuṃ Kâdamba-Râya-sthâpanâchâriyanu Hoyisaḷa-Râya-disâpaṭṭanuṃ brâhmaṇa-prasâdâ-
sâdita-sâśvataisvaryya-niratanuṃ su-charita-charitanum appa samasta-sainyâdhipati nissaṅka-pra-
tâpa śrî-Sâleya-Tikkama-Dêvarâṇeyaru dakshiṇa-dig-vijeya-Dôrasamudrâkramaṇa-kṛita-kâryya kari-
turaga-mukhya-samasta-vastu-sahitaṃ kappaṃ-goṇḍu bandalli ǁ

kanda ǁ
XVI.
kaṇḍan udâra-charita dôr- |
ddaṇḍa Guhana geld Adhôkshajêśar tammoḷu |

XVII.

XIX.
teṅkaṇa-dig-vijayada nevadaṃ |

va ǁ yî-Harihara ...nâḷâ Sâḷuva-Tikkama-Dêvanu tann oḍeyan appa Mahadêva-Râya-vesara dêvâlaya-
dharmmavaṃ mâḍal vêḍi mana-danda pariy-entendaḍe ǁ

vṛi (ǁ)
XX.
dêvaṃ tanna samarchchakargg olidudam tand îven end embudaṃ |
jîvan-martyarig oppe tôrppa ter̤adiṃ śrî-mânyamaṃ mâḍidaṃ |
âvann â-Mahadêva-Râyan iravêḷk ên î-purî-madhyadoḷ |
dêvatvaṃ paḍed endu tân ar̤ipidaṃ śri-Tikkamaṅg Îśvaraṃ ǁ

va ǁ î-pariyalu manamaṃ prêrisid â-dêvana samîpadalliye tann oḍeyan appa Mahadêva-Râyan ane
Lakshmî-Nârâyaṇa-mûrttiyaṃ pratishṭhâpisal â-sthaḷasthar appa mûr̤a-nâlvaraṃ santôshaṃ baḍisi
bhûmiyaṃ krayaṃ-gonḍu prâsâdôpakramada dinav âvud endaḍe ǁ svasti śri jayâbhyudaya-Saka-var-

XXI.
yellara salahuva Lakshmî- |
vallabha-Mahadêva-Râya-Nârâyaṇanaṃ |
yilli sthâpane-geydaṃ |
ballida maha-maṇḍaḷêśa-Tikkama-Dêvaṃ ǁ

va ǁ alliṃ mêlaṇa Pramâthi-saṃvatsarada Phâlguṇa-śu 5 Bhaumâśviniyoḷ â-dêvâlyakke suvarnna-kala-
śa-pratishṭheyaṃ mâḍi â-dêvara śrî-kâryakke Hariharadalli krayaṃ-goṇḍu koṭṭa bhûmiya vivarav
ent endaḍe ǁ

XXIV.

tanna dêvarige sabheyaṃ |
mannisi krayagoṇḍu koṭṭan utsavadindaṃ ǁ

â-dêvâlyada sammukhada kalla-kôṭeyim mûḍaṇa mane 1 koṭṭeya-Kallayyaniṃ baḍagaṇa voḷa-tuḍuke 1
santhey-âraveya teṅkaṇa hor̤a-kaḷa 1 Râmanâtha-dêvara tôṭadiṃ baḍagaṇa hû-dôṭa 1 ǁ

kanda ǁ
XXV.

koṭṭaru santhegaḷ-âyava |
neṭṭane Mahadêva-Râya-Nârâyaṇagaṃ ǁ

va ǁ mattaṃ śrî-Hariharada aśêsha-mahâjanaṅgaḷuṃ Noṇambavâḍi-mûvattitsâyira samasta-
paṭṭaṇakke sirômaṇi-Uchchaṅgi-Bêtûru-Lôkeyaker̤e-Banevaḷḷi-modalâda-paṭṭaṇigaru seṭṭiguttaruv
ubhaya-Nânâ-dêsigaḷu mukhyavâda hadineṇṭu-sameyaṅgaḷu Hariharadalu vajra-bayisaṇigeyâgi kuḷ-
ḷirdda-Mahadêva-Râya-Lakshmî-Nârâyaṇa-dêvarige koṭṭa âya-dâyada kramav ent endaḍe ǁ

kanda ǁ

byavaharisaluk endu hêr̤uvett ayvattuṃ |
bhuvanadoḷ ettalu naḍedaḍe |
avak inituṃ mânyav endar anibaru neraduṃ ǁ
nellu modal enisid upparad |
ellâ-hêr̤iṅge mûleg ommana baḷik an- |
t illiya pasarakk ochchere |

ner̤a tâṃ sollagey ayvat end aḍakeyaṃ matt illi mâr̤âdaḍaṃ |
ter̤ug ayvatt ele kêṇikakk aḍakey îrond-ondan end endum î- |
ter̤aḍim beṃvuḍiy-âya-gomban enipar śrî-Râya-Nârâyaṇaṃ ǁ

EC 11 Dg 60
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg060

[page 106]60 At Harihara, on a rock near Rudrapâda in the Tuṅgabhadra river.


Śaka 1763 neya Plava-saṃ ǁ Chaitra-śu ǁ 1 ǁ śrî-guru-Dattâtrêya-Jôśi Mêsha .. Lakshamaṇa Giri-
maḍi Śejinâtha Panthali-Pâranâtha.

EC 11 Dg 61
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg061

61 At Harihara, on a stone in front of the Chilamagere-Basavaṇṇa temple.


śrî |
I.
jayaty ânamra-râjêndra-chûḍâ-ratnâṃśu .... |
Yôgîśvarasya pâdâbjaṃ krîḍâ ...... śriyaṃ ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ | śrî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ parama-bha-
ṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ | śrîmat-pratâpa-chakravartti Jagadêkamalla-
Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam
re | srîmat-pratâpa-chakravartti-Jagadêkamalla-varshad aydeneya Dundubhi-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-
śuddha-paurṇṇamî-Bṛihaspativâra-sôma-grahaṇad andu Bhrânti-mûvattar̤a manneya-Aiharasan ây-
ayyan-aḷiya Mâcharasaruṃ tad-anuja Mallarasaruṃ Kâma ... harasanuṃ śrî-Harihara-dêvara
Kûḍalûralu tamma Hantumaṇṇina manneya geyyoḷage Beḷeyager̤eyim paḍuvalu Kêkarakoḷada ba-
.. teṅkalu tamma śrî-Yôgêśvara-dêvargge naivêdyakk endu dhârâ-pûravakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭa ereya keyi
mattar ondu 1 ǁ

Nandana-saṃvatsarada Chaitra-śuddha-pañchamî-Bṛihaspativâra-Pushya-nakshatra-vyatîpâta-yôgad-
andu Haḷḷavûru Mâcharasara mamma Îśvara-Dêv-arasaru śrî-Yôgêśvara-dêvargge munna Beḷvaḍi-
yalu tamma manneya geyyoḷage tâvu koṭṭa keyge pratipûravâgi Kûḍalûralu tamma manneya
keyyoḷage munna Mâcharasaru koṭṭa mattar ondar̤a hattira baḍaga-deseyalu kûḍi sthaḷa-
vṛittiyâgiy â-chandrârkka-sthâyiyâgi naḍavantâgi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭa ereya keyi mattar
eraḍu 2 antu mattaru mûr̤u 3 ǁ ür-oḍeya-pramukhay aśêsha-mahâjanaṃ nûr̤a-nâlvaruṃ śrî-Harihara-
dêvara mâlagâr̤arige mane yilladirddaḍe śrî-Yôgêśvara-dêvara bhûmiya maṇṇu mâr̤âṭavâgi Vasanta-
Râma-dêvara kayyalu dhâreyaṃ koṇḍu â-bhûmige pratipûravâgi śrî-Harihara-dêvara keyyoḷage
modala erehiṭṭeya gur̤uvada mommêreyalli śrî-Yôgêśvara-dêvara pâdârâdhakar appa Vasanta-Râma-
dêvargge dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭa ere mattaru 1 kamma 100 Yôgi-Nâgadêva ... Beṭṭada-
Gauḍager̤eya keḷage tamma aṃśadalli śrî-Yôgêśvara-dêvara ... dyakk endu dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ mâḍi
koṭṭa keṅgâḍu kamma 250 ma .... hadêva Chaṭṭayyaṅgaḷu śrî-Yôgêśvara-dêvargge hû-dôṇṭakk en
.... pramukha-aśêsha-mahâjanaṅgaḷa sannidhiyalu .... ya hattire mûḍa-deseyalu nûr̤-ayvattu 150
kamma .... dêva-dânavâgi â-chandrârkka-sthâyiyâgi naḍavantâ ... dêvargge dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ mâḍi
koṭṭaru ǁ ür-oḍeya-pra ... sha-mahâjanaṃ nûra-nâlvara sannidhiyalu sthaḷada-seṭṭe ... lligar ayvatt-
okkaluṃ śrî-Yôgêśvara-dêvargge naivêdya .... aṅgaḍiyalu are-vâna-pramâṇinalu akki saṭṭu ....
dîvigege gâṇadalu sollageya pramâṇinalu .... ge 1 vaṃ â-chandrârkka-sthâyiyâgi naḍavantâgi
dhârâ .... kaṃ mâḍi koṭṭaru ǁ suṅkada-heggaḍe Hariyapayya-nâya ... vâgi samasta-Bharata-neraviy-
anibaruṃ .... hoḷeya suṅkadalli tiṃ .... haṇavaṃ śrî-Yôgêśvara-dêvara naivêdyad abhigârakke â-
chandrârkka ...... vantâgi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭaru ǁ Dammapâḷa daṃ ... śrî-Yôgêśvara-
dêvargge Tâvareyahaḷḷiyalli dhârâ-pûr ...... ṭṭa-vṛittiy ondar̤oḷage Vasanta-Râma-dêvaru â-vûra ....
araḷiya-gaddeyalli kamma 220 hiriya-ker̤eya baḍa .... kamma 450 Nârâyaṇa-dêvara baḍaga-deseyalu
maneye ...... int initu-bhûmiyumaṃ śrî-Yôgêśvara-dêvargge sarvva .... vâgi kâd-ûḍuvantâgi
mêlâda-bhûmiymaṃ śrî-nija .... kumâra-gâladalu śrî-Yôgêśvara-dêvargge koṭṭa alliya ko ... ṇa
vonduvan â-vûra mahâjanaṅgaḷge pâda-pûjeyâ .. rmmamaṃ â-mahâjanaṅgaḷ â-chandrârkka-sthâyiy-
âgi naḍava .... (usual final verse).

EC 11 Dg 62
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg062

[page 107]62 At Harihara, on a stone lying in front of the Basavaṇṇa temple.


śrî śubham astu Prajôtpatti-saṃvatsarada Puśya-ba 10 lu śrî-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara Râvaji-Raṅgapp-
arasa-Jayadêva-mahâ-arasugaḷa kâryake kartarâda .. lâbhâra-Bhâna-Voḍêra kâryake kartarâda
Prasanna-Voḍêru Taḷavârake-Haḷi-nâyaki koṭa sati-âya umbaḷi-hola vokuḷada hola staḷa Chilama-
gere sthaḷa yidake tapidare tâyige aḷupidaru

EC 11 Dg 66
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg066

66 On copper plates in possession of Shanbhog Sîtârâmaiyya.


(Ib) svasti

I.
jayaty âvishkṛitaṃ Vishṇôr vvârâhaṃ kshôbhitârṇṇavaṃ |
dakshiṇônnata-daṃshṭrâgra-viśrânta-bhuvanaṃ vapuḥ ǁ

śrîmatâṃ sakala-bhuvana-saṃstûyamâna-Mânavyasa-gôtrâṇâṃ Hâritî-putrâṇâṃ sapta-lôka-mâtṛibhis
Saptamâtṛibhir (abhir)abhivarddhitânâṃ Kârttikêya-parirakshaṇa-prâpta-kalyâṇa-paramparâṇâṃ
bhagavan-Nârâyaṇa-prasâda-samâsâdita-varâha-lâñchhanêkshaṇa-kshaṇa-vaśîkṛitâśêsha-mahîbhṛitâṃ
Chalukyânâṃ kulam alaṅkarishṇôr aśvamêdhâvabhṛitha-snâna-pavitrîkṛita-gâtrasya śrî-Puḷikêśi-
vallabha-mahârâjasya sûnuḥ parâkramâkrânta-Vanavâsy-âdi-para-nṛipati-maṇḍala-praṇibaddha-
viśuddha-kîrttiḥ śrî-Kîrttivarmma-pṛithivî-vallabha-mahârâjas tasyâtmajas samara-saṃsakta-sakalô-
ttarâ-pathêśvara-śrî-Harshavarddhana-parâjayôpalabdha-Paramêśvarâpara-nâmadhêyaḥ Satyâśraya-
śrî-pṛithivî-vallabha-mahârâjâdhirâja-paramêśvaras tat-priya-sutasya Vikramâditya-paramêśvara-
bhaṭṭârakasya mati-sahâya-mâtra-sa(II a)madhigata-nija-vaṃśa-samuchitôchita-râjya-vibhavasya
vividha-rasita-sita-samara-mukha-gata-ripu-narapati-vijaya-samupalabdha-kîrtti-patâkâvabhâsita-dig-
antasya himakara-kara-vimala-kula-paribhava-vilaya-hêtu-Pallava-pati-parâjayânantara-parigṛihîta-
Kâñchî-purasya prabhâva-kuḷiśa-daḷita-Chôḷa-Pâṇḍya-Kêraḷa-dharaṇîdhara-nûyamâna-mâna-sṛiṅgasya
ananya-samavana-Kâñchî-pati-maṇi-makuṭa-kûṭa-kiraṇa-salilâbhishikta-charaṇa-kamalasya tri-samu-
dra-madhya-vartti-bhuvana-maṇḍalâdhîśvarasya sûnuḥ pitur âjñayâ Bâlênduśêkharaśyêva Sênânîr
dDaitya-balam ati-samuddhataṃ Trairâjya-Pallava-balam avashṭabhya(ḥ) samasta-vishaya-praśa-
manâd vihita(n)-manônurañjanaḥ atyanta-vatsalatvâd Yudhishṭhitra iva Śrî-râmatvâd Vâsudêva
iva nṛipâṅkuśatvâd Paraśu-Râma iva râjâśrayatvâd Bharata iva Pallava-Kaḷabhra-Kêraḷa-
Haihaya-Viḷa-Mâḷava-Chôḷa-Pâṇḍyâdyâḥ yên Âḷuva-Gaṅgâdyair mmaulais sama-bhṛityatâṃ nîtâḥ
Vinayâditya-Satyâśraya-śrî-pṛithivî-vallabha-ma(II b)hârâjâdhirâja-paramêśvara-bhaṭṭârakas sarvân
evam âjñâpayati viditam astu vô’smâbhi[ḥ] shôḍaśôttara-shachchhatêshu Śaka-varshêshv atîtêshu
pravarddhamâna-vijaya-râjya-saṃvatsarê chaturddaśê varttamânê Harishapura-pratyâsannê Ka-
rañjapatra-grâmam adhivasati vijaya-skandhâvârê Kârttikê paurṇṇamâsyâṃ śrîmad-Âḷuva-Râja-
vijñâpanayâ Vâtsyasa-gôtrasya Śrî-sarmmaṇaḥ sômayâjinaḥ pautrâya Mâra-śarmmaṇaḥ putrâya (Îśâna-)
śarmmaṇê vêda-vêdâṅga-pâragâya Vanavâsi-maṇḍalê Eḍevoḷal-bhâge Kir̤u-Kâgâmâsi-nâmâ (grâma-)
sa-bhôgas sarvva-bâdhâ-parihârôpêtô dattaḥ Per-gGâgâmâsi-grâma-paśchima-bhâga-kṛitâkṛita-kshê-
traṃ cha tasya kshêtrasya sîmâ pûrvvôttara-dig-bhâgê Sirigâḷu-grâma-sîmni Pulivutu tata âgatya |
Kavvesurigoḷaṃ | tataḥ Perbbuttu | tata (III a) Âldore | tatô Âlgoḷa | tatô Nittakoḷa tataḥ prâg
gatvâ Nêr̤ilger̤e | tataḥ Kurupaker̤e | tataḥ dakshiṇa-diśam âvṛitya Arakaṭṭaṃ tad âgâmibhir asmad-
vaṃśyai[r a]nyaiś cha râjabhir âyur-aiśvaryyâdînâṃ vilasitam achirâṃśu-chañchalam avagachchhad-
bhir â-chandra-dharârṇṇava-sthiti-sama-kâlaṃ yaśaś chichîshubhis sva-datti-nirvviśêshaṃ paripâla-
nîyam uktañ cha bhagavatâ vêda-vyâsêna Vyâsêna

svaṃ dâtuṃ su-mahachchhakyaṃ duḥkham anyasya pâlanaṃ |
dânaṃ vâ pâlanaṃ vêti dânât śrêyo’nupâlanaṃ ǁ
sva-dattâṃ para-dattâṃ vâ &c. ǁ

rakshâyai jagatâṃ bhûyâd dayâḷur Dviradânanaḥ |
pâthaḥ-krîḍâ-sarâṃsy âsan yasya sapta mahârṇavâḥ ǁ
Harêr lîlâ-varâhasya daṃshṭrâ-daṇḍaḥ sa pâtu vaḥ |
Hêmâdri-kalaśâ yatra dhâtrî chhatra-śriyaṃ dadhau ǁ
pâtrasât-kartu-kâmêbhyô dharâṃ dâtum ivôddharan |
akûpârâd apârâd vaḥ sa pâyâd Vâma-dêvatâ ǁ śrî ǁ
vaṃśê’tra muktâ-phalavat su-vṛittaḥ sva-kânti-kîrti-sthagitâkhilâśaḥ |
manôjña-kântâ-kucha-hâra-bhûshaṇaṃ sat-saṅgamô’bhûn mahitaḥ sa Saṅgamaḥ ǁ
ajâyata tataś śrîmân śrîmad-Vijaya-bhûpatiḥ |
mahârâjâdhirâjêndrô Bukka-Râjô virâjatê ǁ

vêdântê Śuka-tâtô’yaṃ Râma-jyôtir virâjatê ǁ

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-nṛipa-Śâlivâhana-śaka 1276 neya Vijaya-saṃvatsarada Mâgha-śudha 15
Chandravâra-sômôparâga-parvaṇi puṇya-kâladallu | śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara
dharma-mûrti Bukka-Râya-mahârâyaru | Kâsyapa-gôtrada Bôdhâyana-sûtrada Yajuḥ-śâkheya Hari-
haradêvapura-sthaḷada daivajñaru Mâdhava-Jôî̈saṅgaiyyagaḷa makkaḷu | Râmaṇṇa-Jôî̈saiyyagaḷige-

grâmada bhûmi-madhyadoḷu | nâvu Miṭṭaligollage nirûpiśi kaṭṭisi koṭṭa Miṭṭaliganakaṭṭe-yandu-nâma-
dhêyakavâda grâmava(IIb)nu chatuḥ-śîmâ-sammatavâgi sa-hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvaka-mâḍi
nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshîṇi-âgâmi-sidha-sâdhya-hebbârike-modalâda sakala-ashṭa-bhôga-têja-

tasya putras tu Liṅgâkhyô ↓1dvau śâstrâdhipatir dharât ǁ

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-nṛipa-Śâlivâhana-śake 1183 neya Dundubhi-nâma-saṃvatsara-Vaiśâkha-ba |
30 Bhânuvâra-sûryôparâga-parvaṇi puṇya-kâladallu | śrî-Pampâ-kshêtrada Virûpâksha-dêvara
sannidhânadali śrî-Hariharêśvara-dêvara sannidhânadali śrî-Hariharêśvara-dêvaru nirûpisalâgi śrî-
man-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara sarva-râja-rakshaka | dharma-mûrti Harihara-Râya-mahâ-
râyaru Śâṅkaripura-staḷada Viśvâmitra-gôtrada Âśvalâyana-sûtrada Ruk-śâkheya Râma-Dêvayagaḷa
makaḷu Liṅgarasarige Vijayanagarakke saluva Kôṭûru-châvaḍi-keḷagaṇa Vuchaṅgi-vêṇṭhed oḷagaṇa
Hariharada-sîmeyoḷ ihâ | Śâṅkaripurav emba grâmavannu śrî-Hariharêśvarana dêvâlayadali nirantara-
vêda-śâstra-pârâyaṇav âgabêk endu â-grâmavannu mahâjanaṅgaḷa hesarali prati-nâmadhêyav iṭṭu
koṭṭanthâ Śâṅkaripurad-â-grâmakke nîvû tat-tat-pûrvârabhyadindalu hebhâra-yajamânike muntâda-
svâstigaḷannu anubhavisikoṇḍu barutta yidali â-mahajanaṅgaḷa 60 vṛittigaḷa vaḷage nimigû vêda-
pârâyaṇakke 2 yaraḍu-vṛittiyannu sa-hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvaka mâḍi koṭevu â-grâmada tat-
pûrvada chatuḥ-sîmâ-vivarâ | (here follow details of boundaries) î-bage chatu-sîmâ-mareyâde-
yoḷu nîvû nimma tat-pûrvadâ svâstiyannû italâgi vêda-pârâyaṇakke koṭṭa yaraḍu-vṛitti saha anu-
bhaviśikoṇḍu î-mahâjanaṅgaḷa vṛittigaḷige kâlântaradinda anyônya-toḍaku-bârada-rîti tidiṭu sura-
kshitadinda â-chandrârka-stâyigaḷâgi nimma putra-pautra-pârampariyâgi sukhadiṃ bôgisuvadu yandu
barasi-koṭṭa dharma-śâsanavû ǁ (usual final verses) śrî-Virûpâksha.

I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ
II.
Harir avatu kiri-vapur vô yasya radâṅkûra-kôṭi-pîṭhâ saḥ |
sita-mukuḷa-miḷad-aḷi-lalanâ-lîlâṃ bibhartti bhû-kântâ ǁ
Dêvagiriyalli Siṅgaṇa- |
Dêvan iḷâ-nâthan âgi râjyaṃ geydaṃ |
kâvan avanataran ântaḍe |
jîvaman apaharisutippan ari-naradhavarâ ǁ
âtana taneyaṃ Jaitugi |
nûtana-sura-taruv id enisi bêḷpaṅg îvaṃ |
mât ên Antakan ivan ene |
hattisuvaṃ chaṇḍa-vikramaṃ ripu-nṛiparaṃ ǁ
[page 110]tat-tanujaṃ Kannara-bhû- |
pôttaman â-Kṛishṇanante Yadu-kula-tiḷakaṃ |
vittaman uttama-pâtrakk |
ittu jasaṃ baḍedan ettaluṃ bittaradiṃ ǁ
kannara Dêvaṅg udayisi |
kinnara-mithunaṅgaḷinde pâḍisuvaṃ tan- |
nannar ir̤iv îvaruṃ kaḍu- |
chennarum ill enisi Râmachandra-mahîśaṃ ǁ
Kâmaṃ khyâtaṃ chelviṃ |
Bhîmaṃ bhuja-baladin amṛita-tanuviṃ sômaṃ |
Kâmaṃ Bhîmaṃ sômaṃ |
Râma-mahîpatiye tad-guṇaṅgaḷin enipaṃ ǁ

svasti samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ Yâdava-Nârâyaṇaṃ bhuja-baḷa-prauḍha-pratâpa-chakravartti śrî-

târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi | śrîmanu-mahâ-pradhânaṃ sarbbâdhikâri Tipparasa-
ru | Saka-varusha 1197 neya Bhâva-saṃvatsarada | Mâgha-ba 12 Sô | Pushya-nakshatra | yôga
vyatîpâta | Bava-karaṇa saṅkramâṇadali śrîmad-anâdiy-agrahâraṃ śrî-Lakshmî-Nârâyaṇapuravâda

III.
Râmaṅg Aṇuvana-ter̤adiṃ |
Râma-mahîvallabhaṅge Tippâmâtyaṃ |
châmîkara-vî .. ḷâṃ |
bhûmî-kara-saṅkramakkav êkâchâryyaṃ ǁ
tappad enag arttav appud â- |
kapp and eṇ-desegaḷinda barppudu râjyaṃ |
mupp illad irppud enutaṃ |

tôṭade perddor̤eye sîmey âgire baḍagalu |

dêyaman itt iḷeyan âḷdan â-Tipparasaṃ ǁ

ahamahamikeyind ahîndra-jihvegaḷ oḷagâ- |

sale Jiguḷiyum endu mûr̤u-paḷḷigaḷ uḷḷaṃ |
phala-bhôgakk ene solliṃ |

udayisida putrikârttaman |

kôchade śâsanaman Îśvarâryyaṃ pêḷdaṃ ǁ
dhare-gagana-Mêru-giriyuṃ |

sthirav ippannevaraṃ vi- |
stârisug î-dharmma Tippa-mantrîśvarana ǁ
Vindhyâṭavîshv a-tôyâsu sushka-kôṭara-vâsinah |
kṛishṇa-sarppâ hi jâyantê Brahma-dâyâpahâriṇaḥ ǁ

(usual final verse) śrî śrî śrî

svasti śrîmatu-Yâdava-Nârâyaṇaṃ bhuja-baḷa pravuḍa-pratâpa-chakravartti śrî-Râmachandra-Râyana
tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi śrîmanu-mahâ-pradhânaṃ sarvvâdhikâri Tipparsaru Râyana samakshadalu
Dhâtu-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-ba 12 Sô-saṅkrântiyalu Bânuvaḷḷiyâ-pravishṭa Hêḷeyahâḷu Elavaṭṭi
Jiguḷiya suṅka-nibandhiyanu yâ-sthaḷada yaśêsha-mahâjanaṅgaḷige dhârâ-pûrvvakav âgi koṭṭaru |

IV.
suṅkada poṃ-panneraḍaṃ |
saṅkramaṇadoḷ osadu nûra-nâlvargge nirâ- |
taṅkav ene Tippa-Râjaṃ |

mêsvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâsraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmaṃ-Jayasiṅgha-Dêvaṃ

geyuttam ire Noḷamba-Pallava-Permanaḍi-Dêva ǁ Kadambaḷige-sâyirada baḷiya kampaṇa Kundûr-

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêsvara parama-bhaṭṭâraka

râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravardhamânav â-chandrârkka-târaṃ saluttam ire | śrîmatu

↓1Chôḷa-kshmâpâḷa-kôḷahaḷa bâhu-baḷôtpâḷa Nêpâḷa-Kâḷiṅga- |

ene negaḷda Râya-Pâṇ- |

[page 113]jana-kâmadhênu châri- |
tra-nidhâna paṭṭad-arasi Sôvala-Dêvi ǁ

antu nija-nâma-grahaṇa-mâtra-pavitra-tri-bhuvaneyuṃ | âtmîya-kula-pâvaneyuṃ | (v)avanata-sakaḷa-
sapat[n]î-jana-niṭaḷa-kuṭiḷa-kuntaḷa-madhukara-nikurumba-chumbita-charaṇa-kamaḷeyuṃ patibratâ-

paṭṭad-arasi Sôvala-Dêvi ǁ

III.
↓2chatur-ambhôrâsi-vêḷâ-vaḷayita-vasudhâ-rakshakaṃ Râya-Pâṇḍyana |
satiy âgalu vîra-patnîtvamam amaḷa-dayâ-dâna-sauryyânvitar Paṇ- |
ḍita-Pâṇḍyaṃ Vîra-Pâṇḍyaṃ negaḷda-Vijaya-Pâṇḍyar eṃba avanipâḷar |
sutar âgalu vîra-mâtṛitvamama dhareyoḷ tâney olu tâḷdu nindaḷu ǁ
dhavaḷa-chchhatrada taṇ-neḷalu negaḷda-râjya-śrîge tâṃ nilke dâ- |
ṇâ viṇeya-vallabhag âsrayaṃ nija-bhujâ-daṇḍaṃ jaya-śrî- |
ge vasam âdâgra-śrî-pâdaḷe nirmmaḷâsraya śṛiṅgârâsraya padmajâṇ- |
ḍam venalu permmeyan ântan î-Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-kshmâtaḷâdhîśvaranu ǁ

antu svasti samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru Uchchaṅgi-
nelevîḍinal irddu . Noḷambavâḍi-mûvattichchâsiramaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-sishṭa-partipâḷanaṃ geydu
sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyutam ire ǁ svasti râjya-bhara-nirûpita-mahâmâtya-padavî-
virâjita-râjamânônnata-prabhu-mantrôchchâha-sakti-traya-sampannaru Vâji-kula tiḷakaru Bhâra-
dvâja-gôtra-pavitrarum appa Chika-Bannikôḍa-vûr-oḍeyaran oḍambaḍisi munna naḍava dêva-dâna
hiriya-ker̤aya teṅkaṇa tumbina tudiya gadde kammav innûr̤-ayvattu baḍagaṇa tumbina modala-
gadde kammav innûr̤u beddale ¿üra? ⟨ûra⟩ -mundaṇa koṇḍada keḷage mattar ondu ûriṃ haḍuvalu mattar
ondu (right side) śrî-svayambhu-Kali-dêvara munde vôṇiyiṃ teṅka mattar ereḍu śrîmatu
Sô[va]la-Dêviyaru ǁ Saka-varshada 1087 neya Pârttiva-saṃvatsarada Puśya-↓3suddha-amavâse-vyatîpâta-
saṅkramâṇa-Sômavâradandu kulâbhivṛiddhiy âgalu śrî-svayambhu-Kali-dêvarggaṃ Mallikârjjuna-dê-
vara dhûpa-dîpa-nivêdya-nandâdîvige-jîrnnôddhârakkaṃ Beltur̤a gaḍimbadalu .. kugeṇa-gaḷeyali biṭṭa
gadde Mâvinaker̤eya Tâyivaḷḷadiṃ teṅka kamma êḷa-nûr̤u bêvina-koḷadiṃ baḍagalu beddale mattaru
eraḍu kamma nûr̤u ǁ svasti śrîmat-mahânâḍ eddu ûr-oḍeyara sannidhânadalu Mallikârjjuna-dêvarge
staḷa-bhaṇḍa hor̤a-bhaṇḍadalu hoṅge vîsava koṭar inituvaṃ śrîmatu Sôvala-Dêviyaruṃ ûr-oḍeyaruṃ ǁ
yama-nêma-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭâṇa-japa-samâdhi-sîla-guṇa-sampannar appa Jñâna-
sakti-paṇḍitarige dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi-koṭṭa sthânaṃ ǁ (usual final phrases and verse).

sitagara-gaṇḍa davaḷâṅka-Bhîma Maṇinâgapura-varâdhîśvara Baiyyappa-Nâyakara makkaḷu Krushṇa-

dhârâ-pûrvvakavâgi biṭṭu kṛitârthar âdaru yî-dharmavanu pratipâḷisida puṇyâtmage aśvamêdhada
phalav ahudu yî-dharmavanu aḷida .... sige Tuṅgabhadrâ-tîradalu gô-brâhmara mâtâ-pitrugaḷa putra-

EC 11 Dg 84
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg084

84 At the same village, on a stone south of the Kallêśvara temple.


śrî |
I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ Kâḷâñjarapura-varâdhîśvaraṃ suvarṇṇa-
vṛishabha-dhvajaṃ ḍamaruka-tûryya-nirgghôshaṇaṃ Kaḷachuriya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ kadana-
prachaṇḍaṃ mâna-Kanakâchaḷaṃ su-bhaṭar-âdityaṃ kaligaḷ-aṅkuśaṃ gaja-sâmantaṃ śaraṇâgata-
vajra-paṇjaraṃ pratâpa-Laṅkêśvaraṃ para-nârî-sahôdaraṃ Sanivâra-siddhi giri-durgga-mallaṃ chalad-
aṅka-Râmaṃ vairîbha-kaṇṭhîravaṃ niśśaṅka-mallaṃ nâmâdi-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîmad-bhuja-baḷa-
chakravartti Tribhuvanamalla-Bijjaṇa-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam
â-chandrârkka-târaṃ saluttam ire ṭat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ

II.
kshîrâmbhôdhiyoḷ ogeda Su- |
dhâruchiy-anvayada bhûbhujaṃ tân enal î- |
vîraṅge Pâṇḍya-nṛipatig ad |
âruṃ sariy oḷare sakaḷa-mahimônnatiyoḷu ǁ
Surapatiya makuṭadoḷu nija- |
kara-vaḷeyavan oḍedu mîna-lâñchhanavan aḷaṅ- |
karisidudu Mêru-giriyoḷu |
paribhâvise Pâṇḍyan-anvayaṃ kêvaḷamê ǁ
Sênâpatiy-anvayavan ad |
ên embeno Pâṇḍya-râjya-lakshmige sukha-san- |
tânâbhivṛiddhiy enipa cha- |
mûnâtha-padakke tâne karuv enisikkuṃ ǁ
paḷaveyan eṇipoḍe munnina |
Paḷattan-oḷagâda-Pâṇḍya-nṛipa-sutaroḷ tân |
eḷasi piḍidavane bhûpaṃ |
baḷayisidude râjyav alladirddaḍe pûjya ǁ
an-upa[ma]vâda pemmeyoḷu rañjisutippa Noḷambavâḍiyoḷ |
jana-nutavâgi rañjipudu Koṅgaḷi-nâḍ adar̤alli Kampaṇaṃ |
ghanataravâgi rañjisuva Bikkigan-eppatar̤ol mogakke mû- |
gina-ter̤adinde chelvan oḷekoṇḍudu nirantara oppi tôr̤uguṃ ǁ
siriya tavarmmane enipudu |
dharaṇî-dêvatege tiḷakav enipudu puṇyâ- |
karav enipudu Sênâpatiy- |
Arasiyaker̤ey Abba-Gauṇḍan-olu-vesarindaṃ ǁ
↓1negaḷdâ-Gaṅga-Gâṃvuḍan emba vibhugaṃ Lôkavvegaṃ puṭṭi mik- |
ka guṇakk âgarav âda Bamma-Gâvuṇḍana mahâ-sati Mâḷavvegaṃ puṭṭi gô- |
tra-pavitraṃ guṇa-ratna tâney enikum â-Gaṅga-Gâṃvuḍa-prabhu ǁ
[page 116]pogaḷvaḍe Mâḷa-Gauṇḍana mahantikeyaṃ ninag êna pêḷven â- |
vibhugeü Muddi-Gauḍigeyu puṭṭi negartteya Sâta-Gauḍanâ |
satiü Sâtikauvvegaṃ puṭṭi su-putra kolakke Kalla-Gau- |
ḍana vadhu Sôvi-Gauḍigevu puṭṭidan â-Hariyamma-Gâṃvuḍanoḷu mikka gau- |
ḍugaḷ ên ârttaparê samasta-guṇadoḷu saṃstutyadoḷu satyadoḷu ǁ
Hara-charaṇa-kamaḷa-bhṛiṅgaṃ |
guru-kuḷa-ku[va]ḷeya-sudhâkaraṃ Kali-Dêva- |
smaraṇe-pariṇata-nijântaḥ- |
karaṇaṃ śrî-Vâmaśakti-paṇḍita-dêvaru ǁ
avara magaṃ Śiva-dharmma- |
pravipuḷa-lakshmî-viḷâsa-bhavanaṃ puṇyâ- |
rnnavan enipaṃ guru-kuḷa-kai(yi)- |
rava-chandraṃ Kalyâṇasakti-paṇḍita-dêva ǁ
avar-oḍavuṭṭida amṛitâr- |
nnavadoḷu sura-dantiy-oḍane kaḷpa-kujaṃ puṭṭ- |
uvôlu puṭṭida srî-Kali- |
dêva-vara-prasâda-Têjônidhi-Amṛitahasta-paṇḍita-dêva ǁ
↓2dâna-guṇakke kalpa-kujad aṇḍaḷ enippa mahânubhâve san- |
mâna-guṇakke tâne kaṇiy âdaḷ enipp Umâ-dêviya |
pâda-paṅkajav enippaḷu sarvva-guṇakke tâne Sê- |
nâpati-daṇḍanâyakana vallabhe Mahadêvi-daṇḍanâyaki ǁ

śrîmatu Bijjaṇa-Dêva-râjyada Saka-varshada | sâsirada embhatta-mûr̤aneya Vikrama-saṃvatsarada
Pushya-suddha-dasamî-Âdityavâra-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkramâṇa-byatîpâtadandu śrîmatu Śaṅkhara-Nârâ-
yaṇa-dêvara Kûḍalûra Tuṅgabhadrâ-dêviya Brahmatîrtthada Arasiyaker̤eya Mâdêśvara-dêvar-aṅga-
bhôga-nivêdyada samasta-bhôgakke yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâṇa-japa-
samâdhi-śîla-guṇa-sampannar appa śrîmatu Jñânasakti-dêvara śiśyar appa Vâmaśakti-paṇḍitara
śiśyar appa Têjônidhi-paṇḍita-dêvara kâlaṃ Sênâpati-daṇṇâyakana arddhâṅga-lakshmi Mahadêvi-
daṇṇâyakitiyaru kachchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa Mêvanaker̤eya keḷagaṇa gadde kamba 450 â-
ker̤eya paḍu-gôḍiya ereya bhûmi mattaru | Jîyargge maneya nivêśaṇa ondu (usual final phrases).

↑1. * This and the next verse are so in the original : but the metre is incorrect.
↑2. * So in the original.
EC 11 Dg 85
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg085

85 On another stone, at the same place.


śrî ǁ
I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti śrî pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-
tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrî-pratâpa-chakravartti Jagadêkamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarô-
ttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânav â-chandrârkka-târaṃ saluttu Kalyâṇapurada nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-
saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttuv ire ǁ

II.
↓1vanadhi-parîta-bhûtaḷadoḷ endudan ollada râyar illa tan- |
nane śaraṇ endu jîvisada bhûbhujar illa samasta-vastu-vâ- |
hanavan anûna-kâñchanavan itt irad uddhatar illa jîy- |
enut anudinav eyde biṭṭi-vesageyyada jeṭṭigar illa nôrppaḍ ên |
anupamav âyto râjya-vibhavaṃ jagadoḷ Jagadêkamallana ǁ
râyara Mêru râya-gaja-kêsari râya-jhaḷappa râya-Râ- |
dhêya virôdhi-râya-mada-marddana Kuntaḷa-Râya râya-Kaun- |
têya baḷishṭa-râya-baḷa-bhañjana vidviḍu-râya-daitya-Cha- |
krâyudha bâpp enutte pogaḷguṃ jagav î-Jagadêkamallana ǁ
[page 117]aḷavig aḷumbav appa bhuja-garvvada Chôḷa-nṛipâḷan añji tal- |
laḷise taguḷdu Chôḷ-nelanan âḷ-nelan âgire mâḍikoṇḍa Hoy- |
saḷanan aḍarppi têjad esakaṃ migal âne-gavartta-goṇḍan âr- |
aḷavo bhuja-pratâpa-vibhavaṃ jagadoḷ Jagadêkamallana ǁ

tat-pâda-padmôpajîviy enisida Vîra-Pâṇḍya-Dêvan-anvaya-khyâtiy ent endade ǁ

III.
kshîrâmbhôdhiyoḷ ogeda Su- |
dhâruchiy-anvayada bhûbhujaṃ tân enal î- |
vîraṅge Pâṇḍya-nṛipatig a- |
d âruṃ sariy oḷare sakaḷa-mahimônnatiyoḷ ǁ
Surapatiya makuṭadoḷu nija- |
kara-vaḷeyavan oḍedu mîna-lâñchhanavan aḷaṅ- |
karisidudu Mêru-giriyoḷu |
paribhâvise Pâṇḍyan-anvayaṃ kêvaḷamê ǁ
esakada Sôma-vaṃśajaroḷ ȧr ddore tannoḷ enippud ondu sâ- |
hasada nimirkke varddhisuva râjyad amarkke sukha-prapañchamaṃ |
pasarisi tôrkke vairigaḷa râjyada sârkke kaḍurppiniṃ vigur- |
bbisuvara mîseyaṃ suḍuva têjad aḷurkke dharitriyoḷ virâ- |
jisut iral uttarôttarav iḷâ-stuti-vettudu Vîra-Pâṇḍyana ǁ
pati Châḷukya-narâdhipaṃ prabaḷa-bâhâ-daṇḍan aiyyam mahî- |
pati-Râyaṃ parivâra-kaḷpa-late lôka-stutye saubhâgya-vis- |
tṛite tây Sôvala-Dêvi Saṅkarane deyvaṃ Vîra-Pâṇḍya-kshamâ- |
patiyaṃ Yâdava-vaṃśa-bhûshaṇanan inn ê-vaṇṇipaṃ baṇṇipa ǁ
â-nṛipana daṇḍanâthaṃ |

vvî-nuta-vikrama-vibhavaṃ |
Sênâpati nṛipa-chamûpa-chûḍâratna ǁ
Sênâpatiy-anvayavan a- |
d ên embeno Pâṇḍya-râjya-lakshmige sukha-san- |
tânâbhivṛiddhiy enipa cha- |
mû-nâtha-padakke tâne karuv enisirkku ǁ
paḷaveyan eṇipaḍe munnina |

eḷasi piḍidavane bhûpaṃ |
baḷayisidude râjyav alladirddaḍe pûjya ǁ
anupamavâda pemmeyoḷu rañjisutirppa Noḷambavâḍiyoḷ |
jana-nutavâgi rañjipudu Koṅgaḷi-nâḍ adar̤alli Kampaṇaṃ |
ghanataravâgi rañjisuva Bikkigan-eppatar̤oḷ mogakke mû- |

karav enipudu Sênâpatiy- |

alli gâvuḍugaḷ anupama- |

p ellara chittakk avadhiyaṃ puṭṭisadê ǁ

[page 118]svasti samasta-bhuvana-jan(n)a-saṃstûyamân[a]-nidhânanu | âtmîya-têjaḥ-puñ[ja]-rañjitan Îśvarâsthâ-
nanu | ↓2Śavasaya nidhi-n adîpadharttiyu | agaṇya-puṇya-mûrttiyuṃ prabhu-mantrôtsâha-sakti-traya-
ratnâḷaṅkâran â-vîra-lakshmî-śṛiṅgâra-hâranu Śûryyâṇḍa-nâtha-dêha-Rôha(ra)ṇâchaḷôtpanna-puruśa-
ratnanuṃ apâra-varmma-prayatnanu | Chandralêkhâvataṃśa-nivâsa-nirantarâtmana Vîra-Pâṇḍya-
nagarâtmanun enisi Sênâpati-daṇḍanâthanuṃ Châgeya-râjadhâniyoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadind
abhyudeyakk âvâsav âgirdda śrîmaj-Jagadêkamalla-varuśada 6 neya Rud[h]irôd(ha)gâri-saṃvatsarada
Kârttikeya paurṇṇamâsey Âdityavâravuṃ vitîpâtavu kûḍid-andina puṇya-tithiyoḷu śrîmach-Chhaṅ-
kara-Nârâyaṇa-dêvara Kûḍalûra Tuṅgabhadrâ-dêviya Brahmatîrthada Arasiyaker̤eya Kali-dêva-
svâmiy-aṅga-bhôga-nivêdyâdi-samasta-bhôgakke yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunâ-
nushṭhâna-śîḷa-guṇa-sampannar appa śrîmatu Jñânaśakti-dêvara śiśyar appa Vâmaśakti-paṇḍitara
kâlaṃ karchchi Śivârppaṇavâgi biṭṭa hiriya-ker̤eya keḷagaṇa gadde kamma 500 dêvara dêgulada
dakshiṇa-diśâ-bhâgada haraḷa-keyi mattaru 2 guṇḍu-galliṃ baḍagaṇa ereya bhûmiyoḷu mattaru 2
Jîyarggaṃ dêvara patreyan aḍakuva Śuśrikaṅga maneya nela saṇa 2 (usual final phrases and
verse) ôṃ namô

86 On the back of the same stone.


svasti śrîmanu mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ Vijaya-Pâṇḍya-Dêvara râjyâbhyudaya-kâlada Hêmaḷambi-saṃ-
vatsarada Śrâvaṇa-ba 3 Âdivâradandu Viśu-saṅkramaṇadandu Arasiyaker̤eya svayambhu-Kali-dêva-
svâmiya nandâdîvigege â-chandrârkka-sthâyiyâgi Têjônidhi-paṇḍitara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvva-
kaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa gâṇa vondu (usual final phrases).

I.
negaḷd â-Gaṅga-Gavuṇḍan emba vibhugaṃ Lôkavvegaṃ puṭṭi mi- |
kka guṇakk âgaravâda ↓1Barmma-Gauṇḍanuvaṃ Śântaṅgav â-Śântika- |
vvegav old udbhavisirdda Kaleyanumaṃ pôlalke pêḷ mikka gauṇ- |
ḍugaḷ ên âttaparê samasta-guṇadoḷ saṃstutyadoḷ satyadoḷ ǁ
su-lalita-guṇa-nidhi peggaḍe- |

kula-tilakaṃ puṭṭidan end |
olaviṃ Sûryyâṇḍanaṃ karaṃ pogaḷadar âr ǁ
ivar adhideyvaṃ Svâyam- |
bhuv enalu pemp-eseva dêvan î-Kali-dêvaṃ |
bhuvana-stutan âchâryyaṃ |

avara magaṃ Śiva-dharmma- |
pravipuḷa-lakshmî-viḷâsa-bhavanaṃ puṇyâr- |
ṇṇavan enipaṃ guru-kuḷa-kai- |
rava-chandraṃ Vâmaśakti-paṇḍita-dêva ǁ

smaraṇe-pariṇata-nijântaḥ- |

avan-oḍevuṭṭidan amṛitâr- |

uva ter̤adind Âdityaṃ |
bhuvanâdhîśvarana kaṭaka-kamaḷâditya ǁ
vara-sauchâchâradoḷ tannane pogaḷe jagaṃ mantradoḷ mantrigaḷ bitt- |

[page 119]darisal tannaṃ diṭaṃ tannavol anupamar âr embinaṃ kîrtti-lakshmî- |
varan âd Âditya-daṇḍâdhipana mahimeyaṃ baṇṇisal ballan âva ǁ
Girijâ-dêviga[m â]-triḷôka-gurugaṃ śrî-Shaṇmukhaṃ puṭṭid ant- |
ire Bhîmavvegav aty-udâra-charitaṃ Sûryyaṅgav î-lôka-nis- |
taraṇaṃ puṭṭidan âtma-vaṃśa-tiḷakaṃ vidviḍ-madêbhêndra-kê- |
sari Sênâpati-daṇḍanâthan akhiḷa-śrî-kâminî-vallabha ǁ

kuṭṭiga Maḷôja hoyda guru-prasâdaṃ

87 On a third stone, at the same place.


I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti śrî .... varuśada 1187 nêya Raktâkshi-saṃvatsarada Chaitra ........ dandu ǁ samadhigata-
pañcha-mahâ-sabda Dvârâvatîsvaraṃ Vishṇu ..... suvarṇṇa Garuḍa-dhvajaṃ Yâdava .... ḷa-kalikâ-
vikâsa-bhâskaraṃ .... Mâḷava-Râya-mada .... ↓1Gurjja-Râya .... Râya-sthâ .... ya nâmâvaḷî-samâ-
...... srî-cheṃ.... pravuḍha-pratâpa-chakravartti śrî-Mahadêva-Râya tat-pâda-padmôpajîviy a[ti]-
viśama-hayârûḍha-rêkhâ-Rêvantanuṃ para-baḷa-Kṛitântanum appa ǁ

II.
Kannaṃ ........ sa- |
munnata-baḷa-dhuryya-cheryya Râmapa-taneyar |
.... Pâṇḍuge Kontiya |
sannuta-Bhîmârjjunarkkal entu .... rû ǁ

antu vîra-parâkramaṃ Beï-Dêvan Uruvattiya .... Dêvana Kalla-Veggaḍeya sama[ra]-raṅgadoḷu kâdi
svâmi-bhṛityâchâradiṃ .... geldu svarggastan âda vîra-Beyi-Dêvana vîra-gallaṃ âtana kumâraṃ
Sôvi-Dêvanu Bikkigan-eppattakka talevaṇa tamma vaḷitada Arasiyaker̤eya svayambhu-Kali-
dêvaravara sanadoḷu nilsiy â-vîran-aṅga-bhôga...ga-bhôga-pûje[ga]m âhârakkaṃ â-sthaḷada Hanuma-
Gauṇḍa-Bomma-Gauḍaṅgaḷu mukhyavâgi koṭṭa bhûmi guṇḍu-kalla haraḷa-keyi Gaṅgana ka 20 teṅ-
kaṇa-holada dêvara keyya sâraṇa ere kaṃ 20 antu kamba 40 â-bîra-kallige â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-
baraṃ pratipâḷisuvaru maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî

EC 11 Dg 90
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg090

90 At Śâbanûru (same hobli), on a stone lying to the south of the Mâri-kaṭṭe.


I.
bhadraṃ bhûyâj Jinêndrâṇâṃ śâsanâyâgha-nâśinê |
ku-tîrttha-dhvânta-saṅghâta-prabhinna-ghana-bhânavê ǁ
śrîmat-parama-gambhîra-syâdvâdâmôgha-lâñchhanaṃ |
jîyât traiḷôkya-nâthasya śâsanaṃ Jina-śâsanaṃ ǁ

[page 120]svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâraka
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷaka Châḷukyâbharaṇa śrîmat-Tribhvanamalla-Permmâḍi-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târam-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpa-
jîvi ǁ

vṛitta ǁ
II.
(vanadhi)-vyâptâvanî-chakradoḷ ati-subhaṭaṃ vikramâyatta-chittaṃ |
munisiṃ mâr̤âmpan âvaṃ Tripura-vijayigaṃ Sûdrakaṅgaṃ Suparṇṇî- |
tanayaṅgaṃ Phalguṇaṅgaṃ Daśaratha-tanujaṅgaṃ Sahasrârjjunaṅgaṃ |
Danujapradhvaṃsigaṃ Kaurava-nṛipa-ripugaṃ Pâṇḍya-bhûpâḷakaṅgaṃ ǁ
bharadind Aṅga-Kaḷiṅga-Vaṅga-Magadhaṃ Nêpâḷa-Pâñchâḷa-Gûr- |
jjara-Gauḷa-DraviḷÂndhra-Mâḷava-Turushkâ .... Saurâshṭra-Bar- |
bbara-Kâśmîra .......................... marôt- |
karamaṃ beṅkoḷuvaṃ bhayaṅka ........ ṇaṃ Pâṇḍya-bhûpâḷakaṃ ǁ

svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Kâñchî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ Yadu-
vaṃśâmbara-dyumaṇi su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍam parichchhêdi-gaṇḍam Râjiga-
Chôḷa-manô-bhaṅgaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-pâdâbja-bhṛiṅgaṃ nâmâdi-praśasti-sahitaṃ ......
bhuvana ........ dakshiṇa-bhujâ-daṇḍan enisi ǁ

vṛitta ǁ
III.
satataṃ dharmmiye Dharmmajaṃ .............. ḷâ- |
nvitanê huṃ Kamaḷôdbhavaṃ para-hita-vyâpâra ...... bhû-taḷa- |
stuta-Vidyâdhara .......................... satya-saṅ- |
gatanê Bhâskara-sûnu vikra .... naṃ śrî-Sûryya-daṇḍâdhipaṃ ǁ
prabhu-mantrôtsâha śakti-traya guṇa-bharitaṃ mâna-sanmâna-dâna- |
................ n ârâdhakaṃ nitya-lakshmî- |
prabhu śauchâchâra-sâraṃ ...... baḷa-viḷasat-Pâṇḍya ...... |
........................ Sûryya-daṇḍâdhinâthaṃ ǁ

... anavarata-vinuta-sura-nara .... ghaṭita-pada-kamaḷa-yugaḷa śrîmad-Îśvara.. -pâdârâdhaka virôdhi-
nikurumba ...... gaṇḍa Pâṇḍya-maṇḍaḷika-sabhâ-maṇḍana prachaṇḍa-daṇḍanâtha ...... virâjamâna
satata-saṃ ... nâbhimâna ...... mantrôtsâha-sakti-traya-guṇa-gaṇa .... ta niyôga-Yaugandhara
nikhiḷa-dharmma-dhâraṇa ....... pâḷa-mastaka-khaṇḍana-prachaṇḍa-dôr-ddaṇḍa Pâṇḍya-maṇḍaḷika-
dakshiṇa ........ rggarvva-parvvatârûḍha nirûḍha-prauḍha-nitambinî-nikurumba-divya .... śrîmat-
Tribhuvanamalla parichchhêdi-gaṇḍa Pâṇḍya-maṇḍaḷika .......... śaraṇâgata-vajra-pañjara | mṛidu-
madhura ........ dâra-hita .... satata ...... daṇḍanâtha-kuḷa-kamaḷinî-vikâsana-sahasrakiraṇa |
vandi-jana-bharaṇa ...... tantri Sûryya-daṇḍâdhinâthaṃ ǁ

kaṃ ǁ
IV.
âḷâpadinde Pâṇḍya-nṛi- |
pâḷaṅg er̤agada virôdhi-nṛipa ...... |
.... si pada-nataraṃ prati- |
pâḷisida su-bhaṭa.... -daṇḍâdhîśaṃ ǁ

.......... Jina-stavana .... sampû .... pavitrôttamâṅga .... daradiṃ mukta .... yin urutara-
vajra .... karataḷa-rachiyind opputa .. n artthadiṃ bhâsvara-kântâ-ratnam e ...... ǁ

kaṃ ǁ
V.
maṇḍaḷiya .... daḍe ...... ker̤eyeḷu ........ ḍagal enar̤e .............. ǁ
vṛi ǁ
VI.
dore Maru-Dêvi ................ tâṃ |
sari nuta-Lakshmi tat-sadṛiśam â-priya-kâriṇi dêviy endoḍ î- |
dhareya .......................... Kâḷiyakkanoḷ |
vara-guṇa-vârddhiyoḷ muni-jana-priya dâna-vinôda-chitteyoḷ ǁ
[page 121]paḍed artthaṃ kaḷḷariṃ dâyigarim aḷipariṃ bhûpariṃ kichchinindaṃ |
kiḍugaṃ tân ant ad êm śâsvatam eni .... śâsvataṃ marppen end â- |
gaḍe pûṇd iṃ pûrṇṇa-chandrânane Jinapati-sad-gêhamaṃ Sembanûroḷ |
kaḍu-rayyaṃ tân enal mâḍisidaḷ adhika-sad-bhaktiyiṃ Kâḷiyakkaṃ ǁ

svasti samasta-vastu-vistâra-gôchara...... jamâna-Jinêśvara-charaṇa-sarasiruha-madhukarôpamâna-
kuṭiḷa-kuntaḷa-kaḷâpe mṛidu-madhura-satata-satya-vachanâḷâpe | śṛiṅgâra-virachita ...... janma-
bhûta...... mâna-Sûryya-daṇḍâdhinâtha-viśâḷa-vakshas-sthaḷa-sthita-lakshmî.... ne san-mâna-dâne
târa-hâra-Hara-hâsâ .. śaśi-viśada-kîrtti-virâjita-pravarddhamâna-guṇavati Padmâvatî-dêvî-labdha-
vara-prasâde Jina-pûjâ-vinôde dhavaḷa-viśâḷa-kumuda-.. nêtre gôtra-pavitre niśśaṅkâdi-guṇa-maṇi-
gaṇa-virâjite samyaktva-ratnâ[ka]re pañchâṇu-vrata-guṇâkare sakaḷa-vinêya-jana-chintâmaṇi
vanitâ-nikara-chûḍâmaṇi nâmâdi-praśati-sahitey appa śrî-Sûryya-daṇḍanâyakana piriya-daṇḍa-
nâyakitti Kâḷiyakkaṃ ǁ

vṛi ǁ
VII.
Jina-dharmmaṃ prâṇi-.. rmmaṃ tanag adu kula-dharmmaṃ Jina-svâmi deyvaṃ |
janakaṃ mikk Âytavarmmaṃ janani tanage Jakkavve bhavyarkkaḷ enduṃ |
tanag âptar tanna ta .... guṇi Kali-Dêvaṃ lasat-śauryya-dhairyyaṃ |
tanag îśaṃ Sûryya-daṇḍâdhipan ene taḷedaḷ kîrttiyaṃ Kâḷiyakkaṃ ǁ
VIII.
Sûryya-chamûpana tammaṃ |
dhairyya-mahâ-Mêru vairi-jana-laya-.. vat- |
chhauryyaṃ svâmi-priya-kara- |
kâryya daṇḍâdhinâthan Âdityâkhyaṃ ǁ

svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmantâdhipati mahâ-prachaṇḍa-daṇḍanâyaka Châḷu-
kya-Vikramâditya-Dâva-sabhânargghya-vastu-nâyaka prabhu-mantrôtsâha-śakti-guṇa-maṇi-gaṇâ-
ḷaṅkṛita-śarîra | bhaya-lôbha ........ Tribhuvanamalla-Permmâḍi-Dêva-dakshiṇa-bhujâ-daṇḍa ripu-
kâḷa-daṇḍa | prasiddha-Sênavara-daṇḍanâtha-priya-putra châru-charitra | satata-dhârmmika-Dharm-
manandana | svâmi-priya-Marunnandana | Hara-charaṇa-kamaḷa .. saḷa-satatânata-madhukara |
sakaḷa-guṇâkara | samagra-vairi-kuḷa-kudhara-kuḷiśa-daṇḍa | samara-prachaṇḍa | durddhara-Durvvi-
nîta-daṇḍanâtha-vaṃśa-vana-kuṭhâra | saṅgrâma-dhîra .... âyad-âchâryya Mandara-dhairyya Ân-
dhrî-nîrandhra-kucha-kaḷasa-darppaṇa vandi-santarppaṇa Kuntaḷî-kuntaḷa-suvarṇṇa-kusumâbharaṇa
aninditâcharaṇa purushârttha-svârtthîkṛita-Jîmûtavâhana mâna-viḷasad-dhana satata-dâna-santarp-
pita-dînânâtha-yûtha nâmâdi-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmad-Âditya-daṇḍâdhinâthaṃ ǁ

IX.
prabhu-mantrôtsâha-śakti-traya-guṇa-gaṇadoḷ santataiśvaryyadoḷ sû- |
kta-bhavôdyad-bhaktiyoḷ sad-vinaya-naya-sad-âchâradoḷ Chittabhû-san- |
nibha-bhadrâkâradoḷ tad-vitaraṇa-guṇadoḷ dhârmmika-svântadoḷ sat- |
prabhavar ppêḷ innar âr embinam esedapan Âditya-daṇḍâdhinâthaṃ ǁ
śrîmad-Draviḷa-saṅghê’smin Nandi-saṅghê’sty Aruṅguḷaḥ |
anvayô bhâti yô’śêsha-śâstra-vârâsi-pâragaiḥ ǁ
avaṭu-taṭam aṭati jhaṭiti sphuṭa-paṭu-vâchâṭa-Dhûrjjaṭêr api jihvâ |
vâdini Samantabhadrê sthitavati tava sadasi bhûpa kâsthânyêshâṃ ǁ

int enisida Samantabhadra-svâmigaḷa santânadoḷu ǁ

X.
êkatra guṇinas sarvvê Vâdirâja tvam êkataḥ |
tasyaiva gauravaṃ tasya tuḷâyâm unnatiḥ kathaṃ ǁ

avara śishyaru ǁ

XI.
indôś cha kântam ati-vistṛitam ambarâch cha
bhûmêś cha bhûri jaḷadhêś cha gabhîram âśtê |

mattêbha-bimbam iva mânava-târakê‘dya ǁ

int enisid Ajitasêna-bhaṭṭârakar-agra-śishyaru ǁ

ghana-baddha-krôdha-dhâtrîdhara-kuḷa-kuḷiśaṃ mâna-mâdyad-gajâsphâ- |

ene negal̤da Mallishêṇa-Maladhâri-Dêvara śishyaru ǁ

pâḷa-traividya-dêvaṃ Jina-samaya-sudhâmbhôdhi-sampûrṇṇa-chandraṃ ǁ

svasti śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada 53 ya Kîlaka-saṃvatsarad uttarâyaṇa-saṅkramaṇad andu

99 At Sârati (same hobli), on a stone in the wall of Jaḍiki Basappa’s house.


I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti Saka-nṛipa-kâlâtîta-saṃvatsara-sataṅgaḷu sâ ...... yvetteneya Plavaṅga-saṃ- | Kârttika-sud-
dha-pâḍiva-Âdivârad-and uttarâyaṇa ... vyatîpâta-nimitta ǁ svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-
..... hârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ .... kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ
śrîmat-Traiḷôkyamalla-Dêvara vijaya .... m uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddha ...m â-chandrârkkam-
baraṃ saluttam ire ... samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ Kâñchî-pu .... râ-
dhîsvaraṃ Yadu-vaṃśâmbara-dyumaṇi su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi ........ maḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ parichchhêdi-
gaṇḍaṃ Râjiga-Chôḷa-manô-bhaṅgaṃ...... dâbja-bhṛiṅgaṃ śrîmanu mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ...... ḍya-
Dêvaru Noḷambavâḍi-mûvatt-irchchhâsiramumaṃ dushṭa .... pratipâḷanadiṃ Beltur̤uvina nelevîḍi-
noḷu sukha .......dadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire ǁ svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya .... nânushṭhâṇa-
japa-samâdhi-sîla-guṇa-sampanna ........ chayar appa śrîmatu Divyasakti-paṇḍita-dêvara ... sara-
ṇeyam ârppa ........ Divyasakti-paṇḍita-dêvaru ...... vîra-pratâ ........ Divya ............
.................. sûkshmanaṃ vyâpakanaṃ .............. Vâmasakti ...... sishyaru ....
................ Manu-vâkya .... Manasija ...... munivane............ tîrtaṅgaḷa ..........

.... yira-gaṇḍa toḷare .... Vatsa-râjaṃ vîra-vâ ........ para-nârî-pu ........ ǁ śrîman-mahâ ..

dêva-svâ ...... yavara svata ........ mâḍisi .............. bhaktige ........ mige biṭṭevâgi

102 On a 3rd vîrakal at the same place.


svasti śrî Yâdava-Nârâyaṇa prauḍha-pratâpa chakravartti śrî-Mahadêva-Râyana śrîmanu mahâ-pra-

EC 11 Dg 103
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg103

103 At the same village, on a stone to the south of the entrance of the Kallêśvara temple.


I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ
II.
namas tasmai Varâhâya lîlayôddharate mahîṃ |
khura-madhya-gatô yasya Mêruḥ kaṇakaṇâyatê ǁ
svasti śrî-Ammeyâkhyasya sûnus su-jana-bândhavaḥ |
Kahnâkhyô vîra-vikrântô dhanur-vvidyô virâjatê ǁ
Tuṅgabhadrâ-nadî-tîre grâmê Vaiṇava-saṃjñikê |
Kannêśvaraṃ pratishṭhâpya tasya dharmmaḥ pratishṭhitaḥ ǁ

svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ ...... vaṃsôdbhavaṃ suvar-
ṇṇa-Garuḍa-dhvajaṃ ari-râja-jagajh-jhampa Mâḷava-Râya-Madana-Trinêtra Gûrjjara-Râyabhayaṅkara
Teluṅga-Râya-sthâpanâchâryya ity-âdi-nâmâvaḷî-samâlaṅkrita ........ śrîmatu prauḍha-pratâpa-
chakravartti śrî-vîra-Kanhara-Dêva-vijaya-râjyôdaya .... pâda-padumôpajîvi ǁ

III.
vitata-vimaḷa-kîrttir ddharmma-dîpasya varttir
vvyapagata-sakalâ .......... dhurya-mûrttiḥ |
prakaṭita-raṇa-kôpaḥ Kârttavîryya-pratâpô
vijaya .......... Chauḍa-chauhattha-mallaḥ ǁ

svasti śrîmanu mahâ-pradhânaṃ râya-daṇḍâdhipa ...... Hanuma-gandhavâraṇa Chauḍi-Seṭṭiyaru
Huliger̤eya nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire tatu-pâda-padumôpajîvi ǁ

IV.
śrîmaḍ-Dâviya ... yakâtmaja-guṇa-grâmaika-bandhus sadâ
bhûpânâṃ cha va ............ śrî ... bjârâdhakaḥ |
lôkê’smin śaraṇâgatâbhayakarô dharmmâṅkurô ......
........ ya-Nâyakâkhya-sachivô vairîbha-kaṇṭhîravaḥ ǁ

[page 126]svasti samasta-guṇa-gaṇâla ... yôga .... kâryya-dhurandhara parama-viśvâsi vairi-vîra ........
śaraṇâ ...... pañjara râya-kumara Chôḷâvatâra ...... sûnu vikra .... virâjita Dinakara-taneya-vîra-
vitaraṇa Drôṇâchâryya .......... pramukha-nânâ-śastra-śâstra-viśârada dharmma-mêdinî-samu-
ddharaṇa-Varâ ........ nija-bhakti-vachhchhaḷa-śrî-kshêtrâdhipati-dibya-śrî-pâda-padmârâdhaka ...
dyumaṇi śrî-vîra-Kandhara-Râya-mandira-nija-sênâpati môhita...... ḍâyi-Dêvana suta billâḷ-Ammeya-
Nâyakanu Śaka-varshada 1179 tteneya Pai.... vatsarada Mâgha-śuddha 7 Âdityavârad-andu Noṇam-
bavâḍi-mûvatt-irchchhâsirada Ko ... r̤ar̤-oḷagaṇa Bikkigan-eppattar̤a Tuṅgabhadrâ-nadî-pûrbba-bhâ-
gada Durggattiya-pravishṭada Bidireyalli kan ... dêvara-pratishṭheya mâḍi â-dêvarige upahârakkevu
pañcha-parbbada śrî-ka ........ ger̤eya keḷage baḍagalû paḍuvalû sâgara ........ chatur-âśraya-
madhyadali Vatsûr-aḍeyaru Kaḷatiya ........ vâgi Meya-Nâyakanu Malla-jîya Kêsava-jiya ....
dhârâ-pûrbbakavâgi â-Kannêśvara-dêvarige koṭṭa bhûmi ... mattaru vondu 1 (usual final verse).

V.
a-karasya karaṃ kuryyât gô-sahasra-va ....... |
karasya .......... dâtâ gô-kôṭi-phalam âpnuyât ǁ

(usual final verses) maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî śrî-Kannêśvara-dêvara-purada gâṇa tôṭa mânya

EC 11 Dg 105
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg105

105 At Kundavâḍa (same hobli), on a stone lying in Halagappa’s garden.


I.
svasti ǁ namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ Dvârâvatî-pura-
varâdhîśvaraṃ Yâdava-kuḷâmbara-dyumaṇi samyaktva-chûḍâmaṇi malaparoḷu-ganḍa nissaṅka Hoy-
saṇa-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvara śrîmatu-pratâpa-chakravartti-viajya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivriddhi-(m)â-
chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire | tad-viśâla-vaksha-sthaḷa-nivâsiniyar appa svastiy anavarata-
parama-kalyâṇâbhyudaya-phaḷa-sahasra-bhôga-bhâgini dvitîya-Lakshmî-samâneyaruṃ pratyaksha-
Pârvvatiyaruṃ patibratârundhitiyaruṃ śaraṇâgata-vajra-pañjareyaruṃ śrî-Sômanâtha-dêvara dibya-
śrî-pâda-padmârâdhakeyarum appa śrimad-abhinava-Kêtala-mahâ-dêviyaru svasti samasta-surâsura-
nara-garuḍôraga-yaksha-siddha-vidyâdhara-gandharbba-kinnara-kiṃpurushâdy-anêkânîka-maṇi-maku-
ṭa-ghaṭṭita-charaṇâravinda-yugaḷanum appa śrîmad-dakshiṇa-Saurâshṭrav enisida śrîmat-svâyambhu-
Sômanâtha-dêvara Kundavâḍada Sôva-Gaüḍa-Huḷḷa-Gaüḍa-Hariyama-Gaüdaṅgaḷaṃ Chinnagervikada
Bîri-Seṭṭiyara maga paṭṭaṇasvâmi-Saṅgi-Seṭṭi-Muṭṭi-Seṭṭigaḷge Budhavârada-santheya mâḍiy endu
niyâmisalu mahâ-prasâdav endu kaikoṇḍu Âryyavaḷey-ayinûrbba-svâmigaḷu mukhyavâda Noṇambavâḍi-
mûvatt-irtsâyirada śirômaṇi mahâ-râjadhâniy Uchchaṅgiya samasta-vaḷi-nakhara-mummuri-daṇḍa
ubhaya-nânâ-dêsi-nâlku-nâḍuṃ â-pañcha-maṭhada-tapôdhana-mukhyavâda ekkôṭigaḷuṃ asaṅkhyâta-
gaṇaṅgaḷuṃ hadineṇṭu-sameyamuṃ muntâgi Śaka-varushada 1140 neya Bahudhânya-saṃvatsarada
Mârggaśira-śuddha 2 Budhavârad-andu śubha-lagnadalu nanni-kambhavaṃ pratishṭhisi santheyaṃ
mâḍi | â-śrî-Sômanâtha-dêvargge biṭṭa âya (here follow details of gift) sarvva-mânya mummuri-daṇḍada
sthaḷadalli daṇḍa-dôsha ...... anyâyavaṃ sampâdi .... haḷarige drôhi nettaru-gayya baṇajiga
goṭṭadakke nanni-kambada munde hasumbeyan ikkidaḍaṃ Mâgaḷi-javaḷiyan ikkidaḍaṃ ant-int-endu
hi . ge hiḍide . ḍaṃ halarige drôhi î-dharmmamaṃ halaru pratipâḷisi pâlanâd a-chyutaṃ padaṃ emba
nyâyamaṃ kaikombudu | maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî akasege Hasumbihaḷi Nilaṅge vibhûti paṭṭaṃ kkaṭi
Śivapuri idan âlasa .. eva sura-lôkakke martya-lôkakke hor̤agu

EC 11 Dg 106
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg106

106 At Malebennûru (Malebennuru hobli), on a stone near the Bairê-dêva temple.


I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Sâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1450 neya Sarvadhâri-saṃvachharada Vaiśâkha-
śu 10 Guruvâradalû śrîmatu Adiyappa-Nâyakaru Maleyabennûra grâmada seṭṭi-paṭṭaṇâsvâmi-gauḍu-
[page 127]prajegaḷige koṭṭa sâgina dharma-śâśanada kramav ent endare śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêś-
vara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-Krushṇa-Dêva-mahârâyaru sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geütidali
namma nâyakatanake pâlisida Maleyabennûra grâmadali nîü mâḍida ghaḷiyagaḷu khilavâgi mur̤idu
hôdavendu kêḷi kâṇike mêluvaṇa kabbina-suṅkavanû biṭeü yî-vivaravanu Harihara-dêvara stânika-
Chennapayagaḷa maga Hariyaṇṇanu hêḷalâgi sarvathâ biṭevu nîvu nimma putra-pautra-pârampareyâgi
â-chandrârkka-sthâyigaḷâgi sukhadalû ... endu koṭṭa sâgina dharma-śâśana yî-śâśanada sâgu-pramâ-
ṇakke âru aḷupidavarugaḷu tamma tande-tâyigaḷaṃ sâsir-vêdigaḷ apa brâhmaṇaraṃ sahasra-kapile-
yaṃ Gaye-Vâraṇâsiyali koṃ ...... teṅka-mukhav âgi biḍu-maṇḍeyali surâ-pânavaṃ sêvita-hôda-
vana pâpake hôharu (usual final verse) yî-śâśanava biṭṭa karta Adiyapa-Nâyaka-ayanavara su-putra
śrî-Bhairava-Nâyaka .... voppa .... śrî śrî

EC 11 Dg 107
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg107

107 On another stone at the same place.


I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1438 neya Yîva-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-śu 12 Śu-lu ǁ
śrî ...... pati śrî-Puruśôttama-svâmiya divya-charaṇa ............ parama-Mahêśvara parama-
Vaishṇava jagal-mûḷa-kâraṇa śrî-Puru .... durgâ-putraṃ trayî-samuddharaṇa vasundharâ ......
vaṃśâvalamba-stambhana darmma-rakshaṇayika .... mûla-parâkrama dâni ........ narapati-charita-
num ...........vindu-jana-viśrâṇakâ .... vâda-vachana-pratisamâpa .. saptâṅga-prajâ-jana-
santâpa-bandhana san-mitra-hrudayânanda Vaivasvata-Manu-vaṃśa-parâkrama Yikshvâku-kula-
pradîpa Râmachandra-charitâla .. karikâ .. kaṃ nyâyyâdi-biruda-virâjita-Kabalêśvara-mahâ-râjâ ...
śrîma . parama-bhaṭṭâraka rûpu-Nârâyaṇa niranta .. -vidya abhinava-Paraśu-Râma jitâri-samara
niśśaṅka-raṇa-raṅga Draviḷa-maṇḍalêśvara nava-Kandarppâvatâra mahânubhâva gaja-pati śrî-Pratâpa-
Rudra-mahârâyana kumâra śrî-Vîrabhadra-mahârâyaru Maleyabennûra sîmeya maduveya-suṅkava
biṭṭu koṭṭa darmma-śâśana śrî-Krushṇa-Râya-mahârâyaru sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyut-
iddalli namma nâyakatanakke pâlisida Maleyabennûra-sîmeya kâluvaḷi Liṅgadahaḷḷiya-sîmeya voḷag-
âgi namma aramanege saluvanthâ maduveya suṅkavanu śrî-Krushṇa-Râya-mahârâyarigevû namma
tande śrî-Pratâpa-Rudra-mahârâyarigevû namagevû dharmmav âgabêk endu śrî-Krushṇa-Râya-mahâ-
râyara nirûpadinda vutthâna-dvâdaśi-puṇya-kâladali â-chandrârkka-sthâyiyâgi naḍeyal endu sarvva-
mânyavâgi biṭṭevu (usual final phrases) yendu biṭṭa maduveya suṅkada darmma-śâśana (usual final
verses) yî-dharmmake sahâyavâda Bennûra .... Narasa .. yidake mukhyarâda Bennûra ... staḷada Ha-
daḍeya kulkaraṇikav-oḷagâda Kûlambiya-Doḍi-Goṇḍa Ku...... Malli-Goṇḍa Niṭûra-Barama-Goṇḍa
Bennûra-Sûri-Seṭṭi-voḷagâda gaüṇḍa-prajegaḷû tammoḷu yêkastarâgi mâḍidantâ darmma-śâsana
(usual final phrase) yî-śâsanava tîvida silpi Vîrôja śrî śrî śrî.

EC 11 Dg 108
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg108

108 At the same village, from a copy of copper inscription in possession of Hañchinamane-Subbâ-Joyisa.


I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ
II.
rakshâyai jagatâṃ bhûyâd dayâḷur Dviradânanaḥ |
yasya krîḍâ-sarô mukhyaṃ svayaṃ sapta-mahârṇavâḥ ǁ
Harêr lîlâ-varâhasya daṃshṭrâ-daṇḍas sa pâtu vaḥ |
Hêmâdri-kalaśâ yatra dhâtrî chhatra-śriyaṃ dadhau ǁ
bhûri-bhûbhṛin-mukhâmbhôja-kânti-saṅkôcha-chandramâḥ |
↓1râjâ Hariharô jâtaḥ śrîmad-Vijaya-bhûpatiḥ ǁ
jigâya tatvadaḥ śrîmân śrîmad-Vijaya-bhûpatiḥ |
têjaḥ-śrî-maṅgaḷâdarśô vîra-śrî-Bukka-bhûpatiḥ ǁ
[page 128]tatô bhânu-mahâ-têjâḥ kshmâbhṛid-agrêsaraḥ kshitau |
kîrtti-bhûshita-dik-chakrô Dêva-Râjô virâjatê ǁ

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-śrîman-nṛipa-Śâlivâhana-śakha-varsha-śakhage iruva varsha 1327 nê Vyaya-
nâma-saṃ | rada Bhâdrapada-bahuḷa 6 Bhaumavâra-Kapilâ-yôga-puṇya-kâladallu Pampâ-Virûpâksha-
dêvara sannidhânadalli śrîman-mahârâjâ-paramêśvara dharmma-mûrtti Bukka-Râya-Dêva-Râyaru sva-
tantra-Kapi-gôtrada Âpastamba-sûtrada Yaju-śyâkheya Handarike-Sahasranâmada-Narasâvadhâni-
gaḷa pautrarâda Virûpâkshâvadhânigaḷa putrarâda Narasâvadhânigaḷige tiruchârya koṭṭa svâsti-
krama Vuchchaṅgi-vênṭhe-vaḷagina Koṭṭûru-śiṃhâsanakke saluva Bhânuvatî-paṭṭaṇa-sthaḷake Jigaḷe
Kundûru-Harosandra-muntâda gramânugrâmagaḷalli jôtishya-staḷa-purôhityâ yî-bagye nâgaḷa-bîjavari-
bhûmi sa-hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvvaka yî-parvaṇiyalli nâvu koṭu yidhêve nimma putra-pautra-
pâramparyyavâgi anubhavisikoṇḍu bâhôdu yandu barasi-koṭṭa svâsti-bhû-dâna-śâsana-paṭṭige yide
sâkshi

III.
âditya-chandrâv aniḷô‘naḷaś cha dyaur bhûmir âpô hṛidayaṃ Yamaś cha |
ahaś cha râtriś cha ubhê cha sandhyê dharmaś cha jânâti narasya vṛittaṃ ǁ

(usual final verse) śrî-Virûpâksha.

114 On a third stone at the same place.


I.
sva-dattâṃ para-dattâṃ vâ &c. ǁ

svasti Saka-nṛipa-kâḷâtîta-saṃvatsara-śataṅgaḷ oṃbhainûr̤a-padinâlkaneya varishaṃ Nandana-śaṃ-
vatsaraṃ pravarttise Âhavamalla-Dêvaṃ prithuvî-râjyaṃ geyye svasti śamadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-
śabda mahâ-sâmanta Muḷgunda-sinda śrîmat-Jâtarasar Kaḍambaḷige-sâyiramumaṃ uttarôttaram
âge âḷuttire Bramhmarâsi-paṇḍitargge âmnâyadal âda Ôsanada tîrtthava kâlaṃ kal̤chi koṭṭaṃ

EC 11 Dg 115
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg115

115 On a vîrakal in front of the same temple.


svasti samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Vijaya-Pâṇḍ[y]a-Dêvaru Noṇamba-[vâḍi]-
mûvattirchchhâsiramumaṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyvuttam ire ǁ svasti samasta-praśasti-
sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-sâmantaṃ Lakshmî-kântaṃ Toṇḍa-vibhâḍaṃ toḍare balgaṇḍaṃ aṇṇana gandha-
vâraṇaṃ mârkôla-bar̤a-siḍilu bigid-appuvaṃ ripu-sâmanta-Madana-Mahêsvaraṃ ari-biruda-sâmantara
śira-vajra-daṇḍaṃ ayyana .... mechche gaṇḍaṃ kaṭṭi-biḍuva sâmantara gaṇḍaṃ maṇḍaḷika-sâmanta
.. tîrtta...ḷavaṃ sâmanta-jagadâḷu duṭṭa-sâvantara niṭelva-mur̤ivaṃ mîr̤uva-sâvantara miduḷa sûsuvaṃ
gaḍiy-aṅka-Bhîmaṃ Uśanîśvara-dêvara pâdârâdhakaṃ bhuja-baḷa-sâdhakaṃ Vinâyaka-dêvara labdha-
vara-prasâdaṃ Bâya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Ôsanada sâmanta-Chaṭṭaya-Nâyakana maga sâmanta-Benavaya-
Nâyaka sâvanta-Huṇi ...na maga ...... Hariyamaṇayanuṃ Ôsanamumaṃ ko ..... Kokkalûrumaṃ
Hogeya ... yaṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire â-vûra .... sûḷeya Kâḷeya maga
haḍavaḷa-Be .. yanuṃ Chandeyanuṃ Kêteyanuṃ âḷtanavaṃ mâḍi nâlvaruṃ sattalige Prabhava-saṃ-
vatsarada Mâgha-bahuḷa 5 mi Sômavârad andu vîragalaṃ nir̤isuvalli Muguḷiyaker̤eya keḷage gadde
ka 100 teṅkaṇa holada ha.. keya Muttuga-Nâyakara maneya kaḷasa kannaḍi huvu tambula koḍeya ..
yint î-maryyâdeyaṃ â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ salisuvaru salisidavargge (usual final phrases) yî-
kallaṃ Kâḷi-Seṭṭi nilisida.

I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti śrî prithivî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâraka Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷa-
kaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla .... vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivriddhi-pravar-
ddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-ba ... saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi .... svasti samadhigata-
pañcha-mahâ-śabda ...... śvara Kâñchî-pura-varâdhîśvara .... chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mâr-
ttaṇḍa parichchhêdi-gaṇḍa Râjiga-Chôḷa-manôbhaṅga gaṇḍa-râya śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvara Râya-
Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru Kadambaḷige-↓1mûvattir-chchhâsiramumaṃ Bêtu .. nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinô-
dadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi svasti samasta-praśasti-sahita śrîman-Mahâdêvara
pâdârâdhakaṃ para-baḷa-sâdhakaṃ nija-bhuja-vijaya-sâhasaṃ vijaya-kûrppa ...... | satyada
niḷaya | satya-Yudhishṭhira | parivâra-tu .... Râya-Pâṇḍya-râjya-samuddharaṇa | parijanâbha-
[page 131]raṇan ahitara gaṇḍa | gaṇḍa-mârttaṇḍa | śrîmad-Adiyamarasaru | Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada 49
teneya Krôdhi-saṃvatsarada Chaitrad-amavâse-sûryya-grahaṇa-byatîpâta-Sômavârad andu Ela-
vaṭṭiya Sômêśvara-dêvara nivêdyakkam Nârâyaṇa-dêvara nivêdyakkaṃ nandâ-dîvigegaṃ tapôdhanar-
âhâra-dânakkaṃ śrîmad-Adiyamarasaruṃ perggaḍe-Ponnâṇḍaru ü̂r-oḍeya Chandimayya-Nâyakaru
Nâgabhûshaṇa-paṇḍitara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa modal-êriya gadde mattar
ondu beddale.. ya mattaru nâlku pû-dôṇṭa kammav innûr̤u (usual final phrases) Gaṅgâ-sâgara-Yamnâ-
saṅgamadoḷu Bâṇarâsi Gayey emb î-tirthaṅgaḷol âtma-kula-dvija-puṅgavanâ kuḷavan aḷidar int idan
aḷidaru (usual final verse).

126 At Mudihadaḍi (same hobli), on a stone to the south of the Îśvara temple.


svasti samasta-bhuvanâśryaṃ srî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâra-
kaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmaj-Jagadêkamalla-Dêvara râjyam uttarôttarâ-
bhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi samadhi-
gata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda Pallavânvayaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ Pallava-kuḷa-tiḷakan êka-vâkyaṃ Kâñ-
chî-pura-varêśvaraṃ śrîmaj-Jagadêkamallan-Irmmaḍi-Noḷamba-Pallava-Permmânaḍigaḷ Kaḍambaḷige-
sâyiramuṃ Kogaḷiy-aynûr̤uṃ Ballakunde-mûnûr̤uṃ Kuḍiyaparave-yel̤pattuṃ Kariviḍi-mûvattuṃ
pañcha-grâmeyumaṃ nidhi-nidhâna-nikshêpa-sahasradaṇḍa-modalâge dushta-nigraha-visishṭa-prati-
pâḷana-sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadin âḷuttum ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi samasta-râjya-bhara-nirûpita-
mahâmâtya-padavî-virâjamâna manônnata prabhu-mantrôtsâha-śakti-traya-sampannar appa śriman-
mane-verggaḍe Pallavâbharaṇa Brahmâdirâjar pPadaḍe-panneraḍuman âḷuttum ire Saka-varsha 958 ne

svara-dêvargge Brahmavêdi-jîyaraṃ kâlaṃ karchchiy ü̂riṃ paḍuva doḍḍa-gaṭṭina keḷage biṭṭa gal̤de

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêsvaraṃ paramai
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-

padmôpajîvi samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ ..... -pura-varêsvaraṃ Yad-vaṃ-
śâmbara-dyumaṇi samyakta-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa parichchhêdi-gaṇḍa Râjiga-

taṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvara Tribhuvanamalla-Pâṇḍya-Dêvar .......... Ballakunde-mûnûr̤u ..
...... sâsiramumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷanadind âḷuttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi svast-
samasta-râjya-bhara-nirûpita-mahâmâtya-padavî-virâjamâna mânônnata prabhu-mantrôtsâha-sakti-
traya-sampannar appa śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ râyabâri-daṇḍanâyaka Mâ .... ṇṇayyagaḷu piriya-

niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâṇa-japa-samâdhi-śîḷa-sampannar appa Dêvarâsiya
putra Jñânaśakti-paṇḍitara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakam mâḍi śrî-Mûlastânada Kali-dêvaru
.......... dali ¿bitṭṭa? ⟨biṭṭa⟩ beddale mattar eraḍumaṃ śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada 32 neya Sarv-

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Sâlivâhana-śaka-varshaṅgaḷu 1633 neya Khara-nâma-saṃ | Âśvîja-śu 10
llu Vâlmîki-gôtrada śrîmân-mahâ-nâyakâchârya Kâmagetti-Kastûri-Raṅgappa-Nâya[ka]ra pautrar âda
Medikeri-Nâyakara putrarâda Baramaṇṇa-Nâyakaru Âśvalâyana-sûtrada Bhâradvâja-gôtrada Nâra-
ṇappana pautranâda Lakshmîpati-putranâda Bokasta Nâraṇapage barasikoṭa agrahâra-dâna-patrada
kramav ent endare namma hirêrige puṇyav âgabêk endu nâyakaru namma râjyad-oḷagaṇa ... sîmê-
vaḷagaṇa Gaṇḍamu .. nahaḷḷiy emba grâmavannû yêka-bhôgya-agrahâra mâḍi...... sidake dhârâ-
pûrvvakavâgi .. Nâraṇapage koṭu yidhêve yî-grâmake saluva kâḍârambha-nîrârambha-nidhi-nikshêpa-

EC 11 Dg 131
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg131

131 At Kôlukuṇṭe (same hobli), on a stone in the yard of the Âñjanêya temple.


I.
Viśvêśaṃ Mâdhavaṃ Dhuṇḍiṃ Daṇḍapâṇiṃ cha Bhairavaṃ |
vandê Kâśîṃ Guhâṃ Gaṅgâṃ Bhavânîṃ Maṇikarṇikâṃ |
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ
Harêr lîlâ-varâhasya daṃshtrâ-daṇḍas sa pâtu vaḥ |
Hêmâdri-kalaśâ yatra dhâtrî chhatra-sriyaṃ dadhau ǁ

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śakha-varsha 1630 neya Sarvadhâri-nâma-saṃvatsarada Kârtika-
śudha 15 Sômavâra-sômôparâga-parvaṇi-puṇya-kâladallû | Vâlmîka-gôtrada śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâ-
chârya Kâmageti-Kastûri-Raṅgapa-Nâyakara pautrarâda Medakeri-Nâyakara putrarâda Baramaṇṇa-
Nâyakarû ǁ Âśvilâyana-sûtrada Haritsasa-gôtrada Honnâḷi Chika-Kâ .. ṇa-jôyisara pautrarâda Siṅgaṇa-
jôyisara putrarâda | Kâsîvâsi-Nârâyaṇa-Bhaṭṭaru Śaṅkkara-Bhaṭṭaru Śiva-Bhaṭṭaru tri-vargga-
rigû barasikoṭṭa grâma-śâsana-dâna-patrada kramav ent endare ǁ namma hiriyarugaḷige puṇya-
sukrutav âgabêk endu Kâsî-dharmakke nâvû âḷuvanthâ râjya Koḍaganûra sîmey-oḷagaṇa | Kôlukuṇṭṭe
yemba grâmavannû yî-paurṇamî-sômôparâga-parvaṇi-puṇya-kâladalû sa-hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-
pûrvakavâgi | Śivârpaṇavâgi | tri-vâchâ-tri-karaṇa-yuktavâgi koṭṭu yidhêve | yî-grâmake saluva kâḍâ-
rambha-nîrârambha-nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshîṇa-âgâmi-siddhi-sâdhyagaḷ emba ashṭa-bhôga-
têjôpârjaneyiṃ nimma putra-pautra-pâraṃparya â-chandrârkka-sthayigaḷâgi Kâsî-puṇya-kshêtradalli
snâna-dêvatârchaneyaṃ mâḍikoṇḍu atithi-abhyâgata-santarppaṇa mâḍikoṇḍu sukhadall ihud endu
barasikoṭṭa grâma-śâsana-dâna-patrâ ǁ (usual final verses).

EC 11 Dg 133
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg133

133 At Maḷalakere (Mâyigoṇḍa hobli), on a stone south of the Îśvara temple.


svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-prithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ

kathâ-vinôdadi râjyaṃ geyuttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-

(4 lines effaced) svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabha mahâ-râjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ

ippatta-nâlku bâḍada Manneya Mâkarasanuṃ â-sômayâji............ tigaḷ appa prabhugaḷu Sôma-

135 On a stone in Siddappa’s threshing-floor, behind the same temple.


(The top portion is effaced).

...vâlayamumaṃ .. bêḍiparg ...r̤ipum enisi sale tari ... Kâḷidâsana putraṃ prabhu-senabôva-
Mârttaṇḍayya .. châkaṇabbeya putra svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ mahâ-
râjâdhirâjaṃ paramêsvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ
śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandr-
ârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ Kâñchî-
pura-varêsvaraṃ Yadu-vaṃsâmbara-dyumaṇi su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ (pari-)

samasta-pra[sa]sti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ Tribhuvanamalla-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru Noḷamba-
vâḍi-mûvat-iś-chchhâsiramumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-visishṭa-pratipâḷanadiṃ sukha-râjyaṃ geyyuttam
ire ǁ śrî-Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada 34 neya Virôdhi-saṃvatsarada Mârggasirad amavâsye-Brihaspati-
vâra-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkramaṇa-byatîpâta-nimityamâgi biṭṭa dharmma Attigêr-panneraḍar̤a baḷiya-
bâḍam Togalêr̤a uttara-disâ-bhâgade nelas irppa śrî-mûlasthâna-Sayaṃbhu-dêvara parisûtradal irppa

saṃ kîrtti-nivâsaṃ śrîmad-Arasara-perggaḍe uttama-Mêlûra Âḷiyâṇḍanuv alliya samasta-prabhuga-
ḷum irddu âchâryya-Vimaḷasakti-paṇḍitara kâlaṃ kaḷchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi dêvara nivêdyakkaṃ
nandâdîvigegaṃ dêvara mundaṇa piriya-ker̤eya motta modal-êriyalu biṭṭa koḷa gadde kamma 150
dêguladiṃ teṅka biṭṭa beddale kamma 450 yint î-dharmmamaṃ (usual final phrases and verses).

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-prithvî-vallabha ...... Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ ...... râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivriddhi-pravarddhamâna .............. ttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi svasti sama-
dhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvara Kuvalâḷa-pura-varâdhîśvara ...... gaṇḍa Râjiga-
Chôḷa-manôbhaṅga śrîma ...... lla-Dêva-pâdârâdhakanu śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru
Noḷambavâḍi-mûvattir-chchhâsiramumaṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyuttire tat-pâda-
padmôpajîvi ǁ svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmanta vijaya.... kâminî-kântaṃ naṭa-
nagna-kathaka-gâyaka-dînânâtha-sandôha .... bhûshita-jagatî-taḷa-khyâtan a . bhuja-baḷâvaḷêpâ-
ṭôpôdrikta-ripu-nikurumba-kabandha-narttanâ-sûtradhâra saṅgrâma-dhîra pati-hit-Âñjanêya satya-
Râdhêya nija-kuḷa-sarasijâkara-taraṇi-kiraṇa Kusuvar-âbharaṇa Bijjêśvara-Barddegêśvara-dêva-
pâdâbja-bhriṅgan aṇṇana siṅga nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-sâmanta Dâkarasaru

sôma-grahaṇa-nimittamâgi śrîmad-agrahâraṃ Bâḍad Allâlêsvara-dêvar-aṅga-bhôgakke tadu-grâmad
aḍake-yeleya davasâyada perjjuṅkada dasavandada ponnan Îśânaśakti-paṇḍitara kâlaṃ karchchi
dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭaru î-dharmmamaṃ suṅkamaṃ kaikoṇḍu naḍeva puṇya-purusharuṃ
mahâjanam ayvadimbar anukûḷar âgiy â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ sva-dharmmadiṃ pratipâḷi-
suvaru ǁ

I.
jayaty êka-padâkrântam aśêsha-bhuvana-trayaṃ |
dvitîya-pada-vinyâsa-vyâkuḷâbhinayaḥ Śivaḥ ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahâ-râjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ

jîvi samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Kuḷumba-pura-varêśvaraṃ Yedu-vaṃ-
śâmbara-dyumaṇi subhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa paritsêdi-gaṇḍa Râjiga-Chôḷa-

râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada 30 neya Pârtthiva-saṃvatsarad uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrân-

[page 137]143 At Kandagallu (same hobli), on a stone near the Kallêśvara temple.


svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâraka
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷaka Châḷukyâbharaṇa śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarô-
ttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ saluttam ire .............. n Âhavamalla (3
lines gone) śrî-kêḷî-sadanan abhi........ ṇḍaṃ ṛipu-râya-kumu ............ maṇḍaḷika-makuṭ a-chûḍâ-
maṇi vairi-maṇḍaḷa.......... varddhana-mahârâja Vijeyâditya .... Noḷambavâḍi-mûvattirchchâsira..
.. dushṭa-nigraha-viśishṭa-pratipâḷanadin âḷdu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire Saka-
varsha 925 neya Śôbhakṛit-saṃvatsarada Chaitra-śuddha-trayôdasi-Âdityavârad andu śrî .... rasara
samasta-pradhânara Kogaḷi-nâḍa Ka...baḷige-nâḍa prabhu-ga .......... nâḍoḷe svasti samadhigata-
pañcha-mahâ-śabda .................... tiśaya-virâjamâna śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ ......
vinirggata-sakaḷa ............ Prabhâchandra-Jinâlaya-samuddharaṇa ...... m enisirdda śrîmat-
Śrî nandi-paṇḍita-dêvara .. vasôma-bhaṭṭâraru piriyara-Gêtayyanuṃ perggeḍe-Kaṇṇayyanuṃ Bha-
ratayyanuṃ Hambi-Seṭṭiya Barmmayyanuṃ aḷiya-Gêtayyanuṃ modalâgi pâda-mûla-parivâra-nagara-
mahâjana-pañcha-maṭha-sthâna-gavuṇḍagaḷum antu tombattar̤u-sâsirbbarum il̤du Kadambaḷige-
nâḍa kampaṇa ..... mâvina-kandaṃ ge ........ muṇḍa ür-oḍeyaṃ Mâramayyaṅge dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ
mâḍi yâva-kâlakkaṃ pûrâyaṃ hînâyam ennade varsha-nibandhadiṃ dharmma-vatthaḷeyâgi........
Mâghada-puṇṇamige koṭṭaru int î-mar yyâdeyaṃ tappade pratipâḷisuvar î-dharmmamaṇ tappade
pratipâḷisidargg âhârâbhaya-bhaishajya-śâstra-dânaṅgalaṃ kôṭi-Chaityâlayaṅga .. mâḍida phaḷam
akkuṃ idan aḷidaṅge Kopaṇa-tîrthamumaṃ rishiyarumaṃ Bânarâsiyoḷe kavileyumaṃ Brâhmaṇaru-
man aḷida mahâpâtakam akkuṃ (usual final verses) Śrînandi-paṇḍita-dêvara sva-hasta-likhitaṃ
maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî.

EC 11 Dg 144
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg144

I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ
II.
Harêr lîlâ-varâhasya daṃshṭrâ-daṇḍas sa pâtu vaḥ |
Hêmâdri-kalaśâ yatra dhâtrî chhatra-śriyaṃ dadhau ǁ

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya | Śâlivâhana-śakha-varushaṅgaḷu 1638 neya | Durmukhi-nâma-saṃvachharada
Chayitra-śu 14 lû ǁ śrîmat-paramahaṃsa-parivrâjakâchâryyarâdâ śrîmad-Vaishṇava-siddhânta-pratish-
ṭhâpanâchâryarâdâ śrîmad-Râmachandra-dêvara divya-śrî-pâda-pad[m]ârâdhakarâda pada-vâkya-pra-
mâṇa-pârâvâra-pârîṇa sarva-tantra-svatantrarâdâ | śrîmad-Vyâsa-Râyaravara | vidyâ-siṃhvâsanâdhîś-
vararâda śrîmal-Lakshmî-Nârâyaṇa-tîrtha-śrîpâdaṅgaḷavara kara-kamala-sañjâtarâdâ | śrîmad-Raghu-
nâtha-tîrtha-śrîpâdaṅgaḷavara divya-śrî-pâda-padmaṅgaḷige | Vâlmîki-gôtrada śrîman-mahâ-
nayakâchârya Kâmagêti-Kastûri-Raṅgapa-Nâyakara pautrarâdâ Medakeri-Nâyakara putrarâdâ |
Bharamaṇṇa-Nâyakaru | barasi koṭṭa dharma-śâsana-dâna-patrada kramav ent endare | namma
hiriyarugaḷige sukrutav âgabêk endu nâvu âḷuvanthâ râjya Koḍaganûra sîmevaḷagaṇa... Dêmalavana-
haḷi yamba grâmavanû Kṛishṇârpaṇavâgi.... dati | yî-grâmake saluva kâḍâraṃbha nîrârambha | nidhi-
nikshêpa-jaḷa-pâshâṇa-akshîṇi-âgâmi-siddha-sâdhyaṅgaḷ emba ashṭa-bhôga-têja-svâmyaṅgaḷannu ..
śishya-pâramparyya | â-chandrârka-stâyigaḷâgi anubhavisikoṇḍu yi ... endu barasi koṭa śâsanada dâna-
patra ǁ (usual final verses).

...... sta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-prithvî-vallabha mahâ ...... mêśvara parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-

muṃ vyatîpâtamuṃ kûḍi dina .. svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-mônânushṭhâna-

...... Śiva pâda-sêkhara nîti-ratnâkara ...... sujana-jana-Manôja ..... vîra .... samuddharaṇaṃ
pati-hita .... nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmach-Châḷukya-Gaṅga-Permmâḍi Brahmâdhirâja-
pramukha ....... nûr̤u Ballakunda ..... nûr̤u Kogaḷiy-aynûr̤u Kada .... sâyiramumaṃ dushṭa-
nigraha-viśishṭa-pratipâḷaneyindam anubhavisutta ..... vara besadiṃ svasti Śaka-nṛipa-kâlâtîta-

EC 11 Dg 155
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg155

155 At Kabbûru (same hobli), on a stone near the Kallêśvara temple.


I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭâra-
kaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷûkyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ Kalyâṇa-purada nelevîḍinoḷu
sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyvuttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-
śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Kâñchî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ Yadu-vaṃśâmbara-dyumaṇi subhaṭa-chûḍâ-
maṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa Râjiga-Chôḷa-manôbhaṅga śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-pâdâbja-
bhṛiṅga śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Tribhuvanamalla-vîra-Noḷamba-Pallava-Permmânaḍi-Dêvara
tamma svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Kañchî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ
Yadu-vaṃśâmbara-dyumaṇi subhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ parichchhêdi-
[page 141]gaṇḍaṃ Râjiga-Chôḷa-manôbhaṅgaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-pâdâbja-bhṛiṅgaṃ śrîman-mahâ-
maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Tribhuvanamalla-Pâṇḍya-Dê[va]ru Noḷambavâḍi-mûvattirchchhâsiramumaṃ Sân-
taḷige-sâsiramuṃ Banavase-nâḍ-oḷagaṇa agrahâraṃ Tumbegana-Hosavûru-Elagatûr-oḷagâgi palavuṃ
kurttu vṛittigaḷa suka-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷanadi nidhi-nidhâna-
nikshêpa-sahasra-daṇḍa-modalâgi sâdhisutuṃ râjyaṃ geyvuttav ire śrîmanu mahâgrahâraṃ
Kabbura Vîrarâjêndra-chaturvêdimaṅgalatu mahâjana innûr̤-ar̤uvattu idu pûrvva-diśâ-bhâgada
Kali-dêvargge dêva-dattiyâgi Kaṭṭidabayala ûroḍeya-gauṇḍugaḷa mânya-sthânada baḍagaṇa-staḷa-
dalu mattaru innûr̤u-kamma gade Muduger̤eya keḷage innur̤u-kamma gade dêvara pachchima-
bhâgada bedale aravattaru dêvara uttaradiku-bhâ[ga]dalu tôṇṭa innur̤u idu mahâjana biṭṭa dharmma |
svasti śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-varshada 48 ya Śôbhakṛitu-saṃvatsarada Phâlguṇa-su 3 Budha-
vârad andu śrîman-mahâ-agrahâraṃ Karvvûra Gañjiger̤eyalu ondu mattaru gar̤dege mûḍaṇa Kali-
dêvargge nandâdîvigegaṃ nivêdyakka Maleyâḷa-Nârâyaṇa-moḷandale ippattu-gadyâṇa-ponnan ikki
chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluvantâgi mahâjanav aśêsav il̤du dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍikoṇḍu biṭṭa
bhûmi mattaṃ svasti śrîman-mahâ-agrahâraṃ Karvvûra piriya-ker̤eya modal-êriyalu penna-bayalalu
ondu-mattaru gal̤dege mûḍaṇa Kali-dêvargge nandâdîvigegaṃ nivêdyakka Tenuḷa-Kâmâṇḍaru
ippattu-gadyâṇa-ponnan ikki chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluvantâgi mahâjanav aśêsav il̤du dhârâ-
pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi ponna-koṇḍu biṭṭa bhûmi int î-stâna-mânyamaṃ śrî-Mûlastâna-Sh[v]ayambhu-Kali-
dêvarggaṃ Gavar̤êśvara-dêvarggaṃ dêvâleyamaṃ mâḍisi annam-uṇṇada-bratamaṃ pariṇamaṃ mâḍi
dêvara dibya-śrî-pâdamaṃ pûjisuttam ire Nityavinôda-chadurvêdimaṅgalattuṃ Siva-Brâhmâṇara
putra-pavitrey appa Kârekallay-Ammege Maleyâḷa-Nârâyaṇa-moḷandaleyanu Tenuḷa-Kâmâṇḍanu
dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭa dharmma ǁ (usual final phrases and verse) śrîmatu Kunta-dêvarggey
achaḷa-bhakutiyiṃ gandhamaṃ akshate-pushpa-dhûpa-d(v)îpa-nivêdyamaṃ tri-sañjeya kaṭṭaḷe pûje-
yaṃ mârppa samasta-guṇa-sampanneyar appa Tirukâḷatiya puṭṭida Kârekalla-Ameya putra Kunta

II.
ettisi dêvâle[ya]maṃ |
mattaṃ bêḍidargam ar̤idu mannisi sale pemp |
uttarise Śiva-Brahmâṇargge pa- |
vitra enalu negeḷdeḷ intu Kârekalla-Amme ǁ

Sarasvati-gaṇa-dâsi Cheṅgôjana putra Ikkuḍâchâri eraḍu-dêvâleyamaṃ mâḍi sâsanamaṃ bareda |

dinda nimage koṭṭu yidhêve yî-grâmake saluva-kâḍârambha-nîrârambha-nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-

161 At Aṇaji (Aṇaji hobli), on a stone in Guḍḍappa’s dry land.


svasti parama-Mâhêśvaraḥ mâtâpitṛi-pâda-bhaktaḥ Âtrêyasa-gôtraḥ Sôma-vaṃśôdbhavaḥ Ikshvâ-
kubhir api râjarshibhish kṛitâvâha(ḥ)-vivâhânâṃ Kêkayânâṃ kulê jâtaḥ Śivanandavarmmâ sva-
[page 143]dêśasya kshayê Naṇakkâsa-Pallava-Râja-Kṛishṇavarmma-Râjayôḥ samarê tumulini pravṛittê Kṛishṇa-
varmma-Râja-sainyê bhagnê praśamita-hṛidayaḥ saṅkalita-saṅkalpaḥ kṛita-darbbha-śayanaḥ pavi-
tram abhyavahârayamâṇaḥ chira-kâlâvasthâyinîṃ kîrttim abhilashan śruti-smṛiti-vihita-śîla-guṇî
jânânaḥ manushya-bhôga-virakta-manâs svarggâvâpti-kṛitêkshaṇaḥ Indra-lôka-sukham akâmayata
â-chandra-târakam âtmanô vaṃśasya parama-śivaṃ vitanvan vîryya-śauryya-vikkrama-pratâpair
vvaśaś śauryya-karmma-paramparâ-ślâghâ-viśêshaṇa-viśêshitaḥ śûra-gaṇanâm abhimatâm abhigataḥ
abhigamyâpi sva-vaṃśa-sthâpaka-jana-puṇya-karmmaṇâ yuktaḥ yâvad yaśô lôkê vicharati tâvantaṃ
kâlaṃ purushaḥ divi nivasati pramudita-hṛidaya iti ǁ

EC 11 Dg 162
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg162

162 At the same village, on a stone in the Honnamma temple below the tank.


I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti śrî samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîśvara Vishṇu-vaṃśôdbhava su-
varṇṇa-garuḍa-dhvajaṃ Yâdava-kuḷa-kamaḷa-kaḷikâ-vikâsa-bhâskaraṃ Maḷaviya-mallay ahita-râya-
vura-salla Gurjara-râya-vâraṇâṅkusa Teluṅga-râya-sira-kamaḷa-nâḷôtpâṭana-kara pratijñe-Parasu-
Râma bhuja-baḷa-Bhîma mallâḷaṅkṛitay-ity-âdi-samasta-râjâvaḷi-virâjamâna śrîmat-prauḍha-pratâpa-
chakravartti śrî-vîra-Mahadêva-vijaya-râjyôdayada tat-pâda-padmôpajîvitaruṃ ativisama-haya-pra-
vuḍha-rêkhâ-Rêvantanuṃ para-baḷa-Kṛitântanuṃ giri-durgga-mallanu Sejavaḷa-kuvara-Nârâyaṇa-
nuṃ nirvvikuvara-jagad-daḷanuṃ nara-vîranuṃ râvutta-râyanuṃ śrîmatu-Mallinâtha-dêvara dibya-
śrî-pâda-padmârâdhakarum appa Hemmâḍi-Dêvarsara kumâra Viṭhala-Dêvarsararu biṭṭa dharmma
svasti śrî Saka-varurśa 1187 neya Krôdhana-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-śuddha-chaturddase-Sômavârad
andu payitrârôpaṇa-sameyadalu svasti śrîmad-anâdiya-piriy-agrahâraṃ (y)Anujaiya śrî-Sômanâtha-
dêvarige mahâjanaṅgaḷuṃ âsanna-chaü-gâve-samakshadalu srôtravanu biṭṭaru sarvva-namas-Śivâyav↓1
âgi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ biṭṭaru (usual final phrases).
