163 At the same village, on a stone near the Huchchappa-Voḍeyara maṭha.


ôṃ namaḥ Śivâya ǁ

I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti śrî samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîsvaraṃ Vishṇu-vaṃśôdbhavaṃ su-
varṇṇa-garuḍa-dhvajaṃ Yâdava-kuḷa-kamaḷa-kaḷikâ-vikâsa-bhâskaraṃ Mâḷaviya-mallay ahita-râyav-
ura-sa[l]la Gûrjara-râya-vâraṇâṅkusa Teluṅga-râya-sira-kamaḷa-nâḷôtpâṭana-kara pratijñâ-Parasu-Râma
bhuja-baḷa-Bhîma mallâḷaṅkṛitay-ity-âdi-samasta-râjâvali-virâjamâna śrîmat-prauḍha-pratâpa-chakra-
vartti śrî-vîra-Mahadêva-vijaya-râjyôdayada tat-pâda-padmôpajîvitaruṃ ativisama-haya-pravuḍha-
rêkhâ-Rêvantanuṃ para-baḷa-Kṛitântanuṃ giri-durgga-mallanuṃ Sejevaḷa-kuvara-Nârâyaṇanuṃ nirv-
vikuvara-jagad-daḷanuṃ nara-vîranuṃ râvutta-râyanuṃ śrîmatu-Mallinâtha-dêvara dibya-śrî-pâda-
padmârâdhakarum appa Hemmâḍi-Dêvarsara kumâra Viṭhala-Dêvarsaru biṭṭa dharmma svasti śrî
Saka-varśa 1187 neya Krôdhana-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-suddha-chaturddase-Sômavâradandu payitrâ-
rôpaṇa-sameyadalu svasti śrîmad-anâdiya-piriy-agrahâraṃ (y)Anujeya śrî-Sômanâtha-dêvarige mahâ-
janaṅgaḷuṃ âsanna-chavu-gâve-samakshadalu śrôtravanu sarvva-namaś-Sivâyavâgi↓1 dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ
biṭṭara (usual final phrases) Vîra-Pâṇḍya .. vôṇiyalu kaṇi 2 Taḷavattiyalu kaṇi 1 Karabayalu are-kâṇi

svasti samasta-bhuvanâsrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêsvara parama-bhaṭṭâraka

167 On a second stone at the same place.


svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja parama-bhaṭṭâraka Satyâśraya-
kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇa śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-
pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi .. svasti samadhi-
gata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Kuḍumba-pura-varêśvara Yadu-vaṃsâmbara-dyumaṇi
sûtra-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa parichchhêdi-gaṇḍa Râjiga-Chôḷa-manôbhaṅga śrîmat-

râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ

kalitanada tôḷa-bâḷaṃ |

EC 11 Dg 168
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg168

168 On a third stone at the same place.


I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâra-
kaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-pratâpa-chakravartti Jagadêkamalla-Dêvara
vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttaṃ Kalyâṇa-
purada nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire ǁ tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ
svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Kâñchî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ Yadu-vaṃ-
śâmbara-dyumaṇi su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ parichchhêdi-gaṇḍaṃ Râjiga-
Chôḷa-manôbhaṅgaṃ Jagadêkamalla-pâdâbja-bhṛiṅga-nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-
maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Jagadêkamalla-Vîra-Pâṇḍya-Dêvarasaru Noḷambavâḍi-mûvattîr-chchhâsiramumaṃ
dushṭa-nigraha-śiśhṭa-pratipâḷaneyin âḷd Uchchaṅgiya nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ
râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire ǁ

vṛi ǁ
II.
kulamaṃ pêḷvaḍe dugdha-vârddhi-janita-śrî-Sôma-vaṃśaṃ mataṃ |
palavâ ...... v enip â-saṃsthânakaṃ kîrtti ... |
balatâ .... bhrama-bhâgiy andaḍe baḷikk ammamma pêḷ ondu .. |
jala .. bîḷuḍe sîre mailageyo pêḷ î-Pâṇḍya-bhûpâḷana ǁ
bhuvana-prastutav âda-dharmmad esakaṃ nityôdaya-śrî-viḷâ- |
savan enduṃ taḷed irppa râjya-vibhavaṃ vidviḍ-nṛipâḷâṅganâ- |
nivahâḷaṅkaraṇâpahaṃ nija-bhujâvashṭambhadind andu pôlv- |
avan inn âvano Vîra-Pâṇḍya-nṛipanaṃ viśvambharâ-bhâgadoḷ ǁ
ka ǁ
III.
baḷavad-ripu-têjo-maṇ- |
ḍaḷamaṃ nija-bhuja .. têjade bhaṅgisi maṇ- |
ḍaḷika-ravi-Râhu-vesaraṃ |
taḷedavar âr vVîra-Pâṇḍya-bhûpâḷanavol ǁ
Maleyaṃ sâdhisi Châḷu- |
kya-lalâmaṅg ittu tettu besan ên emb ok- |
kaligar mmâḍida nija-bhuja- |
balav âr aḷav amama Vîra-Pâṇḍyôrvvipanâ ǁ
dhare pogaḷe Vîra-Pâṇḍyaṃ |
nirantaraṃ śrî-Noḷambavâḍiyan âḷutt |
iral Uchchaṅgiya-nelevî- |
ḍ urutara-lakshmî-vilâsavaṃ pogaḷadar âr ǁ
vṛi ǁ
IV.
piṅgade tannan êlagipa sûryya-śaśâṅka-marîchiyinde chel- |
vaṅ-geḍegoṇḍu Mêru-girig ôragey ambavol eyde nîḷdu tî- |
rtthhaṅgaḷin âda pâvana-mahad-vibhavakk eḍeyâgi dhâtrig Uch- |
chaṅgi virâjikuṃ negaḷda Pâṇḍya-nṛipâḷana râjya-varddhanaṃ ǁ
[page 146]ka ǁ
V.
naguguṃ Dvârâvatiyaṃ |
puguguṃ nija-śôbheyindav Aḷakâ-puramaṃ |
Jagadêkamalla-Pâṇḍyana |
nagariyan inn âva-nagariyuṃ pôltapavê ǁ
biṅkam-baḍed Uchchaṅgiya |
teṅkaṇa-deseyalli Vîra-Nâgêśvaranind- |
aṃ karav esevudu dhâtrig a- |
ḷaṅkaraṇaṃ Vîrapurav id atyâścharyya ǁ
baḷasida Nandana-vanadiṃ |
tiḷi-goḷadind ikshu-vâṭadiṃ per-gger̤eyind |
oḷagaṇa chelvindaṃ kaṇ- |
goḷisuvud î-Vîrapurav ati-prakhyâtaṃ ǁ
alli mahâ-prabhu sakaḷa-ja |
gal-lalanâ-saṃvṛitâṅgam enirppan Agajâ- |
vallabhan ant â-dêvara |
ballahanaṃ pogaḷal Ahipanuṃ ner̤edapanê ǁ
vṛi ǁ
VI.
viśva-vibhutvadiṃ vibudha-saṃstutiyiṃ viḷasat-prabhâvadiṃ |

hêśvara-kôṭig îpsitavan îva mahâ .... vîra-Nâ- ǁ
gêśvara ...... vîra-pati Pâṇḍya-nṛipâḷakan oldu kîrttipaṃ ǁ
ka ǁ
VII.
â-dêvana mahimeya nuḍi |
......... muni-janârâdhyaṃ puṇ- |
yôdaya-charitaṃ jagad-â- |
hlâdaṃ śrî-Rudraśakti-paṇḍita-dêva ǁ
jana-nutan enisida Pâṇḍya- |
....... nev aggaḷa kâryyava ...... |
manadoḷ êkave .... |
n enisuva pati-bhakti ... Perggaḍe-Dêva ǁ
patiyaṃ vañchisi pombaḍe- |
v ati .... vadhikâriga ........ |
............ tâ |
pati-hita-Vainateyan emma Perggaḍe-Dêvaṃ ǁ

Nâgêśvaran unnatav enipa ............ ner̤ed akkuṃ ǁ .... Pâṇḍyana ya ..... dvandvag er̤eyan
âvagam itta ǁ Dvandvager̤e perchchi .... haḍuvalu teṅka ..... daṇḍanâyaka ... ya ker̤eya keḷage
nivêdyakke biṭṭa gadde ..... Sôma...... sarvvâya dêvargge ... int inisuma sarvva-bâdhâ-parihâravaṃ
mâḍ ... int î-dharmmamaṃ pratipâḷisuva vîra ..... gâvuṇḍa (usual final phrases and verse).

EC 11 Dg 169
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg169

169 On a vîrakal to the east, in the same temple.


svasti śrîmatu Âḷâda-Seṭṭiyara maga Bhûmâda-Seṭṭiyu âtana putran Âdiyaṇṇanuṃ Hariyama ...
palaraṃ.. padalu vadhisi gûḷiyu palaran ir̤iyalu vriśabhanuṃ tânuṃ tanna maganuṃ sura-lôka-prâptar
âdaru ǁ âyana makkaḷu Bammayyanuṃ Nâgayyanuṃ vîragallan ettisidaru ....

EC 11 Dg 171
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg171

171 At Hemmanabêtûru (same hobli), on a stone in front of the Siddhêśvara temple.


ôṃ namaś Śivâya ǁ

I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

[page 147].. tiyaḷa Chaṅgaḷauve mechi âḷuvan iva Kâñchî-puravâ i .. tind idu mêdiniyoḷ adhika Hemmana-
bêtur̤a bakuta-janagaḷa arâdhaneyoḷu ǁ .. râya gra .. vâït idu Mêruvig eṇe-purusar ella sâr̤ida-
kâraṇa dhâruṇiy-oḷagaṇa jaṅgamad ârâdhaneïnd ayesa itî jagak ellaṃ ǁ svasti śrî samadhigata-
pañcha-mahâ-sabda Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîsvaraṃ Vishṇu-vaṃśôdbhava suvarṇṇa-garuḍa-dhvajaṃ
Yâdava-kuḷa-kamaḷa-kaḷikâ-vikâsa-bhâskaraṃ Mâḷaviya-mallay ahita-râya-vura-salla Gûrjjara-Râya-
vâraṇâṅkusaṃ Teluṅga-râya-śira-kamaḷa-nâḷôtpâṭanakara pratijñâ-Parasu-Râma bhuja-baḷa-Bhîma
.. llâḷaṅkṛita ity-âdi-samasta-râjâvaḷi-virâjamâna śrîmat-prauḍha-pratâpa-chakravartti śrî-vîra-
Mâhâdêva-vijaya-râjyôdayada tat-pâda-padmôpajîvitaruṃ sukha-saṅk(h)at[h]â-vinôdadiṃ pritvî-
râjyaṃ ggevuttam ire ǁ

svasti śrîmânu mahân-âḷva-prabhu Biṇichêḍa-kaligaḷ-aṅkusa Kala-Gauvuḍanu biṭṭa(d) dharmma svasti
śrî-Śaka-varśa 1188 Kshaya-saṃvachharada Chaitra-sudha-chaturddese-Sômavârad andu davanârôpa-
ṇada sameyadalu svasti śrîmatu Hemmanabêtur̤a Ḍiṅgaramallaya-dêvarige Kalla-gurugaḷa kâlaṃ
karchchi dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ mâḍi chhatrake biṭṭa bhûmi Haraḷakaṭada hinde gade arevattaru â-teṅ-
kaṇa-kôḍiyalu arevattaru ere ǁ antu gadde beddalu ma 1½ yint î-dharmmavaṃ pratipâlisuvudu ǁ
svasti śrîmânu mahân-âḷva-prabhu Bidiraker̤eya Siṅga-Gauḍanu biṭṭa dharmma svasti śrî-Hemmana-
bêtur̤a Ḍiṅgaramâllaya-dêvarige hâlu-maṇḍagege biṭṭa bhûmi Nicheyagaṭṭada hindaṇa tanna gavuḍa
mânyidoḷage mûḍaṇa kaḍeyalu mataru 1½ yint î-dharmmavaṃ pratipâlisudu ǁ svasti śrîmatu Chiṇaṅ-
giya Kalleya-Nâyakana kumâra Bommeya-Nâyakanu biṭṭa dharmma svasti śrîmatu Hemmanabêtur̤u
Ḍiṅgaramâllaya-dêvarige chhatrkke biṭṭa bhûmi Goravagaṭada hinde Kali-dêvara kaḍahinahatte
baḍagaṇa kaḍeyalu kaḍahu oṃ 1½ â-ker̤eya paḍuvaṇa-kôḍiya teṅkaṇa nîr-ottinalli beddalu mattaru
1½ svasti śrîmatu Chiṇaṅgiya Piḷḷeya-Nâyakana kuvara Ammaṇa-Nâyakanu svasti śrîmatu Hemmana-
bêtûr̤a Ḍiṅgaramallaya-dêvarige Keṃvoṭṭeyali chhatrake biṭṭa dharmma vûra paḍuvalu ereya beddalu
mattaro 1½

EC 11 Dg 172
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Dg172

172 On another stone at the same place.


ôṃ namaś Śivâya

I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti śrî samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda Dvârâvtî-pura-varâdhîsvaraṃ Vishṇu-vaṃśôdbhava
suvarṇṇa-garuḍa-dhvaja Yâdava-kuḷa-kamaḷa-kaḷikâ-vikâsa-bhâskaraṃ Mâḷaviya-mallay ahita-râya-
vura-salla Gûrjjara-Râya-vâraṇâṅkusaṃ Teluṅga-râya-sira-kamaḷa-nâḷôtpâṭanakara pratijñâ-Parasu-
Râma bhuja-baḷa-Bhîma mallâḷaṅkṛita ity-âdi-samasta-râjâvaḷi-virâjamâna śrîmat-prauḍha-pratâpa-
chakravartti śrî-vîra-Mahâdêva-vijaya-râjyôdayada tat-pâda-padmôpajîvitaruṃ ativisama-haya-pravu-
ḍharêkhâ-Rêvantanuṃ para-baḷa-Kṛitântanuṃ Giridurgga-mallanu Sejevaḷa-kuvara-Nârâyaṇanuṃ Nir-
vvikuvara-jagad-daḷanuṃ .... Sâḷuva-nara-vîranuṃ râvuta-râyanuṃ śrîmatu Mallinâtha-dêvara dibya-
śrî-pâda-padumârâdhakarum appa Hemmâḍi-Dêv-arsara kumâra Viṭhala-Dêv-arsaru biṭṭa dharmma
svasti śrî Saka-varśa 1188 Akshaya-saṃvatsarada Chayitra-suddha-chaturddase-Sômavâradandu
davanârôpaṇada sameyadalu svasti śrîmad-anâdiya .. riy agrahâram Anujeya-pravishṭada haḷḷi Hem-
manabêtûr̤a mûla-stânada Kali-dêvarige aśêsa-mahâjanaṅgaḷu âsanna-chavu-gâveya samakshadalu
sôtravanu sarvva-namaś Śivâyavâgi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭaru ǁ Hemmanabêtûr̤a .. Siddha-
Mallaya-dêvarige Chayitrârôpaṇada parvvadalu chatrava naḍasuvantâgi Biṇichêḍa-holadalu Gavar̤eya-
kaṭṭiya hinde Kalla-Gavuḍa ... vâgi mattaru 1 nu dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭaru ǁ svasti śrîmanu
mahâ-pradhânaṃ Kûcharasa-Liṅgarasaru Siddha-Mallaya-dêvarige parvvadalu chatrava naḍasuvant-
âgi hiriya-Araker̤eya ..... keyya baḍagaṇa kaḍeyalu Mâra-Gauḍa mukhyavâgi mattaru 1 nu dhârâ-
pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭaru ǁ î-dharmmava pratipâlisuvaru chatur-vvêda-pâragar appa brâhmaṇarige śrî-
Gaṇgeya ......

EC 11 Dg 174

174 At Kuraḍi (same hobli), on a southern pillar in the Mailâra-Liṅgappa-pâdakaṭṭe in Giryaṇṇa’s threshing-floor.


svasti śrîmatu srushṭi-gatâbda Hêmaḷambi-saṃvatsarake varusha 1955884518 sanditu | Saka-varusha

sikhârakke maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî śrî ǁ

[page 149]JAGAḶUR TALUQ.

EC 11 Jl 8
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Jl008

8 At Chadurugoḷa (same hobli), on a stone at the entrance of the Kallêśvara temple.


I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśva (about 20 lines are defaced) dadiṃ râjyaṃ
geyyutam ire svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmanta vijaya-lakshmî-kânta ........
........ śârddûḷa saṅgrâma-jattalaṭṭa ubhaya-râyara ................ n-aṅkakâr̤a sâmanta ..
.... ya-gaṇḍa ...... pura-varâdhîśvara sâmantâdhipati .......... pâdârâdhaka śrîmatu Vijaya-
Pâṇḍya-Dêva .................... koḷva Har̤uba ...... sâmanta-Bhîmana-chakra satya-Râdhêya
śaucha-Gâṅgêya nuḍidu pusiyal ...... gaḍa-kâr̤a dig-ari-gôṇṭekâr̤a mârkôla-Bhairava tata-vitata-
vâdya-ghana-saṅkîrṇṇa-râga-samuddharaṇa rasa-gîta .... kâr̤a sudha-dêśa ... ḷa viśama abhinava-
Bharata haya-Vatsa-Râja Mâhêśvara-gaṇâvatâra sarvvâbhyudayam appa sâmanta-Sôvi-Dêva-nâya-
kanuṃ Barmma-Dêva-nâyakanuṃ irddu Saka-variśa 1087 neya Pârtthiva-saṃvatsarada Puśya-
bahuḷa-chaṭṭi-Sômavâra-vyatîpâta-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkramâṇad-andu śrî-Vîra-Pâṇḍya-chaturvêdi-maṅ-
gaḷa Bitêri-pramukha-mahâ-agrahâraṃ svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânush-
ṭâṇa-japa-samâdhi-śîḷa-guṇa-sampannar appa śrîmatu aśêsha-mahâjanaṅgaḷa sannidhânadoḷu śrîmad-
.... dêśvara-dêvar-aṅga-bhôga-nivêdyakkaṃ khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakkaṃ | svasti ya[ma]-niya-
ma-nêma-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâṇa-japa-samâdhi-śîḷa-guṇa-sampannaruṃ sakaḷa-
budha-jana-prasannaruṃ dharmma-latâ-dhara-daṇḍaruṃ nirmmaḷa.. bhâ-prachaṇḍaruṃ sakaḷa-śâstrâ-
gamârtha-prachaṇḍa-chaturaruṃ châritra-nirataruṃ ity-âdi-nâmâvaḷî-virâjamânar appa Kâḷâmukha-
bratigaḷ appa śrî-Têjônidhi-paṇḍita-dêvara magaṃ Sarvvêśvara-paṇḍita-dêvargge sthânâ.... -sthânav
âgi sarvva-namasyav âgi kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭa Araker̤eya holada Goravagaṭṭada
keḷage eraḍu-ker̤eya nîra vaḷavant âgi koṭṭa gaddeya sîme ent endaḍe (here follow details of boundaries)

EC 11 Jl 9
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Jl009

9 At Asagôḍa (same hobli), on a stone south of the Śambhuliṅga temple.


svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ parama-bha-
ṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam
[page 151]uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire | tat-pâda-padmô-
pajîvi samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Kâñchî-pura-varêśvaraṃ Yadu-vaṃśâm-
bara-dyumaṇi samya .... subhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ parichchhêdi-gaṇḍaṃ
Râjiga-Chôḷa-manôbhaṅgaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-pâdâbja-bhṛiṅga-nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-
sahita śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Tribhuvanamalla-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru Noḷambavâḍi-mûvattirchchhâ-
śiramumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷaneyiṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyuttam ire tat-
pâda-padmôpajîvi samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-sâmanta-Mallarasaru Noḷambavâḍi-mûvatt-
irchchhâsirada perjjuṅkaman âḷuttam ire samasta-vastu-guṇa-ratna-rachita-vivêka-ratnâkaraṃ nija-
kuḷâmbhôja-divâkaraṃ Madana-hara-pâdârâdhana-labdha-vara-prasâdaṃ kastûrikâmôdaṃ | śishṭêshṭa-
jana-santushṭa-phaḷa-bhârita-kaḷpa-bhûjaṃ sahaja-Manôja vitaraṇa-vinôda vikramôttuṅgan ayyana-
siṅgaṃ chatus-samaya-samuddharaṇa vairi-saṃharaṇa-nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmat-
perggaḍe-Hemma-Seṭṭiyaru Kaḍambaḷige-sâsisarada pejjuṅkaman dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷane-
yind âḷuttam irddu śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada 35 neya Vikṛiti-saṃvatsarada Pushyad-amâ-
vâśye-Sômavâra-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-vyatîpâtaṃ kûḍalu Asagagôḍa śrî-svayambhu-Kalidêva-svâmi-
dêvara aṅga-bhôgakkaṃ dhûpakkaṃ nivêdya-śrîkhaṇḍakam âgi tamma perjjuṅkadalu aḍakeya
pêr̤iṅge lakkhake bêḷeyuṃ eleya pêr̤u davasada pêr̤u bhaṇḍiya suṅkam-eḷagâgiy ûral-puṭṭida suṅkak
ellaṃ daśavandhama biṭṭu yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâṇa-japa-samâdhi-
śîḷa-guṇa-sampannar appa śrîmatu Dharmmakarttâra-paṇḍita-dêvara śishyaru vâdi-praḷaya-Kâla-
Bhairava-dêvara pâda-prakshâḷanaṃ mâḍi dhârâ-pûrvvakadiṃ koṭṭaru (usual final phrases and verse)
Śaṅkara-Nârâyaṇana sva-hasta-likhita ǁ

10 On a 2nd stone at the same place.


svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Traiḷôkyamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarôtta-
râbhivṛiddhi-pravardhamânam â-chandrârkka-târam-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-prasâdôpajîvi samadhigata-
pañcha-mahâ-śabda Pallavânvayaṃ Pallava-kuḷa-tiḷakan êka-vâkyaṃ Kâñchî-pura-varêśvaraṃ śrî-
man-Nârasiṅga-Dêvaṃ Kogaḷiy-aynûr̤u Kadambaḷige-sâsiramaṃ Ballakunde-mûnûr̤uman âḷuttam ire
tatputraṃ samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda Pallavânvayaṃ Kâñchî-pura-varêśvaraṃ śrîmat-kumâra-

svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâṇa-japa-samâdhi-sampannar appa śrîmatu Traiḷôkya-
karttâra-bhaṭṭârakara pâda-prakshâḷa[na]ṃ mâḍi dhârâ-pûrvvakadiṃ sarvva-namasyam âgi tri-

nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷa ................ | tad-pâda-padmôpajîvi ........ malla ........ dhipati

tad-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ samasta-praśasti-sahita śrîman-mahâ-sâmanta Sindharasaru Noḷambavâḍi-
mûvattirchchhâsirada vaḍḍarâvuḷada suṅkaman âḷuttam ire avara besadi samasta-râjya-bhara-
nirûpita-mahâmâtya-padavî-virâjamâna mânônnata prabhu-mantrôtsâha-śakti-traya-sampannar appa

tanadi dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷanadinda ........ Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada 33 neya Sarvva-
dhâri-saṃvatsarada Pushyad-amavâsye-Bṛihaspativâra-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-vyatîpâta kûḍal Uch-
chaṅgi-mûvattar̤a baḷiya Asagagôḍa śrî-svayambhu-Kalidêva-svâmige tamma ........ Kaviḷagâve

30 At Kallêdêvarapura (same hobli), on a stone north of the Kallêśvara temple.


svasti samasta-vastu-vistîrṇṇârṇṇava-pûrṇṇa-chandranuṃ | nirantara-sukumâra | .... sadasiya vibhava-
Vibudhêndranuṃ | chañchach-chandrikâ-prakâśa-vikâśa-sudhâ-dhâvalya-mâṅgalya-saṃspûrtti-kîrtti-
lakshmî-kântanuṃ | yâchaka-nikâya-nandana-vana-Vasantanuṃ | pârâvâra-sañchâra-châru Mêru-
mahîdhara-dhairyâvaḷambanuṃ | bhakti-sakti-vadana-padma-parimaḷa-rôrambanuṃ | Saiva-samaya-
saṃvarddhana sakaḷa-samaya-samuddharaṇa sarbbâgama-sârbbabhaumanuṃ | pañcha-mudraâ-vara
vara-tapô-nishṭhâ-nikâmanuṃ | nabya-kâbya-châṭu-nâṭaka-gîta-vâdya-nṛityâdi-chatushshashṭi-kalâ-
pravîṇanuṃ | samuchita-satya-vachanânusandhâna-Râma-bâṇanuṃ | bâṇa-Bâṇâsura vîra-kaṭaka-
.. dra | Bhadrakâḷa-Mahâkâḷa-Kâḷa-Kâḷakaṇṭha | Nandinâtha-Hari........ Guha-Râvaṇa-Râma-Bhî-

I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśa 1448 neya Vyaya-saṃvachchharada Chayitra-śu
15 lu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha śrî-Kṛishṇa-
Dêva-Râya-mahârâyaru sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ pṛithvî-râjya geyuttirddu śrîmatu Râsyapa-
gôtrada Âśvalâyana-sûtrada ârshêya-kshatriyarâda Viśvanâtha-râüttara makkaḷu Raṅganâtha-râüttaru
śrî-Jamadagni-ṛishi-îśvarara âśramavâda .... tor̤eya tîrada śrî-Kallinâthapura-varâdhîśvara śrî-Kalli-
nâtha-dêvara sannidhiyali śrî-Kṛishṇa-Dêva-Râya-mahârâyarige dharmav âgabêk endu brâhmaṇa-
[page 157]bhôjana shaḍ-darśana-modalâdavarige satrava naḍavadake koṭṭa grâmada dharmma-śilâ-śâsanada
kramav ent endare śrî-Kṛishṇa-Dêva-Râya-mahârâyarû namage nâyakatanakke pâlisida Jagaḷûra
śîmey-oḷagaṇa Nibugûranu Kâśyapa-gôtrada Âśvalâyana-sûtrada Areya-Kshatriyarâda Viśvanâtha-
râüttara makkaḷu Raṅganâtha-râüttaru śrî-Jamadagni-ṛishîśvarara âśramav âda Hanator̤eya tîrada
śrî-Kallinâtha-dêvara sannidhiyali śrî-Kṛishṇa-Dêva-Râya-mahârâyarige dharmav âgabêkendu Brâh-
maṇa-bhôjana shaḍ-darśana-modalâdavarige satra naḍavadakke sahiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvvakav-
âgi â-chandrârka-sthâyiyâgi satra naḍayabêk endu dhâreyan er̤adu Jagaḷûra-sîmey-oḷagaṇa Nibugûra-
grâma 1 nû dhâreyan er̤adu koṭevâgi â-Nibugûra-grâmada chatus-sîmeya vivara (here follow details of boundaries) yint î-chatus-sîmey-oḷaguḷa nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshîṇi-âgâmi-siddha-sâddhya-
ashṭa-bhôga-têja-svâmya ker̤e-kuṇṭe-aṇe-achchukaṭṭu ...... tôṭa-tuḍike-samasta-suvarṇâdâya sakala-
dhânyâdâya .......... taḷavârike .............. hunise-mar̤ada rokka magga ..............
uppina-môḷeya rokka kraya kaḍḍâya biṭṭi birâḍa kâṇike sa .. sakalôtpatti samasta-vali-saha
sarva-nishpatti ...... kavâgi Kâśyapa-gôtrada Âśvalâyana-sûtrada Areya-Kshatriyarâda Viśvanâtha-
râüttara makkaḷu Raṅganâtha-râüttaru śrî-Kṛishṇa-Râyarige puṇyav âgabêk endu śrî-Jamadagni-
ṛishîśvarara âśramavâda Hanator̤eya tîrada śrî-Kalinâtha-dêvara sannidhiyali brâhmaṇa-bhôjana
mûvattayidu shaḍ-darśana śûdra-satra nâlvattar̤a mariyâdeyali satra naḍavadakke Jagalûra sîmey-
oḷagaṇa Nibugûra-grâma-vondanû śrî-Kalinâtha-liṅga-prîtiyâgi tri-vâchâ dhâreyan er̤adu koṭṭev âgi â-
chandrârka-sthâyiyâgi satra naḍayabêk endu koṭṭa grâma-dharma-śilâ-śâsana yî-dharma-satravanu

EC 11 Mk 1
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Mk001

1 At Dêvasamudra (Dêvasamudra hobli), on a stone east of Gaṅgâdharappa’s house.


śubham astu | svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-saka .......... Piṅgaḷa-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-
ba 8 lu śrîman-mahâ ............ paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-vîra-Sadâśiva-Dêva-Râ ......
.... paṭaṇadalû ratna-siṃhâsanârûḍhar âgi pṛithvî-sâ ........ yiral âgi śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara
aḷiya Râma ...... arasugaḷû dharmma-pârupatyada mêle Viṭhala-dêvara guḍiya lekha .. ra guḍi-śilâ
śâśana-pratiyanu barasi tarisi ...... chitayisi â-sâsana-pra .... Kṛishṇa-Dêva-mahârâyaru Pramâ-
dîcha-saṃvatsara-Śrâvaṇa-śu 1 lu ...... sida grâma (other villages named) antu kâluvaḷi-chaü ....
kâluve saha staḷa-suṅka adakke saluva staḷadinda ettida ...... ḷadinda bandu staḷadalu mâḍida
hêrugaḷige saluva suṅka kaḍivâru .... kaḍivâru aṅgaḍi-magga piñjaṇigaru asagaru saha ......
nâḍa daḷavârike horabaḷi hulubanni baṇajigara yettina .... r̤iṅge uppina-môḷeya .......... saha
samarpisiy iralâgi amṛitapaḍige sallade ........ luptam âyita ...... jayantî-puṇya-kâladalû Sadâ-
śiva-Râya-mahârâya ...... râjaya-dêva-mahâ-arasugaḷige puṇya ............ vara amṛitapaḍige
samarpisi ko ...................... saru kaṭṭida grâma ...... (back) ...... daya-Śâlivâhana-
śaka-varusa ........ gaḷa-saṃvatsarada Âśvîja-mâsadalu śrîma .......... paramêśvara śrî-vîra-
pratâpa śrî-vîra-Sadâśiva-ma ...... paṭṭaṇadalu śrî-Bîrê-dêvara amṛitapaḍige saluva .... ruvâḍi
uppina-môḷe ..... (villages named) modalâda-grâmagaḷa staḷa-suṅkakke saluvanta kaḍivâru aṅgaḍi-
kaḍivâru magga-kaḍivâru gâṇa ...... rasa uḷa deri ...... hora-baḷa baṇa (stops here).

EC 11 Mk 2
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Mk002

2 At the same village, on a stone near the Âñjanêya temple.


śubham astu svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśaṅgaḷu 1484 neya Dundubhi-saṃvacha-
rada nija-Śrâvaṇa-ba 5 lu śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêsvara râjâdhirâjâ râja-paramêsvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa
śrî-Sadâsiva-Râya-dêva-mahârâyaru ratna-siṃhâsanârûḍharâgi prithvî-râjyaṃ geyitaṃ yiralu śrîman-
mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara aḷiya Râmarâjaya-dêva-mahâ-arasaru śrî-Viṭhala-dêvara amṛitapaḍige saluva

EC 11 Mk 4

4 At Muraḍi (same hobli), on a stone behind the Basava temple.


śrî-Râmachandrâya namaḥ śubham astu

I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varshambulu 1478 aguneṭi Naḷa-saṃvatsara-Jyêsṭha-śu 15
lu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-Sadâśiva-mahârâyalu Vidyânagara-
mandu ratna-siṃhâsanârûḍhulai pṛithivî-sâmbrâjyaṃ chêyuchuṇḍagânu | śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalê-
śvara Râmarâju-Viṭhalarâju-Tirumalaiya-dêva-mahârâjulugâru śrîmad-yajanâdi-shaṭ-karmma-niru-
tulaina Râyadurgaṃ-śîmaku chellêṭi Muruvuḍiki pratinâmamaina Bukkarâyapura sarvamânyapu agra-
hâraṃ aśêsha-vidvan-mahâjanulukunu daṇḍaṃ peṭṭi yichchina dharma-śilâ-śâsana-kramam eṭl-
annanu | Sadâśiva-mahârâyalu mâku nâyaka-kâryânuku pâliñchina Râyadurgaṃ-sîmaku chellêṭi
Muruvuḍiki pratinâmamaina Bukkarâyapuram agrahârânuku mêmu sarvamânyaṃ chêsina vîvaraṃ mî-
[page 160]agrahâramandu ...... anyâyaṃ...rokhaṃ...vunnârani mîru mâ ........ ...... janâlu | mî-agrahâram-
andu ........ talâri kânuku achche ............... mî-agrahâramandu kshêtra ........ sêsêanduku
puchchukô .... kâṇikalunnu | yivi-modalainavi mâni .... agrahâramandu ..............chêrina ...
modalainavâṭini Viṭhalarâjayyavâru ...................... sahiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvakaṅgâ
yichchina-sarvamânya chandrârka-târaṃ | yi-dharmmamunaku yevvaru........ .... anubhaviñchu
................... ani yichchina dharmma-śilâ-śâsana ǁ (usual final verses) maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî

EC 11 Mk 5
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Mk005

5 At Karaḍihaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in front of the Hanumanta temple.


śrî-Râmachandrâya namaḥ śubham astu

I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana śaka-varshambulu 1478 aguneṭi Naḷa-saṃvatsara-Jyêshṭha-śu 15
lu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-Sadâśiva-mahârâyulu Vidyânagara-
mandu ratna-siṃhâanârûḍhulai pṛithvî-sâmbrâjyaṃ chêyuchuṇḍagânu śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara
Râmarâju-Viṭhalarâju-Tirumalaiya-dêva-mahârâjayyagâru śrîmad-yajanâdi-shaṭ-karma-niratulaina
Râyadurgaṃ-sîmaku .......... raḍipalleku pratinâmamaina Harihararâyapuraṃ sarvamânyapu
agrahâraṃ aśêsha-vidvan-mahâjanâlakunu daṇḍaṃ peṭṭi yichchina dharma-śilâ-śâsana-kramam eṭl-
annanu Sadâśiva-mahârâyalu mâku nâyaka-kâryânuku pâliñchina Râyadurgaṃ-simakuchelleṭi Karaḍi-
palleku pratinâmamaina Harihararâyapuraṃ agrahârânuku sarvvamânyaṃ vêsina vivaraṃ mâ-agra-
hâramandu .... gauṇḍulaina .......... vunnârani mîru mâtô cheppaṅgânu .. mâ-lekkhalaku
samanitiñchi mî-agrahâramandu mîru talâri-kânuku achchê ........ mî-agrahâramandu kshêtrâdi-
bhôgâlu sêseanduku puchchukoni vuṇḍe kâṇikalunnu yivi-modalainavi mânitimi | mî-agrahâramandu
tappu chêsinavârivalla vachchina aparâdhaṃ mâlunnu mî-agrahâramandu dêvastânaṃ charuvu-
kuṇṭa-kâluvaluku vêsukonêṭaṭṭugâ ...... yivi-modalainavi annim Viṭhalarâjayyavâriki puṇyaṅgânu
...... puṇya-kâlamandu dhâra-chêsi yichchina sarvamânya-dharma-śilâ-śâsanaṃ (usual imprecatory phrases and verses).

navarige Timmôja-Koṇḍôjanû binnahaṃ mâḍalâgi Râmarâjaiyyanavarû Sadâśiva-Dêva-mahârâya-
rige binnâhaṃ mâḍi Râyaru âḷu .. vanthâ chatus-sîmeyalu nâyinda-kelasi Timmôja-Koṇḍôjanavara

[page 162]14 At the same village, on a rock near the Yemme Tammana guṇḍu.


(Brahmi lipi).

Suvaṇṇagirîtê ayaputasa mahâmâtâṇaṃ cha vachanêna Isilasi mahâmâtâ ârôgiyaṃ vataviyâ
Dêvâṇaṃ piyê hêvaṃ âha adhikâni a . ti . yâ . vasâni ya ha upâsakê nô tu khô bâḍha pakaṃte
husaṃ êkaṃ saṃva .. sâ.. kê tu khô saṃvachharê yaṃ .... ghê upayîte bâḍhaṃ cha mê pakaṃtê
iminâ chu kâlêna .. misâ samâ . mu .. Jaṃbu-dî .. misâ dêvêhi pakamasahi iyaṃ phalê nô hiya
sakê .... nêva pâpô .. vê kâmaṃ tu khô khudakêna pi pa .... na vi .. ula .. svagê sakê ârâdhitavê
se .... ya i . ṃ sâvaṇê sâvitê yathâ khuda .. mahâptâ cha imaṃ pakamêyu ti aṃtâ cha ......
ṭhitîke cha yaṃ pakamê hôtu ...... vaḍhisiti vipulaṃ pi cha vaḍhisiti a .... yam vaḍhisiti iyaṃ
cha sâvaṇê.................... taviyê ............ hyitavyaṃ śachaṃ va . yaṃ imê dhamma-gu
...... ha . ma........ âchariyê apachâyitaviyê su .......... sâ pôrâṇa .... tî dîghâvusi cha
hêmêva . têvâsinê cha âchariye ............ thârahaṃ pavatitaviyê .............. êsa tathâ
kaṭaviyê cha Pa ............ ṇa↓1

Notes
↑1. * This word is in Kharôshṭi characters.

20 At the same village, on a stone in the raṅga-maṇṭapa of the Triśaṅkêśvara temple in the Brahmagiri hill.


svasti śrîmatu Bahudhânya-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-suddha 3 ...........

I.
śrîmat-Sûryya-kulâgragaṇyan esedaṃ Gôvinda-bhûpaṃ raṇô- |
ddâmaṃ .... jaya-priyan Iruṅgoḷâvanîśaṃ yaśô- |
[page 163]ddâmaṃ Hed[d]or̤e-mêrey âge .......... n âḷdan âtaṅg ati- |
prêmaṃ kaimige puṭṭidaṃ nikhiḷa-vidviḍ-bhûpa-vidrâvaṇaṃ ǁ
svasti samasta-râja-maṇi-râji-virâji-kirîṭa-kûṭa-bi- |
nyasta-padâmbujâtan uditôdita-puṇya-samêtan urbbarâ- |
vistṛita-kîrtti bhû-bhuvana-rakshaṇa-daksha-Mukunda-mûrtti lô- |
ka-stuta-śauryya-sîḷan esedaṃ kali-Bhôga-nṛipâḷan urbbiyoḷ ǁ
paduḷade Bhôga-bhûpatige paṭṭaman .... oykane kaṭṭe vairi-jâ- |
ḷada madav ettikaṭṭidud arâtiga ........ moṭṭe-ga |
ṭṭidudu virôdhi-bhûpara yaśô-nivahaṃ piriduṃ kilumbu-ga- |
ṭṭidud ari-dêśadoḷ bhaya .. saṃ maḍu-gaṭṭidud âgaḷ âvagaṃ ǁ
Bhôga-nṛipaṅgav â-kusuma-kômaḷe Bijjaḷa-Dêvigaṃ manô- |
râgade puṭṭidaṃ Manasijâkṛiti Bamma-nṛipâḷan î-mahî- |
bhâgadoḷ â-Nṛigaṃ maguḷe puṭṭidan â-Nahusaṅge matta ja- |
nmâgamav âdud â-Raghu chaturttha-yugôdbhavan âdan embinaṃ ǁ

antu puṭṭi lalâṭa-paṭṭadoḷu paṭṭamaṃ taḷedu ǁ

II.
taḍeyade Roddamaṃ Kaṇiyakallan aḷumbade Śîru-nâḍan î- |
kaḍu-gali Bamma-bhûpan olaviṃ paripâḷisi matta mâṇdanê |
Maḍiyame-nâḍa Humbuḷige Luṅke Nasumbu Noṇambavâḍi Râ.. |
maḍi-modalâd-anêka-para-vṛittiyan irkkuḷigoṇḍan âvagaṃ ǁ

antu para-maṇḍaḷaṅgaḷan uravaṇiyind ottikoṇḍu Roddada Gôvaṃ khaḷa-Sahadêvaṃ nigaḷaṅka-mallaṃ
ripu-hṛidaya-sallaṃ baṇṭara bâvaṃ Bammi-Dêvaṃ saradhi-parivêśhṭita-dharaṇiyaṃ paripâḷisutte
sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadin[d] ire tadîya-pâda-mûla-parigrâha-vṛittiyumaṃ pradhâna-pratipattiyumaṃ
paḍedu naḍev anvayadoḷu ǁ

III.
Kanakâdrîndrada ratna-mêkhaḷeyoḷ â-kalpadrumaṃ lîleyiṃ |
janiyippante chaturttha-vaṃśa-maṇi-dîpaṃ Malli-Gauḍaṅgav â- |
tana chêta-priye Hampamâmbikegav aty-ânandadiṃ puṭṭidaṃ |
vinayâmbhônidhi sad-guṇâbharaṇan Ajjaṃ saj-janânandanaṃ ǁ
vinaya-nidhânan endu vimaḷânvayan endu vivêkiy endu Kâñ- |
chanagiri-dhairyyan endu kavi-bândhavan endu kaḷâ-pravîṇan en- |
d anupama-dâniy end akhiḷa-saṃstutan end abhirâman îtan end |
anunayadinda baṇṇisuvud âgaḷuv Ajjanan î-jagaj-janaṃ ǁ
paded âdi-Varâhana radanada | moneyoḷu nimiśam irddud eḷe santatam ip- |
pudu karaṇad Ajjamana kon- | tada moneyoḷu Kaṇiyakalla-nâḍ anit-anitu ǁ
â-negaḷd Ajjana sati chan- | drânane gaja-gamane vṛitta-kuche Tippaman â- |
Jânakiyan Arundhatiyaṃ | mânini naguvaḷu patibratâ-guṇadinda ǁ
Jina-pûjâ-ratanaṃ mahî-nutanan añchad-vâchanaṃ mantri-Bî- |
chanan ânandade petta garbbad odaviṃ Daityêndranaṃ Bhânu-nan- |
dananaṃ Khêchara-râjanaṃ Śibiyan â-Mândhâtanaṃ petta taj- |
jananî-saṅkuḷa-dôshamaṃ kaḷedu koḷvaḷ kappamaṃ Tippamaṃ ǁ

ant apratimam enisid oppaman appukeyda Tippamâmbikeya suputran enisi ǁ

IV.
saradhiya guṇpan urbbareya sairaṇeyaṃ sura-saiḷad ondu su- |
sthirateyan Indra-mantriya kaḷâ-kusaḷatvaman ondu mâḍi Paṅ- |
karuhabhavaṃ vinirmmisidan alladoḍ ambuja-pûrnna-sad-guṇôt- |
karamayan âdan ent enisidaṃ karaṇâgraṇi mantri-Bîchaṇaṃ ǁ
ored îtaṃ pati-bhaktan end ar̤idu Barmmôrbhîśvaraṃ koṭṭoḍ â- |

(rest gone).

[page 164](2nd piece) antu nija-pati-prasâdâyattanuṃ dhîrôdâttanum enisi pempu-vaḍeye |

V.
.... vinde Bemma-mahipaṃ besanaṃ kuḍe mantri-Bîchan ud- |
dhurataram âge beṭṭugaḷan oṭṭ.... d ene tandu vajra-pañ- |
jaramane koṭṭan îgaḷ ene Hâniyakaṃ Niḍugallan eyde nâḷ- |
birudina-kôṭeyaṃ kshaṇadin ikkisidaṃ manavikka-vairigaḷ ǁ

antu Kammaṭada Bîcha nirmmisida permmeyind asiya-gasaṇiyuṃ dûveya bevasamuṃ dunduveya
dandugaṃ mâḍi.. ṇiyataṃ kuṭamuṃ huri maṇale bharavasamuṃ toḷalkeyuṃ baḷalkeyuṃ kâḷegad
ûḷigamuṃ kanisinoḷam ill enisi ǁ

VI.
asadaḷav emma tôḷ-valamum âḷ-valamum diṭav endu kâduv ond- |
esakade band arâti-nivahaṃ suralôkaman eyde matte bhê- |
disi kolavêḷku matt avaran embavol aḷḷ ir̤iyuṃ ...... v â- |
gasaman aḍurttu Hâniyada kôṭeyuv î-Niḍugulla kôṭeyuṃ ǁ
javadiṃ Bîcha-chamûpan ikkisida durggâḍambaraṃ gêḷdu Pa- |
llavan aḷḷâḍidan Andhran audhana-vol âdaṃ bechchi Karnnâṭan ant |
avam end â .... n Aṅga-Vaṅga-mahipaṃ beṅgoṭṭaḍ ôrante Mâ- |
ḷavan âḷâdapan endaḍ aḷki taḷaridaṃ Yâdavaṃ .... davaṃ ǁ
bhânu-śaśâṅkar ippinav aśêśada râjyamum âtma-lakshmiyuṃ |
dâniyu.. vuditôditam ârjjitam âge pempu-vett î- |
Niḍugalla î-Hâniyada kôṭegaḷaṃ sale mantri-Bîchaṇaṃ |
mâna-nidânan ikkisidan int idu nôḍe śiḷâ-taḷâksharaṃ ǁ
EC 11 Mk 21
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Mk021

21 On a boulder known as Akshara-guṇḍu, north of the Brahmagiri hill.


(Brahmi lipi)

Suvaṇṇagirîtê ayaputasa mahâmâtâṇaṃ cha vachanêna Isilasi mahâmâtâ ârôgiyaṃ vataviyâ hêvaṃ
cha vataviyâ Dêvâṇaṃ piyê âṇapayati adhikâni aḍhâtîyâni vasâni ya hakaṃ...... nô tu khô bâḍhaṃ
pakaṃtê husaṃ êkaṃ savachharaṃ sâtirêkê tu khô saṃvachharaṃ yaṃ mayâ saṃghê upayîtê bâḍhaṃ
cha mê pakaṃtê iminâ chu kâlêna amisâ samânâ munisâ Jambu-dîpasi misâ dêvêhi pakamasa hi iyaṃ
phalê nô hîyaṃ sakyê mahâptênêva pâpôtavê kâmaṃ tu khô khudakêna pi pakamamiṇêṇa vipuḷê
svagê sakyê ârâdhêtavê êtâyaṭhâya iyaṃ sâvaṇê sâvâpitê .......... mahâptâ cha imaṃ pakamê ..
aṃtâ cha mê jânêyu chiraṭhitîkê cha iyaṃ pa .......... iyaṃ cha aṭhê vaḍhisiti vipulaṃ pi cha vaḍhi-
siti avaradhiyâ diyaḍhiyaṃ vaḍhisiti iyaṃ cha sâvaṇê sâvâpitê vyûthêna 256 sê hêvaṃ Dêvâṇaṃ piyê
âha mâtâpitisu susûsitaviyê hêmêva garutvaṃ prâṇêsu drahyitavyaṃ sachaṃ vataviyaṃ sê imê dham-
maguṇâ pavatitaviyâ hêmêva aṃtêvâsinâ âchariyê apachâyitaviyê ñâtikêsu cha ka .. ya.. rahaṃ pava-
titaviyê êsâ pôrâṇâ pakitî dighâvusê cha êsa hêvaṃ êsa kaṭaviyê cha Paḍêna likhitaṃ lipikarêṇa↓1

Notes
↑1. * This last word is in Kharôshṭi characters.

jaru Frammarige chaturu-muka-ghatidante gha(ṭi)daru Bijaṇa-Dêva (Baira-Dêva Maṅgala)-Dêva

EC 11 Mk 25
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Mk025

25↓1 At Santêgôvi (same hobli), on copper plates in possession of Diḍige Îśvaraiyya.


(I b) śrî-Virûpâkshana padavê gati śrî-Komâra-svâmi-padâravindavê gati śrî-Bâṇarâvi-Mukyaprâṇa-
nâtha-svâmi-śrî-pâdaṅgaḷê gati Basavêśvaranê gati śrî-Maruḷepa .. dayamâḍi pâlisi yî-svâsti koṭanta
kramav ent endaḍe śrî svasti jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśaṅgaḷu 1587 neya Viśvavasu-nâma-
saṃvachharada Kârtika-śudha 10 Sthiravâra-Svâti-nakshatra-śubha-dinadi śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâr-
yya yimmaḍi-gaḍiyaṅka-Bhîma Soṇḍûru-Guḍukôṭe-Bâṇarâvi-râja-râjêśrî Bôri-Nâyika-Bommava-Nâgati-
yavaru Hara-guru-bakti-âchâra-kriyâ-dharma-svarûpigaḷ âda nâlku-maṭada hirêru râ ǁ Âridri-maṭada-
Attîta-dêvaravaru maṭada Mahêśvaraiyanavaru Stavara-maṭapati Gaṇa .... śrî-Mukyaprâṇanâtha-
dêvaru-svâmi-(II a) pûjâri Hire-Dâsappa paṭṭaṇade seṭi Yîrappa kômaṭigara Timmappa gandhaviḍi-
Yîrappa Gudhi .. ya pârapategâra Śînappa Lakshmipati staḷada gauḍa-śânabhôgaru hanneraḍu-mandi
âyagâraru nâyikaru daḷavâyi-gurikâraru yakkaṭṭigaru staḷa-parastaḷa-seṭṭi-savudri samasta-daiva-
bara-ballidaru mukântradallu yî-grâmada akasâlike svastivâna pottadâra Satyappanu Kembâvi-
Yîrappa-Appaṇṇanavarige tanna Bâṇarâvi-sîme mûvattu-mûru-haḷi akasâlike-pottadârike-svâstiyannu
koṭa kramav ent endaḍe râjêśrî-doregaḷa rastina haṇavanu yetti â-Satyappana maneyalli yillada
pakshadallu âtana mane Viṭlapuradalli yida-kâraṇa divâṇada ra-(II b) stina haṇavanu Yele-Kem-
bâviyavara maneyoḷage yiḍal âgi rastina pottada chîlavanu Kembâviyavara maneyanu kaḷaru yiḷebiddu
aramane rastu hâki gaṇṭu kaṭṭi yikkidanta pottada chîlavanu kaḷaru kaddukoṇḍu hôgalâgi â-
Satyappa râjeśrî-karttarige hêḷida mâtu svâmi Kembâviyavara maneyoḷage dêvaravara rastina haṇa-
vanu .. yiṭuyidêvu yîga Kembâvi Yîrappa Appaṇṇanavara kêḷidare râjêśrî-aramane rastina haṇa-
kaḷivili hôyitu yendu âḍuta yidâru yidake dêvaravaru nîvê tarisi avaranu vichâra-mâḍi yilla vuṇṭu
yembadanu dêvaravaru kêḷiriy enalâgi râjêśrî-doregaḷu tamma hujûru sâmadikaru pârapategâra
(III a) kasabe-gauḍa grâmânugrâmagaḷa gauḍaru śânabhôgaru nâḍigaru hanneraḍu-mandi âya-
gâraru nâḍa kulakaraṇi nâyakaru daḷavâyi paṭaṇa-seṭi savudri maṭa-mahatu samasta-hirêru kirêru
daivada mukhântradalli râjêśrî-doregaḷu akasâlêya Kembâvi-Yîrappa-Appaṇṇanavara hiḍitarisi
mâtanâḍasalâgi avaru âḍida mâtu dêvaravara aramane raste-haṇavanu namma mane kaḷaru iḷebiddu
kadukoṇḍu hôdaru yenalâgi râjêśrî-daṇigaḷu â-mâtu kêḷi maha siṭâgi nimma maneyoḷage yiṭanta
divâṇada rastu hôdadu tapu yendu nâṇya .. ga 120 varaha-daṇḍa tegadukoṇḍaru mattu râjêśrî
doregaḷu tamma chitti antaḥkaraṇakke tandu sâmadikaru pârapategâra gauḍa śânabhôgaru (III b)
samastaru kûḍi nâvu baḍavaranu yaraḍu-kaṇṇu kâṇade daṇḍa tegadukoṇḍivi yendu vaḷa sûkshme-
yali vûra-taḷavâra Sômi-Nâyaka nâḍa-taḷavâra Jâbi-Nâyaka avar-ibaru bûmige kâvandarâdavara
karasi nîvu yî-kaḷavina vichâravanu sôdisi yâva-kaḍelâdaru yî-kaḷavu hiḍadu havudu mâḍiri yendu
râjêśrî-daṇigaḷu tâkîdi-mâḍi hêḷalâgi matu âru-tiṅgaḷige ûra-taḷavâra Sômi-Nâyika nâḍa-taḷavâra-
Jâbi-Nâyakanavaru â-kaḷatanavanu bêdisi nija-nispatti mâḍi â-Satyapana mêle horisi râjêśrî-dore-
gaḷige â-Satyappana vapasalâgi adanu vichâraṇe mâḍi kêḷalike â-Satyappana maga râjêśrî-daṇigaḷa
rastina haṇa kadukoṇḍu hôgi tanna śûḷige vaḍive vasta mâḍi (IV a) koṭa ayibu sikalâgi yî-tapu â-
Satyappana mêle yî-kaḷavu hottitu yendu nâvu dharmavannu kaṇṇu-kâṇade baḍavara saṅgaḍa daṇḍa
tegadukoṇḍivi yendu yî-rokavanu Satyappana mêle tîrisikoḷi yendu râjêśrî-daṇigaḷige gauḍa-śânabôgaru
mûvatu-mûru-haḷi-svastivânaru samasta-daivada .... dharma hêḷalâgi â-Satyappana râjêśrîgaḷu
kêḷalâgi svâmi nanagênu âdhâra yillav endu tanna Bâṇarâvi-sîme mûvatu-mûru-haḷi
akasâlike-pottadârike-svâstiyoḷage arda-pâlu svâsti koṭṭên endu âḍal âgi râjêśrîgaḷu gauḍa-śânabôgaru
hanneraḍu-mandi âyagâru samasta-daiva-sanmatadinda Kembâvi-Yîraṇṇa-Appaṇṇanavarige akasâ-
[page 166]like-pottadârike-svâstiyanu kotu yidanu Bâṇarâvi-kasabê-grâmânugrâmagaḷa âya beḷisi mede hore so-
(IV b) pe âḷitti-kâḷu haḷigaḷavaḷage yidanta mânyagaḷu Âvinamaḍavinakere hindaḷa mânyada gade
yishṭu-svâstiyannu sarva-daiva-sanmatadinda koṭṭu yidanu â-chandrârkavâgi anubavisikonḍu aṇṇa-
tammagaḷa hâge vûṭa mâḍikoṇḍu bahudu namma vaṃsha nintare yivaru vûṭa-mâḍuvadu yivara
vaṃsha nintare nâvu vûṭa-mâḍuvadu yendu barasi-koṭa patravu yî-haṇavanu Kembâvi-Yîrappa-
Appaṇṇanavaru koṭu yidaru yivaribar allade matu yivara vamshada aṇṇa-tammagaḷige yî-svâsti
kâraṇa yillavu yidake sâkshigaḷu (names of witnesses) râja-râjêśrî-Maruḷe-arasugaḷu pâlisi daya-
mâḍi-koṭanta svâsti â-chandrârkavâgi anubavisi vûṭa-mâḍikoṇḍu-bahudu (VI a) yidu barada
kasibe Bâṇarâvi-sîme mûvatu-mûru-haḷi gauḍa-śânabôgaru hanneraḍu-mandi âyagâraru bara-
ballidaru samasta-daivadavara sarvara-sanmatadind âta Bâṇarâvi-sîme śânabôga Lakshmapati-
suhasta-barahavu Satyappana vapitavu chalavâdi Giriyappa mâdigara sâkshigaḷu (named).

Notes
↑1. * The orthography of this in the original is very bad.

31 On a copper plate belonging to the same temple.


śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ | svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Sâlivâhana-śaka-varsha 1309 Kshaya-saṃvatsa-
rada Kârtika-suddha-pâḍyadalu śrî-Vîrabhûpati-Voḍeyaru Jaṭâṅgî-Râmai-dêvarige amṛitapaḍi-aṅga-
raṅga-bhôgakke koṭṭa-dharmma-śâsana â-Râmai-dêvarige namma aramaneyalu koḍuva-kaṭalege â-
Râmai-dêvara sannidhiyalu hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvvakav âgi dhâreyan eradu samarpisi-koṭṭadu
(here follow details) antu Pratâpa-gadyâṇa 400 kkaṃ Jîyarahaḷiyanu Jaṭâṅgi-Râmayi-dêvarige amṛita-
paḍi-aṅga-raṅga-vaibôgakke dhâreyan eradu koṭṭevâgî î-Jiyarahaḷiya chatus-sîmeya uḷaguḷa nidhi-
nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshîṇi-âgâmi-siddha-sâdhyaṅgaḷ emba ashṭa-bhôgavanu â-chandrârka-sthâyi-
gaḷ âgi sukhadim bhôgisûdu sthâna-mânya-pûrva-mariyâdeyandu koṭṭa-dharmma-śâsana | śâsanada

EC 11 Mk 32
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Mk032

32 On another copper plate belonging to the same temple.


śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ | svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varshaṅgaḷu sâvirada munnûra
aivatt-âraneya Ânanda-saṃvatsara-Âśvayuja-bahuḷa-daśamiyalu śrîmatu Dêvarâya-mahârâyaru Jaṭâṅ-
gi-Râmaya-dêvarige poḍavaṭṭu koṭṭa-dharmma-śâsana Râyaru Mâchanahaḷiya bêṭege bijeyamâḍi
chittayisidalli Râmaya-dêvara daruśanake chittayisiddalli â-Râmaya-dêvarige prâku Râyadurga-châva-
ḍiyim prâku saluva-amṛitapaḍiya kaṭṭaleya â-dêvastânake saluva ippattu-varahana huṭṭuvaḷi ondu
grâmavanu koḍahêḷi sammukhada niruûpadim Arasappagaḷa appaṇeyim â-Jaṭâṅgi-Râmaya-dêvarige
prâku saluva-amṛitapaḍiya kaṭṭelege Ânanda-saṃvatsarada Âshâḍha-śuddha-pâḍya-ârabhyavâgi koṭṭa-
du Vîraṇṇana guttage-mâḍuttâyidda Hâveda-nâḍa Saṅgebôvana kâluveya kôru suvarnnâdâya sâmya
saha â-kâluveya chatus-sîmege saluva nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshîṇi-âgâmi-siddha-sâdhyagaḷ
emba ashṭa-bhôga-têjas-svâmya-sarvvôtpatya-samasta-bali-sahitavâgi â-chandrârkka-sthâyigaḷâgi
sukhadim bhôgisuvadu yandu koṭṭa-dharma-śâsana | (usual final phrases) śrî-Virûpâksha

EC 11 Mk 33
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Mk033

33 On a rock behind the Bhôgêśvara temple on the same hill.


svasti Sakha-varshaṃ 963 Vishu-saṃvatsarada ...... mâsada Bṛihaspativâraṃ chaturddasiy-utta-
râyaṇa-saṅkrânti ...... aṅka Mallarasaṃ Râmêsvara-dêvargg âgi ............ sarvvamânyam âgi
dhârâ-pûrvvaka koṭṭa .......drârkkaṃ salvudu (usual imprecation).

râjyada 10 neya Vikrama-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-suddha 1 Sômavâra-sûryya-grahaṇadandu Luṅkeya
kôṭeyalu sukhadiṃ râjyaṃ geyivuttam irddu śrî-Luṅkêśvara-dêvar-aṅga-bhôga-nivêdya-jîrṇṇôddhâ-

EC 11 Cl 21

21 At Ôbaḷâpura (same hobli), on a stone to the south of the Siddha-Râmêśvara temple.


svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛitvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ ¿paramêsvarṃ? ⟨paramêsvaraṃ⟩ parama-bhaṭṭâ-
rakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-pratâpa-chakravartti Jagadêkamalla-
Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târam-baraṃ sukha-saṅ-
kathâ-vinôdadiṃ Kalyâṇada-nelavîḍinoḷu râjyaṃ geyvutam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ svasti sama-
dhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaran Or̤eyûr-ppura-varâdhîśvara nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mâr-
ttaṇḍa nuḍidante-gaṇḍa dînânâtha-vandi-bṛinda-santarppaṇa maṇḍaḷika-mukha-darppaṇa ripu-maṇḍa-
ḷika-kudhara-sañchûrṇṇita-vajra-bâhu-daṇḍa nara-lôka-gaṇḍara gaṇḍa bahu-kaḷâ-pariṇata-Chatur-
mmukha ↓1samastayka-Śaṇmukha bhaya-lôbha-durllabha jayâṅganâ-vallabha Mandara-dhairyyan
apratihata-sauryya chatu-śashṭi-maṇḍaḷika-śiras-khaṇḍana nija-râjya-lakshmî-mukha-maṇḍana Hara-
charaṇa-kamaḷa-bhṛiṅga sâhasôttuṅga Gôvindara-Dêvan-aṅka-kâr̤a raṇa-raṅga-nîr̤a Roddada gôva
khargga-Sahadêva nigaḷaṅka-malla bhîtaraṃ kolla mar̤ev-uge-kâva baṇṭara bâva nâmâdi-samasta-
prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaran Iruṅgoḷa-Chôḷa-mahârâjara putra svasti samadhigata-
pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaran Or̤eyûr-ppura-varâdhîśvara ripu-maṇḍaḷika-sarabha-bhê-
ruṇḍan ahitara gaṇḍa sishṭêshṭa-janâbhîshṭa-phaḷa-pradâyaka jaya-lakshmî-Kusumasâyakan êkâṅga-
vîra Madanâvatâra ripu-kuḷa-kuruṅga-kaṇṭhîrava raṇa-raṅga-Bhairava daśa-diśâ-praśâḷa-varttita-kîrtti
subha-lakshaṇa-lakshita-mûrtti saṅgrâma-Râma vairi-sâmâja-Bhîma ari-maṇḍaḷika-jîmûta-nirgghâta-
vâta lôka-vikhyâta-śatru-maṇḍaḷika-pannega-Vainatêya sauch-Añjanêya Siva-charaṇa-kamaḷa-saṭchara-
ṇa mahimey-âbharaṇa śrîmad-Iruṅgoḷa-Dêvana siṅga sakaḷa-guṇa-tuṅga Roddada gôva khargga-Saha-
dêva nigaḷaṅka-malla bhîtaraṃ kolla mar̤ev-uge-kâvan ar̤uvattu-nâlvar-mmaṇḍaḷikara tale-goṇḍa-
gaṇḍa nara-lôka-gaṇḍara gaṇḍan Immaḍi-baṇṭara-bâva nâmâdi-samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-
mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Vîra-Noṇamba-Jagadêkamalla-Malla-Dêva-Chôḷa-mahârâjaru Rodda-nâḍu Sire-
nâḍu Har̤uve-nâḍu Kaṇiyakalu-nâḍ initumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷanaṃ mâḍi sukha-saṅ-
kathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyvuttav iddu śrîmach-Châḷukya-chakravartti-Jagadêkamalla-varshada 10
neya Prabhava-saṃvatsarada Chaitrad-amavâsyey-Âdityavâra-sûryya-grahaṇadandu Sire-nâḍ-oḷagaṇa
Sirivoḷala śrî-Râma-dêvara pratishṭey-appa śrî-Râmêśvara-dêvar-aṅga-bhô-(back)-ga-↓2raṅga-sphuṭita-
[page 173]jîrṇṇôddhârakkaṃ snâna-nivêdyakkaṃ tapôdhanar-âhâra-dânakkaṃ Udyôga-Râma-paṇḍitara kâlaṃ
karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi sarvva-namaśyavâgiy â-Sirivoḷala kereya keḷage modal-gâla garddeya
hanneraḍu khaṇḍugada bayalu â-ker̤eyiṃ mûḍa-voladal irppatta-nâlku-mattaru-keyyamaṃ biṭṭar
adara sîme (here follow details of boundaries and further gift).

svasti śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Jagadêkamalla-Malli-Dêva-Chôḷa-mahârâjara piriy-arasi Balli-
Dêviyaru Sirivoḷala-ker̤eyan âḷutta ker̤eya kibbayala śrî-Kali-dêvarige snâna-nivêdyakkaṃ Têjôrâsi-
paṇḍitara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa gardde dêvara munde khaṇḍugav eraḍu
dêvariṃ paḍuval âr̤u-mattaru keyya biṭṭar (usual final phrases and verse) Oḍager̤eyiṃ mûḍa tôṇṭa
mattar ondu ǁ svasti samasta-guṇa-gaṇâḷaṅkṛita Śiva-charaṇa-kamaḷa-bhṛiṅganuṃ chatus-samaya-
samuddharaṇanum âhârâbhaya-bhaiśajya-śâstra-dâna-vinôdanuṃ śrî-Râmêśvara-dêvara pâdârâdhaka-
num appa śrîmad-Araha .... ṭṭeya Bîchi-Seṭṭigaṃ Chavuḍakabbegaṃ puṭṭida su-putraṃ ......Mâchi-
Seṭṭi śrî-Râmêśvara-dêvara Vishṇu-dêvargge jîrṇṇôddhâra ...... mâḍisi parivâra-dêvaraṃ mâḍisida
maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî

Notes
↑1. * So in the original.
↑2. * So in the original.

yaran Nol̤ambaḷge-sâsiramun Nirggunda-nâḍu-mû-nûr̤uman âḷe âtana priya-patni Gavagaṇabbe

svaṃ dâtuṃ su-mahach chhakyaṃ puṇyam anyasya pâlanaṃ |

38 At the same village, on a copper plate in possession of Veṅkaṭarâma-Sâstri.


śrî Sârvâḍêśâ ǁ namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-saka-varushaṅgaḷu 1660 neya Kâḷayukti-nâma-saṃvatsarada
Mâgha-śu 15 Sômavâra-puṇya-kâladalu Âpastamba-sûtra-Âtrêya-gôtrôdbhavar âda śrîman-mahâ-
nâyakâchâryarâda Harati-Niḍagalu-Yimmaḍi-Hoṭeṇṇa-Nâyakaraiyanavara prapautrar âda vîra-
Hoṭeṇṇa-Nâyakaraiyanavara pautrarâda vîra-Timmaṇṇa-Nâyakaraiyanavara putrar âda Harati-Niḍa-
galu-Hoṭeṇṇa-Nâyakaraiyanavaru Âpastamba-sutrar âda Yaju-śâkhâdhyâyigaḷ âda Haritasa-gôtrôd-
bhavar âda Ayyaṇâvadhânigaḷa prapautrar âda Yallâvadhânigaḷa pautrar âda Veṅgâvadhânigaḷa putrar
âda Apâvadhânigaḷavarige sûrya-sômôparâga-puṇya-kâladalu namma mâtâ-pitṛigaḷige ananta-sukṛita
akshaya-puṇya-lôka prâptav âgabêk endu sa-hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvakavâgi koṭanthâ agrahâr-
ada dâna-śâsanada kramav ent endare namma Niḍagalu-durgake saluvantâ Maṅgaḷavâḍada grâmada
hôbaḷiyalu Buḍusugoṇḍanahaḷiy emba grâmavannu agrahâra mâḍi sarvamânya ǁ

I.
vâpî-kûpa-taṭâkâdyaṃ kâñchanâdi-samanvitaṃ |
putra-pautraâdibhir bhôgyaṃ kramâd â-chandra-târakaṃ ǁ
nidhi-nikshêpa-pâshâṇa-siddha-sâdhya-jalânvitaṃ |
akshîṇy-âgâmibhir yuktaṃ êka-bhôgya-sabhûruhaṃ ǁ

yamba dharma-śâstra-prakâradali namma mâtâ-pitṛigaḷige puṇyavâgi namma kulada svâmi Sârvâḍ-
êśvarage arpitavâgi namma kulada svâmi Vêṅkaṭêśvarage arpitvâgi koṭanthâ dâna agrahâradali
nimma putra-pautra-pâramparyadalu nimma sva-vṛittiyalu â-chandrârka-sthâyigaḷâgi namage âśîrv-
âda-mâḍikoṇḍu sukhadali anubhavsi-koṇḍu yihadu yandu baraśi-koṭa dâna-śâsana sahi (usual final
verses) Harihara-bhakta↓1

Notes
↑1. * Written in the seal.

43 At Mahadêvapura (same hobli), on a stone in the eastern wall of the Vîrabhadra temple.


svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêsvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭ-
ârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivṛi[ddhi-prrvar]ttamânam â-chandrârkka-târam-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpa-
jîvi svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Or̤eyûra-pura-varâdhîśvara Kali-
kâla-....Chôḷa-kuḷâmbara-[dyumaṇi] saṃyakta-chûḍâmaṇi kadana-prachaṇ ḍan udaya-mârttaṇḍaṃ Tu-
hinakara-vaṃśôdbhavaṃ taruṇa-kâminî-jana-Manôbhavâ Karṇâṭî-karṇṇa-ratna-mêkhaḷâḷaṅkâra Sa-
rasvatî-maṇi-hâra vibudha-jana-mitra Kâśyapa-gôtra Roddada gôva khaḷga-Sahadêva nigaḷaṅka-malla
bhîtaraṃ kolla svasti śrîmat-Sarvvadhâri-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-suddha 5 Bṛihaspativâradandu śrî-
man-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Tribhuvanamalla-Mali-Dêva-Chôḷa-mahârâjaru bhaṇḍâri-Kêtaṇage Maṅ-
gapôṭiyalu mûḷiga-vṛittiyâgi koṭṭa-kramav ent endaḍe Maṅgapôṭiya ker̤eya keḷage khaṇḍuga hanneraḍu
tôṭa-sthala khaṇḍugaṃ mûr̤u Râ.. ralu khaṇḍugav eraḍu Hanni-mattara keyi Iṇḍikeya gaddey appuda-
nu bhaṇḍâri-Kêtaṇana makkaḷu-makkaḷu-taradal umbantâgi sarvva-bâdhâ-parihârav âgi ây-agrahârada
Brâhmaṇa-vṛittiy-oḷagaṇa vṛittiy-âgi koṭive î-vṛittiyan â-chandrârkka-târam-bara bhaṇḍâri-Kêtaṇa[na]
makkaḷu-makkaḷu-tara[da]l umbanu (usual final phrases) dêvarige biṭṭa gadde khaṇḍugav eraḍu tôṭa-
staḷad kamba nûr̤ur̤alu khaṇḍu ondu nâlku mattaru kayi-gâṅadali ondu ǁ

svasti śrî.... jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśaṅgaḷu sâ 1468 neya Parâbhava-saṃvachharada

pṛithvî-râjyaṃ gaiüttiralu śrî .......... kumâra-Nâyaka ........ lli râjya ...... Kâmasamudra

EC 11 Cl 47

EC 11 Cl 54
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Cl054

54 At Matsyasamudra (same hobli), on a stone lying in the Bîrêdêvara-gudra.


śubham astu | namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1481 neya Siddhârtthi-saṃvatsarada nija-
Âśvîja-śu 10 lû śrîmatu Hêmâdri-mahâ-Mêruvina dakshiṇa-dig-bhâga Jambudvîpa-laksha-ipataidu-
sâvira-yôjanada madhyad â-Kuntaḷa-dêśâdhipatyake saluva Tuṅgabhadrâ-tîradiṃ Pampâ-pati srî-
Virûpâkshana nirûpadiṃ Vidyâraṇyara nâmadhêyadiṃ Harihara-Râyaru kaṭṭisi pra .... yâgi ninta
Vidyânagarî-siṃhâsanake karttar âda śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-
Sadâsiva-Dêva-mahârâyaru sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ dharmma-pratipâlaneiṃ sukha-râjyaṃ geiutt-
iralu śrîmanu-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvar Râma-Râju Tirumalarâjai-Dêva-mahâ-arasugaḷa kâryyake karttar
âda śrîman-mahâ-.. kshaṇa-gaṇa-prajeg adhîśar âda | Mukkaṇa-mûrtiyoḷu sâlôkya-saurûpya Aṅga-Vaṅ-
ga-dêśada arasugaḷa koḷâhaḷa Nâga-lôka-Nâga-kannikâ-sahôdara bilu-vidyâ-prachaṇḍa kaḍu-vêṇṭe-kâra
kapaṭav-ilada Bêḍa Tiruvâḷa-giri-dêva . nâdya-nilaya Sivarâtrê-sthira-santôshi munnûra-aivatu-gôtrada
eṇṭu-nûra-aivatu manneyar âda...pavakki...niṃ raṇa-kaṭhâri-râya chaluvara gaṇḍa mare-hokara kâva
mârântara koluva bhâshege-tappuva-nâyakara gaṇḍa Kôṭekereya Abbeya-Nâyaka-Bomme-Nâyakara-
vaṃśôdbhavar âda Haratiya-Hiriyoḍeyara Chikapa-Nâyakara komâra Hoṭeṇṇa-Nâyakaru Kâśyapa-gô-
trada Bôdhâyana-sûtrada Yaju-śâkheya Hampeya śrî-Virûpâksha-dêvara stânâpati Liṅgappaygaḷa mak-
kaḷu Veṅkaṭayyage śrî-Virûpâksha-dêvara nitya-naivêdya-nandâ-dîptigâgi koṭṭa bhû-dânada grâma-śîlâ-
[page 178]śâsanada kramav ent endare śrîmanu-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara Râma-Râju-Tirumalarâjai-Dêva-mahâ-
arasugaḷu namage amara-mâgaṇige pâlisida Râyadurgada râjyada Kêṭeker̤eya vêṇṭeyake saluva
Doḍêri-sîmeya Madvasamudrada staḷada Chaṭiyakambhad-oḷagaṇa Chitagoṇḍanahaḷḷiya grâmavanû
sadya-parichchhêdavâgi śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya Haratiya Hoṭṭaṇa-Nâyakaru Kâsyapa-gôtrada
Bôdhâyana-sûtrada Yajuś-śâkheya Hampeya śrî-Virû[pâ]ksha-dêvara stânâpati Liṅgapagaḷa makaḷu
Veṅkaṭâdrige śrî-Virûpâksha-liṅgana nayivêdya-nandâ-dîptige adhika-Âśvîja-śu 15 sômôparâga-puṇya-
kâladalû Tuṅgabhadrâ-tîradalu sa-hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvvakav âgi dhâreyan eradu
koṭṭevâgi â-Chittagoṇḍanahaḷiya grâmake saluva chatus-sîmeya voḷagâda grihârâma-kshêtra-nidhi-
nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshîṇi-âgâmi-siddha-sâdhyaṅgaḷ emba ashṭa-bhôga-têja-svâmya-sarvvôtpatti-
samasta-baḷi-sahitavâgi (here follow particulars of donee, as above) śrî-Virûpâksha-dêvar̤ige naivêdya-nan-
dâ-dîptigâgi śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya Haratiya Hoṭaṇa-Nâyakarû tri-vâchaü dhâreyan eradu
koṭevâgi nîü nimma putra-pautra-pârampareyâgi â-chandrârkka-sthâyigaḷâgi sukhadallû anubhavi-
suüdu endu hâkisida naivêdya-nandâ-dîptiya dharmma-silâ-śâsana (usual final verses).

EC 11 Hr 1
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hr001

1 At Aimaṅgaḷa, (Aimaṅgaḷa-hobli), on a vîrakal in front of the Kambhada-dêva temple in the old fort.


svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda Pallavânvaya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha Pallava-kula-tilaka êka-
vâkyam Ir̤iva-Nol̤amba śrîmad-Ulipayyana maga Nanni-Noḷambana biṭṭa Brahma-dêyam Ayyapa-
maṅgala Sippasintey arddha-baḷadoḷ bâḷuttire svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâman-
tâdhipati śrîmat-Pañchâla-Dêvana perggeḍe Guṇḍayyaṃ Paduvagarey-aynûr̤ar̤a bhôga-pati Ayyapa-
maṅgaḷamaṃ pûrvva-maryyâde dappi akramaṃ geyye svasti Śaka-nṛipa-kâlâtîta-saṃvatsarada
śataṅgaḷ eṇtu-nûra tombhattêl̤aneya Yuva-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-mâsada suddhaikâdaśî-Sôma-
vâradandu Śrîvatsa-gôtraṃ yûr-oḍeya Mâramayyana maga Êchayyan ir̤idu koṇḍu perggaḍe
Guṇḍayyaṅge kshame-goṭṭa stitiy ent endoḍe Ayyapamaṅgaḷada pûrvva-maryyâdeya baḷanaṃ biṭṭu
koṭṭaṃ

EC 11 Hr 3
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hr003

avara bâyoḷige .............. yidu virakta-maṭhave yandu Aimaṅgalada gauḍa-sênabôva-nâyaka
pârapatyagâra maṭha mane jaṅgama-dêvaru seṭṭi mahâ-nâḍu-praje-muntâdavara madhyadali shaḍ-
aṅga-liṅga-samyôgânubhâva-chatuḥ-patra-kañjântarâḷâtta liṅga-nistaraṅga-yukta mahânubhâva-

EC 11 Hr 6
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hr006

6 At Hemaḍâḷu, (same hobli), on a stone in the Basavaṇṇa temple.


śrîmad-râjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa-śrî-vîra-Veṅkaṭapati-Dêva-mahârâyaru sukha-
dim pṛithvî-saṃrâjya gaiüttiha-samayadalu Śâlivâhana-saka-varusha 1514 neya Nandana-saṃ-
vatsarada adhika-Âshâḍha-śu 1 lu śrîmaṃ maha-pürvâchârya râya-dûshakara gaṇḍa mânava-
Mahâdêva śrî-Śâravâḍa Yîśvaraiyagaḷu | â-Yîśvaraiyagaḷa komâra Chenna-Dûḷêśvaraiyagaḷu | â-
Dûḷêśvaraiyagaḷa komâra Chenna-Hoṭṭêśvaraiyagaḷu | â-Hoṭṭêśvaraiyagaḷa komâra Chenna-Basavêśva-
raiyagaḷu â-Basavêśvaraiyagaḷa komâra Chenna-Keñchêśvaraiyagaḷu â-Keñchêśvaraiyagaḷa komâra
Chenna-Yimmaḍi-Basavaṇṇoḍeyara komâru Chenna-Keñcha-Alamboḍeyaru yâ-Alaṇṇoḍeyara komâra
Keñcha-Yisarappa-voḍeyaru â-Keñcha-Yisarappa-voḍeyara komâra Chenna-Hoṭṭe-Yîśvaraiyagaḷa śish-
yaru makkaḷu | śrîman-mahâ-nâyaṅkâchâriya bhâshege-tappuva-nâyakara gaṇḍa | mare-hokkara kâva |
Kôṭekereya Kibbana Kâmi-Nâyakara komârru Abi-Nâyakaru komâra Kâmi-Nâyakaru | â-Kâmi-
Nâyakara komâra Guḍḍada Brahma-Nâyakaru | â-Brahma-Nâyakara komâra Hoṭṭeṇṇa-Nâyakaru â-
Hoṭṭeṇṇa-Nâyakara komâra Yimmaḍi Bîraṇṇa-Nâyaka Yimmaḍi-Brîraṇṇa-Nâyakara komâra Yîśvara-
Dêvi-Nâyakaru â-Yîsvara-Dêvi-Nâyakara komâra Basavi-Nâyakaru â-Basavi-Nâyakara komâraru
Mummaḍi-Brahma-Nâyakaru | â-Mummaḍi-Brahma-Nâyakara komâra dore Haratiya Yîśvara-Dûḷ-
appa-Nâyaka â-Dûḷappa-Nâyakara komârru Duṇḍapa-Nâyakaru â-Duṇḍappa-Nâyakara komâru
[page 180]Lakshmîpati-Nâyakaru | yî-Lakshmîpati-Nâyaka-komâra Haratiya Chikka-Raṅgappa-Nâyakaru |
tamma śrî-guru Hoṭṭe-Yîśvaraiyagaḷa simhâsanada maṭakke amṛita-bhôgapaḍige salabêkendu nâvu
namma tri-karaṇa-śuddhavâgi dhârâ-pûrvakadinda koṭṭa dâna-paṭṭeya kramav ent endare | namma
nâyakatanakke saluva Râyadurgada vêṇṭeyake saluva Haratiya-sthaḷadoḷagaṇa Hemmaḍihâḷ emba
grâmavannu Hoṭe-Îśvaraiyagaḷa śrîpâdaṅgaḷige dharmma śâsanavâgi arpisidevu â-Hemmaḍihâḷa-
grâmada chatus-sîmeyoḷagâda kere kôṭe kaṭṭê kâluve erekavaru goḍugeyalu aṇe achchukaṭṭu kâḍâr-
ambha bîḷaḍavi taru tṛina modalâgi â-grâmadali yiha dâya-aḷuü-âyâya.... trike-nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-
pâshâṇa-yakshîṇi-âgami-siddha-sâdhyaṅgaḷ emba ashṭa-bhôga-têjas-svâmyav-oḷagâgi â-Hemmaḍihâḷa
grâmavanu tamma śrî-va.... â-Hoṭe-Îśvarayagaḷa pâdakke ...... arpisidevu | yî-dharma śâsanada
puravargakke tamma vaṃśadali âvan obban âdaru pararu âvan obbanâdaru âgali â-Hemmaḍihâḷ
emba purada grâmadali adara sîmeyalli âvadu-gondakke aḷupi .... (usual imprecatory phrases) int
appu dharma-śâsanakke pûrvadalli uṇṭâda granthârthadalli anukûlisidantha su-kṛityavanu apahari-
sida pâtakavanu â-ślôkada arthavanu vichârisikoṇḍu naḍisuvudu (usual final verses)..............

svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâ ...... ka-varuśa 1365 neya Dundubhi-saṃvatsarada Asvîja-su
14 A śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-pâramêsvara ari-râya-vibhâḍha chatus-samudrâdhipati śrî-vîra-
Bukka-Râyana kumâra Harihara-Râyaru Vijayanagarada paṭṭaṇadoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-prasaṅgadiṃ
râjyaṃ geyuttidali śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya mar̤e-vokkara kâva bhâsege-tappuva-nâyakara
gaṇḍa Koḍakeya Âdeya-Nâykara makkaḷu Kâmeya-Nâykaru Bommeya-Nâyakaru avara heggaḍe
.. yaṇṇaṅgaḷu Aṅkasamudra-nâḍa stiravâgi ...... tamma Haratige ................saṃvâdav âdali
yî...yarugaḷ ar̤itu nâlku dêsada chaügâtiyava ...... Haratiya .... goṇḍu ............ goṇḍa
heṇḍeya hottu naḍada sâsana maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî śrî yî-sâsanava barada Mâyôja â-Chavuḍa-
gaṭṭada gaüḍage koḍasidake .... Bala-gaüḍa ....

EC 11 Hr 16

[page 181]16 At Yarabahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in Bhûtapurada Giriyaṇṇa’s field.


śrîmatu Krôdhana-saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapada-su 10 Â-dandu | śrîmutu pratâpa-chakravartti Hôśaṇa-
śrî-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvarsara śrîmanu-mahâ-pradhânaṃ Bêbeya-daṇṇâykaru Karaḍiker̤eya Peruma-
gaüḍana magaṃ Nâgeya-nâykaṅge koṭṭa nettaru-goḍagiya kramav ent endaḍe Kambala-Dêvanu
Huḷi-er̤an ir̤idu hôhali Bêbeya-daṇṇâ[ya]karu huyelâ bandudaṃ Moḷala-munde kâdidali â-Nâge [ya-nâ]-
ykana tamma Jakkeya-Nâykanu â-kâḷadali kâdi sameya-mâḍi bidan âgi Nâgeya-nâykaṅge koṭṭa
nettaru-koḍagi (here follow details) chandra-sûrir uḷḷannakaṃ (usual imprecatory phrases).

EC 11 Hr 18
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hr018

18 At the same village, on a stone in Maṭhada Prabhayya’s field.


Vibhava-saṃvatsarada Jêshṭa-śu 1 Maṃ śrîmanu-mahârâja Ballâḷa-Râya sukha-râjya geyvalli śrîmanu-
mahâ-pradhânaṃ Bêbeya-daṇṇâykara besadiṃ Alatoṭiya Kanneya-Nâyakanu Tavanidhiya Nâga-gav-
uḍaṅge Keṇḍanaker̤eya chatus-sîme-voḷagâgi koṭṭa sarbba-koḍagi maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî

EC 11 Hr 19
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hr019

EC 11 Hr 22
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hr022

22 At Uppârahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in Patel Raṅgaṇṇa’s field.


śubham astu | svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varushaṅgaḷu 1476 ne Ânanda-saṃvatsarada
nija-Âshâḍha-śu 12 Gu lu | śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa-Sadâśiva-Râya-
mahârâyaru Vidyânagaradalu pṛithvî-râjyaṃ gaiyuttaṃ yiralu Ambaliger̤eya śrî-Tiruveṅgaḷanâtha-
dêvarige Kâśyapa-gôtrada Âpastamba-sûtrada Yajuś-śâkhegaḷâda śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara a-
prati(ka)malla Sûrya-vamśâdhîśvarar âda Manubôla-Aübhaḷa-Râjagaḷa pautraru Veṅgaḷa-Râjagaḷa put-
raru Pâpai-Dêva-Chôḷa-mahâ-arasugaḷu śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara Râma-Râju-Viṭhalai-Dêva-mahâ-
arasugaḷa komâraru Tirumala-Râjagaḷu tamage vumbaḷiyâgi nilisida Râyadurgada râjyada Gôsiker̤eya-
nâḍoḷagaṇa Haratti-staḷakke saluva Uparikarahaḷḷige prati-nâmavâda Veṅgaḷâpurav emba grâmava-
nu tamma tandegu Veṅgaḷa-Râjagaḷige puṇyav âgalendu â-grâmake saluva chatus-sîmevoḷagaṇa
ashṭa-bhôga-têjas-svâmyavanu | â-grâmada sthaḷa-suṅkavanu | â-grâmada hulu-banni rokkava sahav
âgi dhâren er̤adu â-chandrârka-sthâyi âgi .......... hâge Ambaliger̤eya ûra Tiruveṅgaḷanâtha-
dêvarige Veṅgaḷâpurada grâmavanu samarpisteü ǁ (usual final verse).

EC 11 Hr 36
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hr036

[page 184]36 At Kaṇḍênahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a copper plate in possession of Paṭeḷ Dâśe-Gauḍa’s son Gaṅgê-Gauḍa.


Chenna-Kêśava-râyana vapita ǁ śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchârya Harati-Aaimaṅgaḷa-Tippaḷa-Nâykâchâr-
yaru svasti vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śakha-varushambalu ↓11439 Vijaya-saṃ ǁ rada Pushya-ba
10 llu Dharmapurada sammatu mavuje Kaṇḍehaḷi Bâlana-gavuḍage barasi-koṭṭa dâna-śâsanada
nirûpa Kaṇḍehaḷi-grâmada nâlku niṭu kôṭe ga 250 .. yinnûru-aivatu-varahada varigu lâguvaḍu
muṭisi iruvadarinda kâmagâr̤i ninna mârîphatu mâḍida Vaḍḍara-Irana-bôyige kaḍaga sa 1 sarapaṇi
sa 1 chiṭapâgu 1 papuḷḷi-achchaḍa 1 saha inâmu koṭṭu î-grâmada-paṇikaṭṭu âyagâru śânabôga
Paṭaraṅgapa taḷavâra Vôbâ bêgâra Dâsa Timma âyagâru saha namma mokta nînu bandu
namma staḷadalli ar̤ike mâḍikoṇḍu (back) namma appaṇê-prakârakke mar̤iyâdi saha naḍasi iruva-
dakke sadari-grâmada staḷada gavuḍakeyannu ninage nêmisi śâsana-nirûpa apaṇe-koḍisi iditu idakke
yâru drôhakke biddarê Kâsiyalli gô-hatya mâḍi .... nûru-mandi Brâhmarige visha hâkidaṅge avara
tâyi tandege visha hâkidaṅge sar̤i | î-Kaṇḍehaḷḷi-grâmada staḷada gavuḍike Noṇabara Bâlana-
gavuḍana vaṃsha-parampariyavâgi taḷavâru-bêgâru-vagaire ninna makkaḷâgi naḍasikoṇḍu anubha-
visuvadê sar̤i | yidakke (here follow names of witnesses).

Notes
↑1. * Śaka 1439 = Dhâtu ; Vijaya = 1456.

EC 11 Hr 39
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hr039

39 At Sûgûru (same hobli), on a copper plate in possession of Paṭêl Rudrê-Gauḍa.


śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya Harati-Aimaṅgaḷa-Tipaḷa-Nâyakâchâryaru svasti śrî vijaya-Śâlivâhana-
śakha-varushambulu ↓11235 nê Plavaṅga-saṃ[vacha]rada Kârtika-ba 5 llu Guḍḍada-nâḍinoḷagaṇa Sûg-
uru-Doḍḍa-Dâmana-gavu[ḍa]ge baraśi-koṭṭa dâna-śâsana-nirûpa | Sûgûru-Kôṭe nâlku niṭṭu ga 200 (σ) 0
akshâradalu yiṇnûru-varaha lâguvaḍu muṭiśi kaṭṭiśidarindâlû kâvagâri ninna mârîpatu mâḍida Vaḍa-
na Yîrana-bôyige hûvina-hachaḍa 1 chiṭapâgu 1 ........ beḷḷi-kaḍaga sa 1 sarapaṇi sa 1 saha yinâmu
goṭṭu yî-(grâmada) paṇikaṭṭu ayigâru syânubôga Doḍa-Saṅgappa taḷavâra Chiga-Bêṭiga bêgâra
...... Vôba vagairê ayigâru saha namma mokkata nînu bandu samustânadalli ............ koṇḍu
namma (appaṇê)-prakârake mariyâdi saha naḍaśi yiruvadakke sadari-grâmada staḷada gavuḍikeyannu
ninige nêmiśi nirûpa appaṇê koḍiśi yi...ku munde yî-grâmada staḷada gavuḍike ninnadu alla yandu
yârâdaru drôhakke biddare Kâśiyili nûru-gô-hatya mâḍidaṅge nûru-mandi-Brâhmarige visha-hâkid-
aṅge (back) avara tâyi-tandige visha-hâkidaṅge yî-nirûpada dâkhale-prakârakke ninnalli śâśvatavâgi
yirutapudu tâmrada śâsanavannu baraśigoṭṭu yidara ......âyagâru-vagaire-hesarugaḷu hâkiśi yinnu
munde vikalpa-mâḍade satya-pramâṇagaḷu baradu yî-nirûpa tâmrada śâsana saha koṭṭu yidheyâgi yî-
Sûgûru-grâmada staḷada gavuḍike Doḍa-Dâmana-gavuḍa nanna vaṃśa-pârampariyâgi taḷavâru-
bêgâru-vagaire ninna makkaḷâgi naḍaśikoṇḍu anubhavisuvade ............ śâsana yî-divasa appaṇê-
koḍśi yidhe ... vandidaru śithilavâdaru yî-tâmbrada śâsana ninnali yiṭakoṇḍu staḷa anubhavisu-
vadu yendu baraśi koṭṭa sâdhana sahi (names of witnesses.)

Notes
↑1. ‡ 1235 = Paridhâvi ; Plavaṅga = 1230.

kâryyake karttarâda Kâmagêti-Timmaṇṇa-Nâyakaru Hiriyûra tammaḍiyarigû dêva-dâya-Bramma-dâ-
yadavarigû sarvvamânyada śâsana nimma dêvastânavanû pûje-mâḍikoṇḍu Er̤adimma-Râjayyage

EC 11 Hr 52
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hr052

52 At Sômêrahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in the front of the Sômêśvara temple.


śrî-Sômanâthâya namaḥ |

I.
namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

[page 186]śrîmad-abhinava-Jambû-dvîpakke paśchima-diśâ-bhâgadal idda Kâreyapaṭṭanav emba mahâ-nagaravanu
daivâdhînadinda śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêsvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa-Harihara-mahârâyaru ir̤i-
dalli â-Kâreyapaṭṭaṇada Pâyaṇṇagaḷa madavaḷige Kâmâyiâ maga Jakka-Dêvagaḷu saha tâyi-makkaḷu
âyivaru bandalli avaranu Kandiker̤eya Bayireya-Nâyakaru koṇḍu bandu pâlisidalli â-Jakka-Dêvagaḷa
kula-svâmi Saürâshtra-Sômeya-dêvara nirûpadinda â-Jakka-Dêvanu Hiriyûra dakshiṇa-diśâbhâgadalli
yiha Medder̤a-haḷav emba nadiyanu Kali-yuga-Saka-varusha 1339 Hêmaḷambi-saṃvatsarada Mârgga-
śira-su 10 Gu-dina taṭâka-pratishṭeyanû mâḍi alli tamma tâyi-tande pâlisida svâmi Bayireya-Nâyaka-
rigeü puṇya-lôka-prâptiy âgabêkendu yî-taṭâkadalli â-Sômêsvara-dêvaru prasannanâgi nelasidanu
â-Jakka-Dêvagaḷa .... Kâmâyigaḷige daivâdhînadinda avasâna-kâlaü .... Plavaṅga-saṃvatsarada
Mâgha-ba 14 | Śu-dina .... dhyânavâgidda Phâlguṇa-śu 4 Gu-dina .... śrî-Sadâsivana sannidhige
sâyujya-padavanu ........ Sômê-Dêvara sannidhiyalu Jakka-Dêvanu âta .... tishṭeyanu mâḍi
Pâlguṇa-su 15 Sô-dina ........ koṭṭa dêva-dâya-Brahma-dâya ...... â-chandrârkkav âgi naḍav ...
(usual final phrases & verse).

maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî

II.
lâvikaś cha varâhaś cha mahishî kuñjaras tathâ |
upadêshṭâ cha dâtâ cha shaḍ êtê svargga-gâminaḥ ǁ

śrî-Sômêsvarana tammaḍi Kêta-jîya

EC 11 Hr 53
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hr053

53 At Gaudanahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone near the village gate.


I.
namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

svasti śrî vijeyâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśaṅgaḷu sâ 1678 neya | Dhâtru-nâma-saṃ | Vayasâkha-
śû 1 Stiravâradallu | Vâlmîki-gôtrada śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya | Kâmagetti-Kastûri-Medakeri-Nâ-
yakara pautrar âda Kastûri-Dugapa-Nâyakara putrar âda Râjâ-Medakeri-Nâyakaravaru ...... vara
hesarallu Hiriyûrallû mâḍisihya anna-chhatrada maṭhake namma hiriyarige puṇya sukr̤itav âgabêk
endu nâv âḷuvanta râjya Hiriyûra-sîmey-oḷagaṇa Gauḍanahaḷi-grâmavanu Sivârpitav âgi koṭu yidhêve
yî-grâmake saluvantâ kâḍârambha-nîrârambha-nidhi-nikshêpa .... âgâmi-jala-pâshâṇa-muntâda
ashṭa-bhôga-têjôpârjaneyannu sûryya-chandrâdigaḷ ihya pariyantara sukadinda anubhavisikoṇḍu
sukadinda yihyadu yandu barasikoṭa dâna-patrâ sahi (usual final verse).

DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hr056

56↓1 At Âdirâḷu (same hobli), on a stone to the south of the Âñjanêya temple.


......... meya .... Śâlivâhana ..... saṃvatsara ......... gaṇḍa mâ ...... yagaḷa komâra .......
.... gaḷa komâra Chennavâḍîśvaraiyagaḷa ..... yagaḷu ...... Chennavâḍîśvaraiyyagaḷu â-Basavê-
śvaraiyyaga ................... ayagaḷa komâra Chenna-Keñchêśvaraiya ...... Chenna ....

ranu ............... mahâ .....................komâ .....................................
Nâyakara komâra ............... komâra .... yakara komâ ...... â-Basavi-Nâyakara........
.. nâyakara komâra Abhaṇṇa-Nâyakaru Abhaṇṇa-Nâyakara komâra........ â-Chennappa-Nâyakara
komâra Yimmaḍi-Keñchappa-Nâyakaru ....... â-Keñchêśvaraiyagaḷa ..... sâsanada ma .......
nâü namma tri-karaṇa .....dhârâ-pûrvakadinda koṭṭa .....kramav ent endare namma nâyakatana-
ke saluva Râyadurgada ...... yake saluva Hiriyûra sîmege saluva va Ta .... staḷad oḷagaṇa
..... emba grâmavanu Keñchayîśvaraiyagaḷa śrîpâda-padma ..... nama .... sideü â Hâdirahâḷa-
grâmada chatu-sîmey-oḷagâda kere kuṇte .... guyyalu-aṇe-achukaṭu-kâḍârambha-bîḷu-aḍavi-truṇa-
modalâda â-grâmadalli suvarṇṇâdâya-suṅka-aḷivu-anyâya-aputrike-nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshîṇi

â-Keñcha-Yîsvaraiya ...... rpisideü yî-dharma-śâsanada .... (usual final phrases & verse) int apa
dharma-sâsana .... granthadali apaharisida pâtakavanu slôkada dharmma vichârisi naḍasuvudu.

(Mostly effaced) śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ .... śrî jayâbhyudaya-Sâlivâhana-śaka-varushambulu ↓11467
agunêṭi Svabhânu-saṃvatsara-Mârgasira-ba 5 .........śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja ...... pratâpa-
śrî-vîra ....... hârâ Vijênagara ........ pṛithvî-râjyaṃ ...... gânu .................. yarulaina śrîmani
mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara ...... nikshê...... śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya Kâmagetti-Hanumi-Nâyaniṅgârik-
.... Kâmagetti-Timma .... yaḍuṅgâru śrîmatê Râmânujâya namaḥ | śrîmad-vêda-mârga-pratishthâ-
panâchâryya parama-haṃsa-parivrâjakâchâryya vêdântâchâryyulaina śrî-Mâlyavantaṃ Râmânuja-
jîyyalu-ayyavâriki Kâmagetti-Hanumi-Nâyaniṅgâri komâruḍu Kâmâgetti-Timmaṇa-Nâyaniṅgâru tam-
mulaina ........ Râjaiya Tirumla-Râjayya ...... puṇyamugânu Uthâna-dvâdasi-puṇya-kâlamandu
Hampâ-Virûpâksha-dêvuni sannidhi .... śrî-Mâlyavantaṃ ........................

EC 11 Hr 76
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hr076

76 On the left side of the same stone.


dînikini śrî nad-vêda-mârga-pratishṭhâpanâchâryya parama-haṃsa-parivrâjakâchâryya vêdântâchâr-
yyulaina śrî-Mâlyavantamu Râmânuja-jîyyalu-ayyavâriki dhâra-pôsi ichchina bhû-dâna-dharma-śâsana-
kramam eṭḷu anenu mâ-nâyaṅkatânaku Sadâsiva-Dêva-mahârâyaluṅgâru pâliñchina Kuntaṇa-dêśamu
Chitrahaḷi-sîmalôni Nandana...sômastaḷamulôni Arakere-grâmamu dhârâ-pûrvakaṅgânu istimi.. śrî-
man-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya Kâmagetti-Hanimi-Nayaniṅgâri komâruḍu Kâmugetti-Timmaṇa .. Nâyani-
gâru tama taṇḍri Hanimi-Nayanigâriki puṇyam ayi .... ṅgânu śrîmad-vêda-mârgga-praṭishthâpanâ-
châryya parama-haṃsa-parivrâjakâchâryya vêdântâchâryyulaina śrî-Mâlyavantamu Râmânuja-jîyyalu-
ayyavâriki tri-vâchakaṅgânu Tuṅgabhadrâ-tîramandu Arakere-grâmamu dhâra-pôsi istimi gâna â-
grâmânanu kaligina nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshîṇi-âgâmi-siddha-sâddhyambulugânu ashṭa-
bhôga-têja-svâmyaṅgânu nîrârambhamu kâḍârambhamu sakala-suvarnna-âdâyamunnu cheruvunu
[page 189]tôṭalanu ...... phala-rukshâlu sahagânu dhâra-pôsi istimi gâna mî-śishya-pâramparyyamuṅgânu â-
chandrârka-sthâyiṅgânu sukhâna anubhaviñchchi sukhâna uṇḍêdi (usual final verse).

I.
namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśa 1491 neya Śukla-saṃvatsarada Śrâvaṇa-ba 10 lu
śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchâryya Ha[ra]tiya Abbaṇa-Nâyaka-ayanavara komâra Keñchappa-Nâyakaru
śrîmân-mahâ-dêvâdhidêva-.... Râmê-dêvarige koṭṭa grâmada śâsanada paṭṭeya kramav ent
endare śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara-Râma-Râja-Tirumala-Râjaya-Dêva-mahâ-arasugaḷavaru namage
amara-mâgaṇike pâlisida Hîriyûra sîmege saluva kaṇuveya keḷagaṇa Kânubheyahaḷḷiya grâmavanu svâ-
miya amṛita-paḍi-nai[vê]dyakke âgabêku yendu namma Abbaṇa-Nâyaka-ayyanavarige puṇyavâgabêku
endu sahiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvvakavâgi koṭṭevâgi â-grâmake saluva chatu-śîmey-oḷagaṇa nidhi-
nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshiṇi-âgâmi (ni)-siddha-sâddhyaṅgaḷ emba ashṭa-bhôga-têja-svâmyavanu
svâmige dhârey eradu koṭṭeü endu koṭṭa dharmma-śâsanada paṭṭe (usual final verse and phrases)

EC 11 Hr 87
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hr087

87 On a stone near the same temple.


śrî-Kallinâtha śaraṇu svasti śrî jayâbhyudayaś cha Śaka-varsha 1235 neya Pramâdîcha-saṃva-
tchharada Kârttika-śuddha 1 Â ǁ svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ
Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhiśvaraṃ Malerâja-râja Maleparoḷu gaṇḍa râya-hulirâya gaṇḍa-bhêruṇḍa nis-
saṅka-pratâpa Hoysaṇa-bhuja-baḷa-śrî-vîra-Nârasiṃhva-Dêvarasara suputra śrî-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvara-
saru Dôrasamudrada nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ prithuvî-râjyaṅ-gaiyyuttam irddalli śrî-
manu-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Voḍeya-Viñjha-Dêva-Râṇeyarige Huḷiyar̤a-nâḍu saṃvaraṇege barad
iddalli śrîmanu-mahâ-Huḷiyar̤a-nâḍa prabhu Hegger̤eya Honna-gauḍana maga Kalla-gauḍana
kainda śrîmanu-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Voḍeya-Râya Viñjha-Dêva-Râṇeyaru srîmanu-mahâ-pradhânaṃ
Addureya Allappa-daṇṇâyakaru śrî-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvarige hodakeyanu mâḍi śrî-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvaru
Huḷiyar̤a-nâḍ-oḷagaṇa Chaḷḷaker̤eyanu Kalla-gauḍaṅge koḍagiyâgi koṭṭu dêvara śrî-hastad oppa râyasa-
nirûpadiṃ aramaneya arasâḷugaḷû Baichaya-sâhaṇiyaru Dêveya-sâhaṇiyaru mund iṭṭu Chaḷḷaker̤ege
naṭṭa kallina chatus-sîmeya kramav ent endaḍe (here follow details of boundaries) int î-chatus-śîmey-
oḷagaṇa-gadde-beddalu-nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshiṇi-âgâmi-ashṭa-bhôga-têja-svâmya-śeśe-sid-
dhâya-aḷiü-anyâya-kir̤ukuḷa-tappu-tauḍi-vol̤agâda-samasta-baḷi-sahitaṃ â-chandrârkka-târam-baraṃ
putra-pautrâdigaḷige saluüdu paṭṭa-baddha-putrôtsâha yêtar̤oḷaṃ kêḍ illade dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi-
koṭṭa koḍagiya śâsana (usual imprecatory phrases and verse) int appudakke śrî-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvara
svahastad oppa śrî-Malaparoḷu-gaṇḍa Viñjha-Dêva-Râneyara sva-hastad oppa srî śaṅkha ǁ Huḷiyaṛa-
nâḍ-oppa srî-Bhîmanâtha-vinaya-nidhâna-Vishṇu-dêvara maga Sôvappana baraha

EC 11 Hr 88
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hr088

88 Copy of copper śâsana in possession of Maskal Shânbhog Sidda-Râmayya.


śrîr astu śôbhanam astu |

I.
namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

svasti śrî viayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śakâbdâḥ varshaṅgaḷige saluva 1510 ne Sarvadhâri-saṃ | rada
Phâlguṇa-śu 3 llu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara śrî-vîra-râja-pratâpa śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêś-
varar âda śrî-vîra-Veṅkaṭapati-Râya-svâmigaḷu Hiriyûra- ¿sthḷada? ⟨sthaḷada⟩ syâ ǁ Tipparasaiya Kare-Vîrayyage
barasi koṭṭa dâna-paṭṭeya kramav ent endoḍe | î-Vîrayyanu namma sêve mâḍalâgi Keñchaṇṇa-Nâyakaru
ivara pûrva-vartamâna ¿binnnahaṃ? ⟨binnahaṃ⟩ mâḍalâgi î-Vîrayya mâḍidantha sêvege mechchi svâsthiya pâlisi-
dantha vivarâ namma râjyada âsthânakke naḍavantha Hiriyûra-sthaḷântaragaḷa vivarâ Hiriyûra-stha-
ḷa 1 kke grâma 53 Bagganaḍuvina sthaḷa 1 kke grâma 11 Hosûru sthaḷa 1 kke grâma 21 Gavuḍana-
haḷḷi sthaḷa 1 kke grâma 10 Kurubarahaḷḷi-sthaḷa 1 kke grâma 13 Lakkihaḷḷi sthaḷa 1 kke grâma 7
Basâpaṭṭaṇada sthaḷa 1 kke 14 Aruḷihaḷḷi sthaḷa 1 kke grâma 7 Tavanidhi sthaḷa 1 kke grâma
12 Bukkâpaṭṇadasth aḷa 1 kke grâma 26 Yikkanûra sthaḷa 1 kke grâma 11 antu staḷa 11 kke grâma
185 kke saluvantha kaṭṭe-keḷage salluva mânyada gaddegaḷu (here follows the list) yî-prakâra svâsti-
yishṭ anubhavisikoṇḍu putra-pautra-pârampareyâgi chandrârkka-sthâyigaḷ ir̤uva paryantaradallu
ihudu yandu barasikoṭṭa dâna-paṭṭeya sâsana

[page 191]HOḶALKERE TALUQ


EC 11 Hk 1
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hk001

1 At Hoḷalkere, on a copper plate from Seṭṭara Nâgappa.


śrîmat-pañcha-kalyâṇa-vaibhavâya namaḥ ǁ

I.
śrîmat-parama-gambhîra-&c. ǁ

svasti śrî yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-maunânushṭhâna-japa-tapa-samâdhi-sîla-guṇa-sampanna
rum appa ôṃ ...... kaḍiyâṇa-parigrahâdityaruṃ madhyâhna-kalpa-vṛiksharum appa Pâriśvasêna-
bhaṭṭâraka-svâmiyavaru | Hoḷalakereya śrî-Śântinâtha-dêvara jîrṇṇâlayamaṃ .. ddhâramaṃ mâḍisi-
daru ǁ śrî-Mûla-saṅghada Vodaṇṇa-Gauḍa-muntâdavaru mâḍisida dharmmavu vighnavâgiralu â-
gauḍara sat-putrarâda Sômaṇṇa-Gauḍa Śântaṇṇa-Gauḍa Âdaṇṇa-Gauḍa-muntâdavaru | Pratâpa-
Nâyakarige nûru-gadyâṇavan ikki bêḍikoṇḍuddu Hiriya-kereya hindaṇa-tôṭamuṃ gaddeyumaṃ
beddalamaṃ nammavara maneya-kâṇikeyumaṃ sarva-bâdhâ-parihâravâgi śrî-amṛita-paḍige guru-
gaḷa âhâra-dânakke Śaka-varsha 1076 neya Śrîmukha-saṃvatsarada Mâgha-śuddha 10 Śukravâra
biṭṭa datti ǁ yidakke dêvatâ-mahôtsavada vivara | Bhâva-nâma-saṃvatsarada Vaiśâkha-śuddha-
tadige-Sômavâra vimâna-śudhi vâstu-vidhi nândî-maṅgala dhvajârôhaṇa bhêrî-tâḍana aṅkurârppaṇa
brahachchhântika mantra-nyâsa aṅga-nyâsa kêvala-jñânada mahâ-hômâ | mahâ-snapanâbhishêkake
agrôdaka-prabhâvaneyannu kalaśa-prabhâvaneyannu mâḍisi puṇyôpârjjaneyannu mâḍisikoṇḍaru |
varshaṃ-prati akshaya-tadi[ge]yalli naḍeyuva mahôtsava-prabhâvanege .... ashṭâhnika-parvvagaḷige
Śrâvaṇa-paurṇṇamî-vutsavakke (Bhâdrapada)-śuddha-chaturddaśi-Anantana-nôhi-kalaśa-prabhâvane
mahâ-ârâdhane-muntâddakke | Kârttika-mâsadalli Kṛittikôtsavakke Mâgha-ba-chaturddaśiyallu
Jinarâtre-mahôtsavakke | chatus-sime-vivara | tôṭakke mûḍalu Hire-kere | teṅkalu heddâri | paḍuvalu
neṭṭa-kallu | baḍagalu huṭṭare | gaddegaḷa chatus-sîmege nâlku-dikkigu nâlku-mukkoḍe saha
nâlku-neṭṭa kallu | beddalu-bhûmigu idê-guritu | sujanaru yî-dharmmava naḍesikoṇḍu baruvadu |
(usual final verses) śâsanakke bhadraṃ bhûyâd varddhatâṃ Jina-śâsanaṃ ǁ

I.
śrîmat-parama-gambhîra-&c. ǁ

svasti ya[ma]-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-maunânushṭhâna-japa-samâdhi-śîla-guṇa-sampannaruṃ .....
kaḍiyâṇa-pa .... ha kramâ ..... ruṃ madhyâhna-kalpa-vṛiksharum appa Pârśvasêna-bhaṭṭâraka-

vartti Hoyisaṇa-śrî-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvaru Vi ..... paṭṭaṇadoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ
geyyuttam iralu tat-pâda-padmôpajîvigaḷ appa śrîmanu-mahâ-pradhâna ..... daṇḍanâyakara kumâra

râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire avara maneya Baḷa .... nâyaka va ...... nâyaka Nârâyaṇa mechchi mechche-
dana-gaṇḍa nâ .... nâyakara gaṇḍa mûr̤u saṅgaṇa râvuttara gaṇḍa śrîmanu-mahâ-sâmantâdhipati

vṛittiyâgi ... taṃ viddalli Śaka-varsha 1136 neya Śrîmukha-saṃvatsarada Phâlguṇa-su .. Bṛihas-
pativâradalu Hoḷalaker̤eya Śântinâtha-dêvarige nityô .... vâgi biṭṭadu Hiriya-ker̤eya hinde hola-

EC 11 Hk 6
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hk006

6 At the same village, on a pillar in the verandah of the raṅga-maṇṭapa of the Gôpâla-Kṛishṇa temple.


I.
namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśa 1490 neya Vibhava-saṃvatsarada Jêshṭa-śu 1
śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-vîra-Sadâśiva-Râya-mahârâyaru
[page 195]pṛithvî-râjyaṃ geyiütt iralu śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara Aḷiya Râma-Râjaya-Dêva-mahâ-arasugaḷu
Turukara râja-kâryyakkâgi astamânav âgalâgi paṭṭaṇa siṃhâsana râjya dêśav ellâ keṭṭu khilav âgal
âgi | râjeśri-Tirumala-Râjaya-Dêva-mahâ-arasugaḷu śrîman-mahâ-nâyakâchârya Kâmagettiya Meda-
keri-Nâyakarige amara-mâgaṇige pâlisida Hoḷalaker̤eya sîmeyanu tamma mayiduna Gulliyapa-
Nâyakarige umbuḷiyanu pâlisalâgi â-khilavâgi-hôda Hoḷalaker̤eya ............ la śrî-Madana-
Gôpâla-Kṛishṇa-svâmi-dêva-Brâhmaru punaḥ-pratishṭeya jîrnôddhâravanu mâḍi Gôpâla-Kṛishṇa ....
...... avanu dharmma-dati Gulliyapa-Nâyakanu pratipâlisidakke barada dharmma-śâsana Gulli-
yapa-Nâyakanu hostâgi Hoḷalaker̤eya (rest illegible).

EC 11 Hk 7
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hk007

7 At the same village, ↓1copy of a copper plate in the Gôpâla-Kṛishṇa temple.


śrîmad-Bhaktapâla śrî-Pomboḷala-Vêṇugôpâla ǁ

I.
Harêr lîlâ-varâhasya daṃshṭrâ-daṇḍas sa pâtu vaḥ |
Hêmâdri-kalaśâ yatra dhâtrî chhatra-śriyaṃ dadhau ǁ śrî
namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śakha-varushaṅgalu 1490 neya Vibhava-saṃvatsarada Jêshṭa-
śu 5 Maṅgaḷavâradallu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara vîra-pratâpa vîra-Sadâśiva-mahâ-
râyaru pṛithivî-rajyaṃ gaiyutt iralû śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara Aḷiya Râma-Râjaiyya-Dêva-mahâ-ara-
sugaḷu turuttu râja-kâryyavâgi astamânav âgalâgi | paṭṭaṇa siṃhâsana râjya dêśav ellâ keṭṭu khiḷav
âgalâgi | râjeśrî-Tirumala-Râjaiyya-Dêva-mahâ-arasugaḷu srîman-mahâ-Kâmagetti-Kastûri-Meda-
keri-Nâyakarige amara-mâgaṇige pâlisida-mêle khilavâgi-hôda Hoḷalaker̤eya śrîmad-Bhaktapâla-
śrî-Vêṇugôpâla-Kṛishṇa-svâmi-dêva-Brâhmaru punaḥ pratishṭheyaṃ jiṇṇôddhâravaṃ mâḍi tat-pûrva-
dali Janamêjaya dêvatâ-pratishṭhe Vishṇuvardha-Râyara bhû-pratishṭhe Kṛishṇa-Râyaru Râma-Râ-
jaiyanavaru jirṇṇôdhâraṇe Kâmagetti-Kastûri-Medakeri-Nâyakaru sârôdhâraṇeyaṃ mâḍi śrî-Gôpâla-
Kṛishṇage saluva archakaru śrîmat-Pâñcharâtrada Atrê[ya] sa-gôtrada Bôdhâyana-sûtrada Yajuś-
śâkhâdhyâyigaḷâda Yaṅkâṭâchâryya-dîkshitarige dhârâ-dattavâgi sahiraṇyôdaka-pûrvakavâgi Kṛish-
ṇârpaṇavâgi koṭṭu yida grâma-svâsti pûrva-mariyâdiyannu namma maiduna Gulliyapa-Nâyakana
mukhântradalli bhûmiyannu aḷasi nôḍisi pratipâlisida kramav ent endare archana-vṛittige Śudarśana-
Pâñchajanya-śilâ-stâpaneyâda grâma-bhûmigaḷu archakarige Bhîmâ-agrahâra 1 aṅga-raṅga-vaibha-
vakke Vamalâpuri-grâma 1 yî-kasabeyallu yiruva gade-bedalu-bhûmigaḷu vivara hattu-sêrina-mâna-
dalu bîjavari hattu-pâdada aḷate-kôlu pramâṇa (here follow details) yivu parva-tithigaḷa mânya-
gaḷu yî-śîme kasabeyalli yiruva vartane varahâ 1 kke koḍabêku .. yada haṇavinalli aḍige-parichâra-
karu mantra-pushpada jana sanmârjanê-jana palaki-sattige-sûrepânadavaru huvinavaru saha yivarige
sambaḷa yidaralli arittu koḍuvadu ninta haṇavinalli ratha-alaṅkâra-vâhanagaḷie alaṅkâra-vastra-
âbharaṇagaḷige baḷasuvadu | arasugaḷa kai-uttâra (here follow details, and other grants) yivu nava-
dhânyadalu koḍabêku | santê-pasige mûle-vîsa sahâ koḍabêku yandu barasi koṭṭa sârôdhâra-tâmra-
śâsana sarvamânya pûrva-mariyâdiyannu â-chandrârkavâgi namma Kâmagetti-vaṃśakke puṇya
baraliy endu barasikoṭṭa dharma-śâsana (usual final phrases and verses) śrî-Râma yî-śâsanavannu
yâva dhoregaḷu vôdisidarû pratipâlisidarû punaḥ dêvastânadalli maḍagisuvadu śrî

ôṃ namaś Śivâya

........ Magadha-Pâñchâḷa-Nêpâḷa-Barbara-Saurâṭa .. rada-Karahâṭa .. Kâsmîra-Gurjara-Sindhu-

mahârâjâdhirâja paramêsvara parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbhraṇaṃ śrî-
mat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravardhamânam â-chandrârkka-
târaṃ-ba .... sa ...... tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ

śrîyuṃ .. jisutta pra ...... ḷa . pamaṃ .... vijaya- |

.............................................. ǁ

svasti sa ......... mahâ ...... svaraṃ Yâdava ...... bara-dyumaṇi ...... chûḍâma .... ḷa-mâr-
ttaṇḍa ...... ṭi gaṇḍa ............ na ...... Pâṇḍya-Dêvara .......saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ
geyyuttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmanta jaya-
vadhû-kântaṃ haya-Vatsarâja gaṇikâ-Manôjan achaḷita-dhairya ......... sauryya śishṭêshṭa-vibudha-
gâyaka-nâyaka-naṭî-vṛinda .....samasta-j...... sampu .. chandrahâsaṃ para-ba .. bala-ku .....
daksha-dakshiṇa-bâhu-daṇḍa kûḍi tappuvara gaṇḍa .. ṇa vairigaḷa gaṇḍa-prachaṇḍa Madana ....
taṅga sa ...................... vairi-dâvaṃ ................. Pâṇḍya ........ r̤a ............

.................. poḷalaṃ ......... dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâla ............... diṃ râjyaṃ
geyyuttam i .... tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ....... nâḷ-prabhu Chaṭṭa-gâvuṇḍana ............ lla-gâvuṇḍa
....... gâvuṇḍa ............m irddu Mûlasthânada Kali-dêvarggaṃ Mâchêśvara-dêvargge naivêdya-

DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hk030

30 At Âḍanûr (same hobli), on a stone in the front of the Îśvara temple.


svasti Saka-nṛipa-kâḷâtîta-saṃvatsara-sataṅga 886 Raktâkshi-saṃvatsara pravarttise tad-varishâbhy-
antarada Pôsha-suddha-pañchamiî-Brihaspativâram-uttarâyaṇada-saṅkrântiyandu śrîmat ... ḷôkayya
Kadambaḷige-nâḍu-sâyiramumaṃ nidhi-nidhâna-nikshêpa-sahasra-daṇḍaṃ-modalâgey âḷutt ire śrîmat-
Kannayya Âḍanûran abhyantara-siddhiyâge Êḷaṃ Gauḍaḷaṃ Sâyirada Komara-gadyâṇamuman aṇu-
ṅginoḷ âḷuttire avar-abbegaḷ śrîmat-Bi .. yabb-arasiya Kântêśvaram endu Umâ-Mahêśvara-dêvara
pratishṭhe-geydu Amṛitarâsi-bhaṭârara tôṇṭamum Areyaker̤eya keyyuṃ Kir̤iya-ker̤eya gâvuṅḍagaḷa
...................... âdud ellamaṃ sarvva-parihâraṃ biṭṭôr idakke sâkshi (witnesses named)
int inibaruṃ sâkshiyâge koṭṭar ivar-ubhaya-sanmathadoḷ baradoṃ Chellapayyaṃ (usual final verses
and phrases).

svasti samasta-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ Dvârâvatî-pura-varêśvaraṃ Yâ-

ṭige guṇa-yukte Kâdavege puṭṭidan intu Biyâḷa-nâmadiṃ |

dhâraṇig atiśayad Emmega- |
nûroḷu Biyâḷa-Gêti-seṭṭi guṇa ...... n ene kîrtti .. |
.... udârateyiṃ |
.. rutan ........ mahimônnatiyiṃ ǁ

ant Emmiganûr-oḍeya Jakkarasaru Biyâḷa-Gêta-seṭṭi (others named) intu samasta-prabhu-gâvuṇḍu-
gaḷuṃ adhikâri-Râghava-Dêva-Pampayyaṅgaḷu-mukhyavâgi Śakavarusha 1142 neya Vikrama-
saṃvatsarada Jêshṭad-amâvâse-Sômavâra-sûryya-grahaṇadandu Hiriy-Emmeganûra śrî-Svayam-
bhu-Kali-dêvara aṅga-bhôga-raṅga-bhôga-pâtrapâvuḷa-Chaitra-pavitra-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhâra .... gi
Handiganahaḷḷiyanu yama-niyamânushṭhâna-sampannarappa Amṛitarâsigaḷa putra Bîmarâśigaḷa
makkaḷu Brahmaśivamâḷa-gurugaḷa pâda-prakshâḷanaṃ mâḍi dhârâ-pûrvvakamâgi koṭṭaru â-haḷḷiya
sîmey âvud endaḍe (here follow boundaries) ...... koṭṭa ǁ svasti samasta-vas[u]ma[tî]taḷâkhyâta-
Gaṅgânvaya pratâpa-Mâhêśvara Nandagiri-nâtha ma .. Mândhâtaṃ nanniya-Gaṅga jayad-utta-
raṅga mada-gaja-lâñchhana viniyôga-kâñchana Padumâvatî-dêviya labdha-vara-prasâdanuṃ kaṇ-
ṇambin-âta yesuvar-âditya sayi-gôla-Pârttha hariyarasaṅgaṃ ...... Dêviya .... huṭṭida Bamma-
rasa-Dêvaru Bhîmarâsi-gurugaḷa pâda-prakshâlanaṃ mâḍi .. dhârâ-pûrvakavâgi koṭṭa pûrvva-datti ǁ
[page 205]prathama-sthaḷada gadde tumbina modalalu Gaṅgana gaḷeyalu .. mattaru 1 Biyâḷa-Kêti-Seṭṭigaṃ
Chikkaüvegaṃ puṭṭida Kêśava-Seṭṭi koṭṭa gadde kamba (here follow details) śrîmatu Pâṇḍya-nâḍa
hejjuṅkada heggaḍe Ruddaṇyanu Emmeganûra vṛittiya davasâyada suṅkadoḷage śrî-Svayambhu-Kali-
dêvara nandâdîvigege biṭṭa ga 3 (further details and usual final phrases).
