I.
namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ Gaṇapatayê namaḥ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ parama-
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kul̤a-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-
râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ paduḷaṃ saluttam ire
tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Kâñchî-pura-
varâdhîśvaraṃ Yad[u]-vaṃśâmbara-dyumaṇi su-bhaṭa-chûḍâmaṇi nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârṭṭaṇḍa pari-
chhêdi-gaṇḍa Râjiga-Chôla-manô-bhaṅgaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru Noḷambavâḍi-
mûvattirchchâsiramumaṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyvuttam ire svasti vas[u]matî-taḷa-
khyâṭaṃ Gaṅgânvaya-prasûtaṃ Koṅguṇivarmma-dharmma-mahârâjâdhirâja vandi-jana-kalpa-
bhûjaṃ Kôḷâla-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ.... pa-Mahêśvaraṃ Nandagiri-nâtha manuja-Mândhâta nanniya
Gaṅga jayad-uttaraṅga mada-gajêndra-lâñchhana viniyôga-kâñchana Padmâvatî-labdha-vara-pra-
sâda mṛigamadâmôda .... kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍan aṇiyoḍe gaṇḍa kôdaṇḍa-Pârttha ra ...... rta
śaraṇâgata-vajra-pañjara vairi-dik-kuñjaraṃ kshatriya ...... tra parâṅganâ-putra chatus-samaya-
[sa]muddharaṇaṃ dêśiy-âbharaṇaṃ ripu-gaḷa-Kâḷa-pâśan ayyana chandrahâsa nâmâdi-praśasti-sahi-
taṃ śrî-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ Gaṅgarasaru tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi Guñjigauûra prabhu-gâvuṇḍugaḷu
kumbâra Bammaṇa tale pûsad anna vuṇada vîra-bratama kaykoṇḍu pratishṭeyaṃ mâḍisida Kum-
bêśvara-dêvar-aṅga-bhôgakke nandâ-dîvigegaṃ nivêdyakkaṃ sarvva-bâdhâ-parihâramâgi Araker̤eya
keḷage biṭṭa gar̤de kammav innûr̤u 200 (details of further grant) Gaṅgarasaru Kukkavâḍi-mûnûr̤uman
âḷuttam iḷdu Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâla la 51 neya Parâbhava-saṃvatsarada Pôshya-su 10 Sômavârad
uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-vyatîpâtadandu Utta varâsi-paṇḍitara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi
koṭṭa dharmma Ponnôjag ondu kauṅg ele-vaḷḷi .... samasta ........ (usual final phrases).

sîmeya vivara (details of boundaries) yint î-chatus-sîmey-oḷaguḷa nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-pâshâṇa-akshîṇi-

pârampareyâgi anubhavisikoṇḍu yîhyad eudu koṭṭa bhûmi-vivara Bâgûra sîmege saluva hosa-grâma

EC 11 Hk 84
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hk084

[page 209]84 At Gaṅgasamudra (same hobli), on a stone into the tank bund.


subham astu svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusa 1441 neya Bahudhânya-saṃvatsarada
Kârtika-śu 15 lu śrîman-mahâ-râjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-vîra-Kṛishṇa-Râya-
mahârâyaru pṛithuvî-râjyaṃ geyiütt iralu Kṛishṇa-Râya-mahârâyara pradhâna Ba.. kama-arasaya-
navarige dharmavâgi avara adhikâri-manusya Vâmarasanu kaṭisida ker̤eya jîrṇôddhâra maṅgaḷa mahâ
śrî

EC 11 Hk 85
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hk085

85 At Hebbaḷḷi (same hobli), on a vîrakal to the north of the Kallêdêva temple.


svasti Saka-va kâlâtîta 899 śrîmat-nanni..... Kandarpa taruṇî-viḷâsa ahitar̤a Pârtha Arabalavana
âḷdoḍe Chôl̤ara Pil̤duveyya Pervvaḷḷiya tur̤ugoḷoḷ svarggasthan âdandu Arabalava Pervvaḷḷiya Pil̤du-
veyya....... râjyam uḷḷannavaraṃ bâḷgal̤chu kalnâṭu goṭṭa kiḍisidandu Vâraṇâsiyan al̤idôr

87 On a third vîrakal in the same place.

EC 11 Hk 88
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hk088

88 On a fourth vîrakal in the same place.


(The upper portion is gone) Kannara-Dêva prithuvî-râjyaṃ geyye Gaṅgavâḍi-tombattaru-sâsiramaṃ
Mârasiṅga-Permmâḍi âḷutt ire Perbbaḷḷi Nanniya-Gaṅga-Gâvuṇḍan ûr-ggâvuṇḍu geyyutt ire Sindara
Mâda .. yya ...... r̤ugoḷoḷ ............ Garajjayyana mayduna Muddeyya tur̤ugoḷoḷ muktige sanda

EC 11 Hk 89
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hk

89 At Nâraṇagoṇḍanhaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in the field No. 101.


I.
namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

svasti jayâbhyudaya-Śaka-varuśa ↓11333 neya Vyaya-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-su 15 lu Ellahadêva-
Nâyka Nânadhriva-Nâykaru Paḍuvala Râmanâtha-devara amṛita-paḍige Gauraṇa-Gauḍana kayalu
gadde bîjavari (σ) 1¼ beddale yî-vondanû koṭṭevu (usual final phrases and verses).

Notes
↑1. * So in the original : Śaka 1333 = Vikṛti, Vyaya = 1329.
EC 11 Hk 90
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hk090

90 At Hosadurga (Hosadurga hobli), an a stone in the Vîrabhadra temple.


śrî-Vîrabhadra-dêvarige Mayilâra-dêvarige Śukla-saṃvatsarada Kârtika-śu 14 lu Kâmagettiya
Timmappana maga ... Baḍige koṭa ...gana keḷa-giriya goḍasi Ragapurada umâru.. koṭa grâma-
sîmeyoḷagâgi koṭa hâkida Baḍigi-dêvarige....

EC 11 Hk 91
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hk091

[page 210]91 At Kellôḍu (same hobli), on a stone in the lane of Hanumanta’s house.


yî-grâmake salataka mânnegâru karaṇika Chikarasapanavaru maṭhadaiyagaḷu Kuṇṭa-vaḍêru ǁ koṇḍi-
kâra Timmadâsaiya taḷavâra Maluna-Mâdi-Nâyaka yidu saṭey endu nuḍidavaṅge agôra-naraka
tapadu ǁ

EC 11 Hk 92
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hk092

92 At the same village, on a stone in the Hanumanta temple.


śrimatu sakala-guṇa-sampannar âda Sante-Bennûra ha Hanimi-Nâykana mommaga Daḷa-Nâykaru
Kelagôḍina Hanumanta-dêvarige Kur̤ubarahaḷḷi ... saṃvatsara-Śrâvaṇa-sudha ... pakshadalu hâkida
... charyara baraha śrî

EC 11 Hk 94
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hk094

94 At Mattôḍu (same hobli), on copper plates in possession of Narasamma.


(Nâgarî characters)

(I b) śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ |

I.
namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ
II.
Harêr lîlâ-varâhasya daṃshṭrâ-daṇḍas sa pâtu vaḥ |
Hêmâdri-kalaśâ yatra dhatrî chhatra-śriyaṃ dadhau ǁ
kalyâṇâyâstu tad dhâma pratyûha-timirâpahaṃ |
yad gajô’py Agajôdbhûtaṃ Hariṇâpi cha pûjyatê ǁ
asti kshîramayâd dêvair mathyamânân mahâmbudhêḥ |
navanîtam ivôdbhûtam apanîta-tamô mahaḥ ǁ
tasyâsît tanayas tapôbhir atuḷair anvartha-nâmâ Budbaḥ
puṇyair asya Purûravâ bhuja-balair âyur dvishâṃ nighnataḥ |
tasy Âyur Nahushô’sya tasya parushô yuddhê Yayâtiḥ kshitau
khyâtas tasya tu Turvasur Vasu-nibhaḥ śrî-Dêvayânî-patêḥ ǁ
tad-vaṃśê Dêvakîjânir didîpê Timma-bhûpatiḥ |
yaśasvî Tuḷavêndrêshu Yadôḥ Kṛishṇa ivânvayê ǁ
tatô’bhûd Bhukkamâjânir Îśvara-kshitipâlakaḥ |
atrâsam agu...ṃsaṃ mauḷi-ratnaṃ mahîbhujâṃ ǁ
sarasâd udabhût tasmân Narasâvanipâlakaḥ |
Dêvakî-nandanât Kâmô Dêvakî-nandanâd iva ǁ
vividha-sukṛitôddâmê Râmêśvara-pramukhê muhur
mudita-hṛidaya sthânê sthânê vyadhatta yathâvidhi |
budha-parivṛitô nânâ-dânâni yô bhuvi shôḍaśa
tri-bhuvana-janôdgîtaṃ sphîtaṃ yaśaḥ punaruktayan ǁ
Kâvêrîm âśu badhvâ bahuḷa-jala-rayâṃ yô vilaṅghyaiva śatruṃ
jîvagrâhaṃ gṛihîtvâ samiti bhuja-balât tañ cha râjyaṃ tadîyaṃ |
kṛitvâ Śrîraṅga-pûrvaṃ tad api nija-vaśê paṭṭaṇaṃ yô babhâsê
kîrti-stambhaṃ nikhâya tri-bhuvana-bhuvana-stûyamânâpadânaḥ ǁ
Chêraṃ Chôḷañ cha Pâṇḍyaṃ tam api cha Madhurâ-vallabham mâna-bhûshaṃ
vîryôdagraṃ Turushkaṃ Gajapati-nṛipatiṃ châpi jitvâ tadanyân |
â-Gaṅgâ-tîra-Laṅkâ-prathama-charama-bhûbhṛit-taṭântaṃ nitântaṃ
khyâta-kshôṇîpatînâṃ srajam iva śirasâ śâsanaṃ yô vyatânît ǁ
Tippâjî-Nâgalâ-Dêvyôḥ Kausalyâ-śrî-Sumitrayôḥ |
dêvyôr iva Nṛisiṃhêndrât tasmât Paṅtirathâd iva ǁ
[page 211]vîrau vinayinau Râma-Lakshmaṇâv iva nandanau |
jâtau vîra-Nṛisimhêndra-Kṛishṇa-Râya-(II a)mahîpatî ǁ
vîra-śrî-Nârasiṃhaḥ sa Vijayanagarê ratna-siṃhâsanasthaḥ
kîrtyâ nîtyâ nirasyan Nṛiga-Naḷa-Nahushân apy avanyâm athânyân |
â sêtôr â Sumêrôr avanisura-nutaḥ svairam â chôdayâdrêr
â-pâśchatyâchalântâd akhiḷa-hṛidayam âvarjya râjyaṃ śaśâsa ǁ
nânâ-dânâny akârshît Kanakasadasi yaḥ śrî-Virûpâksha-dêva-
sthânê śrî-Kâḷahastîśitur api nagarê Veṅkaṭâdrau cha Kâñchyaṃ ǁ
Śrîśailê Śôṇa-śailê mahati Hariharê’hôbalê Saṅgamê cha
Śrîraṅgê Kumbhaghôṇê hata-tamasi mahâ-Nanditîrthê Nivṛittau ǁ
Gôkarṇê Râmasêtau jagati tad-itarêshv apy aśêshêshu puṇya-
sthânêshv ârabdha-nânâvidha-bahuḷa-mahâ-dâna-vâri-pravâhaih |
yasyôdañchat-turaṅga-prakara-khura-rajaś-śushyad-ambhôdhi-magna-
kshmâbhṛit-paksha-chchhidôdyattara-kuḷiśa-dharôtkaṇṭhitâ kuṇṭhitâbhût ǁ
brahmâṇḍaṃ viśva-chakraṃ ghaṭam udita-mahâ-bhûtakaṃ ratna-dhênuṃ
saptâmbhôdhîmś aha kalpa-kshitiruha-latikê kâñchanîṃ kâmadhênuṃ |
svarṇa-kshmâṃ yô hiraṇyâśva-ratham api tulâ-pûrushaṃ gô-sahasraṃ
hêmaśvaṃ hêma-garbhaṃ kanaka-kari-rathân pañcha-lâṅgaly atânît ǁ
prâjyaṃ praśasya nirvighnaṃ râjyaṃ dyâm iva śâsituṃ |
tasmin guṇêna vikhyâtê kshitêr indrê divaṃ gatê ǁ
tatô’py avârya-vîrya-śrî-Krishṇa-Râya-mahîpatiḥ |
bibhartti maṇi-kêyûra-nirviśêshaṃ mahîṃ bhujê ǁ
kîrtyâ yasya samantataḥ prasṛitayâ viśvaṃ ruchaikyaṃ vrajêd
ity âśaṅkya purâ Purârir abhavat phâlêkshaṇaḥ prâyaśaḥ |
Padmâkshô’pi chatur-bhujô’jani chatur-vaktrô’bhavat Padmabhûḥ
Kâḷî khaḍgam adhâd Ramâ cha kamalaṃ viṇâñ cha Vâṇî karê ǁ
śatrûṇâṃ vâsam êtê dadata iti rushâ kin nu saptâmburâśîn
nânâ-sênâ-turaṅga-truṭita-vasumatî-dhûḷikâ-pâlikâbhiḥ |
saṃśôshya svairam êtat-pratinidhi-jaladhi-śrêṇikâ yô vidhattê
brahmâṇḍa-svarṇa-mêru-pramukha-nija-mahâ-dâna-tôyair amêyaiḥ ǁ
mad-dattâm arthi-sârthâś śriyam iha suchiraṃ bhuñjatâm ity avêtya
prâyaḥ pratyûha-hêtôs tapana-ratha-gatêr âlayam dêvatâ(II b)nâṃ |
tat-tad-dig-jaitra-vṛityâpicha biruda-padair aṅkitâṃs tatra tatra
stambhâñ jâti-pratishṭhân atanuta bhuvi yô bhûbhṛid abhraṅkashâgrân ǁ
Kâñchî-Śrîśaila-Śôṇâchala-Kanakasabhâ-Vêṅkatâdri-pramukhyêshv
âvartyâvartya sarvêshv atanuta vidhivad bhûyasê śrêyasê yaḥ |
dêvasthânêshu tîrthêshv api kanaka-tulâ-pûrushâdini nânâ-
dânâny êvôpadânair api samam akhiḷair âgamôktâni tâni ǁ
rôsha-kṛita-pratipârthiva-daṇḍaḥ
Śêsha-bhuja-kshiti-ra[ksha]ṇa-śauṇḍaḥ |
bhâshege-tappuva-râyara-gaṇḍaḥ
(s)tôshakṛid arthishu yô raṇa-chaṇḍah ǁ
râjâdhirâja ity uktô yô râja-paramêśvaraḥ |
mûru-râyara-gaṇḍaś cha para-râya-bhayaṅkaraḥ ǁ
Hindu-râya-Suratrâṇô dushṭa-śârdûla-mardanaḥ |
gajaugha-gaṇḍa-bhêruṇḍa ity-âdi-birudânvitaḥ ǁ
[page 212]âlôkaya mahârâya jaya jîvêti-vâdibhiḥ |
Aṅga-Vaṅga-Kaḷiṅgâdyai râjabhis sêvyatê cha yaḥ ǁ
stutyaudâryas sudhîbhis sa Vijayanagarê ratna-siṃhâsanasthaḥ
kshmâpâlân Kṛishṇa-Râya-kshitipatir adharîkṛitya ↓1kîrtyâ samindhê |
Śâlivâhana-nirṇîtê śakabdê sa-chatuś-śataih |
trayastriṃśat-samâyuktaiḥ saṅkhyâtê daśabhiḥ śataiḥ ǁ
Prajâpatyâbhidhê varshê Pushya-mâsê samanvitê |
puṇyêpy Arddhôdayê Bhânuvâsarê samayê śubhê ǁ
Tuṅgabhadrâ-nadî-tîrê Virûpâkshasya sannidhau |
agrahâra-chikîrshâyâṃ parama-prîtimân tadâ ǁ
Śaunakânvaya-sambhûta-varÂpastamba-sûtriṇê |
yaśaśvinê Yajus-śâkhâdhyâyinê guṇa-śâlinê ǁ
Vôrugaṇṭâbhidhâ-pûrva-Tâtapeddânvayê tathâ |
Liṅga-bhaṭṭâya vidushaḥ putrâyâmita-têjasê ǁ
śrauta-smârta-sad-âchâra-niratâya manîshiṇê |
bhû-dâna-pâtra-bhûtâya bhûmidêvâgrayâyinê ǁ
vinutâya viśishṭâya Timma-bhaṭṭâya dhîmatê |
Kuntaḷa-dêśa-vikhyâtê Hiriyûr-âkhya-sîmani ǁ
Maleyanûra-sthaḷê chaiva pratishṭhitam anuttamaṃ |
Hiriyanûr-âhvaya-grâma[t] prâchyâṃ diśam upâśritaṃ ǁ
Bâḷêhaḷḷi-samâkhyâtâd dakshiṇasyaṃ diśi sthitaṃ |
Masakallu-mahâ-grâmât paśchimâyâṃ diśi sthitaṃ ǁ
Go(III a)llarahaḷḷi-nâmâkhyâd udîchyâṃ grâma-śôbhitaṃ |
Bobûru-grâma-vikhyâtaṃ pratinâma-prakalpitaṃ ǁ
Kṛishṇarâyapuraṃ ramyaṃ sarva-lakshaṇa-lakshitaṃ |
grâma-grâsârtham asyaiva grâmaṃ Hattadorai tathâ ǁ
Gâṇadahuṇasê-nâma(n)-pallyâpi cha samanvitaṃ |
nidhi-nikshêpa-pâshâṇa-siddha-sâdhya-jalânvitaṃ ǁ
akshiṇy-âgâmi-saṃyuktam êka-bhôgyaṃ subhûruhaṃ |
vâpî-kûpa-taṭâkâdi-kachhênâpi samanvitaṃ ǁ
putra-pautrâdibhir bhôgyaṃ kramâd â-chandra-târakaṃ |
dânasyâdhamanasyâpi vikrayasyâpi chôchitaṃ ǁ
parîtaḥ prayata-snigdhaiḥ purôhita-purôgamaiḥ |
vividhair vibudhais śrauta-pathikair adhikair girâ ǁ
Kṛishṇa-Dêva-mahârâyô mânanîyô manasvinâṃ |
sa-hiraṇya-payôdhârâ-pûrvakaṃ dattavân mudâ ǁ
yaśasvî yajamânô’sâv imaṃ grâmaṃ vibhajya cha |
dvâtriṃśad-vṛitti-saṅkhyâkaṃ kalpayitvâ samâhitaḥ ǁ
yajamânas svakîyâṃśa ashṭaka-dvaya-vritti-bhâk |
tatô vṛitti-grahîtṛîṇâṃ nâma-gôtrâdi likhyatê ǁ

(here follow names &c. of vṛittidars and the details of boundaries).

III.
tad idam avanî-vanîpaka-
vinuta-dharâyasya Kṛishṇa-Râyasya |
śâsanam uru-kavi-vaibhava-
nivaha-nidânasya bhûri-dânasya ǁ
[page 213]Kṛishṇa-Dêva-mahârâya-śâsanêna Sabhâpatiḥ |
abhâṇîn mṛidu-sandarbhaṃ tad idaṃ tâmra-śâsanaṃ |
Kṛishṇa-Dêva-mahârâya-śâsanân Mallaṇâtmajaḥ |
tvashṭâ-śrî-Vîraṇâchâryô vyalîkhat tâmra-śâsanaṃ ǁ

((usual final verses). śrî-Virûpâksha)

Notes
↑1. * The intervening portion of the stanza is wanting in the original.
EC 11 Hk 95
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hk095

95 A copper plate in possession of the above Narasamma.


This contains only 13 lines which correspond with the opening portion of No. 94 above.

EC 11 Hk 96
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hk096

96 On another copper sâsana in possession of the above Narasamma.


(Nâgarî characters).

(I a) śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ |

I.
namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ
II.
Harêr lîlâ-varâhasya daṃshtrâ-daṇḍas sa pâtu vaḥ |
Hêmâdri-kalaśâ yatra dhâtrî chhatra-śriyaṃ dadhau ǁ
Gaurî-mukha-sarôjârkkaṃ pratyûha-dhvaṃsinaṃ śivaṃ |
bhaktânâm ishṭadaṃ dêvaṃ kalayâmi Gaṇâdhipaṃ ǁ
śrîmad-râjâdhirâjô Manumula-kulajaḥ kômalâṅgaḥ kulînaḥ
śrîmân Hâlappa-nâmâ kshitipatir abhavachchhaiva-śâstrêshv abhijñaḥ |
datvâ svarṇṇañ cha vâsô Harihara-divasêshv âtta-kîrttir dvijêbhyaḥ
śauryê Śakrasya tulyaḥ śaśi-nibha-vadanaḥ śikshitâśêsha-śatruḥ ǁ
Mattêḍu-nâma-nagarîṃ naga-rîti-sâlâm
adhyâsta Hâla-vasudhâdhipatir viśâlâṃ |
kuḍyâśritâmala-viśâla-vichitra-chitra-
mâlâ-virâjita-mahârajatâvarôdhâṃ ǁ
tasya śrî-Doḍḍaṇâkhyô narapatir abhavat sûnur ugra-pratâpaḥ
srîmân Hiriyaṇṇa-nâmne nija-kula-sachivâyâdadad Gañjigêraṃ |
Râmâdrâv agrahâraṃ kuru vimala-jalaṃ kârayîtvâ taṭâkaṃ
tênaivaṃ chôditôsau sapadi samakarôd agrahâraṃ mahâtmâ ǁ
Vamanâṅkita-pâ(I b)shâṇân viśâlân vasudhâdhipaḥ |
Gañjigêrâgrahârasya sthâpayâmâsa diksu saḥ ǁ
grâma-madhyê pûrvva-bhâgê Vâyu-sûnôś cha sannidhau |
êkaṃ prasthâpayâmâsa prastaraṃ Vâmanâṅkitaṃ ǁ
utpattir agrahârasya nishkâṇâm viṃśatis tadâ |
âgâminy adhikâ vâpi sarvamânyêna bhujyatâṃ ǁ
râjñô Doḍḍaṇa-Nâyakasya tanayô râjâbhavat Saṅgayaḥ
śrîmân śâsati mêdinîṃ chirataraṃ dharmêṇa tasmin nṛipê
viprâ Mattinaḍu-sthitâḥ sukṛitinaḥ sampâdayantô’niśaṃ |
kîrtiṃ tasya nṛipôttamasya mahatîṃ prâpuḥ sukhaṃ châdhikaṃ ǁ
tat-sûnur Hâla-Râjaś śithilita-varaṇaṃ Gañjigêrâgrahâraṃ
dṛishṭvâ bhinnaṃ taṭâkaṃ pṛithutara-mrigayâm âcharan kânanê cha |
adhyâsâmâsur asmin bahula-mada-yutân vyâghra-bhûdâra-ṛikshân |
tân hatvâ râja-varyô vipina-taḷam asau bhîti-hînaṃ chakâra ǁ
[page 214]anîkinî-madhya-gataḥ purîṃ svâṃ
âgatya śuddhânta-gatâm avôchat |
bhâryâṃ sva-putrâv api Siddharâma-
Doḍḍaṇṇa-saṃjñâv adhika-pratâpau ǁ
putrau mat-tâta-tâtêna yô’grahâraḥ purâ (II a) kṛitaḥ |
tasyâsmâbhiś cha kartavyaṃ pâlanaṃ dharma-kâṅkshibhiḥ ǁ
śrutvâ tu tau tadâ vâkyaṃ pituḥ priyakarasya tat |
tathêty avadatâm astu dharmaṃ pâlaya satvaraṃ ǁ
Hiryaṇṇaṃ Râmachandraṃ cha kshipram âhûya bhûmipaḥ |
abravîd agrahârasya taṭâkaḥ kriyatâm iti ǁ
prayachchha lêkhya-sahitâṃ hiraṅyôdaka-pûrvakaṃ |
sva-śrêyasê Râmachandra bhûsurêbhyô vasundharâṃ ǁ
Hiryaṇṇa-Râmachandrau tu râjñaḥ śrutvâ vachas tadâ |
kârayâmasatus tasya taṭâkâdikam uttamaṃ ǁ
kshôṇî-rasa-śara-dvîpa-sañjñake Śaka-vatsarê |
Râkshasâbdê Mâgha-mâsê Śivarâtrau Śivâya cha ǁ
paratra chÂdipurusha-padâbja-prâptayê tadâ |
śâsanaṃ chadadau râjâ Gañjigêra-purasya saḥ ǁ
pûrva-nâmnâ Gañjigêram idânîṃ Narasâpuraṃ |
nâma nirdiśya tênaiva Hiryaṇṇena sunirmitaṃ ǁ
vṛittînâṃ viniyôgaś cha kathyatê Narasâpurê ǁ

(here follow names &c. of vṛittidars, boundaries and usual final verses).

EC 11 Hk 98
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hk098

ent endaḍe |

âtana tanûjana parâkramav ent endaḍe ǁ

III.
kâḷegado .... ta-karavâḷa-hatakke hata-prabhar mmahî- |

pâḷay emb idane hambalisirddudu vairi-saṅkuḷaṃ ǁ

ant enisida śrîmanu mahâ-maṇḍalêśvaraṃ Taḷakâḍu-Koṅgu-Naṅgali-Gaṅgavâḍi-Noṇambavâḍi-

Ballâḷa-Dêvaru Gaṅgavâḍi-tombhattâr̤u-sâsiramumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷanaṃ geydu

appa śrîman-mahâ-sâmantâdhipati mahâ-sâmanta-ghasaṇi Nirugundada Chaṭṭaiya-Nâyakara pratâpa-
mahimônnatiy ent endoḍe ǁ

jyâyar mmâlâsthi-mâlâ-dharar amṛita-payôrâśi-Kaiḷâsa-nitya- |
srêyôdyad-[d]vi-triy-akshar negaḷda Hariharaṃ kûrttau sâmanta-Chaṭṭaṅg |
âyuṃ śrîyuṃ jaya-śrîyuman anavarataṃ mâḷke chandrârkka-târam-(baraṃ) ǁ
mâriṭṭ ambaramaṃ Surâchaḷaman okkaysiṭṭu diṅkiṭṭu tat- |

116 On the Garuḍa-kambha in the same temple.


śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-vîra-Achchuta-Râya-mahârâyaru
pṛithvî-râjyaṃ geyuttiralu śubham astu svasti jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1452 sanda
[page 219]Vikṛiti-saṃvatsarada Kârtika-śu 13 Chandravâradallu Ayyapparasayyanavarige puṇyav âgabêk endu
avara kâryakke kartar âda Viśvanâthayyana sêve |

EC 11 Hk 118
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hk118

118 At the same village, on a stone in front of the Antaragaṭṭamma temple.

namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varsha 1478 neya Râkshasa-saṃvatsarada Chayitra-śu 10

120 At the same village, on a stone near the pond in Râmadâsayya’s grove.


śubham astu ǁ svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1445 neya Chitrabhânu-saṃvat-
sarda Srâvaṇa-ba 10 Bu-vâradalu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa śrî-
Kṛishṇa-Râya-mahârâyara karaṇika-Prabhukayyana sahôdara Basavappayyanu pṛithvî-râjyaṃ
gaiüttire avarige sakala-sâmbrâjyav âgabêk endu avara (boksada kavâyi) Timmappanu Kannara-

hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvakadiṃ grâmavanû sarvamanyavâgi koṭṭanthâ grâma (usual final
phrases) maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî

EC 11 Hk 121
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hk121

121 At Nirugunda (same hobli), on a stone near the Siddêśvara temple.


ôm...ôm namaś Sivâya śrî

I.
namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîsvaraṃ Yâdava-
kuḷâmbara-dyumaṇi samyaktva-sûtra-chûḍâmaṇi Maleparoḷ gaṇḍa Poysaṇâdy-anêka-nâmâvaḷi-samâ-
ḷaṅkṛita-samêtaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla Vîra-Gaṅga-Hoysaṇa-Dêvar uttarôtara-pravarddhamânam
â-chandrârkka-târam-baraṃ saluttam ire Gaṅgavâḍi-tombhattâr̤u-sâsiramaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-
pratipâḷanaṃ geydu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ gêyvuttam iralu Saka-varushada ↓1987 neya
Naḷa-saṃvatsrada Puśya-sudha-pañchamî-Bṛihavâra-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrântiyandu samasta-vasumatî-
taḷa-khyâtaṃ Gaṅgânvaya-prasûtaṃ Koṅguḷivarmma dharmma-mahârajâdhirâja vandi-jana-kal̤pa-
bhûja Kôḷâla-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ vîra-Mahêsvaram mada-gajêndra-lâñchhanaṃ viniyôga-kâñchanaṃ
Padumâvatî-dêvî-labdha-vara-prasâda mṛigamadâmôdaṃ nanniya-Gaṅgaṃ jayad-uttaraṅga Gaṅga-
kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ Gaṅ[ga]-Gâṅgêyaṃ kavi-gamaki-vâdi-vâgmi-priyaṃ Śîva-pâdârâdhakaṃ
para-baḷa-sâdhakaṃ gaṇḍa-prachaṇḍaṃ kôdaṇḍa-Pârthaṃ para-baḷa-dhûrttan êkâṅga vîran âhava-
sûra śaraṇâgata-vajra-pañjaraṃ vayiri-dik-kuñjara(m)n âhava-jattalaṭṭaṃ vayiri-gharaṭṭaṃ para-nârî-
[page 220]sahôdaraṃ vîra-Vṛikôdaraṃ samasta-nâmâvaḷi-samâḷaṅkṛita-samêtaṃ śrîmanu-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ
Gaṅgarasaru Arabalav-eppattumaṃ mêlâḷke-manneya-sahitaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-sishṭa-pratipâḷana-
dind âḷuttam ire |

II.
Naṅgali Koṅgu Siṅghamale Râyapuraṃ Taḷakâ ḍu Roddav â- |
Cheṅgiri-vâse Koḷḷagiri Baḷḷare Valluru Chakragoṭṭav U- |
chchaṅgi Virâṭanaṃ-poḷalu Baṅkapuraṃ Banavâse Kôyatûr |
tuṅga-parâkramaṃ negaḷda-vikraman î-kali-Vishṇuvarddhanaṃ ǁ

ant-âtan-agra-tanûja-Narasiṅgha-bhûpâḷakaṃ |

III.
dêvô Dêvagirîndra-rundra-śikhara-byâkîrna-kîrti-dhvajô
dêvaś chaṇḍadharôgra-tâpa-mahimâva .. bha-Laṅkêśvaraḥ |
dêvô bhabya-vidagdha-mudgha-sudatî-prakhyâta-Mînadhvajô
dêvaś śrî-Narasiṅgha-bhûpatir asau jîyât sthiraṃ bhûtaḷê ǁ
śaradhi-byâvêshṭitôrvvîpatiy enisi sukhaṃ bâḷge chandrârkka-târa(mbara)ṃ |
Surarâjaṃ lîleyindaṃ Yadu-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ vîra-saṅgrâma-Râmaṃ |
piriduṃ vikrântadindaṃ nija-vijaya ...... bhûmaṇḍaḷêśaṃ |
Narasiṃhaṃ bhûmipâḷaṃ sthira-...... lakshmî-vallabhaṃ Hoysaḷêsaṃ ǁ

âtana tanayana tôḷ-valav ent endaḍe ǁ

IV.
jaya-jâyâ-priya-vallabhaṃ sakaḷa-bhûbhṛin-mastaka-nyasta-pâ- |
da-yugaṃ dôr-vaḷa-dṛiptan apratiman atyaudâri atyûrjitô- |
dayan aty-archchita-vikramaṃ ripu-baḷa-pradhvaṃsa-niśśêsha-nir- |
daya-nistriṃśa-ni .. gaḷaṃ niyamadiṃ Ballâḷa-bhûpâḷakaṃ ǁ
kâḷagadoḷ niśâta-karavâḷa-hatarke hata-prabhaṃ mahî- |
pâḷakar ...... gahanântaramam ........ anya-bhû- |
jâḷiyoḷ irdda paṅgaḷane paṇṇ enal ammade kâi kâyi Bal- |
lâḷa-nṛipâḷa yembudane hambaḷis irddudu vairi-saṅkuḷaṃ ǁ

ant enisida śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Taḷakâḍu-Gaṅgavâḍi-Noṇambavâḍi-Banavase-Hânuṅgalu-
koṇḍa bhuja-baḷa Vîra Gaṅgan asahâya-sûraṃ Sanivâra-siddhi Giridurgga-malla chalad-aṅka-Râma
nissaṅka-pratâpa Hoyisaṇa-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvaru Gaṅgavâḍi 96000 sâsiramumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-
śishṭa-pratipâḷanaṃ geydu Dôrasamudrada nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam
ire ǁ svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêsvaraṃ Yâdava-
kuḷâmbara-dyumaṇi sarvajña-chûḍâmaṇi Malerâja-râja Malaparoḷu gaṇḍa gaṇḍa-bhêruṇḍa kadana-
prachaṇḍan asahâya-sûran êkâṅga-vîra Sanivâra-siddhi Giridurg ga-malla chalad-aṅka-Râma vairîbha-
kaṇṭhîrava Magara-râjya-nirmmûḷa Pâṇḍya-disâpaṭṭa Chôḷu-râjya-pratishṭhâchâryya niśśaṅka-
pratâpa-chakravartti Hoyisaṇa-bhuja-baḷa-vîra-Sômêśvara-Dêvaru sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ
geyvuttam ire ǁ tat-pâdârâdhakaṃ śrîman-Nirugundada Chaṭayya-Nâyakana pratâpam ent endaḍe ǁ

V.
uḍiguṃ siṅghada dâḍeyaṃ chiṭil enal saṅkruddha-nâgêndranaṃ |
poḍeguṃ dôpene mêre dappi kavitarpp ambhôdhiyaṃ kôpadiṃ |
kuḍiguṃ sur̤rane nôḍe nâḍe muḷisiṃ mârânta .......... mâr |
ppaḍeyaṃ Chaṭṭaya-Nâyakaṃ tavisanê saṅgrâma-raṅgâgradoḷ ǁ

ant avara pâdârâdhakar appa ǁ

udayâdrîśaṃ .. dayisum | uditârkana ter̤ade Nallan udayaṅ-geydaṃ ǁ

vara-kîrt .. late parvvi ... dhare diśâ-kûpântarôpântamaṃ ǁ
keḍadali jîrṇṇavâda Siva-sad-gṛihav irdaḍam ... anâdiyin- |

taḍeyade koṭṭu kaṭṭi ner̤e nirmmisi lôkadoḷ îgal îtan .. |

varan ene sanda Lakshmig eṇey â-Masaṇa ...... ryyey âdaḍ î- |
vara nidhi Dêpan agra-tanayaṃ gaḍa Dêvam âkege tamman âdan î- |
dhareyoḷu Nalle-Seṭṭiy enal âkeya nômpiy ad êṃ vichitramô ǁ

pâpaṃ dharma-prarûpan agaṇita-mahimâ- |
ṭôpan ene Nalle-Seṭṭiya |
rûpaṃ ner̤e nôrppa darppaṇaṃ negaḷd irddaṃ ǁ
jaḷadhiya guṇpu Gujja-Goravaṅge karâgradoḷ eydidad ondu mu- |
.. ḷigene Mêru-Mandara .. biṇp enit irppaḍe munna yorvva-gô- |
vaḷigana kaygey ôdud ene Dêpana guṇpuman unnatikkeyaṃ |

svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâna-japa-samâdhi-sîla-guṇa-sampannar
appa ...... rmma-jîyagevu yibbaru Chaṭṭaya-Nâyaka kâlaṃ toḷadu dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭa
dattiy entendaḍe śrî-Siddhanâtha-dêvar-aṅga-bhôgakkaṃ snâna-nivêdyakkaṃ Chaitra-pavitrârôpaṇa-
kkaṃ jîrṇṇôddhârakkav âgi biṭṭa datti (specified) Kalyâṇi-jîyaṅgeu Mâḷe-jîyaṅgeu Nalli-jîyaṅgeu
mûvarige Nalle-Seṭṭiyaru jîrṇṇôddhârava mâḍisi kâlaṃ toḷadu dhârâ-pûrvvakavâgi śrî-Siddha-
nâtha-dêvarige pâtra-pâuḷa-bhôgakkaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa datti (specified) sarvvajña-vîra-Sômêśvara-Dê-
varu Nirugundada mûla-svâmi Gaṅgêsvara-dêvarigevu Siddhanâtha-dêvarigeu agrahârava mâḍu-
valli dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa vṛitti ondu ǁ teṅkaṇa Ayyâvaḷe end enisida Nirugundada Nalle-
Seṭṭi-mukhyavâda samasta-nakhara-mummuri-daṇḍaṅgaḷu Siddhanâtha-dêvarigeu Gaṅgêśvara-dêva-
rigeu koṭṭa santheya âya (here follow details, and usual final phrases and verses) śrî-Siddhanâtha ....

jîyanu svarggastanâgalu â-stâna tavuḍi âgalu paṭṭa-maha-deviyara maga Chôḷayyaṅgeuṃ âtana maga-

[page 222]dêvara sthâna .. â-vṛi ...... ashṭa-bhôga-têja-sâmya-sahita saluvantâgi tatu-kâlôchita-kraya ga 32
ranu ........ â-Siddhanâtha-dêvara śilâ-śâsanadalu hinde Siddha-jîya-muntâda sthânikarugaḷa

â-gaṇaṅgaḷa mundevuṃ â-mahâjanaṅgaḷige binnavattaḷeya tanda arasâḷu Mâdeyyaṃ Ballayyaṃ (rest
gone).

EC 11 Hk 123
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hk123

123 At the same village, on a stone in front of the Channa-Kêśava temple.


śrî-Chenna-Kêśavanê gati↓1

I.
Śâkê chandra-rasâmarêndra-gaṇitê varshê Vikâryyâhvayê
pakshê Bhâdrapadasya pôshita-vidhau dvâdaśy-abhikhyê tithau |
vârê Bhûmi-sutasya Vishṇv-adhipatau târê’chyuta-kshmâpatir
datvÂnanda-nidhiṃ dvijân dhanadayan âmôdayan Mâdhavaṃ ǁ
puṇyaughaiḥ paripâlitasya paritô bhûtâḷi-saṃvêshṭitâs
sad-varggais sva-vaśîkṛitasya satatâkrântâ bhujaṅga-vrajaiḥ ǁ
prâptasyâtinava-praśastim adhika-prakhyâta-śauryyâchyuta-
kshmâpÂnanda-nidhêr navâpi nidhayaḥ kiṃ tê labhantê tulâṃ ǁ
Notes
↑1. * In Nâgarî characters.

124 At Chikka-Yagaṭe (same hobli), on a stone to the east of the Îśvara temple.


I.
namas ¿tunga? ⟨tuṅga⟩ -&c. ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara Yâdava-
kulâmbara-dyumaṇi samyaktva-chûḍâmaṇi Malerâja-râja Malaparoḷu gaṇḍa kadana-prachaṇḍan (asa-)
hâya-śûran êkâṅga-vîra Sanivâra-siddhi Giridurgga-malla chalad-aṅka-Rama nissaṅka-malla Hoyi-
saṇa-pratâpa-chakravartti Dôrasamudrada nelevîḍinalu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam
ire ǁ

II.
Chôḷana jûbu Mâḷavana goḷmuri Chêran-aṭṭi-timba mâ- |
kâḷi Varâḷanaṃ tuḷiva gandha-gajaṃ Khachan-aḷḷey-ambu Nê- |
.................................... |
........n emba sambhramavo vairi-nṛipara .............. ǁ

âtana mahimônnatiy entendoḍe ǁ

III.
sakaḷa .. ḷâ .. v Aṅgaja-rûpana nija-bandhu .. |
.. kajana ...... javane Manôja-râjana |
prakaṭita-rûpa .. ahita-braja ... yamma .... |

pogaḷadir anyaraṃ ninage nâlige battuva .............. |
.. gaḷalu ...... nîṃ pogaḷ î-kavi-kalpabhûjanaṃ |
jagadoḷu dâniyaṃ negaḷda Nallana .............. ḍanaṃ |
pogaḷave .... budha-janâśrayanaṃ kavitâ-vinôdanaṃ ǁ
...kula-dîpaṃ ...... |
...dharmma .. rûpan agaṇita-mahimâ- |
.......... ya |
rûpan ner̤e nôrppa darppaṇaṃ negaḷd irddaṃ ǁ
jaḷadhiya guṇpu Gujja-Goravaṅge karâgradoḷ eydid ondu mu- |
.. Mêru-Mandara-biṇpinant irppaḍe munna yorvva-gô- |
[page 223]vaḷigana kaigey ôdud ene .... guṇpuman unnatikeyaṃ |
jaḷadhiyan â-dharâdharada ¿gnṇpuma? ⟨guṇpuma⟩ tiṇpuman entu pôlipeṃ ǁ
guru-kucha-tuṅge dâna-guṇa-bhadre budhâśrita-sîte tâne sach- |
charita-mala-prahâri nija-kêsa-bharôddhata-kṛishṇa-vêṇiy em- |
bara nuḍi .. oppe Vibhu-dêvana vaksha-latâṅkurôdayaṃ |
dhareyoḷu Nalle-Seṭṭiya tanûjeye Dêviye tîrtthav allave ǁ
Sarasijanâbhan-ond-udara-paṅkajadalliya ....... bhâ- |
skaran udayâdriyind udayipantevol î-vibhu-Nalle-Śeṭṭigaṃ |
parama-patibratâ-guṇa ........ ammegav andu puṭṭidaṃ |
vara-guṇi Baychan endaḍ avanaṃ ner̤e baṇṇipar âr dharitriyoḷ ǁ
âtan-anujâtan upamâ- |
tîtaṃ śrî-Sûryya-dêvar embar jjagadoḷ |
jyôtiy ene negaḷda bhuvanâ- |
khyâtaṃ ... Râma-Laksmaṇaṅg eṇey enipar ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvana-vikhyâta-pañcha-śata-vîra-śâsanarum appa śrîmad-Ayyâvaḷeya ayinûrva-
svâmigaḷa mummuri-daṇḍaṅgaḷolage Noṇambavâḍi-nâḍa-śirômaṇi Vuchchaṅgiya maḷigey-adhishṭâya-
kara appa ...... Seṭṭiya magaṃ Ballâḷa-Nalli-Seṭṭiyaru Hoyisaṇa-nâḍa Arabala-eppattara baḷiya
bâḍaṃ Ekkaṭṭiyalu tamm ayyana hesara Dêmêsvarâyatanamaṃ nirmmisi ǁ

IV.
Vêdabyâsaṃ puṭṭidan |
âdiyoḷ embante Bharata-paṇḍita-nâthaṅg |
âda vadhu Lakshmi-dêvige |
mêdiniyoḷu Viśvanâtha-guru udayisidaṃ ǁ
â-Viśvanâtha-gurugaṃ |
bhû-vadhuviṅg adhikam enipa A .. bekegaṃ |
bhâvakar atichaturar |
Dêvaṇanaṃ Nallan emba yirbbar ttaneyar ǁ

â-Viśvanâtha-gurugaḷa pâda-prakshâḷanaṃ mâḍi Saka-varśada ↓11116 neya Vibhava-saṃvatsarada
Vaiśâkha-śu .. Sômavâradandu Nalla-Seṭṭiyaru Dêmêsvara-dêvargge aṅga-raṅga-bhôgakkaṃ khaṇḍa-
sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakkaṃ nandâdîvige-Chaitra-pavitrârôpaṇakkaṃ tapôdhanar-âhâra-dânakkaṃ
vidyârttigaḷa asanâchhâdanakkaṃ pûjâri .. dhavaśi.. rigaṃ enisuṃ kundade naḍasuvant âgi dhârâ-
pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭa ¿bhümi? ⟨bhûmi⟩ (here follow details of gift, and usual final phrases and verses) .....
nig illa posa-muttugaḷo ............... Dêpa bereda posa .......int î-śâsanaṃ kaṇḍarisidaṃ
rûvari ...

Notes
↑1. * So in the original.
EC 11 Hk 125
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hk125

125 At Kallakere (same hobli), on a stone to the north of the Hanumanta temple.


śubham astu svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśa 1457 neya vartamâna-Jaya-saṃvatsa-
rada Mâgha-ba 14 Śivarâtri-puṇya-kâladalu śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâ-
pa śrî-vîra-Achuta-Râyana karaṇîku Tiragarasaru Banada-Chauḍêśvariya amṛitapaḍige koṭa Kalake-
r̤eya dharmma-śâsanada kramav ent endare Achyuta-Râya-mahârâyarige anêka-râjyâbhyudayav
âgabêk endu Jayakâr̤a-Râmapayana mâgaṇige saluva Bûdihâḷa-sîmeya vaḷagaṇa Kallaker̤eya-
grâmavanu hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvakavâgi â-Kallaker̤eya-grâmada gade-bedale-suṅka-uṇḍige-
muntâgi śrî-Banada-Chauḍêśvariya amṛitapaḍige Kallaker̤eya-grâmavanu koṭevâgi â-grâmada
chaumûlege saluva-gadde-bedalanu nâvu Achyuta-Râya-mahârâyarige sakalâbhyudayav âgabêk endu
âtana maneya Jayakâr̤a-Râmappayana kayya Kalaker̤eyanu nâü tri-vâchâ Banada-Chaüḍêśvarige
koṭṭa dharmma-śâsana śrî (usual final phrases).

I.
namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ śrî
yâvach chandraś cha sûryaś cha yâvat tishṭhati mêdinî |
yâvad Râma-kathâ lôkê tâvad râjyaṃ Vibhîshaṇa ǁ
râmâbhirâmaṃ nayanâbhirâmaṃ
śrôtrâbhirâmaṃ vachanâbhirâmaṃ |
sarvâbhirâmaṃ satatâbhirâmaṃ
vandê sadâ Dâśarathaṃ cha Râmaṃ ǁ

adya-tithi-mârttaṇḍa-maṇḍalôdayâd upari Prabhava-saṃvatsarada Chayitra-su 1 Gu sanda Śaka-
varushaṅgaḷu 1308 hindake sanda Kali-yuga-gatâbdaṅgaḷu 4488 Ballâḷasamudrada Kêśava-dêvara
dêvâlyada kalu-gelasa dîpamâleya kalu-kambha pratishṭhe mâḍida-dina pûrvva-paśchima-samudrâ-
dhipati śrî-vîra-Harihara-Râyanu pṛithvî-râjyava mâḍutt iralikkâgi avara maneya manneyaru Châ-
ḷuki Nârâyaṇa Châḷuki chakravartti śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍalêśvara ant-yambara gaṇda gaja-daḷa-bibhâ-
ḍa Mali-Dêviya Vîra-Dêvarasara kumâra Vallabha-Râya-mahârâjara dharmmadali avara nirûpadiṃ
avara manushya Peddarasanu mâḍisidanu â-Vîra-Dêvarâjarige darmma siddisabêk endu mâḍida
dharmma Kêśava-dêvarige amṛita-paḍige saluva gadde (here follow details) yîshṭanû â-chandrâr-
kka dêvara amṛita-paḍige saluvadakke koṭṭa bhûmi yî-dharmmaü sûryya-chandramassugaḷu uḷḷa â-
yîshṭu-kâlavû naḍavudu (usual final phrases and verses) yî-kelasava mâḍida Sirigiri ...... châryyaṅge
arasugaḷuṃ gaüḍu-prajegaḷuṃ oḍambaṭṭu koṭṭadum eṇṭu-koḷaga yand-endigeü salisuvevu âva âva
arasugaḷu bandareü yî-dharmmakke sahâyavâgi pâlisuvaru maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî.

132 At the same village, on copper plates in possession of Jôḍidâr Râma-bhaṭṭa.


(Nâgarî characters)

(Corresponds almost with No. 94 above, as far as ‘dushṭa-śârddûla-marddanaḥ’ in line 65).

I.
vîra-pratâpa-ity-âdi-birudair uchitair yutaḥ |
âlôkaya mahârâya jaya jîvêti vâdibhiḥ |
Aṅga-Vaṅga-Kaḷiṅgâdyair râjabhis sêvyatê cha yaḥ ǁ
stutyaudâryas sudhîbhiḥ sa Vijayanagarê ratna-siṃhâsanasthaḥ
kshmâpâlân Kṛishṇa-Râya-kshitipatir adharîkṛitya nîtyâ Nṛigâdîn |
â pûrvâdrêr athâsta-kshitidhara-kaṭakâd â cha Hêmâchalântâd
â Sêtôr arthi-sârtha-śriyam iha bahaḷîkṛitya kîrtyâ babhâsê ǁ
kṛitavati sura-lôkê Kṛishṇa-Râyê nijâṃśaṃ
tadanu tad-anujanmâ puṇya-karmâchyutêndraḥ |
prakaṭam avani-lôkaṃ sâṃśam êtyâri-jêtâ
vilasati Hari-jêtâ vidvad-ishṭa-pradâtâ ǁ
yat-kîrtti-chandraś charati kshamâyâṃ
tithishv aśêshêshu vivardhatê cha |
tanôti chakrasya mudaṃ samindhê
divâ cha sâyaṃ kumudair virundhê ǁ
[page 226]madaṃ manasi mârutaṃ sithilayaty amêyai rayaiḥ
yad-aśva-paṭalî khuaraiḥ kshiti-rajôbhir utthâpitaiḥ |
ajîjanad iti krudhâ kimu viśôshayaty ambudhiṃ
Bala-pramathanasya nô raya-virôdhinaṃ vâjinaṃ ǁ
kârâgṛihâkalita-vâsa-virôdhi-bhûpa-
dârâvaḷî (III a) kara-vichâlita-châmarasya |
râjâdhirâja-para-râja-bhayaṅkaraika-
vîrâdikâni birudâni bahûni yasya ǁ
Gôkarṇa-Saṅgama-Nivṛitti-Suvarṇasamsat-
Śôṇâ.. -parvata-Virañchipurêshu Kâñchyâṃ |
śrî-Kâḷahasti-nagarê’pi cha Kumbhaghôṇê
dânâni shôḍaśa bahûni kṛitâni yêna ǁ
ambhôdêna nipîyamâna-salilô’gastyêna pîtôjjhitas
taptô Râghava-sâyakâgni-śikhayâ santapyamânas sadâ |
antasthair baḍavâmukhânala-śikhâ-jvâlair viśushkô dhruvaṃ
yad-dânâmbu-ghanâmbur ambudhir ahô pûrṇas samudyôtatê ǁ
Aṅgênâpi Kaḷiṅgêna Va .. na cha parair nṛipaiḥ |
jaya jîva mahârâyêty aniśaṃ gîyatê cha yaḥ ǁ
sa jayati narapâlô ratna-siṃhâsanasthaḥ
Vijayanagara-vâsî kîrtya-pûrtyâ vilâsi |
Nṛiga-Naḷa-Nahushâdîn nîchayan râja-nîtyâ
nirupama-bhuja-vîryaudârya-bhûr Achyutêndraḥ ǁ
Śakâbdê Śâlivâhasya sahasrêṇa chatus-śataiḥ |
pañchâśatâ cha saṃyuktaiḥ pañchâbhyadhikayâ kramât ǁ
vatsarê Vijayâbhikhyê mâsi Kârttika-nâmani |
śukla-pakshê cha puṇyâyâm Utthânadvâdaśî-tithau ǁ
Tuṅgabhadrâ-nadî-tîrê Viṭhalêśvara-sannidhau |
nânâ-śâkhâbhidhâ-gôtra-sûtrêbhyaḥ śâstra-vittayâ ǁ
vikhyâtêbhyô dvijâtibhyô vêdavidbhyô viśêshataḥ |
śrî-Hôsaṇa-râjyastha-Yakkaṭîya-vaḷittagaṃ ǁ
Niragundada-sîmântarbhâvaṃ châpi samâśritaṃ |

(here follow names of boundary villages).

II.
Imâmbikâsamudrâkhya-nagarîṃ samupâśritaṃ |
khyâtaṃ Kêtaggere-grâmaṃ sarva-sasya-samanvitaṃ ǁ
(III b) sarvamânyaṃ chatus-sîmâ-saṃyutaṃ cha samantataḥ |
nidhi-nikshêpa-pâshâṇa-siddha-sâdhya-jalânvitaṃ ǁ
akshiṇy-âgâmi-saṃyuktaṃ gaṇa-bhôgyaṃ sabhûruhaṃ |
vâpî-kûpa-taṭâkaiś cha kachchhârâmaiś cha saṃyutaṃ ǁ
putra-pautrâ libhir bhôgyaṃ kramâd â-chandra-târakaṃ |
dânasyâdhamanasyâpi vikrayasyâpi chôchitaṃ ǁ
svâmi-kârya-dhurîṇasya svâdhîna-naya-sampadaḥ |
sûrya ...... sûryasya sûnṛitâlâpa-śôbhinaḥ ǁ
(Tirmalârya)-putrâya dharma-marmârtha-vêdinaḥ |
Timma-Nâyaka-vârâśi-svar-maṇîbhavad-âkṛitêḥ ǁ
Haḍappa-Baiyapêndrasya tapaḥ-phala-satâṃ-nidhêḥ |
(vihitañjali)-bandhasya vijñaptim anupâlayan ǁ
[page 227]parîtaḥ prayataiḥ snigdhaiḥ purôhita-purôgamaiḥ |
vividhair vibudhaiś śrauta-pathikair adhikair girâ ǁ
Achyutêndra-mahârâyô mânanîyô manasvinâṃ |
sahiraṇya-payô-dhârâ-pûrvakaṃ dattavân mudâ ǁ
khyâtê grâmê chatus-trimśad-vṛittîr atra samâśritê |
vṛittimantô vilikhyantê viprâ vêdânta-pâragâḥ ǁ

(here follow names and other details of vṛittidârs).

(Va)
III.
pûrayatô budha-vâñchhâṃ
vârayatô vairi-bhûpa-chitta-madaṃ |
Achyuta-vihita-vibhûtêr
Achyuta-Râyasya śâsanaṃ tad idaṃ ǁ
Achyutêndra-mahârâya-śâsanêna Sabhâpatiḥ |
abhâṇîn mṛidu-sandarbhaṃ tad idaṃ tâmra-śâsanaṃ ǁ
Achyutêndra-mahârâya-śasanân Mallaṇâtmajaḥ |
tvashṭâ śrî-Vîraṇâchâryô vyalikhat tâmra-śâsanaṃ ǁ

(usual final verses).

136 At Honnekere (same hobli), on a stone near the Kallêśvara temple.


śrî ôṃ
I.
namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

svasti samasta

II.
aḷaviyoḷ erddu pâyda puliyam muni hoy seḷeyinda tat-kshaṇaṃ |
seḷeyoḷ aḍarttu poyye seḷeyaṃ negapalk atichitrav âdud â- |
seḷe-koneyalli nêlva puliy ettida sindam enalke kîrttiyaṃ |
taḷarda Saḷaṅge Poysaṇa-yasa prakaṭîkṛitav âytu lôkadoḷ ǁ
śrîmat-Poysaṇa-chakravartti Vinayâdityâvanîśaṃ yaśaḥ- |
prêmaṃ śrî-Yer̤eyaṅga-Dêvan avariṃ śrî-Vishṇu-bhûpâḷakaṃ |
bhûmîśaṃ Narasiṃha-chakri baḷa[va]d-Ballâḷa-bhûpaṃ jayô- |
dyô .. ṃ śrî-Narasihva-Râyan ivariṃ śrî-vîra-Sômêśvaraṃ ǁ
śrî-Sômêśvara-chakrigaṃ vara-jaya-śrî-Bijjalâ-râṇigaṃ |
bhû-saubhâgya-nidhânan ûrjjita-baḷaṃ śrî-Nârasihvaṃ jayâ- |
vâsaṃ Vâsava-têjan udbhava[....]sâhitya-sarvajñan emb |
â-sampatti dharitriyoḷ pasarisal bîrâvatârôrjjitaṃ ǁ
.. ya na.. nâtha Kêsara- |
Râya ...... kîrttig-âvaha-bhûpaṃ |
râya Kali-kâlan abhayaṃ |
râyaṃ śrî-vîra-Nârasiṃhva-nṛipan ǁ
[page 228]ari-kari-siravaṃ sîḷv î- |
Narasiṃhage râṇi Paṭṭamaha-dêvige tâṃ |
piriduṃ janisida vîranu |
dharaṇipa-(śrî)-Ballâḷa-Râyan udayaṅ-geydaṃ ǁ
â-nṛipan udayaṅ-geyda .. |
â-nṛipar âna .. di bharadi yeḷe-mukhak (iḷiyal) |
kânana-nivâsa.. mag inn |
ê-vidhiy end aḷki naḍuguvar bhûpâḷar ǁ
kaṇḍavara kâ .......... |
.......... toṇḍu-nṛipâḷar |
daṇḍama .... jêndran âhava- |
gaṇḍaṃ bhêruṇḍa-vîra-kali-Ballâḷan ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâsrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ ...śrî-vîrâvatâraṃ paramês-
varaṃ parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ Yâdava-kuḷâmbara-dyumaṇi sarvvajña-chûḍâmaṇi Malerâja-râja Malapa-
roḷu gaṇḍa gaṇḍa-bhêruṇḍa kadana-prachaṇḍan asahâya-śûra êkâṅgi-vîra Sanivâra-siddhi Giri-
durgga-malla chalad-aṅka-Râma vairîbha-kaṇṭhîrava Adiyamana Yama ...... Kâñchî-kâñchana
Chôḷa-Râya-stâpanâchâryya Pâṇḍya-Râya-pratishṭâchâryya Magara-Râya-nirmmûḷa Châḷukya-kuḷôd-
bhavarum appa Hoyisaṇa-śrî-vîra-Ballâḷa-Dêvarasaru .. Mâdigi-Dêva-daṇṇaykaru Dôrasamudrada-
neleviḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire ǁ svasti yama-niya[ma]-svâdhyâya-
dhyâna-dhâraṇa-mauna-anushṭhâna-japa-tapa-samâdhi-sîla-guṇa-sampannaruṃ aupâsanâgnihôtra-
dvija-guru-dêvatâ-pûjâ-tatpararuṃ Mârkkaṇḍôjvaḷa-kîrtaruṃ yajana-yâjana-adhyana-adhyâpana-dâna-
pratigraha-shaṭ-karma-nirataruṃ Rig-Yajus-Sâma-Atharbbaṇa-vêda-vêdânta-Prâbhâkara-pravîṇa-gu-
ṇa-sampannarum enisida śrîmat-sarbba-namasyada mahâgrahâraṃ śrîmad-Udubhava-Sômanâthapurav
âda Nirugundada śrîmatu yinnûr̤-ippattu-mahâjanaṅ[ga]ḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyut-
tam ire ǁ Gaṅgavâḍi-tombhattâr̤u-sâviradoḷagaṇa Arabal-eppattar̤oḷage prathama-sthaḷa Honneya-
ker̤eya gauḍagaḷa kîrtti-prabhâva(ne)m ent endaḍe ǁ râya-dûsakara gaṇḍa mâvan-aṅkakâr̤a mar̤ey-
okkara kâvaru ǁ

III.
Sôma ↓1Himâbdhig unnata |
Sôman asaha-k(h)aḷigaḷoḷage sâhasôttuṅgaṃ |
Sôma sadu-kîrttig atisaya- |
kshêmaṃ kânt enipa nalla Abhinômallan |
yinduvina sakaḷa-k(h)aḷegaḷa |
sandôha-śrî-Lakshmiy-udayad udarâtmaja .... |
bandhu-jana-vandya Kṛita-yugad- |
andina châritra-mallan Abhinômallan ǁ

Honneyaker̤eya śrî-Prasanna-Mallinâtha-dêvara divya-śrî-pâda-padmârâdhakaru śrî-guru-charaṇa-
karu[ṇa]dind udbhavisida Honneyakeṛeya maha-maneya Sôma-gauḍana arddhâṅgi-lakshmi Lakha-gau-
ḍiya udaradalli janiyisida guru-bhakta-niruta satya-Mahêsvara Siva-pâda-sêkhararum appa Malli-
gauḍa mâḍida dharmma ǁ Śaka-varsha 1228 neya Parâbhava-saṃvatsarada Pushya-bahuḷa 5 mî-
Sômavâradalu Makara-saṅkrântiyalu śrî-Prasanna-Mallinâtha-dêvarige aṅga-bhôgakkaṃ raṅga-bhô-
gakkaṃ amṛitapaḍigaṃ dhûpa-dîpa-naivêdyadkaṃ nandâ-dîvigegaṃ biṭṭa datti (here follow details
of this and other gifts, and usual final verses.) śrî-Prasanna-Mallinâtha-dêvara śâsanava barada âchâri
Yêchôjana maga Sidôja-Sômôjaṅgaḷige maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî

Notes
↑1. * So in the original.
EC 11 Hk 137
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hk137

[page 229]137 On the same stone.


Parâbhava-saṃvatsa[ra]da Âsvayija-suddha 11 Sômâradalu svasti samasta-bhuvana-vikhyâta-pañcha-
sata-vîra-sâsana-labdhânêka-guṇa-gaṇâ[la]ṅkrita satya-saucha-châru-châritra-naya-vinaya-vijñâna vî-
râvatâra Vîra-Baṇañju-sameya-dharmma-pratipâḷakarum app Arabal-eppattar̤a Seṭṭi-guttaru paṭṭaṇa-
svâmi-gavuḍu-stânikaru halaru hadineṇṭu-sameyaṅgaḷu koṭṭa sâsana-kramav ent endaḍe Honneya-
ker̤eya Mâra-gavuṇḍaṅge nâḍa-heggaḍetanavaṃ koṭṭevu 40 vûriṅge vond-on[du] paṇa 30 vûriṅge aḍa
aḍa santey-âya-muntâgi koṭṭevu yint-appudakke nâḍa sva-hastad oppa śrî-Gavar̤êsvara ǁ śrî-Pra-
sanna-Mallinâtha-dêvarige heggaḍe-Mâra-gavu[ḍa]nu dîpâḷigeyali dîptige pa 1 r̤a yeṇṇeyanu
varshaṃ-prati naḍasuvanu śrî śrî

EC 11 Hk 141
DHARMA ID: INSEC11Hk141

141 At Chikka-Jâjûr (Baramaṇṇanâyakandurga hobli), on a stone in the Îśvara temple west of the village.


śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ | śubham astu śrî-Sadâśivâya namaḥ svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-
śaka-varuśaṅgaḷu sâ 1586 neya Krôdhi-saṃvatsarada Vayiśâkha-sudha 3 Sômavâradallû | śrîmatu
Jâjûra staḷada gavuḍugaḷû Lôkarasa-gaüḍana maga Râmaṇa-gauḍana maga Puṭṭappaya (others
named) muntâdavarû nâü namma strî-putra-jñâti-dâyâdya-sâvantânumatadiṃ namma avasara-nimit-
yavâgi Hâlattihâḷa Basavaṇṇana pûjâri pañcha-maṭha ......maga Guruvaṇṇanavarige kraya-patravâgi
sale mârâgi koṭa vivara Jâjûru-grâma 1 Kôṭehâḷa-grâma 1 ubhayaṃ yî-yaraḍu-grâmada gauḍikênu
sale mârâgi koṇḍa kraya ga 200 yinnûru-varaha aksharadallû yi(ve)nûru-varaha niü nimma putra-
pautra(ṃ)-parampareyâge â-chandrârka-sthâyigaḷâgi anubhavisi yirriy endu koṭa patra-sâsana (here
follow names of witnesses).
